reviewText: pros: Great location. We could see the sea from our balcony! Staff were friendly and organised airport transfer and a trip to Benagil caves. The interior design of this hotel is lovely. Housekeeping is fabulous and the rooms are clean and comfortable cons: Nothing to dislike here. A bar would be great but I think that is in the pipeline
pros: Tout cons: T’as
pros: Clean and comfortable cons: Queuing for coffee

pros: hotel was spotlessly clean and breakfast was adequate. cons: they advertised a bar but that turned out to be a fridge where breakfast was served and I couldn't buy a beer. thought this was strange and when I arrived I was told the pool would be shutting for renovation 2 days later.

pros: Beautiful hotel  very good location with a 1 minute walk to a great beach. Breakfast is very nice  we had a room with ocean view. Employees are super sweet.
In summary: a perfect holiday destination cons: Nothing everything was super. Only 1 comment the pillows are not the best for me personally.
pros: The hotel room and facilities were excellent and close to beach and restaurants and bars. cons: Parking garage was tightest garage I have been in my life.
pros: Friendly staff and great location. The swimming pool area was always clean. cons:
pros: Everything cons: Nothing
pros: Hotel is very new and beautifully decorated very clean and in a good location very close to a lovely beach staff were amazing I would definitely recommend it. cons:

pros: the hotel was very clean and modern water and coffee in the room breakfast was ok cons: you could hear everything your neighbors are doing: talking turning the light switches going to the toilet

pros: My stay was perfect from the moment I arrived. The staff were friendly and helpful. The room and facilities were very clean and stylish. I also enjoyed having breakfast each morning. Additionally the location was perfect! 50 mins from the airport 5 minutes from the beach 10 minutes to the strip where all the bars and restaurants were. I would definitely recommend staying here! cons: You could sometimes here noise from the other rooms and street.
pros: Such a convenient Clean property very kind staff :) straight to the point hotel ! cons:

pros: Property was exceptionally clean and had cleaners come to clean rooms every morning. Great location right next to the beach and the strip for bars/clubs. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay! Breakfast was also very lovely and staff were welcoming and lovely. cons: Complaints from visitors about noise which was quite annoying as was on a party holiday.
pros: Room is clean and new with a little balcony. Breakfast start from 7am which is a bonus. cons:

pros: We loved this hotel can definitely recommend. Nice clean comfortable very friendly and helpful personnel very good breakfast. The nearest beach is just a couple of minutes away (their beach towels are great btw ask the reception if you need one they don't seem to offer them in the room by default). They also have an underground garage for a reasonable extra price if you have a car (there are free parking places in the area as well but rather limited and we found it very convenient with the garage). cons: I don't think it has a gym (at least we didn't see any). The balcony in our room was small and facing the road and the noise didn't make it so pleasant to sit there but you do get a little bit of ocean view. It doesn't spoil the overall good impression.
pros:  cons: Breakfast might have been better.

pros: Location is perfect close to the beach.
Breakfast was superb.
Staff is very kind and helpful. cons:
pros: Amazing room kind and helpful staff great housekeeping cons: everything was amazing
pros: Location and breakfast cons:
pros: This place was upscale and very comfortable.  The staff was very friendly and accommodating and the breakfast was awesome. cons: The only thing that they couldn't control the weather!
pros: good hotel friendly staff good location cons: no remarks
pros: Breakfast area too small for number of guests. Always queue for coffee machine. Beans always cold. cons: As above comments.

pros: Close to the beach very good staff they provide gym vouchers for first time in a local nearby gym. Inside was overall clean and new. cons: During 3 day stay shampoo shower gel got empty and we had to ask sepparately for refill. One time we were provided dirty towel and bathrobe. However - these problems were solved very quickly. So once again the staff was very good. The beds were not too comfortable and the street side was a little bit too noisy. Breakfast was good but had no variety.
pros: Very clean cons: Coffee machines in dining room were hopeless..  Always a queue and  extreeeeeemely slow
pros: I did enjoy breakfast but very busy in morning in dining area. cons: Did not see a bar area when there? Balcony very small but great view of pool area.
pros: Perfect location. Parking available. Functional rooms with well placed AC. Hard beds. cons: Too small bathrooms. Late cleaning of rooms. Crowded breakfasts with ok selection of food.

pros: Nice and stylishly furnished rooms comfortable bed good location cleanliness very nice attentive and polite staff. It's good that the hotel has its own swimming pool. cons: If they want to improve the excellent standard they can offer a wider selection of breakfast - but this is really just a comment that is not absolutely necessary.
pros: Beautiful & modern. Extremely close to the beach & this was very convenient for AfroNation. The staff are quite friendly & helpful. cons: Nothing. Everything was up to to par.
pros: Everything about the hotel was amazing very new facility and the entire staff were wonderful friendly and amazing. Definitely my best hotel stay so far cons: Nothing

pros: Nice modern rooms! Nice coffee machine. cons: Breakfast area is too small leading to long queues and crowding of buffet area.
Bathroom is small.
No privacy in terrace you are literally sharing it with others on ground floor. All terrace rooms are on ground floor. See the pic attached.
pros: Clean and classy cons: The breakfast could have been better
pros:  cons: Parking garage was way to small. Would not recommend using it and it should be advised before charging customers for its use and charging them for it. Staff would not offer a refund

pros: It was not what was expected for a 4-star hotel cons: Despite the cleaning not being up to the desired standard but the staff's disregard/neglect  for something obvious the air conditioning that didn’t work resulting my family spent 4 nights without sleeping was shocking.

pros: The room was nice with enough space.
The swimming pool was very good and there was good facilities such as showers and WCs available. cons: The hotel is clearly understaffed with people from reception having to clean tables during breakfast when too many guests are coming down at the same time. Also there's not enough room for many guests because the breakfast area is too small for the hotel capacity and a line is formed with delays of up to 20 mins to get some breakfast (line is also formed even for getting coffee once you get your table).
Room cleaning is very poor as they claim they clean them from 15.00 to 18.00 which is crazy because if you went to the beach or on a tour and want to take a shower and have a nap you might get caught by the cleaning staff.
They also have skipped or poorly made our room more than once during our stay leaving dirty cups and trash not taken away unmade beds not changed towels etc. We had to complain more than once and they even got the face to tell us that we left the "do not disturb" sign when we clearly left the other "please make the room" (both signs have the same color on both sides of the card which calls for this kind of trouble if staff misread them).
Lastly we selected a Queen size bed and they gave us a Twin beds instead (they do not make that clear here in Booking like other hotels do) and when we told them they said that they don't have queen size so the publishing of the rooms is either wrong or misleading. On the same line the advertised "room service" does not exist as they only offer coffee or small beverages and not really food to serve on the room or anything like that.
On a final note during checkout we gave this feedback again and they only offered a 5% discount for our next stay... Considering the poor service provided for a 4 star hotel and that we aren't ever going back I'd say is a cheap tactic with low risk for them to save face.
pros: Muito aconchegante e limpo os funcionários são muito simpáticos o pequeno almoço da manhã é excelente com uma grande variedade. Recomendo. cons:

pros: La cercanía a la playa cons: Reserve dos habitaciones con dos camas y cuando llegamos nos las habían cambiado porque nos dijeron les había llegado un grupo grande y necesitaban nuestras habitaciones así que nos dieron dos con camas de matrimonio llego con dos niños de más de 180 cada uno y me los ponen en cama de matrimonio de 135 y nos dicen que creen que no pueden hacer nada porque están completos al final logramos que al menos una de las habitaciones la cambiaran.
Pero pienso que no pueden cambiar por su cuenta una reserva porque luego les llegue un grupo que quieran poner todo junto y no tengan más espacio.
Encima ese grupo llegaba al día siguiente.
La gestión de reservas un desastre.

pros: Bom café da manhã. cons: Quando ia pegar café ou outros produtos batia a cabeça nos abajures em cima da mesa acho que esses deveriam estar mais altos. Máquina do café sempre apresentava um problema.
pros: Localização simpatia dos funcionários e decoração cons: A garagem
pros:  cons: El parking con muchas columnas....difícil aparcar

pros: Fantástico!! limpeza conforto proximidade dos principais pontos custo/benefício excelente. café da manhã super top. Andreia a gerente  pura simpatia. viajamos em família em três casais maravilhoso. com certeza um dia voltaremos. cons: Do mau tempo...rsrsr

pros: Muy buen hotel cómodo y buenas calidades de las instalaciones. Muy cerca de la playa. cons: La verdade que los desayunos tienen mucho que mejorar colas para el café todo muy estrecho y tuvieron muchos problemas y desafortunadamente parecían no saber gestionar la ocurrencias. Mala experiencia por las mañanas espero mejoren con más variedad de desayuno y gestión.
pros:  cons: A luz de emergencia dentro do quarto atrapalhava o sono

pros: cafe da manha
localizacao cons:
pros: Localización y personal amable cons: La piscina estaba cerrada por obras
pros: En general todo cons: Nos a encantado todo

pros: El trato del personal fue muy agradable el desayuno del buffet era muy variado y de muy buena calidad y por último la habitación era justo lo que muestran además de que tenía un balcón muy coqueto cons: La cama era un poco dura
pros: Tudo confortável tudo estava incrível cons: Nada a reclamar estava tudo impecável

pros: El desayuno estupendo variado y fresco todo. Riquísimo. 
La ubicación para mí fue perfecta justo al lado de las playas mas bonitas y menos llenas de gente. 
Todo muy moderno muy limpio y el personal super amable. Si vuelvo allí no buscaré otra cosa. Me encantó cons: .
pros: La ubicación muy buena cons: La zona de la piscina es chiquita creo k debería tener más espacio para que la gente se anime más…
pros: La amplitud y comodidad de la habitación y el desayuno. Personal muy amable. cons: Lo único a lo  que le puedo poner pegas es que quizás el baño debería ser un poco más grande.
pros: Me encantó cons: Me gustó todo por poner un pero le falta un gym

pros: O hotel em si  decoração tudo impecável. E os empregados incansáveis em ajudar e super simpáticos todos sem exceção ☺️.Adorei e voltarei sem dúvida . Os pequenos almoços bons e o cozinheiro sempre atento e prestável para não faltar nada. cons:
pros: tudo cons: nada
pros: El desayuno justito y la estancia para ello pequeña cons: El habitáculo del desayuno pequeño y el bufet justo
pros: la ubicación y el hotel estaba como nuevo cons: por decir algo el desayuno un pelin escaso en dulces y un poquito más de variedad
pros: Muchas cosas la limpieza el confort de las habitaciones y camas sobretodo. Todo muy nuevo y decorado con gusto. cons: Por decir algo. No tiene parking en el mismo edificio.
pros: O hotel  tem um design moderno  muito bonito amai.😀 cons: Nao desgostei  de nada .
pros: El hotel está nuevotodo muy limpiomuy buena ubicaciónretirado del bulliciopero a 5 minutos andando del ocioal lado de la playa cons: En el desayuno habia poca variedad
pros: De tudo cons: Nada a apontar
pros: El hotel es acorde a las 4 estrellas cons: Todo bien

pros: Gostei bastante do conforto da cama hotel foi renovado há pouco tempo e está bastante bem decorado e moderno. 
O pequeno almoço era rico e completo sempre com fruta rica e saborosa com excelente variedade de outros produtos. cons:
pros: Nos encantó todo el hotel los detalles la decoración la limpieza el trato del personal… volveríamos sin dudarlo. cons: Todo estuvo fenomenal no hubo nada que no nos gustara.
pros: Hotel muy nuevo cons:

pros: Muy bien decorado 
Buen desayuno y buena ubicación cons:
pros: Su limpieza todo estaba muy nuevo cons: La espera para los desayunos mucho tiempo esperando solo 1 hora abierto el desayuno para tanta gente: deberían gestionarlo mejor
pros: En Desayuno especialmente Señorita CATI fue muy amable y en mostrador turuno de noches Sr. Francisco quiero agradecer muchos cons:
pros: Gostamos de tudo em geral o quarto muito limpo todos os dias a simpatia dos funcionários o pequeno almoço muito bom muita variada. A localização boa. cons:
pros: Buena ubicación limpio y buenas instalaciones. cons: Piscina pequeña y poca variedad en el desayuno.

pros: El hotel es muy bonito y está bien ubicado. Las habitaciones cuentan con todas las comodidades. El desayuno es súper completo y delicioso. cons: Si bien en general el personal es amable no todos han sido así. Algo llamativo en un hotel de 4 estrellas.
pros: Limpieza y amplitud de la habitación. cons: Parking un poco complicado.
pros: Todo cons:
pros: Gostei de tudo no geral quanto ao pequeno almoço é excelente cons: O que menos gostei foi do estacionamento. É um pouco difícil estacionar num espaço tão apertado.
pros: Um Hotel muito limpo com quartos muito agradáveis e um pequeno almoço muito bom com muita variade para todos os gostos. Vamos voltar com certeza 😊 cons:

pros: Pequeno-almoço maravilhoso! Um agradecimento especial ao funcionário do bar na hora do pequeno-almoço pela simpatia e qualidade do serviço!
Um agradecimento especial ao senhor da receção que nos atendeu com tanta simpatia e profissionalismo quando pedimos para extender a estadia por mais uma noite! cons: O bar poderia estar aberto até um pouco mais tarde. Poderiam ser disponibilizados copos para as escovas de dentes nos quartos.

pros: Hotel muito agradável com uma óptima localização e staff de uma simpatia e educação notáveis. Fomos muito bem recebidos e gostámos imenso de praticamente tudo da nossa estadia. A repetir! cons: O meu único reparo talvez fosse para os horários de pequeno almoço que terminam excessivamente cedo para quem procura uns dias de descanso e se vê "obrigado" a levantar tão cedo mas também não é um aspecto que nos fizesse desistir de regressar.
pros: Bien cons:

pros: Excelente localização limpeza ótima as funcionárias da limpeza eram maravilhosas cons: Os funcionários ao pequeno-almoço todos os dias me perguntavam cerca de 3x o número do quarto (cada vez um funcionário diferente) não havia comunicação entre os mesmos

pros: Ubicación estupenda personal amabilísimo e instalaciones renovadas completamente. Casi puedo decir que olía a nuevo! cons: Únicamente si pudiera poner un punto de mejora sería el sistema del secador de pelo en lugar de pulsar haciendo fuerza con la mano todo el rato (se hace muy incómodo) pondría un secador con botón de encendido/apagado al uso.

pros: Absolutamente todo es perfecto es de los hoteles más bonitos que he estado la decoración la limpieza el colchón el parking desayuno todo de 10. Tuvimos un problema con el aire acondicionado y nos cambiaron en seguida de habitación. El año que viene volveremos sin duda! Gracias cons:

pros: El hotel en general muy bien. Es un 4 estrellas aunque a lo que estamos acostumbrados en España es como un 3 estrellas.

Todo lo demás genial. La limpieza de 10. El idioma perfecto. Y la ubicación muy muy buena. Está justo enfrente a apenas 2 minutos a pie de la Prais Do Amado que es una cala que bajando unas escaleras es espectácular.

Sin ninguna duda repetiría este hotel aunque me gustaría que cambiarán el desayuno. Por lo demás perfecto cons: Empiezo con las pegas y es el desayuno buffet. Muy muy escaso y todos los días lo mismo. Hemos estado una semana y no ha cambiado. Por poner alguna pega sería esta. Recomiendo coger solo alojamiento o con desayuno como mucho.
pros: Quartos espaçosos e correspondeu em tudo as nossas expetativas cons: Gostei de tudo
pros: Ubicación al lado playas y zona restaurantes y copas   limpieza  ropa de cama y baño desayuno variado y rico. Acogedor. cons: La piscina. Sin zona verde y demasiado aireada
pros: El desayuno bueno  ubicación muy buena cons:

pros: Excelente hotel instalaciones muy nuevas. Servicio inmejorable y desayuno exquisito.
Cerca de todo buen ambiente y un lugar ideal para desconectar y relajarte.
El hotel tienen parking bajo coste pero merece la pena.
Sin duda repetiremos. cons:

pros: O hotel novo decoração moderna amplo bem iluminado. Quarto super limpinho.
Ar condicionado silencioso
Cama e travesseiros confortáveis otima roupa de cama e banho. 
Banheiro moderno excelente chuveiro boas amenidades de banho: Shampoo Condicionador Creme Corporal
Deixam gentilmente sem cobrança adicional: agua e uma maquina de café para consumo.
Boa localização fácil de estacionar pelas ruas adjacentes ao hotel.
Café da Manhã/Pequeno almoço muito bom a equipe que cuida desse serviço é muito gentil prestativos e atenciosos fizeram toda a diferença. As maquinas de café disponiveis são otimas aumentando ainda mais as opções com: expresso machiatto cappucino chocolate quente. Boa variedade de frutas ovos mexidos. Boa variedade de pães. Um dos melhores cafés da manhã durante as minhas hospedagens por Portugal. 
Equipe da Recepção bem educada também. cons: O estacionamento/garagem oferecido pelo hotel é ruim vagas apertadas dificil de movimentação interna dos veiculos para estacionar a um alto custo por noite. Melhor parar nas ruas proximas.
pros: pequeno almoço muito bom cons: precisa incluir na diária estacionamento para carro
pros: Bom pequeno almço cons: Estacionar na zona não e facil
pros: Hotel muito bonito limpeza impecável quarto excelente tudo muito bom cons: O quarto poderia ter uma cama de casal e não duas de solteiro
pros: Instalações e staff. cons: Falta de estacionamento.

pros: Sitio super recomendable para quedarse en Portimao. Buena ubicación buena atención por parte del personal buena limpieza buen desayuno y buena piscina. Recomendable también si vas en coche (hay sitios gratis cerca) y también si vas con niños. Si volvemos a esta ciudad repetiremos hotel. cons: -

pros: Apesar de não ter sido reservado foi-nos disponibilizado com pagamento adicional o acesso à garagem.
A localização é boa e bastante central.
O pequeno almoço estava bem servido e com bastante variedade. cons: Tivemos que trocar de quarto porque não nos entregaram inicialmente (e conforme reservado) o quarto Twin.
Algo demorado o Check In. Não há estacionamento na porta principal.
pros: Cama confortável cafeteira água grátis limpeza cons: Nada a declarar. Estava tudo a nosso gosto.

pros: El hotel en sí nos ha encantadomuchos detalles que hacen la estancia muy cómoda y la ubicación es perfectaen la playa do amado que es preciosacon un paseo y un chiringuito al lado inolvidables. cons:
pros:  cons: ———

pros: El Hotel parece recién reformado es muy bonito y acogedor. Posiblemente sea el más limpio en el que he estado todos los días nos recogían la habitación y nos la dejaban perfecta. El desayuno no era muy variado pero todo estaba muy rico. El personal muy amable. Sin duda para repetir. cons: Por poner una pega diría que estaría bien un poco mas de variedad en el desayuno. Pero todo lo demás estupendo.
pros: La localización cons: Hacen las habitaciones muy tarde algún día llegamos después de las 15:00 y la habitación estaba sin hacer...
pros: Localização  café da manhã cons: Ter que pagar caução de 30 euros para utilizar toalha de piscina
pros: Decoração  serviços e higiene das instalações. cons:

pros: El hotel está perfecto. Es muy coqueto es nuevo y un 4 estrellas de verdad. Relación calidad precio bien y el desayuno perfecto bueno y variado.
Personal muy amable.
Es verdad que el comedor para el desayuno es chico y me imagino que en julio y agosto será un poco complicado.
Está a 100 mts de la playa. Se puede ir andando al Praia da Rocha ( uns 10/15 “ caminando). 
La única pega es el aparcamiento que prácticamente no tiene y fuera no es fácil aparcar. cons:

pros: El hotel está muy bien ubicado cerca de la playa. 
En los alrededores hay bastantes restaurantes y tiendas.
Las habitaciones son amplias las camas son cómodas bien aisladas del ruido. Perfectas para descansar.
El desayuno es muy completo. cons:
pros: Muy bonito y confortable. Todos los equipamientos necesarios. Personal muy reactivo y amable. cons:
pros: Varanda quarto confortável pequeno almoço e localização. cons:

pros: Da simpatia dos funcionários da recepção.
Do hotel em geral. cons: Pequeno almoço. A má disposição do funcionário do pequeno almoço.
pros: Todo. El hotel es precioso bien decorado y exclente ubicacion limpio rico desayuno. cons: Nada
pros: Su limpieza cons: Las fotos de la publicidad da la impresión que esta frente mar  primera linea y no es asi

pros: Estuvimos dos parejas durante 5 días y la estancia fenomenal. El personal fantástico.... recepción cocina...todo. El hotel superlimpio desayuno habitación piscina...
En general todo perfecto....para repetir cons: Nada
pros: Tudo muito novo limpo e funcional cons: Gostei de tudo

pros: Tudo! O quarto era bastante espaçoso limpo os turcos do banho tinham um cheirinho muito agradável a cama e almofadas eram super confortáveis. O hotel no geral tinha uma decoração muito clean. O pequeno-almoço era fantástico muito variado. cons: Não posso dizer que não gostei de alguma coisa porque gostei de tudo. No entanto sugeria que o horário do pequeno-almoço fosse um pouco mais alargado assim como o do check-out.
pros: Todo muy nuevo y funcional. El trato excelente cons: El precio nos pareció algo alto pero es temporada y está cerca de la playa. No hay posibilidad de todo incluido

pros: Tudo muito limpinho sempre a cheirar muito bem.
Bons pequenos almoços
Boa localização perto de tudo cons:
pros: Perfecto cons:
pros: As instalações e os funcionários cons: O pequeno almoço era pouco variado
pros: Localização. cons: Sala pequeno almoço pequena (em fase de resolução de acordo com os funcionários).

pros: Odio muy limpio y se veía muy nuevo. La habitación bastante amplia los albornoces muy suaves. Muy cerca de las playas y restaurantes pero sin el bullicio de la “calle principal”. El personal muy amable. cons: El parking dependiendo de la plaza en la que aparcases era complicado maniobrar. Quizás tendrían que quitar alguna plaza para facilitar las maniobras.

pros: La cama que era muy comoda  y la gran terraza cons: Que no habia cafeteria 
Solo dan desayunos
La habitacion era bonita pero muy estrecha

pros: Una ubicación excelente la piscina limpiotodo muy cerca las mejores calas del Algarve restaurantes y bares de copas de todo tipo un buen paseo todo el personal del hotel muy atento y especial mención a Andrea muy simpática. cons:

pros: Todos os funcionários eram acessíveis e muito simpáticos. A localização é bastante boa ficando a 2/3min da praia do Amado e a cerca de 10min a pé da praia da Rocha. O chef no pequeno almoço é um amor de pessoa e até sugere confecionar algo caso seja necessário. O hotel teve a amabilidade de fazer um upgrade do nosso quarto o que foi uma bela surpresa. Recomendo a toda a gente! cons: Possivelmente o hotel abriu a pouco tempo e ainda há alguma arestas a limar mas nada que condicione uma excelente estadia. A rede Wi-Fi por vezes falha o que pode se tornar um problema caso tencione trabalhar.
pros: Muito limpomoderno agradávelfuncionários muito simpáticos e prestáveis. Muito perto de tudoda praia do centro. Impecável! cons: Nada a criticar
pros: o espaço e pequenos almoços cons: garagem com difícil acesso e porta do quarto que não fechava corretamente sendo necessário sempre fazer força para fechar a mesma
pros: Localização design funcionários cons: Estava muito caro (provavelmente pelo evento) estacionamento pequeno (mas ao menos tem) só tem um elevador e com aquilo cheio fica difícil descer

pros: La cama cons: Una de las chicas en la recepción no tan agradable  y un comentario desafortunado del señor del desayuno al decir a un cliente  pienso habitual ( ya no hay comida se lo han comido todo) al público o del festival de afronation!...

Un poco estresado
pros: Proximidade da praia! cons: Sala de refeições pequena e com muita gente piscina pequena e pouco prática com acessos pela receção do hotel.

pros: A localização do hotel foi sem dúvida o que mais gostamos tem uma praia em frente não é muito grande mas pode ir para outras lá ao lado que também são relativamente perto. O quarto muito bem decorado e confortável. O hotel também é moderno e bem decorado tudo muito limpo. cons: Os quartos são pequenos principalmente a casa de banho.. Não havia estacionamento porque já se encontrava cheio. Na zona do pequeno almoço também como é muito pequeno e quando está cheio torna-se difícil a circulação. Relação qualidade-preço ficou a desejar é bom para quem vai poucos dias.
pros: Gostei do conforto dos espaços da higiene e da simpatia/atenção de todos os funcionários. cons: Pouca variedade de comida ao pequeno-almoço e falta de estacionamento.

pros: El personal y el trato excepcional. Muy buena plantilla acogedor y todo muy limpio. cons: Lo que menos me gustó o me faltó fue quizás algunas instalaciones o servicios como instalaciones de gimnasio o servicios de bar más tiempo.
pros: Localização e decoração cons: Casa de banho e sala de pequeno almoço muito pequenas
pros: Quarto e vista cons: Pequeno Almoço

pros: A limpeza do quarto o conforto da cama o bom pequeno almoço que tínhamos à nossa disposição os funcionários impecáveis bom terraço e boa vista do quarto. cons: Falta de zonas de entretenimento de inverno( piscina interior jacuzzi ginásio..)
Parque pago por dia com um valor absurdo e os parques gratuitos encontram-se longe do hotel.

pros:  cons: As 7:30 da manhã foi disparado um alarme de emergência não nos foi dada justificação na altura. De manhã ficamos a saber que foi um cliente que acendeu um cigarro no quarto. 
Como tinham um funcionário não qualificado para o desligar naquele momento demoraram imenso tempo a desligar isso foi bastante incomodo porque foi a noite da passagem de ano e não nos foi possível descansar bem. As 9 da manhã alguém bateu a nossa porta e quando abrimos não estava ninguém. 

Nos quartos do resto de chão ouvimos os passos de toda a gente ouvimos conversas..

pros: design moderno e acolhedor decoração simples e prática. Bom pequeno almoço. Muito boa localização muito perto da praia restaurantes e lojas. cons: colchão um pouco rijo e almofadas muito altas. A janela do quarto é estreita o que faz com que o quarto tenha pouca luz durante o dia. A sala do pequeno almoço é muito pequena para a quantidade de pessoas que o hotel aloja

pros: Hotel cómodo perto da praia e funcionários simpáticos e disponíveis. cons: Não servem almoço nem jantar.
O serviço de bar fecha muito cedo.
Espaço para pequeno almoço reduzido.

pros: Como bueno señalar la ubicación que no es a pie de playa pero está bastante cerca. 
La cama cómoda. cons: Muy caro para lo que ofrecen. 
Desayuno con espera por las dimensiones de la sala desayuno muy muy básico la descripción de desayuno muy bueno no es correcta. 
Lo peor el servicio de limpieza He estado con una sábana manchada 3 días y el último ni siquiera entraron a la habitación a limpiar y hacer la cama.

pros: The hotel is quite lovely offering spacious rooms that provide a comfortable and relaxing stay. I especially appreciated the attentiveness and professionalism of the staff who were always ready to assist with any request. a wonderful variety of fresh fruits that added a delightful touch to the morning meal cons: bathrobes provided in the rooms the pool should open earlier than 9 AM and swimming caps should be supplied by the hotel.

pros: Food was excellent fresh and very well present ed.
Pool on roof was lovely
Air con/ heating very efficient and welcome in December
Wi-Fi very good and with no password very straightforward for a non tech person cons: Balcony on my room 408 was tiny and overshadowed by a huge tree...ok for a short December break but not in nicer weather.
Staff were helpful when approached but didn't make any effort to help otherwise....no indication of where pool/spa/bar were located. Also a personal preference....I like corporate image and would have liked staff at least in identifiable polo shirts. Breakfast staff could have been more helpful with machines.
No real bar/coffee shop just a couple of soft chairs.
pros: Clean cosy welcoming cons: Nothing

pros: Staff very helpful and happy.
Food is excellent cons:
pros: Clean beautiful pool and bar area. Staff helpful and friendly. cons: N/a
pros: Just loved this hotel and its staff. cons:

pros: A very nice hotel in a very nice environment. 
We got probably the best weather at least for us at around 23-24°C in late October perfect! 

Really recommend it! cons: The only downside which is not a big deal is that the wellness pool and sauna are small. But for a quick recharge is ok.
pros: The rooftop pool and spa were great breakfast was delicious room is clean and employees very pleasant and competent. cons: Sound isolation in the room is not great
pros: Very stylish and the food was excellent.  The staff were friendly and efficient. cons:

pros: The advantages of this hotel are: a large comfortable room a very comfortable bed cleanliness availability of beach towels freshly squeezed juice for breakfast good location (quite close to the beach and the city center) and a nice lobby at the reception. cons: We definitely did not like the breakfasts. The main and daily dishes were classic English breakfast ingredients. Any sausages beans grilled tomatoes and fried mushrooms are indigestible dishes for someone from the continent. If someone wanted something different they had at their disposal: three types of yellow cheese two types of ham eggs sliced ​​tomatoes and cucumbers. Every day exactly the same poor quality products were served. There was a lack of salads and olives and other local products. The cakes also left much to be desired. The most delicious cookies in Portugal - pasteis de nata - could not be eaten in this hotel. We consider it scandalous in a 4* hotel to serve instant coffee during breakfast. This was the first time we had encountered something like this in Portugal. You had to pay extra for an espresso. We also did not like the arrangement of tables in the hotel restaurant. They are so close to each other that either the person from the next table or people passing by constantly nudge you. When we wanted to sit in quieter places at tables by the window the waiters were very careful not to take a table for four. So we sat at a table for two by a busy passageway while a table for four stood empty.

pros: Great friendly relaxed  vibe and atmosphere. Have been several times before and never fails to deliver. Stayed in the Deluxe Suite this time and loved all the little extras from management. Beach is wonderful and not too busy this time of year(late September). Shame we can't always control the weather late on in the season but a gem of a stay nonetheless. 10/10😊 cons: Am really nit picking now and this is completely personal - but the music at breakfast and dinner was a bit intrusive and was the same playlist everyday all day during our stay - love background music but perhaps mix it up and not all Bon Jovi!! 😄 Thanks
pros: Nice location with great facilities. The hotel was very nice. cons:
pros: Great location clean rooms and staff were friendly and helpful. We would stay again if we are ever in the area cons:
pros: The friendly staff  spotlessly clean  the whole place smelt wonderful excellent spa facilities cons: N/a

pros: Breakfast was excellent great choices 
Location was close to beach and restaurants cons: Nothing

pros:  cons: 1. Mattresses
2. Breakfast was repetitive and pastries were not great quality.

pros: Perfect location great facilities the hotel is practically new bedroom was huge and bed super comfy. Breakfast had a great selection. Staff super friendly and helpful. Only stayed one night as we were passing by but will definitely book again in the future. cons:

pros: A nice and a cosy hotel  very good location. Friendly staff. Nice rooftop pool and a bar. Fresh orange juice served at breakfast. Room was very comfortable with good space. cons: Coffee didn't taste the best.
pros: Very good breakfast high quality cons:
pros: Everything … clean  staff were super friendly and welcoming .. location good and facilities excellent .. couldn’t fault it .. cons: Nothing
pros: Fresh clean and welcoming cons: We didn’t have long enough here
pros: Breakfast is really good many options and great quality. cons:
pros: Very helpful staff clean rooms excellent restaurant. cons: Nothing.
pros: Good facilites cons: Almosr every thing

pros: Lovely hotel great facilities and the food was fresh and delicious. It was my friend's 50th birthday and the hotel arranged a cake and wine which was so lovely. The staff couldn't have been more helpful. cons: The only very minor negative (which actually was also a positive) is the pool. It is on the roof beautiful there is a bar and it is spotless. But it is quite small so some people were unable to use a sun lounger. That said the fact it was small meant that it wasn't overcrowded and was just a wonderful peaceful experience. Oh - book transfers before you get there The taxi from the hotel to airport was eu 100!!! Booking through booking.com was 60.
pros: Modern property with excellent facilities and friendly staff cons: Rooftop pool was freezing cold !!!
pros: Big room and food breakfast cons: Curtain was broken and the towels often old
pros: The overall feel very modern very relaxed cons:

pros: From the front of house staff to the pool staff all very welcoming and so helpful. Our room was upgraded which was an added bonus for us. Thank you. Highly recommend excellent location. Will be returning cons: Nothing
pros: Lovely employee’s lovely breakfast and great location cons: Expected the balcony slightly larger
pros: Nice big bedroom  cons: No water on arrival  tea / coffee / milk was also not given … 2 sachets of coffee on the first day and that was it !!!!
pros: I loved everything about this property cons:
pros: Nice clean hotel. Lovely pool on roof. Good location cons:

pros: Rooftop pool and spa.

My wife had spa package for birthday and loved it.
Hotel delivered champagne and cake for her 60th.  Really special. cons: Spa inside pool closed for repair when I was staying there
pros: The Spa is as the pictures. Very few people so we could enjoy in a nice atmosphere. Sauna is great. cons:

pros: Stayed for 5 nights lovely staff lovely room very clean. We got to use the roof sun deck & pool. Only 5min walk to the beautiful beach of Monte Gordo. Highly recommend this hotel. cons: Nothing to dislike here.

pros: Beautiful hotel and very peaceful. Just a few minutes from the beach. I don’t think it’s very clear from the description online just how close to the beach it is we were very pleasantly surprised! Our room was a very good size huge and comfortable bed. And the rooftop was great lovely view over the sea. We were very happy with our stay. cons: We would have loved for the bar on the roof to be open during our stay we missed it by a day. However the lovely staff at the bar downstairs allowed us to get drinks there and take them up.
pros: Very clean good breakfast great location and very relaxing! cons: Layout for buffet breakfast at busy times.
pros: Quiet cons: Clean

pros: The suite was perfect for us 4. Comfortable and big sofa bed for the kids. Breakfast was good. Reception staff was really nice. cons: They should not charge 2 euros for each proper expresso at breakfast! This is not acceptable in a 4 starts hotel. They had a basic coffee machine but should offer expresso to guests wanting one at breakfast. This is quite standard in Portuguese hotels of this level and price.
pros: Very good staff serving the breakfast. cons:
pros: Hotel staff is very kind and helpful. Breakfast is the best - selection of food is excellent and the best thing is fresh orange juice. Rooms are large and clean. cons: -

pros: Excellent location near running trails and beach. Friendly and helpful staff sizable rooms the restaurant was ok as well and I particularly liked the breakfast. cons: The isolation in the rooms is not that good and you hear the traffic and dogs barking ear plugs recommended.

pros: Nice reception area. Polite staff cons: Bed was very hard and no wall art

We asked if we could have dinner one evening and it seemed a big deal to provide us with the al a carte menu instead of the buffet as we needed to eat for all of our stay each evening to qualify for the buffet. We didn’t mind choosing from the more expensive menu but it was almost taken that we wouldn’t want to do that. 
Bed was extremely hard. Housekeeping did put a mattress topper on the bed which did help a little.
pros: Lovely clean hotel. Great breakfast. Great location. Good value for money out of season. cons:
pros: Food was ok cons: Very crowded on breakfast time

pros: Breakfast was great with fresh orange juice bedroom was large with huge comfy bed spa was great with very warm pool and hotel had free bike hire
Staff were very good and helpful
good location close to woods and beach cons: small things
bad coffee at breakfast
pillows to soft
room a bit boring 
lack of information

pros: Good breakfast room was big and they were great to leave me cake and champagne for my birthday. We were only passing through so did not get a chance to use their spa facilities. Staff at the front desk was friendly and helpful - gave us good recommendations for dinner. cons: I wish they had king size beds instead of just 2 single beds. Decor was ok could be furnished with more to cosy up the room. But just nit-picking - the hotel was good.

pros: The staff was very friendly and professional
Nice breakfast with vegetarian options
Good location close to the beach
Amazing views from the rooftop cons: The water in the jacuzzi was not hot enough and it looked a bit greasy and dirty most of the time. The first night we booked the sauna and when we got there it was already closed.

pros: Large room with balcony fantastic breakfast in lovely restaurant comfy beds good free parking in front of hotel cons: Very poor lighting in room and very difficult to read-these energy efficient bulbs useless
Should have a grab bar in the shower
pros:  cons: no bathrobes in the room to take to the pool
pros: Wonderful housekeeping friendly service nice beds perfect location. cons: It was great no issues.

pros: Light bright modern hotel cons: Ac kept coming on over heating the room

Could save some costs by reducing the heating
pros: everything was attractive and good quality without being too "fancy" or design-y; helpful staff cons: my partner found the jacuzzi not really hot enough to be called a jacuzzi

pros: Large comfy bedroom. Excellent spa included in price jacuzzi sauna pool robes plus Gym. ("rip off "chains take note"). Good breakfast plus the plates are warm for hot items. Very helpful staff  spotlessly clean in all areas. Well worth a visit. cons: A few pictures on the bedroom walls would make it far less institutional in "feel". The shower in a very good bathroom was excellent except it lacked a handrail to assist in gaining access to it. This is dangerous as the base is very slippery. The cost of drinks in the bar/restaurant seemed expensive. Plenty of competition in the area however.

pros: We enjoyed the relaxed atmosphere the facilities and the ever helpful staff cons: Very little to comment on here. If there was one thing they could improve it was the bikes the hotel had available for guests. They needed a good service - at least! We love using bikes so just upgrade them please.
pros: Clean and modern building. View from the room was great and everything was clean. Staff was very friendly. cons: The breakfast could be better
pros: Ontbijt cons: BedCentrale ligging
pros: The staff are so helpful and kind  everything with a smile cons: The hot breakfast food was just warm  actually rather cold

pros: breakfast was awesome and large
best fresh squeezed orange juice ever cons:
pros: Very nice hotel with stylish interior large rooms a spa area friendly staff and a fantastic restaurant. I think it's the best hotel in Monte Gordo. cons:

pros: The staff at the hotel
we’re amazing  I have never meet such helpful and attentive staff cons: Nothing
pros: Great stay as ever. When in that area we always stay in the Prime. Home from home. Excellent service. Excellent staff and facilities. Highly recommended. cons:

pros: Every thing in the hotel was excellentthe best bit was the gym and indoor pool the sauna and jacuzzi also it location to the beach etc was about 300 m but the hotel is located just far enough from the bars etc so as not to disturb your sleep the prime energize also has a pool on the roof with sun loungers around and a bar that I expect is open in summer month's cons:
pros: The price at 52£ was a real bargin cons: Nothing everything was wonderful
pros: Friendly staff good breakfast nice room sunny balcony cons:

pros: We were totally blown away by this hotel. Very intimate with a welcoming reception that is luxurious and comfortable. Its location is towards the back of the town and is very quiet with easy access to the whole town. The spa is superb and can be found on the same level as the reception and consists of an indoor pool with a jacuzzi well-appointed gym and and treatment rooms. There is an outdoor swimming pool which is located on the roof of the hotel and the views are breathtaking especially at sunset. The restaurant is modern spacious and bright. cons: Nothing.

pros: Check in was very good.  Spa and pool are good but not wonderful.  Breakfast was just standard fare warm/hot food kept in heated tureens. Good choice of fresh fruit and cold food.  Could do better in my opinion! cons: Breakfast
pros: the quietness of the shared rooms. cons:

pros: Very good choice for breakfast
Staff always happy to help
Able to collect/drop off towels each day for use at the pool
Location great close to shops and beach cons: Good hotel was fully booked however required 3 sittings for breakfast and sometimel had to wait for a table for 5
Given full capacity limited availability to sit at pool would have like the bar area to stay open to 7pm to relax and have a drink before returning to room to change for dinner...6pm closure in September a little early

pros: The staff at the front desk were exceptionally helpful and accommodating. Well-trained and friendly personalities. Carlos even offered to assist with the luggage and the female staffers were supportive in providing guidance on directions. cons: The food could have been better. We had dinner once in three nights and the breakfast menu was monotonous in presentation and variety. It needed more options and was most often crowded even though the front office staff attempted to segment eating hours.
pros: Lovely room cons: Restaurants very small and busy for breakfast
pros: Great 👍 cons:

pros: Beautiful room with comfortable bed and lovely ensuite.  We had big balcony as we're on corner but generally balconies small. Near to restaurants and bars and beach. Great breakfast cons: Pool area nice with good facilities- bar etc but need to be up early to get space.  Pool on roof of hotel.
pros: Great property all round cons:
pros: Cool design clean and quiet. Nice rooftop swimmingpool area. cons: Staff were a bit aloof.

pros: Everything! The location is great. The hotel is wonderful. The pool is fabulous. Breakfast is good. The staff is very accommodating. From the front reception pool bar and house keeping. Will definitely recommend this place to others. cons:

pros: Breakfast 
 Atmosphere  towels for  beach  drinks of water at reception cons: Nothing
pros: Location and quality cons: N/a

pros: A gorgeous breakfast unlikely the ‘noiser music’ w/ plates cups and whatsoever stuff!
A shortly but comforts room. 
A very much refreshing ‘tank’ in the roofsupposedly cause haven’t used. 
The availability & staff good willing to help. cons: Definitely the car park used policy!

pros: Location beds parking cons: Have to pay for coffee(I don’t mind) but it’s ridiculous have a coffee machine in the bedroom and have to pay for capsules.. and have to tell the time for breakfast… and a bit overpriced for Portugal

pros: Beautiful and clean close to the beach. 
Friendly and helpful staff. 
Family vibe and great breakfast. 
Loved the Rituals cosmetics in the bathrooms. cons: A little expensive but really nice.
pros: Room size and location. Property was very clean. cons: Breakfast could be better and pool was mobbed from early in the day to evening.

pros: Breakfast was great as was location x x cons: Pool was small
And no info on area given

pros: The prime energize is a nice hotel with a good location and with a lovely pool on the roof. The room was big and really clean. The breakfast buffet had everything you need and tasted good! I think this is the best (and most modern) hotel in Monte Gordo. cons: The bath room was a bit outdated and really basic unlike the rest of the hotel. For a hotel like Prime Energize you expect more than this.
pros: Location and pool. Restaurant staff v friendly cons: Tried to check in early and staff not so helpful. Reception could be friendlier!
pros: Excellent staff.great rooftop bar and pool. Also a sauna and indoor pool. cons:
pros: Clean good food and friendly staff cons: Appaling Wi-Fi in my room. Basically we had no Wi-Fi in room 310
pros: price quality ok. cons: swimming pool a bit too small
pros: Breakfast was great loved the outdoor pool at the top. Kids also loved the spa pool in the mornings. cons:
pros: Great breakfast and helpful staff cons:
pros: We always stay at the Primw energize. Spacious room. Easy check in. Good WiFi and nice breakfast. Highly recommended cons:
pros: Breakfast and facilities. cons:
pros: The staff where excellent. Hotel a little expensive compared to others in the area but I think the extra was worth paying cons: Room was fairly small and twin beds compared to double

pros: All the premises were really nice and clean good amenities with rituals products. the weather was a bit chilly so we used the SPA a lot. The breakfast was also really nice with fresh orange juice wit the amazing local oranges. Very close do the beach. cons: The mattresses were not really to our liking a bit too soft.
pros: It was peaceful and the staff were very helpful and the breakfast had a very good choiceleisure facilities were excellent. cons:

pros: Everything very clean and comfortable. I was slightly disappointed breakfast was a buffet I prefer waiter service. cons: Some information about meal times etc  would have been useful. I had to phone reception to ask what time dinner was served and  not having a coffee machine some instructions how to use one would have been helpful.

pros: My stay at this hotel was amazing. It's a very clean environment relaxing view and I absolutely enjoyed every bit of it.  I needed a peaceful and relaxed holiday for my birthday. The hotel surprised me with a birthday cake and prosecco bottle which I taught was a great touch. 
Breakfast was delicious very healthy filling and fresh. We had fresh fruits and juices every day and varieties of pastries hot and cold. They kept on replenishing as it goes until the last minute for breakfast. The staff were very friendly smiley always willing to help and very informative. 
The location is perfect right in the centre of a tourist location surrender by other hotels. 10-15 min walk to the beach a very calm and peaceful and relaxing environment. cons: Everything about this hotel was outstanding. However the gym needs some gym mats and spray sanitising for the equipment.
pros: Everything cons: Nothing

pros: Nice spacious clean room with good air conditioning.
Nice bathroom with a bidet
Good tea & coffee facility in the room with a little fridge
Good hotel location 
Good breakfast & dinner cons: There isn’t enough room around the buffet at breakfast & dinner and also the restaurant space is too small. You don’t need that artificial tree in the middle of the dining room as it makes difficult for people to access their table and the restaurant room is too small anyway for such a big artificial tree. You should put it outside in the terrace as a decoration.
I didn’t like the fact that I had to book for my breakfast the night before.
Also the buffet in the evening quickly runs out of food and one has to wait for the food. The nice dessert run out quickly and was replaced with some yogurt 😕
Finally the coffee is bad…. Can’t you have proper filter coffee and proper teapots!
pros: Easy check in. Great facilities and staff. Indoor pool and sauna. Roof top pool. cons:

pros: The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. The spa was very nice and the booking system means it’s not crowded. They have bikes available to use for free. the breakfast was very nice and food in the restaurant was also good quality. The decor is really pleasant and there’s a nice bar/ lobby area to sit in. The rooms were large with a small balcony and comfortable bed. short walk to the beach and local restaurants. cons: The jacuzzi could have been a bit warmer. The coffee from the breakfast machine wasn’t great (but you can order nice coffee from the bar).
pros: Fantastic outdoor pool cons:
pros: The hotel is very modern and clean. Staff friendly. The Spa is lovely. Location is great. cons: Pillows are uncomfortable.  Ideally you should have a choice of pillows.
pros: It was a brilliant place. Restaurant was fantastic. Great location. Staff really helpful. Free parking on site. All good. cons:
pros: Good size room easy check in. Great choices for breakfast. Fresh orange juice. Good size indoor pool with jacuzzi. Perfect sauna. cons:
pros: Great.food  beautiful comfortable property  great location cons:

pros: In one line from the beginning to the end a fantastic stay. A modern 4 star hotel with all the facilities you would expect from this hotel class; fantastic staff who take excellent care of the guests day in and day out. I'm already looking forward to my stay! cons: The recurring Christmas music... terrible but this is typical of Portugal where people suffer from "Christmas phobia".

pros: Nice clean  smart and modern hotel set in a central location with friendly and helpful staff . Very comfortable and warm room . cons: The only downside was the needless requirement of allocating a time slot for breakfast ( not something you want to do on holiday ) and on top of that being required to sit at a specific table   the dining room never being more than one third full ... maybe a review of this policy in low season might be an idea ?
pros: nice location nice area near the beach. cons: air con was turned off so that was a bit annoying.
pros: Beautiful very modern hotel in a great location close to town center and the beach. I had a great room with ocean view balcony. This is the best hotel in this area. cons: Nothing.

pros: lovely hotel amazing beach walking distance away. good gym spa and pool. cons: Felt out of place as there wasn’t much to do for younger people but that may have been the time of year. massage wasn’t the best considering the price.
pros: very friendly staff really clean good breakfast cons:
pros: lovely modern hotel. good spa. Large room good breakfast and helpful staff. cons: loud dogs barking from nearby properties all day and night. location not great in October.

pros: Comfortable and modern style. Good location and nice facilities (pool spa). cons: No seating in room even though plenty of space for an armchair. VERY slippery shower floor - quite dangerous! Could have been a more varied choice of bread and fruit for breakfast. We found a cockroach in the bathroom …..
pros: The breakfast was delicious.  So much to choose from. cons:

pros: Very nice boutique hotel  rooftop pool with bar area and basement pool and spa  excellent food in restaurant. 

There is private paid for parking available behind the hotel with individual barriers to keep the space for you  there is no street parking nearby and the nearest public parking is very dark and appears not used at night so I recommend paying the €12. per day to park behind hotel. cons: €4. for a cap to swim in basement pool .

pros: We have stayed there for the third time. Again everything was just perfect. Very nice room with a fantastatic ocean view and a beautiful large terrace. Perfect service nice staff good breakfast. The room was equipped with everything you would need for a good stay. Comfortable beds coffee machine coffee tabs and water was refilled daily plus a very good bottle of wine & fresh fruit basket as a welcome gift and on top a bottle of Champagne with sweets for my husbands birthday. Thank you so much for that !!! cons: Nothing we did not like !

pros: Staff were good and very efficient hotel was very clean and immaculate cons: Breakfast was quite poor really constantly running out of basic food stuff like bread baked beans very little choice bacon was processed rubbish like plastic pool area very small and inadequate

pros: nice clean modern hotel with great staff.
convenient clods to the beach. nice staff. cons: a little expensive but it was high season .
pros: Great breakfast pool and comfortable room. Staff were very friendly and accommodating as we were with our baby. cons:
pros: The pool and rooms cons: That the dinner menu wasn't optional and that there was no where to eat at different hours
pros: Everything was fantastic cons: Everything was great...no faults

pros: breakfast 
staff cons: parking

pros: Excellent breakfast a bit of everything The fresh orange juice was delicious.
The food in the restaurant was very good.
The beds and pillows very comfortable and the room had a big terrace.
Staff very friendly.Definitely recommend this hotel. cons:

pros: Fruit very good 
Orange juice was excellent
 Coffee etc v good 
Good choice of fruit cheese ham cons: Bread was a little stale the first day but the weather was exceptionally hot do could have easily dried out
my husband didn’t like the fried breakfast .. mushrooms inedible very chewy 
Powdered eggs .. tomatoes had garlic on bacon chewy  … so I didn’t bother having it
My husband left his breakfast 
The second day he only had yogurt 
Cake choice was very limited but the continental breakfast was really good

pros: The breakfast was delicious and really well organised 

The rooftop pool was beautiful and a lovely escape from the heat 

The staff were really friendly and accommodating cons: The indoors pool was small and required a booking which wasn’t as appealing as the rooftop
pros: ALL GOOD cons:
pros: food bed location cons:
pros: Everything was perfection and the staff was absolutely amazing and accommodating!! cons: nothing
pros: Has a very good location. The room was comfortable quiet. The balcony was also a very good plus. cons:

pros: Everything!!!
Amazing staff and installations.
Keep the wonderful work. cons:
pros: Modern and clean. good access to facilities cons: Room was a little small

pros: Spacious room comfortable bed friendly staff walking distance to beach. Champagne and cake a wonderful touch on my birthday. cons: No towels for pool/beach available until 4:00 pm our first full day—waste of a pool/beach day.
pros: Amazing hotel nice rooftop swimming pool :) great breakfast and great staff at the reception cons: nothing
pros: Good atmosphere friendly staff. Great location close to but not on the seafront. cons: Spa hadn't opened yet. Queue for breakfast took a while.
pros: Room was clean and well outfitted. Staff was very friendly. Breakfast was very good. cons: Beds were not very comfortable. Dinner at the restaurant was disappointing and a bit expensive
pros: fantastic location close to the beach and shops very clean and safe free parking great price attentive and friendly staff amazing rooftop bar and pool. cons: nothing it was excellent.

pros: We loved pool on roof and below.
Staff very good. Bar man manuel was super he made us amazing cocktails and made our trip very memorable. We are back in June for our wedding looking forward. 
We even got a preview of our suite for June. 😁😁 cons: The bed was not the best. Bit on hard side
pros: friendly & helpful staff cons:

pros: my second time staying in here

Best place in Monte Gordo cons: everything was ok

No minibar

pros: Nice hotel about 8 mins walk to the amazing Monte Gordo beach. The included breakfast was great. We also ate dinner there great food & staff. cons: Due to Portugals OTT covid regs the jacuzzi was not in use and you had to book time slots for meals & the indoor pool. (Not the hotels fault).
pros: The pool and sauna were fantastic!!! cons:

pros: Staff
Location 
Smartness of hotel cons: The suite we were kindly upgraded to but the layout of the room was not good
Double bed was pushed against a wall 
Lounge was large but not useful
pros: Nice location cons: Very small pool resulting in not been assured of  getting a sunbed.

pros: Location cons: I didn’t like the fact that I booked a suite room with swimming pool view for the first 3 days and they lied to me saying that room didn’t exist and then for the last two nights that i extended and after I complain to bookings they gave me a suit room with swimming pool view etc and they overcharged me and they never offered to refund me back

pros: Location outdoor pool kindness and availability of the staff in general food & drinks cons: The lack of parking for customers that leads to additional costs to park around the building (even more challenging if you drive an Electric) the beds mattress are not that comfortable and the young staff that easily reveals lack of experience and maturity to manage clients as best as possible in different situations (it's all about details and sometimes they failed)

pros: It's quite at night. cons: Restaurant is not adequately sized for the property.  Queue all morning long for breakfast reagardless of time. The inhouse cleaning staff who are brilliant were so good we gave them a good tip.Staff are friendly If you are from Portugal.  Never will return and this review will never be published apart from the good parts.  Never ever again.

pros: The hotel itself is very nice stylish looks new has all the amentities pool sauna fitness etc also pool on the roof top nice spaciouse rooms. Rooms was clean staff overall are nice and friendly besides one person in the restaurant who reassigns the tabels during the breakfast time. She literally poisoned my stay. cons: 1. The person who welcome you during breakfast and reassigns the tabels in the restaurant it was awful experience! The hotel receved low score just because of this one person! We stayed for 5 days and everyday she used to give us table in the exit where was very tight and not nice but I prefer sometimes to get table near the window and not in the dark corridor. I get it there a lot of guests everybody deserves a good table etc. And for me personally it was important and I especially asked her if we can seat on the "other empty prepaired table for two" and every time we got a NO answer and exuses like these "tabels was with other people" they reserved etc-this is literally what she told me! I did not want to argue but it made me feel very uncomfortable. While we were having breakfast I saw how new couples were arriving and she was giving them those empty "reserved" tables. I would never ask table for 4 people for example because I get it there families with kids etc. But free tabels already served and she send us away every day!! How breakfats tabels can be reserved in prepaid breakfasts in the lobby of the hotel??? I was very irritated in the end of our stay which you dont want on holidays right? I suspect she took money from people to reassign them better tabels otherwise it was something personal etc. My opinion hotyel should not keep such employees!
2. Paid parking!

pros: The hotel was pleasant and located close to everything. Staff were very friendly. cons: Its just the normal glossy photos that dont quite match the reality when you are there. Nothing was bad at all just not quite as sharp as the images show. 
I sent a message via booking to request check in earlier as well as a WhatsApp. I had no response and when I got there I had to wait to check in which was annoying.
pros: Staff were friendly cons: Our room had sticky floor and just felt a bit worn in. Could do with a bit of a re paint and scrub up.

pros: The hotel has a nice spar area and a rooftop terrace. The rooms are very spacious and ok-ish maintained/ likely renovated a few years ago. cons: The breakfast is mediocre (it was room included in our room rate) - do not try the coffee … 
Unfortunately we had a cockroach in the room and when contacting the reception we had the feeling no one really cared about it - ultimately we were able to change the room.
pros:  cons:

pros: Lobby and rooftop pool area were renovated and nice cons: Rooms very dated and old. Beds very uncomfortable. Restaurant very crowded and chaotic at breakfast. Not serving any snacks outside restaurants time. Town were it is based is very ran down

pros: Nice lobby area and friendly reception staff . On What’s app 24/7 incase of a problem . 
Good selection at breakfast . 
Nice Rooftop pool but no gardens. cons: Beds so uncomfortable… had to ask for two lots of mattress toppers . 
Shower didn’t drain well. 
Aircon set at 22 degrees . Ok when cold but you could not change it to lower . Stuffy at night . Asked for fan but never came .

pros: Excellent location. Excellent parking facilities reasonable breakfast although lacking in good fresh fruit. Very clean bathroom and bedroom. cons: Very uncomfortable bed. Sagging mattress desperately needs changing.
 TV very user unfriendly the remote barely worked.
Evening buffet extremely expensive and very poor selection. Drinks were extra.

pros: The room was comfortable clean and warm. Location good and I loved that they lend bikes to guests. The gym was great but despite being open 24hrs twice l had arrived and it was locked. Breakfast was good I think I expected more variety though. cons: The open corridors make you cold the minute you walk outside your room. The spa needs to be booked which is fine but on our last day we booked and arrived to the spa closed and sauna turned off they told us it would have taken 1 hour to warm up and we couldn't wait. My husband and I both found the jacuzzi too cold. The TV in our room was extremely slow.
pros: The entrance and the resturant cons: The food arrived was 50% . the room heating was not good. the bath had no anti slip paint in it so its dangerous. The lifts are like small boxes
pros: Great facilities with restaurant & bar swimming pool and spa area. Hotel also offers beach towels cons: The gym has an unpleasant smell the beds are a bit small.

pros: The fresh orange juice at breakfast and the big varanda in the room. The Hotel was close to the beach. cons: During regular room cleaning the drinkware was not properly cleaned.
The breakfast staff was in general rude to the guests. The pool was very small and the pool beds uncomfortable.
The room was noisy and would could hear all day the staff chatting in the corridors.

pros: Staff and location cons: Booked Spa this morning for 9.00 no staff no massages available jacuzzi out of order cleaner was the only one who could let us in to the Spa after 15 mins wait.
Roof terrace pool not open for early morning swim hardly 'Energize' is it

pros: Breakfast was good and the gym was well equipped. Short walking distance from the beach. cons: We stayed for 3 nights. The bedroom windows didn't isolate the noise coming from the outside and it was very noisy during the night with people talking and screaming on the street and dogs barking all night long.
We stayed in a suite which living room window  faced an internal corridor and it wasn't nice to see. The bed had one side against the wall (really strange to see this in a suite) not practical and comfortable at all for the one sleeping on that side. After complaining we were offered a room with 2 twin beds which we refused as this didn't meet what we were looking and paid for. The suite size is good but not practical with a lot of empty space that could be used to provide the guests more comfort.
The bathroom was really small comparing to the size of the room. Not perfectly clean as it had hair sand on the floor when we arrived. The bath tub where the shower is also located had a leak so after having a shower the floor was flooded with water.
Nice pool area on the roof top but the only time we tried to have a snack there we were told there was no bread. I'm sorry but this is not the standard of a 4 star hotel.
Overall I felt disappointed. The hotel is over rated and didn't meet the value for money I was expecting.
pros: The sea facing room was super. cons: The restaurant was quite compact.

pros: location cons: water off on morning of check out couldn’t have a shower and NOT informed! however reception proceed to lie and say everyone in hotel was informed by a piece of paper under the door? 
this was not the case for my room and others no help whatsoever no apology or explanation offered! absolutely disgraceful… 
I have stayed in this hotel twice but will never return after such an experience.. imagine paying so much money not to be able to have a shower .. never again!!

pros: Sound proof room great sea veiw great breakfast staff were very accommodating food in the restaurant was very good wine and beer excellent .lift was a bonus room cleaned every day air conditioning. Poolside bar. cons: No kettle in the room coffee machine did not boil the water so tea making was disaster food in the restaurant served on wooden boards can't beat China plates pool area was always full  small pool

pros: The check in at the hotel was quick and relatively easy. The staff were helpful and provided information about the New Years Eve dinner and party.
The breakfast was very good and plenty of choice cons: Went for dinner in the hotel Fuel Restaurant on the first night and noticed the buffet laid out. I asked if dinner was a buffet that evening and also asked if there was an a la Carte option. I was told it was a buffet. Halfway through our dinner we were told we were not entitled to the buffet and should have had the al la carte! Tried to explain but the waiter was not interested. 
Unfortunately we had to depart from the hotel six days early due to illness. We were not offered any kind of refund even though it was due to illness. When mentioned to the reception staff they told me there was a no refund policy and there was nothing they could do. This was very disappointing and I felt also unfair.
pros: have stayed here before liked the room but paid for an upgrade as the first room was supposed to have a sea view  it didn’t cons: the breakfast was absolute chaos
pros: Nice bathroom. nice breakfast. friendly staff. cons: the windows of the balcony were dirty.
pros: Very clean stylish hotel with great staff. cons: The beds were rock hard.
pros: location. modern hotel. good breakfast. good restaurant cons: small room

pros: The breakfast was good. There was lots to choose from and it was all fresh and well prepared. The public areas of the hotel are pleasant with lots of unusual artefacts. The staff were friendly and very  helpful. cons: The bath had mold around the top and needed re-grouting. Both pools are quite small especially the indoor one which you understandably have to book to use and we did not manage to get a booking to swim which is one of our top pleasures when holidaying. No facilities for disabled ie nearby car parking handles in bathroom and no shower mat. The entrance floor was super slippery as if they use polish on it which is dangerous for elderly or disabled travellers.

pros: - Loved the vibe; relaxed and welcoming
- Loved the sea view room with terrace
- Staff were friendly & helpful especially for a fussy customer like me
- Breakfast was great
- Healthy food options available
- On-site spa was quite nice 
- Good to have a gym on site 
- Pool area was nice and relaxing 
- Not too expensive; good value for money
- A few minutes walk to the beach
- Everything was super clean and well kept
- Reception / lobby area is lovely and relaxing with books and magazines to read
- Check-in is really relaxed and thorough 
- Sea view rooms are well worth the upgrade 
- Early breakfast is recommended and booking ahead means you avoid over crowding 
- Quality of food and drinks were excellent
- The freshly squeezed orange juice was amazing! cons: - The Standard rooms were huge and lovely but paper thin walls so you could hear everything
- I had asked to change rooms because I had specifically requested a quiet room but the noise of the room next door was too disturbing. I had to ask 7/8 times before moving rooms. I was moved (and paid for) a Sea view room on the 5th floor which was much better & much quieter but it was exhausting having to ask so many times to move.
- I had a spa treatment one day which was lovely but no one showed me around the facilities. 
- I didn’t get details of the daily classes which I would like to have joined.
- The gym isn’t great if you’re a weight lifter / body builder; only a few kettle bells and a Kinetic machine but good for a general workout and good cardio options.
- Lots of food empty if you arrive late for breakfast
pros: it was in the centre of Monte Gordo and it made it easy to get to the beach and the shops. cons: the breakfast was the same every day.
pros: Central.  Modern. cons: Restaurant and breakfast area small for the amount of people in hotel.
pros: Hotel is modern with rooftop pool. cons: Strange as we had to argue for a table without reservation at dinner when half the restaurant was empty. For a "sports" hotel gym was lacking.

pros:  cons: it’s overpriced for the service offered 
- checking in/out service desk long waiting 
- No luggage handling at all 
- Same price I paid at same area for 5 stars hotel
- Poor breakfast variety

pros: The hotel is well located being within a short walk of the beach and it provided comfortable and clean accommodation.  Generally staff were courteous and helpful.  The food served in the restaurant was excellent and I would highly recommend dining in the hotel restaurant.   I would be happy to stay in this hotel again. cons:

pros: Breakfast.
The staff is very nice cons:

pros: The decoration of the Hotel is lovely. The bed was sooo comfortable we slept really well.
Loved that they have Rituals stuff in the bathroom.
Bedroom was very clean.
The breakfast was lovely although I think they could have more juices and a few more things to choose from it was very busy so maybe that could be why…
Very well located and easy to get to the restaurants etc… cons: Bedroom decoration was a bit flat.
The rooftop pool bar closed at like 6pm I don’t know whether this is normal or it was because it was windy but there were still a few people there when it closed.
They gave us cards to pick up towels at the reception for the pool but we went to pick up some towels and they didn’t have any and didn’t even apologize for it actually I found the girl at the reception a little bit uninterested and she was also the one who received us for check in and I found her a little bit apathetic.
We were very disappointed about not being able to use the Spa seeing as I chose this Hotel mainly because of it and I was told it would be functioning by the time we were due to the Hotel but they informed us 2 days before our reservation that the Spa wasn’t working and so they gave us 2 drinks vouchers for the rooftop bar which was nice but still didn’t make up for it to be honest.

pros: location was good cons: Check In process was difficult. Arrived early & promised a call when room was ready. No call received. Reception staff member was unhelpful. Roof top bar area was not as clean as it could have been. Booked deluxe room with sea view massive tree right outside blocked most of balcony outlook. Beds were uncomfortable. Breakfast service was adequate at best. Staff unhelpful and buffet choice was limited. Spa was closed for renovation no notice given prior or on check-in.
pros: nice and modern cons:

pros: nice room with good facilities. cons: Everything required booking in advance eg. breakfast gym and spa. There were two large sports groups which basically took over the whole place making it crowded and very noisy.
pros: good cons: good
pros: reception and restaurant look nice cons: Quality of the rooms was very poor. Awefull beds. Hotel looks luxurius on the website but the rooms are really not.
pros: great staff and service. breakfast with lots of choice. chill in the sauna and indoor pool. great cocktails cons:
pros: O quarto bem espaçoso limpo e com uma vista espetacular no 5.° piso. cons: Os acessos ao ar livre são muito gélidos. O SPA é pequeno e não muito acolhedor.
pros: Tudo muito bom cons: Foi comunicado que tinhas q usar a piscina c tocas obrigatóriamente  mais tinha muita gente na piscina sem tocas.

pros: La ubicación.  Cercano a la playa cons: Que el A.A. está  controlado desde la recepción que es lógico para que no se pueda. manipular a capricho del cliente. Pero no estaba dentro de la temperatura de confort

pros: La habitación es amplia y muy cómoda las camas bien y el climatizador funciona perfectamente.
La piscina cubierta  es bajo reserva pero no tuvimos problemas para escoger horario  y es una maravilla .
El personal muy amable y atento 
Todo estupendo cons: Nos gustó todo

pros: Praticamento Tudo. cons: O facto de haver crianças no SPA/Piscina Interior.
Uma solução poderia passar por estabelecer um horário específico para crianças.

pros: Hotel muy limpio tanto habitaciones como zonas comunes. Personal muy amable y servicial.  Habitación muy cómoda con terraza television grande toallas secador de pelo y amenities de Ritual. El spa muy tranquilo cuidado y con muchos detalles. cons: Nada

pros: El ambiente y la tranquilidad que ofrece el hotel.
La amabilidad de sus empleados especialmente Luciana que se portó genial con mi peque Álex.
La habitación muy acogedora fantástica calefacción .
Bañera hidromasaje un acierto .
Spa gratuito con horario especial para niños fue lo que llevo al fantástico hotel  es difícil de conseguir en otros alojamientos.
Soy amante de los productos de Ritual y están todos lados . 
Me encanto el servicio WhatsApp que tiene para los clientes ya quee ayudaron enseguida que necesitaba algo.
Gracias por darnos una estancia tan comoda. Volveremos cons: El frió de los pasillos .pero sin importancia porque la estancia es perfecta .

pros: Localização e pequeno almoço.
A piscina interior e o staff. cons: O tipo de construção do quarto todo forrado a pladur ficou um pouco á quem de um hotel de 4 estrelas.
O tipo de construção dos corredor "abertos" que em dias de chuva leva-nos a "apanhar frio" entre o quarto e a recepção. Algo que não é muito usual mas também não é grave.
