pros: El trato espectacular y todas las comodidades cons:
pros: Me gustó todo cons: Nada
pros: SIMPATIA E EFICIÊNCIA! cons: Temperatura do 1°quarto ( ar condicionado não estava a funcionar para aquecimento )!!
pros: do ambiente cons: o hotel pelo facto de a passagem para os quartos ser pela varanda no inverno é desconfortável.
pros: la piscina cons:

pros: Energia do Local Especial colaboradores super simpáticos e disponíveis.
Spa de excelência onde se viaja internamente trazendo um bem estar incrível.
Restaurante com pequeno almoço delicioso e refeições vegetarianas muito saborosas. cons: Quando solicitei pequeno almoço para levar comigo achei ser muito limitado e pouco equilibrado a nível nutricional .
pros: Spa y habitación cons: El desayuno muy escaso

pros: Localização do hotel é perfeita  staff muito simpático  a piscina interior é linda é um hotel perfeito para quem quer fazer uma escapadinha no inverno (vivendo no Algarve no nosso caso) e no verão é o Monte Gordo paradisíaco que toda a gente conhece.... ah.. falatava só dizer que o restaurante é top.. experimentem o risotto de cogumelos cons: De não poder ir mais vezes...
pros: Pequeno almoço spa localização cons:
pros: Sossego e espaço confortável. Pequeno almoço com sumo de laranja natural cons: Nada a referir

pros: Pues me gusta todo y ha sido la segunda vez que vamos al mismo hotel. cons: Me gusta todo aunque me hubiera gustado que nos informan de recepción que iban a existir cortes de calles/ carreteras para llegar al hotel o coger el teléfono para indicarnos una ruta alternativa de llegada.

pros: He estado en la mayoría de hoteles en Montegordo y el Prime Energize es el mejor hotel pequeño muy personal trabajadores muy amables con buenos servicios de spa gimnasio piscina exterior en terraza. Camas de matrimonio king size muy cómodas. Desayuno muy bueno. Amenities Rituals. Tuvieron un detalle con nosotros que agradecemos. La zona del restaurante muy acogedora y con comida de calidad. En temporada alta los precios se disparan pero en otras temporadas los precios son accesibles y merece la pena. Si puedes hacer un upgrade de habitación se nota (habitación en planta alta terraza  loción de cuerpo Rituals albornoz y chanclas agua café etc.) por poco más. cons: Lo único que noté esta última vez es el accionamiento automático de los aires acondicionados que emitían un molesto ruido en la noche pero poca cosa.

pros: El hotel muy tranquilo. La habitación grande muy limpio todo y bien climatizada. El Spa con la piscina climatizada gratis es un plus sobre todo en invierno. Además es grande y bien climatizada. El personal de hotel muy amable y siempre dispuesto a ayudarte. Hay una piscina en la azotea que no pudimos usar por el frío pero tenía una pinta muy buena. cons: El único punto negativo fue que en nuestra habitación la ducha tenía un escalón para entrar y cuando sales mojado resbala y puedes tener un disgusto al bajarlo.
pros: Me gustó todo  muy buen hotel . cons: Por poner un pero las camas de las niñas eran sofás incómodas para ellas siendo una suite.
pros: Localizaçao e oequeno almoço cons:

pros: No es la primera vez que vamos nos gustan mucho sus instalaciones no es un macro hotel y eso se agradece porque resulta acogedor. El personal es muy amable y el desayuno Buffet buenísimo y variado. Las cenas en su restaurante son una velada agradable y con buena carta. Siempre nos gusta volver! cons:

pros: Ótima estadia funcionários sempre muito atenciosos e disponíveis limpeza e funcionárias muito simpáticas.
Pequeno almoço muito variado numa sala muito confortável e com excelente decoração....
Piscina interior e exterior muito agradável...
Adorámos e gostaríamos de voltar a repetir.😊👍 cons:
pros: Cama grande e confortável aquecimento bom piscina interior interessante. tranquilidade cons: corresdores sem isolação para o exterior e  por conseguinte frios

pros: Hotel com recepção e restaurante muito elegantes e acolhedores espaços comuns super agradáveis. Comodidade do quarto dimensões incríveis e perfeitas para uma família com dois filhos. cons: Possibilidade de as crianças poderem usar a piscina interior após as 14h. No nosso caso entre passeios e regressar ao fim do dia teria sido incrível que o nosso filho pudesse usufruir deste serviço

pros: Pequeno almoço muito bom e variado.
Localização orientação da piscina exterior (muito boa exposição solar protegida dos ventos de norte).
Serviços de SPA.
Atendimento e simpatia. cons: O corredor de acesso aos quartos quando se sai do elevador é demasiado exposto aos ventos e chuvas. No Verão pode ser agradável; no Inverno caso esteja a chover torna-se muito desagradável.
pros: El personal las instalaciones. cons: La cama no me pareció demasiado cómoda.
pros:  cons: Não existem camas de casal e o colchão demasiado mole.
pros: Nada a apontar tudo perfeito. cons: Nada! Esteve tudo perfeito

pros: Cama super confortável 
Quarto grande e moderno 
Pequeno almoço excelente cons:
pros: Limpeza e pequeno almoço cons: O ar condicionado não estava a funcionar correctamente!

pros: Nos encantó la comodidad de las camas  la ubicación y la limpieza. cons: No es compatible con un descanso completo por ejemplo había muchos niños en el spa. El spa no tenia ni una sola ducha para hacer contraste con la sauna  y no tenia más que una piscina muy pequeña y sin chorros. No era un spa realmente. 

Respecto a la habitación televisión antigua sin posibilidad de relajarte y compartir alguna plataforma desde el móvil para ver películas o series .
pros: El desayuno la limpieza el personal muy amable la ubicación etc cons:

pros: Gostámos da simpatia dos funcionários do spa do peq almoço e receção. O pequeno almoço estava ótimo com imensa variedade e qualidade. Gostámos dos equipamentos de ginásio da piscina e da sauna. Simpático o welcome drink que nos ofereceram. cons: Os Quartos com muito pouca insonorização ainda nos mudaram do quarto inicialmente atribuído junto aos elevadores mas ainda assim ouvia-se imenso os sons da rua dos quartos contíguos e de uma forma absurda as portas a bater do corredor. Dado que os corredores são abertos para o exterior torna ainda o som mais propagado. Como o target do hotel são maioritariamente estrangeiros tivemos uma má experiência numa das noites com um hóspede que chegou embriagado e a gritar e que nos acordou.
 No pedido na reserva mencionámos de que o nosso objetivo era descansar bem como tínhamos como objectivo usufruir dos equipamentos para relaxar. 
Fomos acordados todos os dias a partir de cerca das 8h pela equipa da limpeza que obviamente está a desempenhar o seu trabalho mas que ao mesmo tempo com a agitação inerente ao seu trabalho não nos permitia descansar até um pouco mais tarde como gostaríamos de férias e deixámos esse feedback no check-out. Para quem pretende uma experiência mais relaxante acho importante terem o cuidado de terem pisos que permitam ter essa possibilidade de ter menos barulho.
pros: Limpeza do quarto e simpatia do staff cons: Seria ainda mais agradável se tivesse área externa /jardim

pros: A localização é optima. O hotel está muito bem cuidado o pequeno almoço era óptimo e o restaurante ainda melhor!
O facto de disponibilizarem roupões no quarto demonstra preocupação com o cliente também nos foi feito um upgrade ao quarto o que nos agradou bastante. cons:

pros: A variedade do pequeno almoço. cons: O hotel reserva um espaço muito pequeno da sala de pequeno almoço para os grupos de 2 hóspedes o que resulta em estarmos todos a comer em cima uns dos outros.

pros: Das instalações da simpatia dos funcionários da qualidade da cama da limpeza da variedade de alimentos colocados à disposição para o pequeno almoço das funcionárias da receção etc cons: Nada  de negativo a mencionar...

pros: Poucas variedades e quase mesmos pratos todos os dias. cons: As funcionárias do SPA muito preocupadas com o pré-pagamento e não cumpriram o tempo (-5-7 minutos menos do que era previsto na cada massagem).
pros: El trato del personal es excelente las instalaciones están muy bien cuidadas cons:

pros: Quarto e a varanda piscina interior jacuzzi vista da piscina exterior no telhado pequeno almoço bom ginásio internet e tv. cons: Pelo facto de o hotel ser um prédio sem espaço exterior a piscina interior e ginásio são pequenos e limitados em número de utilizadores em simultâneo. Mesmo o espaço circundante à piscina exterior é relativamente pequeno. De qualquer forma nesta altura do ano nunca tivemos nenhum impedimento na utilização dos espaços. Preferia em termos de privacidade espaços exteriores com vegetação e maiores aéreas.
pros: En general todo cons: Que entrarán en la habitación a dejar colchas cuando no  estábamos

El Spa demasiado caluroso. La piscina de agua caliente quemaba y no podíamos entrar. 
El hotel tiene solo algunas plazas de parking disponible con coste de 15 euros al día. La zona es difícil para encontrar aparcamiento.

pros: Instalaciones cons: Personal de recepción no nos ayudó cuando bloquearon la llave 20 minutos antes de la 12 (hora de salida) y además iba mi madre asmática y mi hija de 4 años  las 3 mojadas desde el spa.

pros: A simpatia dos funcionários em particular a Alexandra o qual deixo publicamente o meu obrigado.
A piscina interior cons:

pros: Las instalaciones muy nuevas la habitación limpia y el spa aunque pequeño estuvo bien. Fuimos tarde y no había mucha gente supongo que si hubiéramos ido más temprano la experiencia hubiera sido otra. El aparcamiento en la calle perfecto había de sobra. Desayuno abundante con zumo natural y te cocinaban huevos fritos a demanda cons: Quisimos café de máquina y lo tuvimos que pagar a parte en el desayuno. En la habitación durante la noche se oía mucho el ruido del cuadro eléctrico (un zumbido constante) cuando lo desconectamos se encendió la luz de emergencia de la habitación por lo que no pudimos dormir demasiado bien.
pros: Todo perfecto cons: No hubo nada
pros: Su decoración y  limpieza cons:

pros: Realmente nos ha gustado todo como siempre el trato proferencial la limpieza la comida sus instalaciones y ubicación.
Somos clientes habituales. Siempre volvemos al Prime Energize.
Aconsejamos que vayan. 100%. Espectacular. cons:
pros: Tudo cons:

pros: Amei a recepção que tivemos na nossa chegada ao quarto tinha uma garrafa de espumante e um bolinho de chocolate a nossa espera pétalas de rosas e o quarto todo decorado  tinha lhe ditos que fazia aniversário de casamento 
Foram muitos simpático e receptivos 
Tudo top 
A piscina do SPA e o jacuzzi espectacular 
O pequeno almoço tbm tudo muito bom e delicioso
Espaço agradável 
Super indico ..... cons:
pros: La relación calidad-precio es magnífica; el personal muy atento cons:

pros: Pequeno almoço muito bom👌empregados muito simpáticos cons: Já sou cliente deste hotel algum tempo sempre falei bem mas desta vez como fui sozinha fui mesmo para descansar coisa ke não consegui o colchão era péssimo acordei com muitas dores nas costas a noite a seguir tive que eu mesma desfazer a cama e virar o colchão do avesso  assim já consegui dormir nesse dia a tarde tentei descansar porque tinha dormido mal tomei um comprimido p dores mas as empregadas de limpeza faziam tanto barulho a porta que não consegui agora vou falar da piscina interior quando vamos para uma piscina que é spa é p relaxar mas encontravam se  lá uma família de irlandeses no hotel que faziam que queriam jogar a bola dentro da piscina dar mergulhos a empregada falou com eles mas..... No dia seguinte fui novamente fui barrada a entrada porque não tinha marcado hora mas lá me deixou entrar lá estavam os irlandeses todos contentes eu fui tive lá perto de quarenta minutos sai o eles continuaram lá eles podem tar  tempo que quiseram eu as 18.00 tinha que sair porque aquilo ia encher no último dia tentem novamente primeiro fui ao jacuzzi levei com água na cara porque tava lá uma criança com mãe que não insinuou ao seu filho que jacuzzi não e p nadar sai fui onde da p relaxar os pés tal é meu estampado que travam lá pessoas deitadas enfiadas lá dentro 🥵 por amor da santa será que não podem ensinar as pessoas como se usa um spa ? Por isso e que nosso país tá assim todos vem para aqui fazem o que querem e nos aceitamos tudo😡 .... Bem fora esto todo resto foi bom 👍
pros: SPA y todo el servicio cons: En realidad todo perfecto
pros: Disponibilidade e simpatia dos funcionários. Condições do quarto cons: Por vezes fila para o pequeno almoço
pros: Conforto cons: Peq almoco em turnos; bar da piscina sem snacks

pros:  cons: Foi preciso ser eu a dizer que queria fatura. E depois entregam- me a fatura sem número de contribuinte pese embora terem recolhido toda essa informação no check in. Em todos os hotéis por onde passo depois de efetuar o pagamento emitem logo sem ser necessário pedir a fatura e com NIF.
pros: Localização cons:
pros: bom cons:
pros: Pequeno almoço excelente. cons: O quarto não tinha nenhum sofá

pros: Simpatia e disponibilidade dos funcionários dimensão dos quartos higiene circuito de SPA maravilhoso pequeno almoço com bastante qualidade e variedade.
Tenho também que destacar uma situação que achei muito positiva. Ficaram uns ténis esquecidos no quarto e imediatamente nos ligaram a comunicar a situação e prontamente nos indicaram como poderiam proceder ao envio. cons: Colchão já estava muito desgastado sentia-se muito as molas acabando por ser desconfortável mas foi apenas a única situação a apontar.
pros: El buen trato del personal cons: La masificacion a la hora del desayuno
pros: Limpeza e simpatia dos colaboradores cons:

pros: Todo buena habitaciónbuen trato el spa muy pequeñito pero como va por horas esta estupendo y el desayuno buffet es pequeño pero bastante completo y de buena calidad volveria a repetir sin dudas. cons:
pros: Excelente pequeno almoço pessoal simpático parâmetros de limpeza elevados. cons: Por vezes tínhamos de esperar para tomar o pequeno almoço apesar da prévia marcação da hora.

pros: el desayuno aunque no era muy abundante estaba delicioso y había variedad. El salón es precioso. La piscina esta en la azotea y dispone de bar por si quieres tomar algo no hay muchas hamacas pero suele estar disponible alguna. Lo mejor de la habitación además de lo bonita que es es la cama king size supercomoda tanto la cama como las almohadas. Lo peor por ponerle algo es el parking que toda la zona es de pago y la aplicación para no tener que estar cada 4 h cambiando el tiket es anti turistas ya que no te permite darte de alta si no tienes un dni portugues ni cuenta alli. Situación estupenda la playa esta a 7 minutos andado. cons: el parking que fue una odisea. Ademas el hotel dispone de muy pocas plazas. La app del parking es antituristas.

pros: Excelente localização próxima da praia. As instalações foram recuperadas recentemente. Dispõem de piscina interior e exterior ginásio e spa.
O pequeno-almoço era variado. cons: Necessidade de agendar a utilização da piscina interior. Limpeza das cadeiras e sofás da sala onde é servido o pequeno-almoço.

pros: Pequeno almoço muito bom com muita qualidade. cons: Fiquei pela 3ª vez no Hotel Prime Energize e esta foi a pior experiência destas 3. Quarto com camas mais desconfortáveis e ao lado de um quarto utilizado pelas empregadas para arrumaçao/estender toalhas/etc. o que leva a que haja constante barulho e conversas entre as empregadas à porta do quarto.
Ainda assim voltarei no próximo ano com a esperança de ficar num quarto mais agradável.
pros:  cons: A falta de parque grande dificuldade no estacionamento.

pros: La habitación era grande moderna y cómoda y su terraza fantástica.
La piscina en el roof top con su bar un acierto total.
La comida del restaurante es de mucha calidad original y muy sabrosa. 
Los detalles que nos dejaron en la habitación sin esperarlo (champagne  fruta trufas).
El servicio de toallas para playa y piscina es una buena idea para mejorar la estancia.
El desayuno era variado pero de calidad media.
El hotel en general era moderno y estaba bien cuidado. cons: Tener que hacer cola cada mañana para que te den una mesa en el desayuno.
El personal en general no era demasiado amable exceptuando tres empleados que fueron encantadores.
La prohibición de dejar cosas en la nevera de la habitación asegurándote que tirarían cualquier producto que encontraran. 
El calor y la larga espera para cenar en el restaurante. Más de 30 minutos y no estaba lleno.
Me parece que tienen que mejorar la atención de los empleados que es tan importante como la calidad de las instalaciones.

pros: Excelentes produtos de higiene no quarto. Limpeza muito acima da média. Excelente comunicação dos funcionários. Parabéns pelo serviço de bicicletas que partilham com os clientes permitindo o exercício físico e diminuição do uso de automóvel nas zonas envolventes. cons:
pros: Top! cons: Nada!
pros: Muito boa localização e quartos muito bons. cons: Poucos lugares de garagem.

pros: - Possibilidade de alugar um lugar de estacionamento
- Funcionários portugueses (o que é cada vez mais raro no Algarve) preocupados e orientados para o cliente (quer seja estrangeiro quer seja portugues)
- Sumo de laranja natural do pequeno almoço cons: - crianças só podem utilizar a piscina interior até às 14h
- piscina exterior um pouco pequena e com poucas espreguiçadeiras (reservadas com toalhas logo na hora da abertura e sem ninguém comparecer durante horas)

pros: El desayuno muy bueno lo malo es que la zona para desayunar es muy pequeña y hay que hacerlo por turnos. El día anterior eliges la hora a la que querrás desayunar y procura no llegar tarde porque hay cola. cons:
pros: Do hotel e dos seus serviços incluindo o restaurante e pequeno almoço. cons: Das algas na praia no mar e areal...

pros: Gostei muito da piscina no rooftop da simpatia dos funcionários das panquecas do pequeno almoço dos cocktails do bar da piscina. Do quarto. Do Spa ENERGIZE. E DO RESTAURANTE FUEL. cons: Os quartos podiam será insonorizados às 6.30 da manhã acordei com o barulho dos hóspedes.
Incutir o silêncio a estas horas da manhã também seria importante.
pros: Buena ubicación y desayuno fantástico. El personal muy agradable. cons:
pros: La habitación es magnífica. Sólo una pega: el cuarto de baño un poco pequeño en comparación con la amplitud de la habitación que es tipo suite cons:

pros: Relação Preço - Qualidade muito boa com quartos amplos e muito limpos.
Espaço agradável moderno e muito confortável.
Piscina na cobertura  com bar e uma visa muito agradável no entanto faltava algum espirito de verão uma vez que não tinha música. cons: Nada a referir
pros: De tudo cons: Nada a a pintar
pros: Animação em local supremo de praia cons: Falta de estacionamento
pros: Comodidad cons: El formato del desayuno por turnos

pros: Serviço de limpeza bom quarto espaçoso e confortável  os funcionários muito simpáticos e prestáveis pequeno-almoço com variedade e com reposição atempada restaurante muito agradável. cons: Casa de banho antiquada e banheira de difícil acesso

pros: La ubicación es buena muy cerca de la playa. La habitación amplia y cómoda con un pequeño balcón.
El desayuno bien. Todo el personal magnífico. cons: El cuarto de baño es pequeño. Hay un escalón para subir al plato de ducha. La mampara es muy corta y por mucho cuidado que tengas se sale siempre agua.
El armario no tiene puerta tiene una cortina.
El personal de limpieza es escaso nuestra habitación la arreglaban siempre después de las tres o más tarde.
pros: A piscina e o Spa cons: Jacuzzi avariado

pros: La ubicación la tranquilidad y la limpieza. cons: No me gustó nada la hora de la cena. No se ve nada la carta ( la letra muy pequeña) es demasiado sofisticada los platos todo salsas y sabores muy picantes. A la hora del desayuno el personal que lo organiza se esfuerza mucho por organizar a la gente y son muy amables pero el comedor es estrecho en la zona de buffet. 

El Spa no funciona al completo los chorros no funcionan y hay un parche que no sé si tapa unos azulejos caídos o algo peor. Pero una niña intentó quitarlo. La presencia de niños en este tipo de hotel no me parece adecuada. No creo que vaya con la imagen que quieren dar de relax para adultos que vamos sin crianças. Me hice un masaje que se supone que duraba 50’ y fue mucho menos casi 10’. Eso sí los 80€ me los cobraron completos.
pros: O quarto era lindo mesmo o pequeno almoço muito bom também. Espero voltar outra vez. cons:
pros: Localização quartos confortáveis e sala das refeições muito agradável. cons:
pros: Tudo 5 estrelas cons: À piscina .pequena

pros: Pequeno almoço maravilhoso com muita variedade de comida. Limpeza excelente. 
Acolhimento impecável por parte do staff. cons: Os elevadores não tinham ventilação assim como as escadas de acesso aos pisos tonando assim estes espaços quentes e desconfortáveis de utilizar.

pros: Look moderno com excelente decoração. Funcionários super simpáticos. 
Alguns apontamentos diferenciadores tais como água fresca na recepção do hotel e maçãs para quem
Quisesse retirar gratuitamente. 
Pequeno almoço ótimo e com muita variedade. 
Piscina muito agradável no rooftop. 
Serviço de toalhas de praia e piscina incluído. Bicicletas do hotel disponíveis para andar gratuitamente(apesar de não recomendar os passeios de bicicleta porque não têm ciclovias não achei uma localidade segura para andar tranquilamente de bicicleta - trânsito) 
Possibilidade de alugar um lugar de estacionamento por 13€ noite. 
Jantamos "à carta" no restaurante e foi uma experiência gastronómica muito agradável apesar dos 73€ que custou para 2 pessoas. 
Têm a possibilidade de jantar buffet incluído na estadia por 25€ dia pessoa que não escolhemos. cons: O duche tem umas portas mais antigas apesar de até isolar bem a água. 
O estacionamento naquelas ruas é um inferno. 
Ou colocamos num lugar a pagar (que é quase em todo o lado 090€ hora) ou temos que arriscar estacionar no bairro onde tem cadeiras garrafões de água motos e outros objetos a bloquear os lugares de estacionamento para os moradores.

pros: En general todo super limpio todo el personal super amable desde la recepción hasta los camareros y el personal de limpieza no puedo poner ninguna pega solo que me hubiese gustado estar más tiempo. cons:

pros: La limpieza y comodidad de las habitaciones. 
La tranquilidad absoluta que hace que el descanso sea pleno. cons: Variedad del bufet de desayuno escaso.

pros: - Piscina interior
- Vista da piscina exterior
- Decoração do lobby
- Alguns funcionários cons: - Piscina exterior muito baixinha (1.10m)
- As almofadas são todas muito altas

pros: Gostei de tudo em especial a surpresa no quarto muito obrigada! cons: Só não gostei da piscina exterior porque as pessoas deixam as toalhas nas espreguiçadeiras a guardá-las sem estarem presentes horas infinitas
pros: Muito bom cons: Do restaurante com nome de um grande chef nao gostei da comidaestava  espera de maisa sobremesa estava pessima reclamei mas nao deram importanciafiquei triste
pros: Da vista do quarto e da varanda com vista para a piscina. cons: O Elevador que é muito pequeno.
pros: Habitación baños e instalaciones de piscina cons: Nada
pros: Muito profissionais e amaveis cons: .

pros: Es muy confortable Esta muy nuevo La relación calidad - precio en temporada alta no es tan buena pero el
hotel es una buena opción cons: EL desayuno es un kos  esperas para que te den mesa  falta personal y el que hay está estresado lo cual no justifica la mala actitud de algunas camareras La verdad es que volvería al hotel pero no al desayuno Es una pena porque aunque no hay mucha variedad lo que hay es de calidad

pros: desayuno bueno y en un espacio luminoso y amplio cons: piscina ok pero en dias de tanto calor debería abrir antes de las 1000 de la mañana
las personas de la recepción estaría bien que fuesen un poco más simpáticas
no te hablan del restaurante que tienen en la playa con lo que se pierde la posibilidad de hacer cross selling

pros: Todo estaba muy limpio. Cerca de la playa estupendo el personal y el desayuno muy completo. Lo recomiendo. Volveremos seguro cons: Estaba todo genial. No tiene aparcamiento el hotel pero hay mucho en los alrededores
pros: Las instalaciones y la piscina de arriba cons: Que el jacuzzi no funcionaba y no lo arreglaron que te cobraran por el parking 13 €

pros: Localização fantástica quarto TOP limpeza ótima pequeno almoço muito variado e apetitoso almoço/jantar cozinha by Chacal  fenomenal SPA altamente recomendável. Massagem Energize (com eucalipto alecrim e limão) no topo nunca em toda a minha vida tinha feito uma massagem tão espetacular quanto esta massagista excelente profissional Inês funcionários muito competentes educados simpáticos eficientes e acolhedores.
Altamente revigorante e a regressar muitas mais vezes. Gratidão. cons: Não aplicável.

pros: Fue una estación excelente. El personal fue muy amable el desayuno buffet de los mejores que he probado y el restaurante del hotel riquísimo. El spa no estaba nada concurrido y la piscina tenía un chiringuito que estaba genial de precio. La ubicación del hotel muy buena a 5-10 minutos de la playa andando. 

 Además tuvieron un detalle increíble la estancia coincidió con el cumpleaños de mi marido y nos dejaron un pastel con velas y una botella de champán fuimos los más felices. cons: Nada

pros: Las instalaciones modernas y el desayuno fantástico sobre todo por el zumo natural de naranja recién esprimida y la fruta cortada un lujo.
La ubicación muy buena. cons: La cama de la habitación 302 que uno de los lados pegaba a la pared y era incómodo salir.

pros: Gostamos de tudo. Desde o quarto sossegado bastante confortável cómodo etc.. ao pequeno almoço bastante requintado. 
Os funcionários sempre prestáveis e com muito boa disposição. cons: Não temos nada há apontar neste caso mas gostaria de referir que na nossa opinião achamos que o jacuzzi e a piscina interior fosse um pouco com temperatura mais alta. É  apenas um pioramento
pros: A simpatia e disponibilidade dos empregados cons: O pequeno-almoco é por marcação. O local é pequeno e limita o número de pessoas que podem tomar o pequno almoço ao mesmo tempo
pros: Limpeza simpatia dos funcionários. Cama confortável. Bom pequeno almoço. O sumo de laranja é natural. cons:
pros: Tudo exelente!!! Recomendo! cons: O preço um pouco alto
pros: os espaços de lazer spa e piscina panorâmica cons: de nada ‘em especial

pros: As bicicletas disponíveis.
O pequeno almoço foi excelente com variedade e várias bebidas vegetais disponíveis. Sumo de laranja feito na altura.
Funcionários muito prestáveis especialmente quem nos recebeu Marta e nos fez sentir bem vindos dando todas as indicações para que a estadia fosse a mais proveitosa possível. cons: O spa poderia ter alguma zona para troca de roupa mais fácil possivelmente com um banco de apoio.
pros: Tudo no geral. Bom hotel. Boa piscina interna. Boa jacuzzi. cons: Talvez mais diversificadas frutas no pequeno almoço  seria bom.

pros: Muito bom. 
O serviço esteve sempre bem organizado. cons: Não tenho nenhuma sugestão em particular. Não sei se o hotel tem meios para disponibilizar estacionamento para o carro com maior garantia. De facto é difícil encontrar um lugar em Monte Gordo em que durante o dia o carro possas ficar estacionado por um período superior a 4 horas.

pros: Adoramos tudo! Aliam claramente a excelente qualidade ao elevado profissionalismo dos funcionários que excede as expetativas mais requintadas.
A regressar brevemente.
Optamos também por massagem de relaxamento e a profissional Inês é simplesmente magnífica.
Gratidão cons: Não aplicável
pros: Bom cons:

pros: Simpatia dos funcionários tanto a piscina interior como a exterior são fantásticas. O pequeno-almoço é excelente! cons: O ar condicionado do quarto 407 após ser desligado faz imenso barulho tornando-se um pouco incomodativo durante a noite.

pros: O pequeno almoço estava excelente
Dá para todo o tipo de pessoa. cons: Um pouco mais de controle á entrada

pros: Pequeno almoço excelente
Piscina interior aquecida
Piscina exterior no roof top cons:
pros: Hotel bem localizado e com excelentes instalações. O restaurante é muito bom e a comida excelente. O pequeno almoço estava muito bom. cons:

pros: Sem dúvida o spa  a temperatura da piscina interior era excelente ☺️
Pequeno almoço muito bom cons:
pros: a simpatia dos colaboradores do hotel em particular da Inês do restaurante muito atenta às necessidades do cliente. cons: os vidros deviam estar identificados por questões de segurança
pros: Las instalaciones en general cons: Nada
pros: o fato de haver piscina coberta cons: ter que comprar touca de natação para usar a piscina coberta!

pros: Quarto. Vista mar. Pequeno almoço. cons: Possivelmente os hóspedes não respeitarem os horários do pequeno almoço e consequentemente gerarem-se pequenos atrasos.
Tudo o resto impecável.

pros: Gostamos muito do restaurante Fuel e do pormenor do hotel de disponibilizar um refresco aos clientes na receção. cons: Da falta de uma garrafa de água de oferta no quarto e a hora para arrumarem os quartos ser um pouco cedo.
pros: Hotel muito agradável e confortável. Recomendá-lo-ei a outras pessoas e voltarei lá quando for a Montegordo. cons: Não houve nada de relevante a criticar
pros: todo especialmente el Spa que es gratuito. cons: nada

pros: Todo fue genial a un poco más de 5 minutos de la playa con unas instalaciones y el servicio increíbles. cons: El check-in es a las 15:00 por lo que si llegas pronto por tu viaje se hace un poco larga la espera.

pros: Pequeno Almoço muito bom.
Localização perto de árvores em zona sossegada.
Especial agradecimento pela recepção por parte de Maria que em muito contribuiu para a nossa estadia ao nos ajudar na escolha de alojamento mais confortável e adequado às nossas expectativas. Bem haja 🙏😊 cons:
pros: Adorámos estes 2 dias aproveitamos as piscinas jacuzzi spa. O staff é excelente muito simpático limpeza e arrumação. Tudo ótimo a repetir cons: Nada a apontar.
pros: As piscinas (exterior e interior) eram sensacionais bem como o ambiente em volta. cons: A vista mar era um pouco reduzida.
pros: Todo cons:
pros: A recepção foi rapida e simpática o quarto muito confortável e espaçoso estava tudo limpo cons: Nada

pros: Great location. Lovely hotel. Nice room with a great view. Great breakfast with good choice especially the gluten free sausages. cons: We ate in the Italian restaurant but for mebeing coeliac the choice wasn't great. Surely you could stock some gf pizza basesand spaghetti rather than fusili

pros: The super staff couldn't have been more accommodating from reception through to housekeeping. Rooms were cleaned every day. Apart from the buffet-style breakfast lunch and dinner there is also the amazing il Basilico with a menu to match. Large pool area lots of sun beds and lots of comfy view points making the most of the stunning views and gardens. Not far to walk for a variety of bars and restaurants. Will definitely return when the hotel re-opens after refurbishment. cons: n/a

pros: Location Staff very friendly and helpfulcomfortable room and bed very clean.comfortable bar areas and lounge areas.Great food great choice at the evening buffet. cons: Minor complaint some of the breakfast food was not very hot but lots of choice .

pros: Nice location with sea view rooms pool and garden. Excellent breakfast with a lot of options.
Happy hour in the cocktail bar with drinks in half price.Lots of free spaces for parking. cons: Nothing
pros: Everything cons: Nothing

pros: Was kept extremely clean 
Food in all Restaurants was of a very high standard 
Come away relaxed and well fed 
Beach was amazing despite the steps cons: Was disappointed with only having a partial sea view despite booking a sea view room. There  was a minimal fee to use the steam room or saunabut by the time we got there all the good slots had been taken

pros: Beautiful ground garden and pool. Excellent breakfast and dinner buffet. Comfortable and cozy room with beautiful sea view. Very good facilities and friendly staff. Best location with easy parking. cons:
pros: Staff were excellent!! Everything was excellent!!! cons:
pros: Everything. Wonderful breakfast and dinner buffet. Nice indoor swimming pool tennis court. New year's eve party. cons:
pros: Breakfast was incredible best I've had in a hotel! cons: Heated pool would have ben good :)
pros: The cliff is divine the facility also very good cons: Food could be more diverse

pros: excellent hotel with provided territory and view of rocks and sea. very high-quality and tasty breakfasts incomparable freshly squeezed orange juice. Dinner-buffet was very good especially fish but meat was also very tasty. Italian restaurant on the territory is ok. rooms are quite spacious clean have everything you need cosmetics from Rituals there is a balcony with view of pool and sea. excellent and friendly staff allowed us to stay on the territory of the hotel after check-out and waiting for transfer to Faro. Location is excellent: Albufeira is 10 minutes by car. cons: This is definitely not a problem but the hotel and interior are a little outdated the rooms are a little not modern.

pros: Friendly and professional team well organised comfy clean splendid and generous breakfasts and evening buffets and enjoyed the live entertainment in the bar every evening. Having direct access to the beach and within walking distance of Vilamoura along the quiet stretches of sand was a plus. cons:
pros: Great cons: Everything
pros: The location of the hotel on the cliffs overlooking the ocean as well as the hotel gardens!  Wonderful!! cons: N/A
pros: Breakfast  great selection of food loved the omelettes.staff very efficient and friendly. cons: Completely satisfactorythere was nothing we did not like.

pros: PortoBay Falésia is a lovely resort in Ochos de Água with direct access to the spectacular Falésia beach. The property is quiet and beautifully landscaped  with several patios with views to beach and ocean. We swam in the ocean played tennis and danced to live bands in the evening. Besides the generous breakfast buffet we particularly enjoyed our meals in the Italian restaurant- again with live music. It was easy to tour Western Algarve from here and walk to the village (which has a great Chinese food restaurant !) cons:

pros: Very decent breakfast good choices replenished often. Perhaps consider another omelette station to lessen the wait time and help the overworked omelette maker. The "vegetarian" breakfast box which was graciously offered because we had to leave early before buffet started was terrible and showed a complete ignorance of vegetarianism. Nice try - but highly unsuccessful. cons: Breakfast box. Offering it was nice but very badly executed. Coffee and tea in the room were never replenished.

pros: PortoBay is the perfect home base in the Algarve both in terms of location and the quality of the hotel's customer service.
We received an unexpected surprise to live in room 124 which is one of the pilot rooms for the expected renovation of the hotel. We definitely vote that after the renovation all hotel rooms are like our room 124! cons:
pros: Breakfast was incredible!! cons: Parking was a bit of an issue
pros: Lovely breakfast. Clean rooms. Courteous staff. Peaceful location. Plentiful parking. cons:

pros: Food was excellent. Very good location and great value for money

The view from the pool area was outstanding cons: Indoor pool and jacuzzi not quite up to expectations
pros: Amazing location the beach nearby was amazing. Staff were great and the cherry on top was the wine tastings cons:

pros: Great staff super friendly.
Absolutely beautiful beach and lovely views from the hotel. cons: Food at the hotel was quite over salted
Kids playground needs upgrading

pros: Great location with nice pool.Easy walking access to small town and a short drive to Albufeira. cons: Going to the beach you had to pay extra for a recliner. Most evenings was a fixed price buffet so too much for small appetites. Bit of a soulless lounge bar.

pros: Breakfast & Dinner Buffets excellent cons: Room .Maybe a biscuit or two on Tea /Coffee tray.
An Iron perhaps ?
Wardrobe doors need hinges oiled.
pros: Beautiful views. Great Breakfast. cons: Room was a bit small and dark. Very busy in breakfast area- advise going later.
pros: Extensive and excellent breakfast buffet. cons:

pros: Location. Seating areas around property. Felt like a cruise ship ( why we don’t cruise) at breakfast on our first day. cons: Check in and check out was very slow. Buffet being one of only two dining options on the site.

pros: The choice on the buffet breakfasts and dinners
the size and layout of our room the size of the bed
the helpful staff at reception desk
the location and gardens on the property cons: what we didn't like is too minor to mention for the overall experience of staying at the hotel and its facilities.
however the hotel room felt a little dated in need of modernising though it didn't detract from the overall experience of staying there
pros: The view is breathtaking! All the staff are amazing! My son and I love our stay and we absolutely love all the foods as we avail the fullboard! cons: Nothing
pros: The location. cons: Room was very dark and the air con was too cold. The bathroom WC was faulty.
pros: Idilic location! cons: N/A

pros: Breakfast was very good and the cleaning staff was very friendly cons: We heard noise every night at around 5:00am. Not sure what it was but if felt like it was coming from the floor above. Nothing to do with people partying but trolleys moving around.
pros: The breakfast was amazing! cons: Reservation system for dinners was flawed. Could only get 8pm times but we went to dining at 7 every night and lots of empty tables.

pros: This was our third visit to Porto Bay Falesia. We love the beautiful location. Friendly staff. Great food. Wonderful facilities. Quiet no loud music playing. Not too crowded. cons: Being vegetarian we would have liked more veggie protein dishes such as beans lentils tofu etc. Some days these kinds of foods weren't as available as other days so we had to resort to eating cheese and eggs which we would normally prefer not to eat.  We would also request the resort considering offering oat milk as a milk substitute. Soy milk was available though.
pros: Perfect location cons: The price-performance ratio is simply not right best exemplified by the €12 (!) charged for an omelette at the Il Basilico restaurant.
pros: Level of service cons:
pros: Facilities. Cleanliness. Courteous staff. Food. cons: 120 steps to the beach!
pros: The location is the very best thing with direct access to the most beautiful beach. cons: The rooms are small and “tired”.

pros: Beautiful location overlooking the sea. Short walk to the beach and bars and restaurants. Good buffet breakfast. Lovely deck for lunch and dinner providing beautiful views. Lovely shade under the pine trees for those who prefer the shade but lots of places to sunbathe too. cons: The outside pool would benefit from heating. It wasn’t a problem at the time of the year we went early September but if it had been in spring autumn or even early summer I would’ve found it too cold despite the warm air temperatures. 
Too many sunbeds in the pool area. Not all were occupied but if they had been guest would almost be on top of each other.
pros: Hotel on the beautiful shore of Algarve right in the middle of amazing pitoresque zone cons:
pros: Location to the beach was fab cons: Rooms were a bit dated

pros: Good variety and range of food at breakfast. Room was relatively spacious but our one lacked a balcony which was disappointing. Pool is very nice with adequate number of beds nearby with umbrellas. Steps down to the beach are pretty steep and likely tricky for older folks especially on the way back up (though there are some rest chairs where someone can take a rest if need be along the stairs). Beach though is really beautiful and lovely to walk along. cons: There was a smell in our bathroom after using the shower. Sort of like stale water stuck in the downpipes. Not too nice. Referred it to reception who said would get it looked at. Never received any indication that it was checked but it lingered for other days albeit at lower level (or maybe our noses were just attuned to it). One annoying thing at breakfast was some of the staff clearing your plates just after you had finished eating off them. Was intrusive and I'd have been on the cusp of telling them to just go away. This was just a few people others were very nice and mannerly. At the beach found the restaurant at beach entrance very busy staff rude and prices high. Went once but would not go back.
pros: Lovely location not too busy and with a feeling of being secluded but also accessible cons:

pros: Excellent location with a beautiful view and close to the beach.
Very clean friendly stuff excellent breakfast. cons: Mattresses too soft gym could be better equipped and we preferred going out for a dinner as we are not fans of buffet dinners.
pros: The staff location and facilities cons:

pros: Location. This place is all about location. And the dining areas. cons: The rooms are a bit outdated (the bathrooms are old and the carpeted floor in particular doesn’t make much sense nowadays). A small refurbishment and this would be 10/10.

pros: Location is perfect close to the beach and near of many place to eat dance and so on.
Staff is really nice always thinking on you cons: Nothing.
Maybe the outside swimming pool require a most deeply clean (only bottom for the beach sand)
pros: Facilites in general the good compromise between quality/price the excelent view and the helpfullness of the colaborators of the hotel. In resume i will be back. cons:
pros: The view from our room was fantastic cons: 125 steps to the beach
pros: The location is beautiful beaches and view. cons: The AC doesn’t work properlyrooms need some maintenance more food options.

pros: Beautiful view very good housekeeping work OK food in all-inclusive option. cons: Our room was really old (even though cleaned thoroughly every day) its bathroom really needs a renovation as well as room textiles. 
SPA was average clearly stuff is not professional (some of them serve in buffet as well): they follow a protocol but once it comes to massage / face treatment itself we know immediately there is no any related education at all. 
Pool is never truly clean but warm enough. 
What I found truly scandalous is that with all-inclusive option water is not included ! Even a usual tap/filtered water! You can buy for 470€ 750ml of water so it’s not like if they sell it at adequate price. We were truly surprised by drinks price (920€ for a smoothie?) it felt more like Paris than Portugal.

pros: Very friendly staff and very supportive for example to fix the weeks from one of our bags.

The location also is excepcional cons: Internet was slw

pros: Lots of options for breakfast easy walk to town and the beach. They must be doing a rolling upgrade at the hotel because our room was updated and the bathroom was new and very nice. cons: The pool area could use an update. Chairs and umbrellas were worn but still intact.
pros: view cons: queue on the reception; dont book sheety touristic trips - nothing interesting and they are trying to make tax avoidanxe via only cash payments which is not ok.

pros: Food location/ setting pool water temperature staff assistance particularly with wife’s food allergies cons: Room is showing age and could do with renovation. Pool is crowded during this high season - add a second pool for adults.

pros: Breakfast was excellent everything you would expect. Location everything in walking distance restaurants shops etc cons: Room was dated and dark . Cleaning of the bedrooms could have been better.

pros: The hotel location and the sea view was lovely.
The breakfast was lovely and I liked that the omelettes scrambled eggs and fried eggs were cooked fresh at the breakfast counter. cons: No comments
pros: Very clean nice location cons: Nothing

pros: Wonderful location and excellent service. You can reach Albufeira by Uber in 5 minutes and the beautiful Falesia beach is just a 5 minute walk from the hotel. It was my girlfriend's birthday and the staff left a complimentary bottle of wine in our room as a birthday gift. This was a 10/10 stay. cons: If you want a sunbed close to the pool make sure to grab one as early as you can

pros: Amazing amenities nice staff and great location enjoyed our entire stay there. Would stay there again next time I visit Portugal. cons: Room we had faced the car park initially however we upgraded and  got a room a bit higher up which worked out nicely the views all round are nice but once you see the view facing the ocean that’s the only view you want.

pros: 5 STARS FOR 4 STAR HOTEL! 
THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR EVERYTHING! cons:

pros: Great location
Sports availability cons: Rooms furniture bit old
Food not always top

pros: The location is PERFECT! Right in the middle of the Algarve Region great point to visit to both sides and also have the Albufeira Town very near with great nightlife. The beach of Falesia is amazing! And the views from.the Hotel also beautiful. cons: The receptionist sell us the navegation for caves and when we asked the departure port they send us to the incorrect one and loose the tour fortunately the company find us a place the following day but we need to arrange our itinerary because of that.

pros: Beach front 
Staff
Pool
Food cons: No restaurants close by
pros: Setting and beautiful well kept grounds cons: Nothing

pros: Beautiful location with a view to the beach as a backdrop behind the pool and the trees easy access to the beach good quality food and nice staff. An oasis! cons: The hotel could be more kids or youth friendly it was more for older couples with quiet jazz music in the evening or two singers in a large room with no atmosphere in the evening although it is true that it is relaxing.
pros: We loved the hotel. Beautiful scenery relaxing environment attentive personel. cons: I do not think there was something wrong. A Nespresso machine in the room would be a cherry on the cake :)

pros: 2nd time there and will be going back love the location and think it's reasonably priced cons: Could live without the live music every night I think you need a bar away from the main bar not everyone wants to listen to live music every night and sitting in the lounge area you could see people walk to the entrance and turn around it is quite dark in there
There is plenty of space for an outside bar.
pros: Location cons: Staff only hot water in room’s toilet and horrible waiter at the buffet.
pros: Access to beach breakfast buffet plenty of lounge chairs and day beds for sunbathing/relaxing cons: Small room. King bed was two twins pushed together.

pros: Such a wonderful Hotel and Team - made for a gorgeous experience. 
The setting is stunning and food is excellent. cons:

pros: Nice location.
Clean and tidy.
Nice relaxing atmosphere. cons: Nothing

pros: Location was great. Lovely long beach has a few stairs to get to it but well
worth it! Pool garden and reception areas all very nice. 
Buffet breakfast was very good lots of selection. The onsite restaurant has great food! cons: The hotel has a lot to offer but it is looking like it needs updating and a little TLC. Carpet is a bit worn and walls had some dents and marks on them. Was clean and comfortable which is always the most important.

pros: Very spacious- great access to beach; beautiful views from common areas cons: The rooms are not special more of a travel lodge feel than a 5 star hotel but the pools spa and all common amenities make up for the average rooms
pros: Everything cons: Nothing

pros: The staff very friendly and helpful. The food was very good. Easy distance to this wonderful beach. cons: The furniture and the carpet. It‘s out of fashion. The hotel rooms need renovation. It could have been cleaner especially in the bathroom.
pros: Lovely place close to the beach cons:

pros: The stunning location. 
Brilliant choice of dishes at mealtimes & fabulous staff throughout Hotel. cons:

pros: Access to the beach
Spa facility cons: Gym wasn’t 24 hours opened

pros: Very good buffet breakfast. Nice sized rooms we travelled with a baby and the room was more than adequate to fit a travel cot (provided by the hotel). Pool area was lovely tranquil and there as plenty of space. Didn't feel jammed in like sardines as at other resorts. cons: Initially our room was set up as a twin not a double and it took a few requests before this was rectified. The bathrooms are a little on the older side including bath and shower but very functional and clean. Happy hour cocktails were a bit disappointing and short lived.

pros: Sea view did not disappoint. Very comfortable beds. Extensive outside facilities including lounges at the pool and also the surrounding gardens. Beautiful sea views from the various outside  patios / bars. cons: The food was a little underwhelming especially breakfast. A little more love and attention is required.
pros: Fantastic property in a great location just out side the we harbour village cons:

pros: We loved the location the facilities the view the proximity to the beach the tennis court… All fantastic. cons: We asked in advance for a room far from the elevators and on one of the higher floors. This was because we knew we were going to arrive at a late hour and wanted to still have our preferences communicated beforehand. Unfortunately these were not taken into account at all. We were given a room on the first floor close to the elevators completely against our preferences.

pros: If you want to disconnect. This is the right place to go great swimming pool great beach next to the hotel. There's a mini market very basic. cons: The WiFi the signal wasn't great but that's it
pros: The grounds were great cons: The rooms were really outdated and it took forever to get a hold of concierge

pros: The location was excellent if you want to enjoy a view from the hotel of Falesia beach or use the hotel's dedicated path to the beach.  The breakfast was the best of our entire stay in the Algarve having moved from various accommodations.  Although the hotel seemed full there were plenty of chairs for the pool and garden area and there was no shortage of staff in all aspects of the running of the hotel.  We were met with an upgrade to our room and had the buffet dinner one evening which had many local fish and seafood choices and the service was excellent. cons: Nothing
pros: Everything you need for a relaxing time is in one location. cons: We weren’t very happy with a shower in our room
pros: fabulous location and views cons: nothing

pros: Beautiful tradicional hotel with amazing views friendly staff and a wonderful breakfast!
We used it to chill after our wedding and it was everything we needed. cons: It is slightly away from some other attractions so if you are planning an Algarve trip this might not be the best location. But if you are looking at a place to stay and relax that is it for you.
pros: This place is all about location on the cliffs over the Praia de Falesia the most beautiful beach in Algarve. cons: Housekeeping
pros: Facilities were good and the attitude of staff was exceptional. Views over he falaises seashore and sea added to the magic. cons:
pros: Location cons:
pros: Amazing hotel staff obviously a very well managed and motivated team everything was seamless cons: Nothing
pros: Location breakfast shower internet bed comfort clean hotel in general cons: The rooms are looking tired and need updating which they are doing on an ongoing process. Hotel need a lick of paint.

pros: It is a large clean well maintained hotel with friendly staff in a cliff top location overlooking the sea. cons: Would have preferred to have been shown to a table at breakfast rather than the free for all.

pros: Very nice hotel - staff friendly and helpful
Place was really clean and staff very polite.
We only did bed and breakfast as there are lots of restaurants and pubs in the area
Would definitely recommend it to friends cons: nothing - very satisfactory
pros: Very clean lovely staff great sea view amazing breakfast! The pool was large but very cold as we went at the start of May. The seagulls are very naughty but entertaining. cons: Nothing!

pros: Beautiful beaches and access lovely pool and amazing huge beds! Breakfast was also really good quality. All hotel/reception and dining staff were extremely friendly and helpful when we asked for any travel tips around the Algarve. We had such a relaxing lovely stay and would come back again! cons: It was a shame to have to pay an additional cost to use the sauna and steam room each time the sauna also didn’t get hot enough but everything else was brilliant
pros: Absolutely everything food staff entertainment  pool just everything you need cons: Nothing

pros: Location views staff lovely room upgrade cons: Fresh fruit selection at breakfast could have been better. Parasols at the pool were not fitting into bases properly and were being blown around - likely to cause serious injury !!

pros: The resort has a great location and outdoor space. The pool the garden and the view were amazing. cons: We stayed in room 155 and the bathroom was pretty smelly. Also the food from both the breakfast and lunch was not so good quality.

pros: The catering was very nice. Staff very friendly
The room service very good
The swimming pool was great cons: Nothing to say
pros: I already wrote my review with the other room booking. I booked 2 rooms. cons:

pros: Locationoutdoor set upfriendly and helpful staff (especially Leto before my trip)food. cons: I requested a nice room as it was my sister’s (whom I shared room with) hen weekend. I wasn’t expecting see view as I didn’t pay for it but north facing room was disappointing!  Also I asked that my other sister’s room be located close but we were 3 floors apart!

pros: Breakfast is wonderful facility overall is very nice wonderful staff awesome location. Pool area very nice overall areas to rest and enjoy the views of the coast are absolutely beautiful. cons: Pool wasn't heated so not usable. Bar lacks "energy" looks dated or being part of a retirement facility. Music choices particularly live music was geared toward non-existing-patrons. Means no local music and atmosphere. The result was that the place was mostly empty. While the breakfast choices and dinner-buffet choices are really good the setup creates the feeling of a cattle drive where too many folks try to access the buffet and at the same time people are entering or leaving the restaurant using the same small aisles...
pros: We’re so glad we stayed in PortoBay Falesia again. There’s so easy access to restaurant and the wonderful beach. It was so quiet and relaxing place. Highly recommended!!! cons:

pros: Beautiful area the view of the ocean and red cliffs are stunning! Large clean pool and lots of loungers but we went in April so maybe busy in the summer. The pool was cold but I still went in and enjoyed it. The hotel is close to restaurants and a small town with some shops and bars. Driving distance to Albufeira. Private beautiful beach area for the hotel however lots of stairs down. But no worries lovely beach within walking distance. The restaurant served delious food and staff was warm and friendly. 
Breakfast was top notch! They made omelettes to order fried eggs. Bacon sausages fruit pancakes...I could go on and on! And your own pot of coffee and milk for your table was a nice touch.
The view eating breakfast was glorious. We stayed in a standard room with balcony and a sea view. We could sit on the large balcony and just take it all in. I also liked the little hangers outside to put your wet bathing suits to dry.  Our room was standard but clean and a nice spacious bathroom. Fluffy towels comfortable bed. Good housekeeping. A fridge safe and I can't remember but thought there was a kettle or coffee maker. 
They had entertainment in the bar that was maybe a bit cheesy for a younger crowd. I actually really enjoyed it because it was nice to stay in the hotel in the evening and I thought the music had good variety. We stayed for 3 nights but didn't want to leave! cons: Just a note: Lots of stairs to the beach if you have mobility issues.
pros: Everything .. location  staff  facilities  food .. excellent cons:
pros: Beautiful hotel staff were friendly room was clean and well maintained. Lovely location near the beach cons: Liked everything

pros: Very enjoyable stay. Excellent location close to restaurants shopping and beautiful Falesia beach. Very helpful and friendly staff. Great breakfasts and dinner too. Hope to visit again later this year. cons:

pros: Location location and breakfast all was very nice! Staff exceptional cons: Room charging for electronics was terrible as there were none at bedside and the plugs kept falling out just not ideal for today’s electronics used.  Our air conditioning failed in middle of night!  That wasn’t good.

pros: This place is lovely super clean and the most amazing grounds and views.
The whole complex is well looked.
Bedroom a good size with ritual toiletries and super comfy beds.
Breakfast great selection and plentiful fizz and pastries for breakfast..what more does one want!
Private beach don't be put off with the steps it's easy going and the beach and views are worth it.
Pool area very clean pool towels very handy. Indoor pool is great and the spa treatments are amazing!
Mini market bars restaurants and few shops within walking distance and trips available to be booked.
Very relaxing couple of days away.
Staff friendly and helpful managed an early check in and late check out. cons:
pros: Beautiful gardens magical views very silent we could enjoy views without music from bar very thank you❤️❤️❤️paradise!!!!!! cons: Old furniture in rooms  bad smell in rooms

pros: Great food buffet cons: Pool water too cold
Gym very basic
pros: Brilliant stay with very friendly staff and great food. Beautiful location too. Made us feel very welcome and looked after out little daughter. cons:

pros: The location and the ground are absolutely beautiful. The hotel offers activities and entreatment. The stuff vs helpful welcoming and accommodating all needs. cons: The room was very small and dated. Bathroom very small.

pros: Breakfast spread was nice. The evening buffet was decent - we tried it twice - there was a lot of choice even if no item was particularly good - with a kid in tow that was useful to ensure they wld find something worth eating.  Didnt get to try the outdoor pool as it was cold and didn't see many people swimming in there. The indoor pool was warm with temps between 28-32C which was great for swimming with a 2 year old. cons: The children play areas both indoor and outdoor were quite poor. The 3HB opposite had much better play facilities for kids - which made this hotel feel a bit dated. They only offered 1 bottle of water at check-in there was no replenishment of the bottle every night which shld be common practice.
pros: View and proximity to Felesia beach indoor swimming pool and good buffet restaurant breakfast and dinner. cons: Limited what you can do if it is wet and windy.
pros: Very beautiful hotel in nice location clean cons: Spacious rooms clean has a lot restaurants food is good we like it and will be back 100%
pros: Amazing location and scenery and very comfortable friendly hotel cons: Nothing we can think of....
pros: Beautiful hotel with a lovely pool and grounds cons:
pros: The hotel is placed perfectly above the ocean.  It’s beautiful grounds cons: Our view was of the parking lot.  Our room was a bit dated
pros: rich beakfast buffet falaise difficult to walk cons: wanting a better room had to pay a steep value added price
pros: Lovely sea cliff location cons: Not a lot to be honest. Perhaps a modernisation of some of the bedrooms is needed

pros: Stunning cliff location. Spacious room with a comfy bed and pillows. Complimentary bottle of water. Rituals toiletries. Lovely towels. Great breakfast. cons: Outside parking spaces limited. Underground parking €5. Too small indoor pool.
pros: Beautiful grounds .. Fantastic Breakfast..Comfy Rooms ..Beautiful Beach.. Good Value.. 😎👍 cons:
pros: Beds were amazing! Great location  Yummy breakfast Beautiful pool area cons: Could hear people in room next door talking and going to loo which was bit grim
pros: The staff were friendly and attentive the location was very nice and have an access to the beach cons: The hotel somehow needs renovation as the toiletss are old
pros: Everything was fine.  Especially liked the fresh fruit at breakfast. cons:

pros: Amazing breakfast buffet! Great staff very professional and friendly. Please be patient with them during the off season - probably less people working so they are very busy but trying their hardest. Some guests were quite rude to the workers. Spa services were great the location and view is amazing. Perfect for a relaxing stay! cons: There was no option for double beds (the rooms have single beds next to each other so there’s a gap). Maybe if you upgrade the room size.

pros: The hotel is in a gorgeous location with beautiful grounds and many spots to enjoy the sea breeze. The food is excellent and the staff very helpful. I had a room with a balcony and sea view with full board included an excellent value. cons: Only a few minor points-the minibar was empty on purpose but the form for ordering drinks was missing. You have to use your room key to get any electrical power in the room which is awkward and annoying when the TV pops on each time. The duo playing music in the bar was really really awful like super cheesy.

pros: The breakfast was great with tonnes of choice and the food was well cooked. The rooms are very spacious and comfortable I highly recommend. A very nice pool and jacuzzi cons: The gym is pathetic it was very small and not much in it tbh expected a better gym
pros: Ig was amazing!!!!! All of it cons:

pros: Location Facilities the indoor pool was fabulous especially as January weather is a lot cooler. They had an indoor kids playroom also which was a nice surprise. The room was spacious clean and warm as it was a cooler month of the year. 

 The buffet breakfast had a great variety it was very busy so good to get down early but it was always fully stocked with everything. Crepes were a big hit with my toddler.

The staff were AMAZING. Mariana looked after us everyday for lunch in the restaurant by the pool. Everyone was so so lovely. cons: The hotel was closing until February we would have extended if it was open. We will be back again in the summer!

pros: This is simply a superb resort. We would strongly recommend anyone visiting Albufeira to stay at this place instead of anywhere within the Albufeira town. It is close enough to the town (15 mins by taxi) to be able to visit anytime you want and far enough to enjoy its own private beach at Falesia. There are two swimming pools one outside and one indoors with jacuzzi. We loved the indoors one during cloudy days. The view from the facility over the cliffs is breathtaking. Only a few flights of stairs lead you to the pristine Falesia Beach which is almost empty during sunrise hours. The breakfast at the resort is amazing with a lovely spread and so are the buffet dinners. If you want something else you will find a few nice restaurants within 5-10 minutes walking distance. Overall this is the best resort experience we had in Europe. Highly recommended. cons: If we nitpick we will have to say that the Italian restaurant and the night bar on the property are not the best we had. We would expect better cocktails at such a resort. The buffet dinner was honestly better in value and quality over the Italian restaurant. That's all everything else was amazing.

pros: Fantastic hotel nice vibe great breakfast with lots of variety very nice buffet options for lunch and dinner Rooms are spacious very clean  and comfortable. 
All personnel were very friendly and made extra efforts to make the stay memorable. Michel at the bar was super friendly. Receptionist are quick and professional.  Best beach in the Algarve amazing views. cons:
pros: Everything cons:

pros: Location outdoor facilities and garden cons: Very small rooms
Pretty cold (winter time)
pros: Great location beautiful beach perfect breakfast cons: Room looking @ the parking spa small and crowded have to pay for sauna and extra for also extra for the turkey bath
pros: Everything was clean. cons: Nothing
pros: Everything..mostly. cons: The brown wardrobe doors.need a little updating.!

pros: Everything. ! cons: The brown wardrobe doors and doors.
Having to pay for the sauna.!
The jacuzzi not working on my visit.

pros: Nice location good value excellent breakfast clean. cons: The staff at the counter!  Rude could care less if you stayed or how was your stay or if you were dead or alive.  I know robots that have better personality!!
pros: Breakfast excellent. Pool spacious. Plenty of sun loungers cons: Buffet dinner not hot enough.
pros: Superb quality hotel lovely rooms superb food cons: The overall sense that each and everyone was made to feel special. Total luxury feel and great location

pros: Very friendly staff rich breakfast including glutenfree and lactosefree products cons: It would make sense to heat the pool outside as it was really cold. I think it could be done with solar panels
pros: Beautiful views great food fantastic beach cons: Didn’t really have a bar or a gift shop.

pros: Location next to the beach 
Food for breakfast and dinner was excellent 
Lovely relaxing place to stay cons: Rooms/Furniture are dated.. but everything else was excellent and would stay again
pros: Everything cons: Nothing

pros: It was my birthday so there was a bottle of wine in the room so nice.
Amazing breakfast  amazing sea view coffee and tea in the room. Just the perfect place to relax. Staff are very friendly. cons:
pros: Extraordinary. The food the location the service. I would happily visit again. The view. The room might be smaller but the view compensates it. cons:

pros: Staff was without hesitation the star. Of course the views also were amazing. All the experiences together made an absolute experience. cons: Weather was still very acceptable so more options to have dinner lunch or breakfast outside to enjoy the views would be great.
pros: Super location. Clean and relaxing hotel cons: Nothing

pros: Lovely location not in the hustle and bustle of Albuifera. Loved the beach walks in the morning as the hotel is right on the beach. Spacious rooms and a delicious breakfast with lots of options. Friendly and helpful staff. cons: Nothing.
pros: Location and food were outstanding cons:
pros: Beautiful views of the beach comfortable room with sea view breakfast buffet indoor pool/jacuzzi/spa was nice to use. Location not too far from other towns - Albufeira Faro Alvor etc cons:
pros: Hotel location staff....excellent cons: Nothing
pros: friendly staff cons: a bit big for us

pros: The pool area was great and never overly crowded nor did people get up early to leave towels down for the day which was great.
The breakfast was lovely and abundant.
The area that overlooked the cliff beach was beautiful. 
The rooms were comfortable and quiet.
You can easily walk down to the beach below. cons: The area in which the hotel is located is a little far from either vilamoura or albufeira but it does have a small little village town near it( although not much to eat or drink in that area as its kinda quiet). You can get taxis for cheap enough to either town but just something to bear in mind. 

The facilities such as tennis or pool or anything else all had a fee which I found a bit excessive.

pros: Beautifully landscaped wonderful views of the ocean and cliffs. Easy access to the beach. Beds were comfortable. Hotel clientele was very quiet (mostly older couples not many families). cons: Breakfast buffet was great and well worth it. The other meals besides breakfast at the main restaurant were nothing special. Rooms were generally quiet except voices carried from the hallway if anyone was walking past.
pros: Beautiful location room are OK average though the gym is located in a strange area on it’s ￼own no bathrooms no tow￼els… cons: The beach and ￼Basilico restaurant
pros: Breakfast had lots choices. cons: Sauna and steam room not available to use. Looked like an additional charge to use. Jacuzzi not working.
pros: Food was very good. cons:

pros: Breakfast  excellent choice. Plenty of space & sun loungers around the pool also very peaceful garden area. I liked the fact that there was no loud music blaring out around the pool area. cons: Obviously you couldn’t move the beach but you’d want to fairly fit & active to negotiate those steps down & up every day.
pros: Great location view from the room comfortable   bed and access to the spectacular beach! cons:
pros: Breakfast was great.  Location was beautiful.  Staff was helpful. cons:
pros: Great hotel with great service cons: The people at the reception were not as friendly as the rest of the stuff.
pros: Really comfortable and well run hotel excellent room cons: Nothing

pros: The hotel locations is the best feature of the hotel the outdoor spaces are fantastic for relaxation. The access to the beach adds great value. The pool area is beautiful. Breakfast spread is great and should not be missed. Good service and the spa there is good too. cons: The rooms design are a bit dated and can do with a bit of refurbishment but are neat and clean.

pros: Clean -comfortable bed -amazing location and excellent breakfast cons: Slow service and reluctant staff bad dinner.

My husband and I stayed at this hotel for four nights and any time that they cleaned the room they did not leave a soap in the room any time we asked they were so reluctant to give us any and that was the only option to wash our hands no other alternative we had shampoo and body wash but no hand wash they just gave us one more in the last day which we did not use.same issue with the beach towel I had to come up reception for beach towel it took them 20 mins to provide us with beach towels it was none left in the room when I stated that to the reception they called the room service to make sure there was none left at our room I was offended they acted such a way as we are lying .I don't know why they made such a big deal with that.

We also did not like the dinner tried it once and never again .we went to the nearby hotel for dinner and it was top notch.

pros: The beautiful grounds. There were lovely shaded areas to rest and relax in with plenty of chairs and sun loungers and a nice pool area. 

There was also some stunning view points of the amazing cliffs and beach below with seating to sit back and take in the views.

We also enjoyed the daily  Happy hour!

There were daily Yoga classes that  added to the feeling of relaxation the hotel promoted.

Having a 12pm checkout was also useful . cons: That there only appeared to be one toilet for each sex in the reception/bar area. So I had to keep going back to our room to use the facilities there .
There was a  lack of background music on the terrace bar and in the Italian restaurant.  It would have added to the ambience to have some easy listening jazz or lounge music playing. The Italian restaurant did have a live band twice a week which was good if you were eating there.

The access to the stunning beach below the hotel was not for those with limited mobility or physical disabilities but they were well made and not too steep with level parts to break the desent. 136 steps though!
pros: Very good staff and service. Excellent location. cons:

pros: A great all round experience for a relaxing shortbreak. We enjoyed time by the pool at the beach and strolls to the small village centre. For dinner we visited the on-site Italian restaurant hotel buffet and  a meal in the village. All were excellent with choice of dishes and friendly Portuguese hospitality. cons:

pros: Location location location. Beautiful landscape seaviews & one of most beautiful accessible beaches in Europe. It takes about 10min walk down to the beach. We spent whole days there. Rooms need a brush-up looking a bit dated but functional clean. Balcony useful & welcome. The food is also very good. Plenty of choice variety & good quality. We would go again. cons: Rooms a bit dated. Alarms going off around 6:30am several days not sure why?

pros: It was our second stay here. We didn’t love it the first time but the beach location was better than any other option we saw at this price point. We also preferred this beach to others down the stretch as our “home” beach. It is clean not built up and has plenty of room. The tides are not too bad for swimming and the views are amazing. 

This time around we did more exploring. If you go at low tide you can walk along the beach across several town areas. It was a great way to get out of the resort and resort food options - we had lunch at another beach and walked back at high tide along the roads stopping in a neighboring town area for dinner. Would recommend!

The resort itself is clean and the staff were lovely. Breakfast was excellent for a buffet and the pool is large. cons: The food options were limited and the food was generally underwhelming. Next time I would pay for the view (our room overlooked the parking lot). The rooms need a refresh - the two twin beds are not ideal (switch to Queen beds please!) and the chairs are stiff and plastic (they squeak when you sit or move in them). The tv turns on every time you walk in the room.
pros: Everything is perfect better than we would imagine cons:

pros: Amazing view very friendly staff comfortable room and tasty food cons: Toilet cosmetics were not replenished during the entire stay until it was completely gone and I personally asked for refills.

For some reason beach towels are left in the room; there is no way to return them after the beach and exchange them for clean ones. All the sand on the towels has to be carried through the entire hotel to the room
pros: It’s location to beach .  It’s stunning gardens cons: There was nothing I didn’t like

pros: Location next to fabulous beach. Gardens pool & tennis courts very good cons: It is a little tired. The buffet food for dinner was average only ate there once. The Italian restaurant was booked out.
Had to book steam room normally this is free
pros: The beach is excellent! Breakfast buffet was very good. cons: The dinner was just OK.  We walked to town most nights to eat at local restaurants in Olhos de Agua.
pros: The location and facilities were amazing! Very private location and the beach walking was spectacular! cons:

pros: Excellent choice and quality of food in both restaurants and good service. Lovely views and terraces  quiet pool no loud music and plenty of sun loungers: perfect for a quiet and relaxing holiday. The staff were all friendly and professional. cons: The bar prices were quite expensive  but there was a daily happy hour with a good choice of alcoholic and non alcoholic drinks at half price.
pros: Loved the resort amenities and the beach is gorgeous. The breakfast buffet was amazing. The staff was great cons:
pros: everything.. cons: all good.. nothing i didn't like
pros: Comfortable room. Friendly staff. Breakfast was great cons: Pool water was a bit cold

pros: Absolutely stunning place the views the beach we loved it. The pools the jacuzzi the staff the green area were great cons: everything was great I would only suggest to improve a bit the outside kids playground :)

pros: Great location near a fabulous beach. Excellent cleaning staff polite and detailed. Maria was especially helpful and nice. cons: The omelet line in the morning was slow. Should have 2 cooks when busy.
pros: Super clean very nice staff good position with stunning view  very good food! cons:
pros: Everything we needed in one spot affordable luxury cons: Rooms were on the smaller side but only because the bed was so large!! Unsure if that is a negative but is the only one!
pros: Superb location cons: Photos are a bit misleading

pros: The location. Is stunning Restaurant and buffet are good.  Staff are very friendly and accommodating. cons: The price! Very overpriced for a very ordinary room. I was also surprised to have to pay extra to use Padel courts.

pros: The location of the hotel directly by the sea.
The view.
The parc around the hotel. cons: The price seems to me too expensive regarding the standing of the hotel and the services offered.

pros: The spa was amazing hard to book in so make sure you book when you arrive. 
The food was really good at both a la carte and buffet restaurants.

If you want to lounge at the pool make sure you grab a lounge chair first thing in the morning.
Hotel has some great walking trails. The beach is about 100m via stairs so make sure you are ready for those! cons: Quite busy lots of lines to beat the crowds

pros: We had a great time. We celebrated my husbands special birthday and received a nice sparkling wine and staff at Il basilico were very accomodati finding a table for us at the last minute on the spwcial day. cons: Gym- too small and two machines not working. My daughter and I are celiac and the braed/pastry options were limited.

pros: Super location 
Beach was fabulous 
Good breakfast spread 
Relaxing resort cons:

pros: I loved the choices of restaurantsthe cleanliness and accessibility to the centerthe rooms are really spacious too. Most of all I loved the beach side and beach facilitiesthe views are unmatched with the most gorgeous sunsetI had amazing walks there! cons:
pros: Everything cons:

pros: Amazing breakfast lots of choice
One of the best massages I have had was with Rogerico
From the blu spa cons: Robes in room
Coffee machine

pros: Outside area is lovely - large pool garden area and quick access to the beach. Loved the food at the buffet breakfast and dinner staff very friendly. Relaxing atmosphere. Hotel is kept very clean and lots of nice sofa areas to sit outside. Beautiful view of the sea and cliffs cons: The room was outdated fixtures and furniture quite old. The air conditioning broke multiple times. Staff were very quick to get it fixed but it is obviously an old room. Also no double beds just two single beds put together. For the price I would have expected a more modern room

pros: Superb property stunning scenery hotel management top class… cons: Our stay would have been perfect if one unfortunate event involving one staff did not occur during our stay. Fortunately hotel management dealt with it swiftly and professionally.
pros: Location service and cleanliness cons:
pros: Breakfast and access to the beach. cons: Nothing

pros: The food was very nice and the room was spacious and clean. Staff very friendly. They did everything to help us with our extra requests. The sea view from our room was amazing! cons: The swimming pool for children was dirty.
pros: Stunning location cons: Restaurant did not have great options for kids
pros: all good cons:
