pros: The breakfast  was really  good  and satisfying . The food was excellent.  We loved the location of the hôtel overlooking  the ocean  really beautiful ocean vue .we had à great  time. cons:

pros:  cons: The walk to the beach is a challenge. There are too many stairs up the hill and it can be exhausting. It would be best if the hotel had an elevator like Pine Cliffs or a shuttle to and back from the beach.
pros: Location was amazing right at the beach cons:
pros: That was my second visit in the hotel. It was great. The room is comfortable and clean. The hotel staff is very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was very good a lot of everything. cons:

pros: The air conditioning was excellent and the variety at the breakfast was very good. The hotel was very peaceful and had get facilities to relax. cons: Some of the prices were very extensive like 7 euro for an iced coffe
pros: It was not too busy cons: Separate beds
pros: Amazing hotel view cons: Nothing

pros: Good location not far from town centre. Very clean and tidy. Good reception area and very polite and helpful staff in all departments. No rush for the sun beds. cons: Although we knew about the 139 steps down to the beach it was still challenging going back up on a scorching hot day. But worth the effort to walk along the beautiful 7km beach.

pros: Hotel is located in very nice area surrounding was clean and keep in. 
Amazing view to the beach from hotel area and close to swimming pool also nice resting area. 
Breakfast plentiful various fruits cheeses sausages… cons: Little bit noisy during dinner time we had room at first floor above restaurant and kitchen.
pros: staff were lovely and the location stunning cons: had some difficulty getting sun beds and i think it was quite expensive

The hotel’s situated at a great location near the beach; food was great and plenty healthy options; we really enjoyed the morning yoga and Pilates sessions. cons:
pros: Amazing location and view! Excellent choices of food-we went for full board!! Absolutely value for money! cons: Nothing

pros: I loved the location with direct access to beach and a very relaxed vibe. the staff were great also and very friendly. cons: if I had to choose something the noise from corridor could be a bit loud occasionally when people come back to rooms. also would have like to see more snack/tapas options in menu as opposed to meals
pros: nice rooms great pool  spacious lobby cons: I couldn’t get a bottle of water anywhere when I was going to bed. I was told to drink the tap water😕

pros: Nice room and dinner breakfast excelent.
Watching dancing couples and have some drink in bar there...very nice invirement cons:

pros: The location  the friendly and helpful staff and the food. cons: The room was clean but very tired and could have done with a makeover  especially the bathroom which had seen better days.  The towels were old often torn and discoloured.  I would have expected a bit more for a 4 star hotel at that price.
pros: The pool the location breakfast and the staff. cons: Dinner buffet wouldn’t eat dinner there again. Lunch was good by the pool.

pros: The location is perfect with lots of different areas to relax and chill out.  There's a great beach bar at the bottom of the cliff with an amzzing beach and the town is only a 5 minute walk away so really everything you need without going far. cons:
pros: Amazing pool area beautiful views direct access to beach and varied choice of breakfast options cons: Honestly can't fault whole stay
pros: close to beach cons: nothing

pros: We had a lovely stay at Portobay Falesia. The breakfast was excellent with a great choice of food. The staff were very professional and went out of their way to be friendly to everyone. We loved the pool area there were plenty of beds and the poolside bar served lovely snacks & lunch. cons: The room cleanliness could have been better. We were not given replacement pool towels when they took away the dirty ones.
pros: Good location and excellent facilities cons:

pros: Breakfast room was excellent and staff very friendly. cons: The bar closing at 11.30pm
pros: Perfect! cons: Leaving 😂
pros: So much to do. cons: Dinner Buffett could be more creative.
pros: The staff worked tirelessly to keep the whole hotel spotless. The facilities were great the food was really good the beach and surroundings beautiful. cons:

pros: Hotel with beautiful view nice pool great spa and overall great amenities. 
Personnel very friendly. Good bar and restaurant.
Comfortable and clean room. cons:
pros: Breakfast was good location great cons: Nothing

pros: staff were amazing 
facilities great 
excellent buffet breakfast cons: room was small

pros: The hotel was beautifully maintained throughout..pool gardens dining areas etc. Staff efficient and friendly. Pool towels provided in rooms every day unlike other hotels where acquiring them involved deposit and daily trips to reception to change them . Reception staff were multilingual and very helpful and friendly. Morning buffet breakfast was excellent. The staff in the dining areas were fantastic...so efficient and friendly. cons: The evening buffet was more than adequate if you liked fish and meat but was not for me and I found that many of the salads also had fish / meat in them.!! I would have liked a larger more defined area designated to vegetarian options.  The reception area is not in the best location as there is a large pillar partially blocking the view of available receptionists. Could I suggest that you put a hand rail on the steps leading from back door to pool area. On two occasions I observed a person stumbling backwards going up the steps and likewise stumbling going down .

pros: Very tidy near to the beach the swimming pool also great and always available sunbeds and besutiful view over the see from the hotel. The staff was very friendly and welcoming and last but not least the breakfast was amazing 10/10 👌 cons:

pros: Beautiful resort!!  Lovely grounds with lots of place to sit and relax and enjoy the spectacular coast!!
Amazing beach!!  Great restaurants a the resort and several within 10 min walking distance.  Resort has Delicious breakfasts with lots of choices.  Lovely pool and nice and quiet at the pool. Lots of umbrellas and lounge chairs.  Only 8km to visit Albufeira by taxi. cons: Loved it all!!!
pros: GREAT cons: Add another restaurant option
pros: excellent breakfast relaxed morning exercise class gym descent evening music happy hour nicely furnished lobby with cosy chairs cons: only 1st day supplied bottled water but very cheap to buy

pros: Food was delicious wonderful selection. 
Staff were very helpful and friendly lovely atmosphere in hotel and comfortable surroundings cons: -
pros: I liked the breakfast buffet cons: They didn't have traditional sardine pate

pros: Breakfast 
Indoor swimming and jacuzzi 
Close proximity to beach and other amenities cons: For couples the mattress should be double or king size
Singles bed x 2 inconvenient and not great to sleep
pros: Beautiful stay and right on the beach ⛱️ cons:
pros: The staff were so helpful and so friendly. The hotel was very clean. It's located very close to the beach. cons: Breakfast - some fish options would have been nice.

pros: Location is amazing. It is next to one of the must see places in Algarve. 
It was my birthday at this place during our stay so hotel left us bottle of chilled Champagne and hand written note which was very nice! cons: Bed should be double bed and not two singles.

pros: We loved our stay here the views were amazing. There were lots of chairs and umbrellas so we did not need to get down to the pool early to get one. Easy access to an amazing beach. Staff were delightful. I wish I could remember the name of some of them but sadly I don’t. cons: the only disappointment was the coffee which was usually bitter and sometimes lukewarm.

pros: Very nice resort. Grounds and property are well kept and quite nice. Buffet breakfast and dinner  were very good. Be aware that drinks are not included with dinner. The specialty restaurant was excellent and the price was very reasonable. Beds were very nice and the rooms were small but very comfortable. cons: You really need a rental car to explore the area.  The hotel will help you with that  but unless you only want to use the beach near the hotel  plan on it.

pros: Nice room with comfortable bed. Balcony with view over inland but for price is OK. So much food glad only stayed couple of nights but extra day on beach would have been good cons: Nothing really
pros: Amazing Location. Pool area beautiful staff very attentive. Food good cons: Superior room quite small balcony got no sun. Dinner in italian restaurant a little disappointing.
pros: Great location very friendly staff. cons:

pros: It was by far the best hotel I've ever stayed at in my life. Just exquisite. The massage room pool beach views food staff were all incredible. It was relaxing and quiet despite being busy. We will definitely be back. cons:
pros: Very well kept and spotlessly clean. good selection of food. and well presented. cons: No negatives.

pros: Staff were super friendly
Hotel was exceptionally well run
Bilingual receptionist 
Clean 
Food was good
Spa excellent cons: Nithing it was perfect
pros: Lunch at La Basilica was excellent.   Wonderful happy efficient staff.  Seating area overlooking the blue sky and sea gorgeous. cons: Nothing.
pros: Great choice of food cons: Twin bed not double

pros: The location of this hotel was perfect for us.  It allowed us to travel along the Algarve Coast and into Spain as well.  The hotel staff was very friendly the facilities and location to the best beach was phenomenal.  This hotel has the best views and was very relaxing.  We have recommended all the Portobay locations to everyone we know.  We also stayed at the Marques in Lisbon and have the same opinion. cons:

pros: facilities location cleanliness excellent staff! cons: Rm 275 had a septic smell that did not go away. For breakfast we would have preferred the latte machines otherwise everything else was wonderful!
pros: Fantastic Beach very clean hotel cons: Service in the Italian restaurant was very slow.

pros: The property was gorgeous. The views from the hotel were stunning and the landscaping was really impressive. They offer a happy hour everyday which helped on the price of drinks. Easy to get down to the beach and not overtaxing either. I saw some older couples taking a break but they have benches along the way for that reason with shade. Nice little restaurant down at the beach as well. The pool was clean and refreshing. The hotel room was as you would expect. Clean and great air con for a hot day. Shower was excellent - came with Ritual shower products. The staff were exceptional - so friendly and didn’t forget us. They had music every night but it was cheesy and not much of a vibe - more background music for late night drinks and for an older crowd but can’t complain as we weren’t looking for a wild time! location from airport was also a massive plus. Uber made everything very easy and affordable. Easy and cheap to get to Albufeira as well for an evening. Also had good activities for adults like pool and tennis (although had to pay extra for everything). cons: It was expensive for the drink and food on the property and the food quality could have been just a bit better but we were going for convenience of not leaving the property at lunchtime. It wasn’t horrible but also wasn’t incredibly happy spending 40€ on a subpar lunch.
pros: incredible location beautiful swimming pool great staff in particular Joana and Michal at pool restaurant Hussein at evening bar and Emanuel in the spa! cons: our bedroom was small
pros: The food good room shower internet location great breakfast cons: Only English TV channels were Sky News and BBC news and BBC didn't work. There was some random film channel with subtitles.

pros: All staff weee hard working and very friendly. Everyone greeted you and smiled. They were all very pleasant. The pool area restaurant and back gardens were clean and well cared for. cons: The care pet in our room was a little ripped. The drying rack on the balcony should have been installed on the side that gets the most sun.

pros: We loved the convenience the location the cleanliness the staff the food. I don’t know that we’ve ever stayed anywhere where we had absolutely zero complaints but here that was the case. Completely happy and zero complaints. cons: There was quite literally nothing that we didn’t like and we are quite particular about a few aspects of holiday accommodations so this is a big deal!

pros: Clean hotel & beautiful view of the sea as good location. we were half board and buffet restaurant was good you might struggle with allergies as gluten free options were only at breakfast and no labels if ingredient’s at dinner cons: smokers around pool and entertainment poor we walked to a nearby hotel some evenings as more lively.

The food is fantastic. Breakfast was incredible! cons: The rooms could be modernised but they were still clean nonetheless!

pros: Hotel facilities pool food breakfast

pros: Wonderful location overseeing the ocean. You can access the beach or stay at swimming pool. Great to relax! cons:

pros: Very good location stairs from the hotel directly to the beach. Amazing view from the sea view room. Good breakfast. Rooms cleaned every day. Free parking outsite od the hotel. Friendly staff. cons: Room in the far end of the corridor looking over the car park was above the kitchen - it felt dingy and was very loud - started at 6/7 in the morning all sorts of noises I guess from the kitchen or backdoor of the hotel- avoid

pros: views cons: room view (requested a sea view but wasn’t the case) 
the coffee in the breakfast not nice

pros: We loved the hotel! Peace and quiet all around. Very comfortable quiet room (as we requested in advance). Wonderful friendly staff . 
Excellent location and access to the beach.
Highly recommended! cons:

Minor issue with the showers getting boiling hot or icy cold every few seconds.

pros: Excelent location and access to the beach. 
Amazing view and green space! 
Good food. 
Amazing staff. cons: Beds were a bit uncomfortable

The furniture/decoration dated

Really unconvinient:
Our room was right above the bar. 
Result: noise & music every night until at least 23:30. We had a hard time to put our baby to sleep. These kind of rooms should not be attributed to someone with a baby.

pros: We loved the hotel!!  It was way better than we expected.
-  Staff:  very nice friendly and helpful. 
-  Restaurant by the pool was very nice. Breakfast was excellent. 
- Room: it was very comfortable clean and stunning sea view. It was worthy to spend more for the view. Very quiet room don't hear anything (neighbours/staff etc) 
- We went in April and water was cold  weather was lovely. We didn't use the outdoor pool neither enter the sea.
- Location was very good.  Quiet area but some restaurants 5min walking distance to the hotel. Not too far the party area in Oura or Old Albufeira(15/20min by Uber). cons: - Bed : we sleep in an extra firm bed  at home I would rather a firmer mattress but the bed was ok.  Not bad.
pros: room was cleaned everyday food was amazing especially the restaurant round the pool. cons: nothing
pros: comfortable beds good shower sea view rooms great breakfast & located on a cliff above a beautiful beach. cons:
pros: basically we liked everything. location facilities staff services… cons: the only small minus is the restaurant by the pool that could easily be much better.

pros: The hotel has everything you need for a summer break. Comfortable clean and secured. Huge outdoor space indoor and outdoor swimming pools and excellent views. cons: Kids outdoor playground needs upgrading.

pros: - stunning view

This is one of the best hotels I've ever stayed in Europe cons: - slow check-in and check-out process staff should be more organized

pros: Perfect safe and basically private beach few minutes away.
Staff are amazing. cons: Annoying tourists zero tolerant with kids... If you have noisy kids stay somewhere else. No need to put extra eur for charity on check out account.

pros: Awesome breakfast great in-house restaurant. Loved the indoor swimming pool and jacuzzi. The location is great too. And dont worry about the fact that the hotel doesnt have double beds. If you request ahead of time they can join the twin beds to make a really comfy queen size bed. We are definitely coming back! cons: The front desk staff are very polite but I think they can be a just a tiny bit more attentive to guests waiting to speak to them. But other than this very minor thing the staff are great!
pros: Breakfast was very good - Buffet dinner was excellent cons:

pros: Buffet breakfast was very good lots of varieties to choose from and yummy. Room had good view and comfortable. Outdoor pool was relaxing with a nice view. Indoor pool with jacuzzi was very good for chilling. cons: TV automatically starting as if there are strangers in the room.
pros: The hotel and the staff are excellent! cons: nothing.

pros: Great location lots of things to do. Amazing breakfasts and food. Great facilities and lovely walks. cons: if we had to pick one thing it would be that some of the staff weren’t overly friendly but on the whole mist were

pros: The location. Gorgeous sunrises and sunsets along the cliffs framed by wildflowers around the property.  The facilities are dated and worn but it evident that the property is well-cared and clean.  The staff are very nice. cons:

pros: Fantastic location - good restaurants within walking distance and direct access to the beach. The staff is very helpful. Good food provided at hotel restaurants. cons: The restaurants at the hotel didn’t have allergen menus and as I am lactose intolerant it was stressful ensuring that my food is safe for me to eat. I was once served an incorrect meal (the staff were very apologetic and didn’t charge for their mistake) but all could have been avoided if the information on what’s contained in each of the dishes was readily available.

pros: Breakfast was so lovely and set us up for the day. The property was so beautifully planned out with so many lovely sitting areas and nice designs. The staff were all so happy and helpful. Really made us feel welcome. Was so sad to leave today and can’t wait to come back. cons: The rooms really need screen doors so that you can enjoy the cool evening ocean air without the addition of terrifying cockroaches flying in to say hello. We also wish we had been encouraged to book the spa before we came as we were really looking forward to treating ourselves but it was totally booked up. I was also disappointed that our shuttle taxi to the hotel was free but back to the airport it was €49. That was a bit of shock.
pros: clean calm the view cons: nothing

pros: Great clean and friendly hotel perfect location with steps leading down to the beach from their gardens breakfast was included and it was fantastic every morning especially with me being a fussy eater. I could not fault this hotel in the slightest and I would stay again! cons: nothing
pros: Everything was perfect! cons:
pros: breathtaking views amazing breakfast large selection of breakfast very helpful staff cons:
pros: fab location fab breakfast.  friendly efficient staff.  great facilities. spa and yoga.   no complaints. fab fab fab cons:
pros: Consistently friendly and helpful staff excellent selection and quality of food at both breakfast & dinner. Located five minutes from the beach and ten minutes walk to the little village cons:

pros: I liked the walk to the beach which was absolutely beautiful!  Breakfast was excellent.  The restaurant was good fresh fish and vegetables were tasty.  Waiting staff were friendly.  Overall the hotel was clean.  I liked using the gym although not all equipment worked well.  Did not use the pool but it looked great!! cons: I wanted to have a dessert and hot chocolate in the evening outside looking over the cliffs and beach where the seats and tables were but when I had asked about this at the Italian restaurant there seemed to be an issue with this.  They did allow me to do so reluctantly.  I returned my glass and dessert plate to the restaurant when I had finished but their initial reluctancy did ruin my quiet time when looking over the cliffs and beach.  I used the gym but not all the equipment worked properly.  On arrival to the hotel one member of staff at reception I found unfriendly.
pros: Great location well looked after very attentive staff. cons: not much
pros: the variety of food in the buffet was good the view is beautiful the location between beaches is amazing cons: The attention in the restaurant basilico or so the second restaurant was not good

pros: location location location! dream spot beautiful views and access to cliffs and beach a true jewel. Very clam respite feel great breakfast buffet reasonable pool side drinks and snacks. cons: nothing!

pros: everything - great location friendly helpful staff superb accommodation and facilities cons: nothing
pros: Breakfast  pool and location cons:

pros: the hotel’s location is fantastic the day beds overlooking the cliffs are so relaxing and tranquil. there are some steps from the hotel down to the beach which is perfect. there was champagne available at breakfast every morning and the beds were very comfortable. we also booked massages which were the perfect way to end the trip. cons: the walls are quite thin so there was from noise from other rooms.

pros: Breakfast and location surpassed our expectation cons: We were disappointed in the twin beds. We requested a double. 
The location to the beach was outstanding.

pros: location is fantastic steps down to 5 miles of beach cons: buffet for evening meal - it’s good quality just not a buffet fan. There’s also a small Italian restaurant option which is very good quality and value for money.
pros: Fantastic servicepolite people cons:
pros: beautiful location and amazing food facilities and staff cons: nothing!
pros: Clean close to some restaurants and shops great access to the beach for walks cons:
pros: Beautiful property all around......staff were friendly and helpful!  Enjoyed the music entertainment at the bar. cons: The bar area should accommodate more than nuts with drinks.
pros: the food was lovely staff excellent the rooms and comunal area exceptional cons: there was nothing I didn’t like
pros: Breakfast was fantastic. Nightly live music was great. Service was prompt and polite. Hotel was very clean. Beautiful views of the ocean. cons: Shower was just ok. Room was a bit small.

pros: Good buffet breakfast and dinner 
Great tennis courts 
Lovely indoor pool 
I arrived early (11am) but my room was ready so I was able to check in early ! cons: Slightly outdated furnishings in bedrooms 
Jacuzzi not working for whole length of stay

pros: The location is stunning the food was excellent the lady in the spa reception was incredibly helpful and knew exactly what we needed to relax. All staff very friendly. cons: The charge for the sauna and steam room I was told it was for just our room to use for the 45 minutes while it was booked by me but lots of other people using it too so despite paying for it I couldn't really get in the sauna when I wanted to.

pros: Beautiful location on the cliffs above the beach; nice facilities. We enjoyed room service and eating on our balcony with a view of the pool and the ocean. There was a great breakfast buffet. All staff were friendly and helpful. cons: NA
pros: The views are incredible and the food was amazing cons:

pros: The location was excellentright on the cliffs overlooking beach. All the staff were really helpful no request was too big or small. They made us feel comfortable and relaxed. Room was ready for early check-in without requesting when we arrived at 10am. That really made our holiday amazing from the first moment we arrived. Cant wait to go back. cons:

pros: Great location and ocean views from the hotel garden and restaurants (2). Great staff. Clean and comfortable room. Within walking distance of Olhos d'Agua sea front so plenty to do nearby. cons: The hotel gym could have been al little better equipped but perefectly adequate all the same for fitness gurus on a short stay.
pros: Fantastic location with amazing views. The staff were brilliant and so helpful. cons:

pros: Everything was as we expected. Clean beautiful room with a balcony. The huge breakfast is really rich of many different continentals. 
Suna make our stay perfect. 
We really had a good time and we are going to go back for sure.
Many thanks to the team. cons: Leaving
pros:  cons: Extra price for the sauna.
pros: exceptional breakfast breathtaking view beach just 5 mins away:) cons:

pros: The relaxing environment garden and views and location with easy beach access. Breakfast and dinner buffets were good quality overall with great choice. Efficient room servicing. cons: The view from the balcony and second-hand smoke from other balconies were unpleasant. Towels seemed to be replaced even though they were left hung up indicating it was unnecessary so that was a waste of energy. Unnecessary and annoying hotel communications pre- and post-stay

pros: Nice property nice beach good temperature indoor pool when they make an effort then dinner was good! Nice staff cons: Same breakfast EVERYDAY! Even the position of every food item would be the same. We had the exact same breakfast for 6 days! 
No cut fruits. They keep whole fruits. 
Desserts are repeated.
Sometimes I think they keep food/desserts from the previous night. 
Old dated rooms
They charge 10.50€ for the tennis rackets. Can be free of charge as there is not a lot of recreation around or on property

pros: Good variety for the buffet breakfast and lovely breakfast room - very attentive staff. cons: Walls between rooms were thin! I could hear alot from other rooms but it is the same in most hotels - I couldn't find fault elsewhere.

pros: The sea cliff & beach views from the pool were beautiful; live music every night in the bar area and some nights in the Italian restaurant. cons: When we went (in November) it was a -much- older crowd - mostly older Germans who seemed bothered by our teens & pre-teens - especially in the pool area.  We were very surprised by this and wouldn't recommend staying at this property if you're a family with young kids & teens.  Perhaps the summer stays are different (there is indeed a kids club) but but there were absolutely no other young adults on property during our stay - not so fun for the teens especially when other guests seem constantly annoyed by them.

pros: breakfast super fine great variety of the food 
location of the hotel is amazing if you want to be close to pure beautiful nature views are amazing cons: hotel is a little bit out of date
equipment is old needs update and reconstruction 
bathrobes are not included in room price as well as sauna in wellness center. you can have them only for additional cost. bathrobe costs 2.5 euros per day and are very low quality . it’s a little bit strange for 4 stars hotel

pros: Fantastic Hotel great amenities room was clean and very comfortable staff is very friendly and helpful reception is fast and professional Anastasia was very helpful. Breakfast was amazing variety and great quality ( much better than higher priced resort near by) Dinner was also very good great Buffet options with freshly made fish and also meat right in front of customers. We noticed very good preparation knowledge and quality products. 
Also spectacular view to the Falasia Beach beach is absolutely spectacular great walks
and swim good access thru steps. 
Nice bar area with amazing views we enjoyed our drinks and saw dolphins in the distance just perfect. cons:
pros: It's just a perfect hotel with absolutely wonderful staff. cons:

pros: This hotel is absolutely beautiful. We went there on a honeymoon trip and it surpassed our expectations in every way ! The rooms are comfortable the breakfast is one of the best I’ve had in a hotel (and I travel a lot!) the food is delicious the heated swimming pool and jacuzzi are great. cons: we loved everything.
pros: The location the gastronomy and comfort. cons: Some of the staff in the restaurant and bar are not very professional.
pros: location. Staff. Cleanlinesses. Breakfast. Ambiance. Comfort. cons: zero

pros: We really enjoyed our 3 night early November stay; the weather was great (20/21c) and the hotel is so pretty well kept and clean and matches the description and photos on this site. Parking is free on the road and thestaff are very friendly and efficient. Our room was very nice with comfy beds a good shower and a balcony with fabulous views. We didn’t use the outdoor pool as the water felt quite cold but it is open all year and plenty of other people were enjoying a swim. The indoor pool and jacuzzi are warmer but small so they can be too crowded for comfort. Didn’t use the spa. The beach is stunning! Yes there is a flight of steps down from the hotel but these steps are sturdy and safe with little seats to rest on all the way.  The restaurant has good food with plenty of choice for every diet although I found the dinner buffet dishes  a bit over salted. The Italian bistro food was splendid but the lighting could do with being a bit more subtle and atmospheric. Happy hour in the bar (5-6pm) was fun - perhaps a bit too fun lol! Very well priced drinks which if you order carefully can keep you going until supper time! Would prefer not to have the football screen on constantly in that area - no one ever watched it! 
Traveller tip - We had a lovely time but we were staying out of season so the hotel was not full. Nonetheless it was surprisingly busy. Therefore I would think in peak holiday season it might be a bit overcrowded for comfort. cons: Leaf blower under our balcony at 7am one morning and badly behaved kids in the indoor pool and jacuzzi - the spa should be adults only. 
Traveller tip - in the restaurant walk to the far end to be seated as it is less crowded and quieter.
pros: great beach good foood well maintained and run. excellent staff. rooms plenty adequate cons:
pros: Everything  the breakfast staff couldn't be more helpful . cons: Nothing to complain about at all
pros: location cons: nothing
pros: location. good breakfast cons: a/c could be better

pros: the location is suberb the beach was absolutely amazing water temperature was just right clear water the hotel staff was very friendly and professional Iryna and Anastasia were helpful and fast very friendly. 
The breakfast is very good they had everything. 
the room was good hairdryer and amenities good quality. 
The cliff terrace is amazing drinks are well served best moment was to see the dolphins from the cliff overview terrace. 
The bar had life music and drinks were nice. cons: n/a
pros: amazing location great views and very friendly staff. cons:

pros: Good range of facilities including indoor pool gym and spa cons: Too many loungers for the number of guests. poor quality plastic loungers around the pool and garden area. spoilt an otherwise lovely setting by making the area cluttered.
pros: Absolutely everything friendly staff good food at reasonable prices. Perfect place for relaxing holiday cons: Nothing

pros: The outside area is lovely. The staff are friendly & helpful. The food is good . The hotel is very clean & the beds comfortable. cons: The bedrooms are a little tired & towels need upgrading. Wish there was another restaurant.

pros: We have been to the hotel in September a number of times.  We like the staff and location particularly.  We always have a sea facing room too and pay extra for this. cons: This time we did have one thing that we didn't like.. . This related to the outdoor music near the Il Basilico restaurant.  The live music was VERY loud and everyone in the sea facing apartments would hear it.  The band plays for the restaurant but We didn't want to hear it but we were forced to close the window to drown the sound. The band either plays inside the restaurant or turns down the sound significantly if outside.. WHY NOT JUST PLAY PIPED MUSIC TO THE DINERS!

pros: very clean and well run hotel . very glad we had sea view rooms ! which have. fantastic coastal view . Pool is very clean and lovely for good swimming first thing . Breakfast great but busy ! situated above a beautiful beach . Can walk a very long beach all the way to Vilamoura and back (10 miles) . We did root out some good restaurants in the village . cons: A little tired ( decor in bedrooms and bathrooms needs redoing ) 
A little expensive too especially the attached Italian restaurant! The beach is fabulous but the village Oleos De Aqua doesn’t offer a lot ? Certainly not a pretty village but then some of Algarve coastal areas are a little unattractive.We really had to root around to find good restaurants but they are there . 
We stayed a week with family ( sister and brother in law) and had a great time .
pros: Room was comfortable and view from balcony spectacular - Gorgeous Property! Great Breakfast Buffet cons: Dinner Buffet could be better.  Some main dishes were overcooked

pros: This place is so picturesque and quiet perfect for relaxing and unwinding around the pool. Breakfasts were really good with lots of different options to
pick. The beach is amazing but beware the water is freezing. cons: il basilica Italian restaurant was awful. my husband burnt the roof of his mouth on the worse spaghetti bolognaise he has  ever eaten.
pros: The location is incredible! The grounds are gorgeous. It’s an easy walk to the MOST beautiful beach! cons: Nothing
pros: The hotel was very clean and comfortable.The buffet dinner in the main restaurant was very good. cons: Cramped sun beds around the pool - but there was space around in the grounds.
pros: The pool area was so clean and always lots of sunbeds available. The staff were so helpful and nothing was a problem.Spotless clean and very comfortable cons:

pros: The hotel was nice. However at the first day there was a dirty towel on the bathroom and I has to call reception and they sent straight out housekeeping to remove the it. Later on I received an apology car from management. cons: Everything was fine

pros: the location is stunning and absolutely perfect. the walk to the beach and the view from the cliffs are gorgeous. the breakfast was delicious and varied. the wifi was perfect. cons: the staff are not as helpful as I would expect them to be. the hotel is very very expensive for its standard and frankly the standards of service need to be raised to justify the price.
pros: nice hotel  professional staff cons: missing a desk to work in the room
pros: Amazing resort-like hotel by one of the most beautiful beaches. There is so much to do and lots of great food options. cons:

pros: Premium location great ambience and amenities ideal for couples.
Charming hotel that doesn’t feel as big as it really is. cons: Gym only opens at 9am and since it’s ‘self service’ there’s literally no cost for the working hours to change to 8am or even 7am.

pros: Fantastic breakfast buffet and vicinity to an amazing beach Falesia ( be prepared to walk a lot of stairs) panoramic views beautiful nature around. Pleasant bar/restaurant with ( a bit of a )  cliff view. Nice staff in the spa. cons: Crowded pool area and very much "on display" . 
A very dull view from the room onto parking/other walls and windows..
Staff was adamant in  not allowing check in/giving rooms  earlier than stated 3 pm(!) . had to wait around about 2 hours...
pros: service cons: the walk from the beach

pros: Excellent WiFi never busy and fabulous food. Air conditioning worked superbly beds magnificent both comfortable and with superb linens. 
Food was excellent staff superb and the grounds and pool maintained daily to always be spotless. cons: Very little. Hard to pick holes in this exceptionally well managed hotel.
pros: Stunning scenery right on the beachfront in a small quiet town cons:

pros: Great location for relaxing and the Falesia beach. Cliff-top views over the sea are amazing. Half board buffet offered a good selection of meat fish salads and desserts to most tastes.  Good breakfast.  Best place to dine is the veranda area for the ambiance. Beds were very comfortable for us. Family suite room was spacious. cons: Family suite room - 2 bedrooms common area 2 bathrooms no sea view tiny balcony - were a little tired and showing 15 years of use. Some of the power sockets did not work and the master bathroom needed some cosmetic improvement. Disappointing given the price and a 4-star hotel.  Also can't get tap water with dinner - all bottled water is charged.

pros: The location is excellent. The beach is just a short walk away. But why leave the hotel? The swimming pool is excellent the food and the bar is great then view on the bay is marvellous the staff is super friendly and there are lot's of in-house entertainment (not 1 but 2 live music locations in the evening!) cons: The rooms are a little dated but there's nothing wrong with them. 
For a longer stay you might grow a little tired of the buffet-style dinners but there's also a "à la carte" restaurant

pros: Perfect location comfort pool no need to book sunbeds in the morning. Very near beautiful beach to reach in 5 minutes walk from the hotel. cons: Mediocre food buffet no drinks of any type included in all inclusive option even water is paid.

pros: Location is undersold on the website - This is a beachside hotel just a couple of minutes walk from a fantastic beach. Rooms were very clean and changed daily. Breakfast was fresh with great variety. Didn't spend much time round the pool.

Italian restaurant was fantastic but need to prebook to get a nice sea view. cons: The rooms don't let a lot of light in. This is fine at night but in the day it feels quote gloomy. Not the biggest problem as cannot imagine people spending a lot of time in the room in the day.

Rented a car as able to drive 15mins to Vilamoura and 25 to Vale De Lobo. Location around hotel very dated.
pros: Everything the location was great and there were many activities in the resort. cons: Nothing
pros: the location is amazing and  the view from the property breathtaking ! cons: minibar in the room was empty.
pros: All facilities were very good cons: Can't think of anything

pros: Exceptionnal buffet . Stunning View on the ocean.
Peacefull garden under the pine trees.
Location close to the beach
10' drive to Albufeira cons: As usual people some people on the rooms corridor are speaking loudly and bother guests all around
pros: the location cons: the room was smelly
pros: the location and the access to the beach cons: the noise of AC
pros: lovely pool very clean hotel excellent food cons: pool table out of order

pros: Buffet Breakfasts and Dinners were wonderful...great to see such an amazing choice.. cons: For some reason its not possible to pay cash for drinks especially poolside...its a better way to budget rather than having to slam everything on Credit cards
Found some very sour faced staff in bars...

pros: All the facilities where very nice especially the beach access. 
The view was amazing! cons:

pros: The Il Basilico restaurant was excellent and very good staff. The pool and whole site was very clean. Variety of food at breakfast was very good. cons: The grass on the putting green was too long. This is a very minor point and we still enjoyed playing as a family.

pros: We spent a weekend at the property. The hotel sits on the edge of a beautiful beach. It has its own swimming pool tennis courts and plenty of other places to spend time. We mainly had drinks. The staff speak many languages perfectly: Portuguese English French and German. It is a very lovely gesture to be able to use the pool and other facilities after check-out. We reached the hotel by bus the stop is 10 minutes from the main entrance.  I would recommend a stay at this property. cons: The only downside was the pizza in the restaurant I expected something better baked and tastier.

pros: The food offered at Porto Bay Falesia was absolutely superb.  The buffet breakfasts and dinners were extensive beautifully presented and we couldn't fault it.  The lunches offered at the poolside Il Basilico as part of our full-board option - were again beautifully cooked and presented.  All of the staff at the hotel - particularly in the restaurants - are an absolute credit.  
Incredibly comfy beds plenty of sunbeds for all we loved the poolside live jazz music in the evenings and the clifftop setting and outdoor seating areas have exceptional views over the sea. cons: Our family suite was enormous.  The hotel decor is perhaps a little dated and could do with a refresh.  A few potted plants around the Reception area and more of a 'wow' factor in terms of bedrooms and decor throughout the hotel would turn this from 'really good' to 'amazing'.  However this didn't detract from our stay at all - beautiful setting comfy beds incredible food and friendly attentive staff made our stay thoroughly enjoyable.

pros: The location is absolutely beautiful and it was conveniently located between the Atlantic Ocean and Spain allowing us to explore the whole southern coast line. Absolutely gorgeous region!  Food was good breakfast was fantastic and the cocktails were great. Lastly the staff were all super friendly and helpful. cons: The live music was terrible that could be improved upon. Also it took them a whole week to finally fix our toilet seat that was broken.  Could've given us a free drink for that hassle. Lastly housekeeping left their cleaning rag on my toiletry bag- was not happy about that although they all apologized and felt super bad about that.

pros: The food was absolutely amazing. The beach nearby was so stunning. The rooms were comfortable and clean! Loved our stay at this resort cons: Our only complaint was the shuttle. We asked for a shuttle to the airport and the shuttle costed us 65€ which felt insanely expensive. We later checked and an Uber would have costed us 40€. Wish we would’ve checked sooner.

pros: I enjoyed everything about this hotel. I'm absolutely in love with the place and I hope to come back! I'll recommend to all my friends and family. Couldn't be happier!

Thank you so much to everyone: restaurant and kitchen staff cleaning staff garden and swimming pool (...) I couldn't possibly name them all I appreciate your hard work. Thank you! cons: Everything was fantastic!
pros: Good cons: N/A
pros: fantastic views  best location . cons:
pros: staff service & location cons:

pros: The hotel is truly a place to relax. The beds are very comfortable and staff is super helpful. They provided harder pillows for us on request with no issue. Activities and live music was also nice. Breakfast is amazing cons: I think the staff in pool bar is overworked. We have seen one waiter working super long hours during our entire stay. 
The shower was working but it was obviously broken. The water comes out from both bottom and top head and it is impossible to fix it. The shower head is also very flimsy. it was still doing its job but I expected things like this not to happen for the price of the room.

pros: Nice pool and view on the sea. Plenty of sunbeds. Waiters were especially friendly. cons: More vegan options would have been nice. Also labelling in the menu if its with meat/vegetarian/vegan would be helpful.
pros: location and facilities cons: description on room on Booking.com need to better. I would have enjoyed my stay more if I had booked a sea view room.
pros: The food in the restaurant is delicious. Location is great. cons: The dinner restaurant crew could be a little more flexible regarding their rules.
pros: Excellent breakfast good location and very good staff. cons:

pros: I left my home car’s key in the room and checked out 😳 Many many thanks to the staff who found it called me to come back 😍👍🏻😀
Special thanks to the lady who cleaned our room #359 and a lady at the reception who called me occasionally she’s from Lithuania as I am 😍 cons: the wardrobe’s doors squeek so terribly that it’s better not to use it at all 😳 We had a side sea view room but in reality you don’t see any sea from the room #359 🙁
pros: Pool terraces cons:
pros: great views nice grounds and pool. super comfortable beds cons: too big for us
pros: Staff were incredibly helpful a good variety of food and the view was absolutely stunning!!! cons: -
pros: beautiful gardens spacious room’s amazing restaraunt cons:
pros: Good breakfast. Nice pool. Room ok cons:

pros: The location close to the beach is great. 
You can choose between the pool area the garden and the beach. Our favorite spot was the terrasse overlooking the cliffs and the beach (also there are only three spots and except for the terrasse at the poolbar it's the only spot with a view).
There are two nice restaurants at the beach (not part of the ressort).
The breakfast is tasty and the staff manages to keep the buffett filled even in rush hour. cons: Few things:
Albufeira is a center of mass tourism. We had a rental car so we toured around and didn't mind. 

The prices for afternoon snacks/drinks at the pool are quite high - and too high if you compare it with average pricing in the region.
pros: The location and facilities plus the friendly staff cons: Nothing to dislike

pros: outdoor space 
room 
location distance to beach cons: would be great to have another semi private area with the lounger beds looking over the beach they were difficult to nab. some things in the poolside restaurant were overpriced during the day

pros: Everything. So clean relaxing great food and location.
Staff were so professional and friendly. cons: Loved it all.
pros: Clean comfortable great staff. cons:
pros: amazing place cons:
pros: peaceful and beautiful views cons:
pros: stunning location no music at the pool.. could hear the sea and birdsong. incredibly clean. very helpful friendly discreet staff a real peaceful haven. amazing food cons:
pros: Staff are very friendly from reception restaurant staffmaids and bar staff.Hotel grounds are amazing incredible views and comfortable rooms. Breakfast was a fantastic buffet as well cons:
pros: Breakfast was excellent. Buffet dinner very good. Plenty of choice cons: Entertainment at nightnot great ...I would rate it poor really
pros: very stylish cons: nothing
pros: very clean location was good staff where friendly food was good cons:

pros: stunning views comfy beds very clean great service good food in a la carte restaurant access to beach cons: lack of entertainment/amenities for children bit tired in places  buffet was a bit limited & not that interesting

pros: beautiful hotel with friendly staff who couldn’t do enough to make your stay enjoyable. very relaxing holiday and the beach was amazing too. cons: a bit out of the way but it didn’t cost much for a taxi to the Old Town in the evening.  Also the entertainment was not good in the evening.

pros: The staff were very friendly and super helpful the outdoor entertainment at night was really lovely and the location couldn’t be more stunning cons: For the price the rooms are a tad small but that’s more than made up for with the notes above

pros: the facilities breakfast  dinner staff and live music were excellent I had a great time. cons: From the "sea side view room"  it is barely impossible to see the sea.
I would rather call it "Glimpse sea view room "  to be really honest with the customer.
Room was a bit outdated.
pros: nice room comfortable bed lovely view of the sea. cons: the steps down to the beach
pros: great hotel with a lovely pool very close to the beach cons: need a cat as not much around in terms of restaurants

pros: I can’t fault this hotel  it was spotless 
the housekeeping staff  gardeners etc were always around .
rye hotel staff were so helpful and friendly 
breakfast was 10/10 so much choice and things also cooked to order cons:

pros: The proximity to the beach and the views over the bay are amazing.
Staff are very warm and friendly and it's very clean. cons: Nothing

pros: Fantastic hotel staff facilities and food. The perfect location for a chill out and unwind. The Beach is also amazing cons: The only thing i disliked was the entertainment. Most nights the music was well below par and the large area with the stage really lacked atmosphere. would have been nice to have a smaller bar with some atmosphere and craic ( as us Irish say)
pros: location services cons: parking

pros: Lovely hotel comfy beds with top quality bedding fab breakfast friendly and accommodating staff nice pool area and sun loungers all well kept. Good little gym too for those who like to work out on hols. cons: Thought I’d requested a sea view but had a view of car park! Also would’ve been nice to get a proper welcome drink - could only have beer wine tea coffee juice. Glass of fizz would’ve been more appreciated seeing as though they offer it at breakfast! Still really enjoyed our stay.
pros: Lovely breakfast. Brilliant staff for bar and house keeping cons:

pros: Great pool & lovely food. 
Really good location & we had such an amazing long weekend for my little sisters hen party!!
Beautiful hotel with lots of facilities cons:
pros: The breakfast was wonderful. The most helpful staff and loved the fact the resort didn’t play the normal annoying “resort” music! Instead you could hear the birds and the ocean waves. cons:
pros: Breakfast was great with a variety of options on offer cons: The towels were a bit tired could do with an upgrade
pros: Everything! It was fantastic the first and foremost the location the facilities and for sure the staff. A peaceful holiday to recharge your batteries :) cons:

pros: generous sized property plenty of lounge chairs around pool and lawn area. lovely decks overlooking beach and cliffs for eating or lounging. Close to start of gorgeous 6km. beach (but many stairs down to it). Snack bar bar restaurant on site. Comfortable beds in nice room with private deck. Great location for the beach and close to restaurants on way to Praia da Olhos d’Agua. wifi worked all over property cons: Music from bar carried slightly to our room every night until 12. Room was close to outside stairs anove bar
pros: beautiful views cons:

pros: Location 10/10
Great food 
Very Clean cons: Very small matter that our room didn’t get serviced until 3pm in the afternoon. They have a lot of rooms to get around but could have done with fresh towels and supplies a bit earlier in the day. Did ask at reception 3 times before it got done. When it was serviced it was immaculate as if we hadn’t even moved in yet!
pros: location excellent/ staff friendly and very accommodating cons: rooms a little small

pros: The welcome from the front staff from the start of holiday to end The food was quite varied with at  least one thing you would like. Our room which was standard was really of a good standard . The one downside was the poor quality
of the towels and the old bathroom bath. the furniture could also do with an update. cons: AN UPDATE OF THE FURNITURE
pros: Staff were very helpful cons:
pros: The place was absolutely stunning. Great food and facilities. cons: The shower didn't work very well and bathrooms could do with an update.
pros: amazing views great breakfast and absolutely fantastic outdoor trains! cons: it would be great to have double beds

pros: Helpful staff very friendly open people. Breakfasts dinners are very tasty a wide variety of food.  champagne is offered at breakfast dinner is held in a comfortable environment a very tasty large selection of dishes.  beautiful pool clean water the pool is cleaned every day.  excellent location of sun loungers umbrellas everything is very clean around the pool. beautiful restaurant by the pool excellent food special thanks to the restaurant staff. The hotel area is like a green oasis.  everything is very beautiful a lot of greenery pine trees flowers.  In the heat you can always find a place in the shade of trees!! cons: probably the only thing I didn't like was the steps to go down to the pool .
This is very inconvenient. Especially for the elderly a big request to replace this.!
pros: location location location!  absolutely stunning views of the most spectacular beach I’ve ever seen. just jaw dropping. cons: nothing. I loved it

pros: Breakfast excellent choices and standard of food. Staff efficient at clearing and bringing hot beverages and restocking buffet when empty cons: Would have been nice to have been able to have a sundowner at the pool bar after 6pm but it closes then only to reopen again for reserved dinner guests.

pros: The pool was large and refreshing (some would say cold but it was totally swimmable). Really good pasteis de nata at breakfast. Bed excellent wifi by the pool access to the beach via a wooden staircase (quite long and steep). cons: The interiors are old-fashioned with used-looking carpets in the corridor and the room. Smallish car park (outside) but there was space on the street.
pros: everything cons: nothing
pros: location and comfort cons:

pros: The property is stunning! it is kept so clean! the staff is sooo friendly and helpful.  they really go the extra mile to help and make sure you are taken care of from reception to staff at meal times to cleaning staff! excellent staff! it’s excellent value for money! honestly one of the best holidays we have ever had!! cons: loved everything!!
pros: The hotel had very good amenities from the bar to the various restaurants pool and spa and access to the local beach cons: n/a

pros: Really nice hotel in a great location on the cliff top. Food was excellent buffet each night was fresh and hot at all times of serving with lots of choice. Staff and their service was very good always smiling and helpful nothing was ever to much and things were done quickly. cons:

pros: Excellent location. Grounds are beautiful 
A lot of free parking around the property cons: Dinner Buffett was a little pricey and charged for use of the sauna and steam room

pros: Breakfast was good room was clean three pools one for children and one heated inside. Landscape and surrounding beaches cons: There are plenty of balconies to which the sun never shines.... .a sharp screw on the bathroom floor the jacuzzi has seen better days
pros: Location and the grounds were beautiful! cons:
pros: Everything about the resort was first class. Excellent location with spectacular views and facilities. cons: Everything was exceptional. No complaints.
pros: Amazing hotel loved the decor. Room was good for the price we got. Amazing location by the sea wuth a pool and lovely seating areas. cons: More recycling facilities. That's about it.
pros: everything cons: n/a
pros: Comfortable and Clean and  breakfast was amazing cons: Nothing to mention

pros: It was one of the best breaks we have had. Nothing was too much trouble for the staff and the location was great. 

Would recommend for sure. cons:
pros: stunning views around the property and dinner in a La Carte restaurant was just amazing cons: nothing

pros: Location was excellent with loveky views over the sea. Over 100 steps down to Falesia beach which was fine but may not be suitable for less active. Staff were very friendly and helpful and lots of choice at breakfast and dinner. Low key entertainment and nice to relax around the pool without any loud music. Ideal for a lovely relaxing holiday or short break. cons: Pillows were a bit hard and curtains didn’t seem to fit the window properly - think they just need to be adjusted slightly.

pros: We had a wonderful bacony with view over the ocean — and we paid for it!! Personal service. They even sent me spumante for my birthday. cons: We were there in 2015. Little things are starting to wear creeking doors etc.

pros: The service from the staff were exceptional. From room service to the breakfast and bar restaurant staff. The pool was also great and there is plenty of sunbeds. cons: Our bed was two beds together so that wasn't fitting when you have a baby.

pros: The property was very clean and well organised. It also had a lot of different facilities to keep everyone entertained. Having both indoor and outdoor pools was a luxury in case the weather wasn’t great! cons: It was a bit remote in terms of nightlife and had only 2 nice restaurants nearby if you didn’t want to eat in the hotel. you needed to get a taxi to livelier spots.
pros: Lovely views and futility cons:

pros: Everything cons: Staff tried to charge me for a meal I already paid for earlier in the day and on another occasion they tried to charge me for beers I had at the bar that day even though I hadn't set foot in the bar until that night. Keep a hold of all receipts while staying just incase

pros: Breakfast was fantastic such a great selection! The view of the seafront was stunning and the facilities were brilliant- never stuck for something to do. pros: Good place to stay for a lazy holiday. Awesome views nice outdoors pool area. It’s not in the centre of Albufeira but not too far either which was perfect for us. Breakfast was outstanding  staff helpful and attentive. Rooms were clean and had all the facilities we needed. cons: We were a bit surprised that the room we had felt a little outdated. Same with the indoor pool and saunas. Also we weren’t lucky with our room view which was parking lot under the hotel building and other people’s rooms. It didn’t ruin our holiday but wasn’t the impression we got from the photos and hotel information.

pros: Lovely views over the beach quite a few restaurant/bars in walking distance good selection at breakfast comfortable sun loungers cons: Not great soundproofing between rooms - could very clearly hear our neighbours snoring/tv
pros: great location and facilities cons:

pros: The hotel is in a beautiful location and has fabulous grounds. 
Hotel staff are incredibly helpful hotel is really clean with reception being spotless. Housekeeping came in everyday. 
Facilities are great. Bed is comfortable room is well provisioned and good size. Nice balcony.
Really had a wonderful stay. cons: Would have been helpful to know when tour reps were onsite.
Having USB charging points in the rooms would have been super helpful.

pros: - Just a stairs devide from the Ocean with a beach of 7km
- Espectacular garden 
- Superb breakfast
- The foods in the Basilico restaurants was very nice and tasty also the staff were very nice
-They can provide take away berakfast if you are in early check out cons: - The sauna and steam are need to be separately booked and they charge for it
- The bathrobe is also for special reuquest and based on a daily charege  it needed to requets on the reception where they told that somebody will bring it to the room but after an hour we had to call them again and need to urge (normally in other hotels this is the basic to provide the bathrobe as well included in the price)
- They provided beach tovels and told to change it every day but after the first night they just took it without replecement
- The take away breakfast was very poor and dry 2 sandwiches (without any butter without any cream without any vegetables one of them with a slice of ham the other with a slice of cheese) the rest of it was ok (cake water orange juice apple)
- During the breakfast the lady only asked if we want coffe or milk so we tought that we can find tea separately but finally needed to ask (they weren't so kind)

pros: The whole reason to book this place is the beach walking distance from the hotel and a beautiful place. Also we had 3 spa treatments and they were all fantastic. hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText:
pros: Marvellous place. Very calm and peaceful. The staff is very friendly  and welcoming. The room was cozy spacious and warm we had a little terrace a great place to relax in the sun. The views are fantastic over there. 

Our kids liked feeding animals very much and the person who helped us was very kind to kids. cons: Absolutely nothing

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText:
pros: My husband and I loved our getaway for a night. The room was on the first floor overlooking the pool and countryside. 

The restaurant food was lovely and such high quality. The breakfast had so many choices too. 

There was water coffee and tea in the room with a balcony to enjoy the sunset. 

There was little walks around the place animals swing and hammock to enjoy. cons: We went late December so the pool was closed but it didn’t bother us as it would have been freezing.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: Staff were amazing. Food at the restaurant also amazing. Expected a bit more for the breakfast but it was good. Big bedrooms and nice decor. Great pool pool bar not working. Great for kids when feeding the animals . cons: Liked everything. Something that could be improved is de bedding and pillows

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: Beautiful place to stay for some rest Gardens and surrounding areas well maintained lots of space for peace lovely smell of rosemary through. Great size rooms with balcony or terrace. Lovely pool to cool down in. Pedro at the bar was friendly and made great cocktails. Had dinner in the restaurant was beautifully cooked - even got given a birthday cake with a candle for dessert. cons: Nothing to do with the hotel itself- the only part was when you leave the hotel and come out onto the main road you are in a blind spot for seeing oncoming traffic the mirror across the road is little help

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: The staff at the restaurant were fantastic !! The steak we had was out of this world. My two grown sons said it was the best steak they'd ever eaten :) cons: Nothing.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: A lovely clean and comfortable hotel. Staff friendly and kind. The man who does the jobs around the garden is so nice with the children and works very very hard. A lovely place for families to stay. We loved watching the terrapins! cons:

reviewText: pros: Beautiful views delicious food lovely pool. All the other guests and staff very friendly. cons: Dinner service a little slow.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: Hotel is absolutelly fantastic. Located on top of the hills. Beautifull view. Countryside. Orange trees. We walked through them.  This place have special energy. Silence. You fill so relaxed. Other people who come to this place were positive polite friendly. Hotel staff is so kind. They pay attention to each visitor. Super kind and positive people in restaurant. All of them. At breakfast lunch and dinner. We filled so welcomed here. Delicious food. Excellent dinner. Definitely will come back on my next trip to Portugal. cons: Pool was on reconstruction. But this did not damage our feeling at all. We had sunbeds. It was in March. Weather was so beautiful day time. Evenings bit colder. Our stay was excellent.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: This hotel was literally a breath of fresh air because of its beautiful rural location. Our room had a small veranda/balcony and overlooked the local olive farms. It was a perfect antidote to 5 days of city touring. They had a pleasant dining room with big picture windows where we had our breakfast. There was also a very nice swimming pool but we didn't have time to use it. The hotel wasn't far from the lovely little town of Tavira with all its restaurants. cons:

reviewText: pros: the large light-filled room was delightful - it even has a bath! - with a terrace overlooking the beautiful countryside and the pool and spa area. the steam rooms/sauna are great and massages are available on request. it’s a large area of nature reserve and much of the produce is grown onsite. dinner was excellent the local wine very good and at breakfast there’s the opportunity to eat al fresco. there are lots of animals here - a donkey cats sheep rare breed hens etc. which we really loved. this is just a glorious place cons:

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText:
pros: What a beautiful place so typical Portuguese and the animals just give it that special and warm feeling like home.
The staff were just out of this world! So kind and welcoming! Especially Pedro with his Algarvian sass! They went above and beyond with our special requests. We hope to come back one day. As this was by far the best place we have ever stayed in Portugal! (Having lived there for 15 years 8years ago we visit Portugal every year)
The food was soooo tasty offering a different meat fish and even vegan dish everyday! We enjoyed the included breakfast buffet very much every morning!

MUITO OBRIGADA AO STAFF ❤️ cons:

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: The hotel is located in the country side close to the village of Santa Catarina and a town at the sea - Tavira. Fantastic hotel spacious room clean comfortable beds very good breakfast nice pool and great surrounding. I really enjoyed our stay there and love to come back one day. cons: Either you drive for dinner to Santa Catarina or Tavira or you have to book up-front at the hotel. The second day of our stay we wanted to have dinner at the hotel asked about this during breakfast - all places were booked so we had to drive to the town to eat something. There are shifts for breakfast which has its pros and cons. We got up-grade for our room at the same price which was very nice and helpful (due to the fact that my husband is disabled the disabled rooms were occupied so we got a big family room instead). At the same time we could not use tea or coffee maker as in the regular room there were none same with water. I am very grateful for the up-grade but really this one tea or coffee or water is nothing in comparison to the hotel rates and would not make a difference for the hotel but made a huge difference in my perception of the service. Nevertheless it is a great place and I would come back definitely.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: the property was amazing the setting was stunning the place was immaculate the breakfast wholesome and delicious and the staff were as friendly and helpful as ever !!!! cons: I wish the beds were a bit softer and the pillows a bit firmer

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: beautiful place and people spectacular views orange orchard herbs and flowers meadow you can simply lay on if you have kids there are some animals you can care of and feed them surely nice swimming pool and clean rooms in short tranquility and beauty comfort and human warmth in it. it’s simply love from the first sight. cons: having so many vegetables all around serving only tomatoes for breakfast is a bit disappointing (no lettuce cucumber onions peppers anything to make salad or at least give some vitamins in the morning) but possibly we have different eating habits. there is fire place but not firewood even for sale strange. still 10/10

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: Stunning views from all rooms.  Friendly cooperative staff.  Beautiful gardens and walks on the property itself.  Easy parking.  Everything as described in the brochure.  Food was excellent - I was half board - beautifully fresh well prepared traditional meals presented in a modern way.  Wine choices had great Portuguese varieties.   Lovely sauna and steam room in the spa area.  Very quiet and perfect for getting away from it all and healing. cons: The weather?  Only kidding it was seasonal and of course nothing to do with the property.  Still very beautiful bright and warm on most days.  I didn't want to go into town for a phone card to call the UK but they didn't have them at reception.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText:
pros: Big thanks to Anna Thiago Pedro and Sophia for their valued company and helpfulness.
They all made the week a super week. cons: The coffee machine was poor. Slow and tasteless.
This super Quinta would be well served to provide fresh filtered coffee.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: Very friendly staff. Excellent buffet breakfast. While serving yourself masks and use of tongs are mandatory. Superb views from the room/balcony. Heated pool. Rural area with hiking options. cons: We were most days gone for numerous hours. Returning to a room mid afternoon or later  not attended to was ok for once but numerous times not so. We are sure there might have been a staffing or other problem that we were not aware of. Nevertheless we very much enjoyed our stay and do hope to return.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: The room was spacious clean and comfortable and had an excellent view over the hills to the sea. Breakfast had good choices and was plenty. Dinner was excellent and of high quality - there was at least 1 VEGAN choice on the menu. cons: I would have liked a bathrobe to go to the Spa and maybe some seating/relaxing area at the Spa.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: The staff at the hotel were the best we have met on our travels. They were friendly professional and nothing was too much trouble.The hotel is a great place to enjoy taking a step back to remember why you are on holiday.It is very peaceful and the views are amazing. cons: Nothing!

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText:
pros: Our stay at Quinta do Marco was wonderful. The breakfast buffet was excellent as was the dinner we had one night. All staff in the restaurant and beyond were friendly helpful and very kind. 
We had an early check out and the hotel arranged a to-go breakfast for our travels and had someone on hand at 6am for pick up.
The hotel is in a beautiful location for which you would almost certainly want a car. cons:

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: Excellent view food and the availability and kindness of staff!!! cons:

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: Philippa host us in the junior suite room who has perfectly clean nice and comfy. It was huge with a big bed. the view was amazing. Perfectly calm. The staff are extremely nice. We only stayed two nights but we wanted to stay more. The breakfast is amazing. It was just the best hotel in Algarve. Kids were so happy. Thank you so much Philippa ! cons: Nothing

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: This was our second stay at this excellent Quinta and won’t debe our last. The rooms are spacious clean and comfortable the view over the Algarve to the sea is amazing and the grounds are spectacular and immaculately kept. The breakfast is superb with plenty of choice and good fresh products. Most importantly the staff are so helpful and friendly.  Great place to stay. cons: Nothing at all to dislike

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: A nice place in a fantastic environment (natural park) cons: Renovating this property with plastic doors and windows is a very very bad idea. From the original charm nothing is left.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: Location was beautiful. Rooms spacious and clean. Nice pool cons: Average breakfast smell from shower (in en-suite)  which was never resolved and disturbed sleep.  door was difficult to lock.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText:
pros: The location was lovely being in the countryside side. The catering staff were very helpful and friendly. cons: Towels were only replaced every 3 days. This information wasn’t on the website. The breakfast buffet had limited choice of hot food and fruit. 

Also the outlet of the shower in the bedroom had a very nasty smell which lasted over 48 hours. This still hadn’t been resolved when checking out. After contacting booking . Com the hotel have offered a refund of 1 night which I have accepted but the nasty smell caused lack of sleep and was a very bad experience

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText:
pros: Beautiful large fresh room with lovely tiled floor. So private and peaceful.
Large clean bathroom 
View of countryside from the room
Gorgeous shrubs and herbs in the garden -the lavender was spectacular 
Room & breakfast price -really good value cons: So disappointed with the dining experience. We were expecting something really special having read the reviews .The lovely fish meals on offer were only available if you ordered 24 hours before and as we only stayed 1 night this wasn’t an option. So  we had a limited menu and the only available fish was octopus which didn’t appeal . I settled for the vegan chickpea dish which was very tasty but not what I had in mind. Husband enjoyed the venison though the potatoe dish had a large amount of garlic in despite the waitress saying it would not be significant.Having made it clear that he didn’t like garlic  the olives appeared soaked in garlic. The waitress was very nice &  apologetic though. 
The restaurant itself is very clean but it had a cafeteria style with very hard chairs.I asked for a cushion but the answer was no.  Not cosy or romantic in any way. Bright lights no candles etc It seemed quite expensive for what we had but I think it was the overall experience that made me feel this way.
The bed was very hard but loved the room overall.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: The place is very nice and has good breakfast cons: We asked for a room with shower no bathtub and they never answered our message and didn’t give us one. Apparently if we had reserved directly not thru booking they would have honored that request.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: Huge bed cons: No tea or coffee in the room

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: La ubicacion y el entorno cons:

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: Ubicación excelente los niños disfrutaron con el entorno y los animales. Desayunos y cenas buenos y habitaciones confortables. El personal muy amable y atento. cons:

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText:
pros: Simpatia e disponibilidade dos funcionários.

Apesar de terem poucos animais foi possível um contato próximo e até passar pela experiência de alimentar os animais foi excelente para as crianças. cons:

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: Paisagem sossego cons:

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText:
pros: Es un lugar que te permite desconectar de todo ya que la tranquilidad que te proporciona su localización la comida y el buen trato hacía el cliente son lo primero que notas cuando te adentras en el hotel.

La calidad de la comida es excepcional y los camareros super amables. En concreto el trato con Pedro ha sido una maravilla debido a que sus recomendaciones han sido un total acierto y ha sabido adaptar las guarniciones a nuestro gusto (no podíamos consumir uno de los componentes principales del plato).

Sin duda volveríamos a disfrutar de esta experiencia. cons: Nada

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText:
pros: La amabilidad del personal.
La limpieza.
La ubicación. cons: No nos gustó que esté catalogado como spa y sólo tienen sauna. 
Además no tuvieron disponibilidad para darnos un masaje durante toda la estancia a pesar de que llegamos por la mañana mucho antes del cheking para intentar reservarlo. ¡Y lo cogímos precisamente por eso!!

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: Excelente desayuno. cons: Nada. Todo de diez.

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: O quarto é ótimo para uma família de 4 pessoas a piscina  é muito boa e o hotel fica bem perto de Tavira. O pequeno almoço é muito agradável. cons:

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: As condições de laser incluindo piscina fantástica cons: A casa de banho com um pouco de cheiro

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText:
pros: gentileza dos funcionários.
local sossegado.
café da manhã cons:

hotelName: Hotel Rural Quinta do Marco - Nature & Dining
reviewText: pros: O quarto ser muito amplo como a casa de banho. A zona da piscina a localização é excelente para quem quer descansar  o pequeno almoço com produtos caseiros no entanto achei que podia ter um bocadinho mais de variedade como panquecas e produtos sem lactose. cons: Nada a apontar
