reviewText: pros:  cons:
pros: Overall it was a good place to stay cons: I feel like the rooms were small Each room at the location is apparently the same size. I wished for more space.
pros: It was very friendly and helpful staff room lovely location perfect cons: Bar shuts early
pros: The beds were very comfortable cons: Nothing

pros: We honestly couldn't fault anything in this hotel.
Everything was very excellent.
We especially enjoyed the location as an option to visit Marina Old Town and traditional restaurants all around. cons: I honestly can't think of anything.

pros: Breakfast was good. It was nice to relax in the spacious lobby area with friends at the end of the day(we travelled in a group). The staff were all very welcoming and helpful. Rooms were also well attended by helpful friendly staff. The pool was a bonus! cons: We are all active people with fitness programs at home. Even a small fitness centre would have been appreciated.

pros: Beautiful hotel right by the Marina front.
We have booked a room facing the marina and it was very nice and spacious.
The staff at the reception were very friendly and helpful too. Easy walk to the Historical centre with numerous cafes and restaurants.
Will definitely stay here again if we do come to Lagos. cons: Nothing
pros: Great location cons: Nothing

pros: This hotel is so well located for exploring Lagos. Overlooking the marina with a small balcony it was perfect for our quick stay. cons: The only issue we had was the space that our luggage took up in the room and that's probably more on us than them.

pros: Best ever welcome from reception.
Happy smiling staff. cons: Nothing to dislike!.
pros: The freshness and cleanliness and the attention to detail was appreciated. The reception staff were very helpful and the location was great. cons: All was great
pros: Beautiful views and location. cons:
pros: Great location very nice room good breakfast cons: Some of the staff were rather unfriendly kind of gave the impression they would rather be doing something else.

pros: 1. Convenient location beside Flixbus station Old town Lagos and Marina 
2. Clean rooms
3. Storage space to put luggage after checking out
4. Spacious rooms
5. Friendly staff cons: 1. Laundry is very expensive at the hotel but there are also many coin laundry places nearby
pros:  cons: Breakfast room didn't open till 8am. If you had a tour booked there was no where to get breakfast as no cafes were open either. But everything else was fabulous
pros: Beautifully clean light and bright! Such friendly staff 😊 cons:
pros: Location & cleanliness cons: Nothing🙂
pros: Great view of Marina and very quiet cons: No soap at the sink area. Hair left at bathroom
pros: staff all helpful and friendly.   Rooms a very good size.    Very smart refurbishment recently undertaken. cons:

pros: Nice hotel across from the Marina and right next to the bus stop which is perfect as that was our mode of transport to and from Lagos. Good facilities and access to rooftop pool. Unfortunately it was a bit too windy so didn't utilise the pool as much as had hoped. Comfortable beds good air con and comfortably sized bathroom. Easy walking distance to the beach and access to many restaurants. cons:
pros: Everything. Great view over Marina from our balcony. cons: Nil

pros: The location was excellent and the hotel is very clean. My room was of a good size and it is nice having a balcony with a clothing rack. 

The cleaning staff were very friendly but I did not experience that with the front desk staff. cons: The front desk staff could have been more welcoming.
pros: People at the service desk did a wonderful job and wereveryhelpful in making recommendations cons: Everything was great

pros: Great balcony view of the marina. Room was very clean comfortable and practical.
Staff were very friendly and helpfull. cons: Nothing

pros: I liked the location of the hotel very close to transport facilities and also across the road from the lively marina area with many restaurants and tour options. I liked having a little balcony and a small washing line to air some clothes. Also appreciated breakfast being included in the price. cons: There was nothing I didn’t like about the hotel but next time would probably choose a room with a view over the marina instead of the bus station.

pros: Spacious and well decorated rooms bathroom with walk in shower and grab rails excellent for people with mobility issues. Location excellent for Marina and old towns. Excellent restaurants in walking distance. Breakfast good with plenty to choose from. Staff friendly and helpful. cons: Cannot fault the hotel have visited before and it is my go to Hotel in Lagos small very clean and personal
pros: The quality and design of the hotel was superb cons: Backing onto the bus station
pros: Excellent hotel excellent location. Everything was perfect. cons:

pros: The hotel was located very close to the meeting spot for our boat tour and there were several restaurants near by. We arrived by bus and the bus station was directly behind the hotel (no disturbance from the noise there). cons:
pros: All went perfecty. Room was clean with a balcony and view to the marina. Car parking in the structure. Conference room where I could work in peace. All what I needed was there. cons:
pros: The location was lovely and staff very kind! cons: The beds could have been softer!

pros: Hotel overlooks the Marina and has a lovely roof top terrace and small swimming pool. There is a very reasonably priced car park next door to the hotel. The staff were charming and helpful. We didn't eat there at all so I can't comment on the food. cons: Our room faced onto the bus station but it was quiet. It was the last room available so it didn't matter as we sat on the roof terrace and took coffee and drinks up there to enjoy.
pros: Wonderful upgrading of the lobby & bar areas since our last visit. cons: The breakfast was a major disappointment.  Very poor for such an excellent hotel.

pros: Nice modern hotel with nice furniture. Located across from marina. Has parking lot next door. Wifi and Internet connection are excellent. Breakfast buffet was excellent cons: Elevator is slow. Parking on street and next door is paid on weekdays. Breakfast is served starting at 8 am only. The rate was steep for off-season
pros: Amazing hotel! We opted for the marina view room and it was well worth it. The views each day were so nice to wake up to. Convenient location to walk into old town each day as well. cons:

pros: The location was perfect for excursions and just a short walk into the heart of the town. The staff at the hotel was exceptionally friendly. They truly care about the experiences of their guests! They also care about the job they do. The room was immaculate. The cleaning staff and front desk staff were so excellent and welcoming. We enjoyed the calming light blue color scheme of the room. cons: Some features of the facilities appeared dated but everything seemed to function well. The bathrooms would bring this place to a new level if updated. Also the bed set-up was such for two people made up as two separate beds. This was the only hotel we stayed in during our visit in Portugal set up quite like this.

pros: The hotel location was excellent being across from the marina and a short walk to the old city. Our room faced the bus station behind the hotel and was very quiet. The small rooftop pool and lounge area was a nice bonus. Breakfast was excellent and because we had an early departure on our last day the staff arranged an early breakfast available for us. Rita who worked at the front desk was very personable and helpful. We enjoyed the boat ride we booked through the hotel. The recommended restaurant Reis was great a lovely family run establishment that served delicious cataplana! The hotel is conveniently located close to both the bus and train stations. cons:
pros: Great staff at the reception :) cons:

pros: Location was excellent. Bus station to and from Lisbon was next to hotel. Walking distance to historical centre  marina  beaches and numerous cafes. 
Clean and comfortable. Great to have breakfast included. Staff helpful and friendly cons: Nothing
pros: Excellent all over trip cons:

pros: the hotel is right next to the Marina Bay the location is just perfect with the balcony open to the Marina. The bed is super comfy room is clean and smell very nice as well. cons: only one staff available I have to carry the luggages by the trolley myself.

pros: Hotel friendly and welcoming. Rooms well decorated and maintained well. cons: The hotel was beautiful and the view over the marina was lovely. The main road in between was noisy which was disappointing however the patio doors were good and  no noise when shut.

pros: Clean great location.   Staff were wonderful friendly welcoming and helpful especially Rita and I can’t remember the other fellows name hi was there when we checked in.  Breakfast was great. cons:
pros: Clean efficient and central cons:
pros: Location was great. Close to everything cons: Nothing
pros: Location is very ideal cons: Would of appreciated to have any extra as requested for anniversary

pros: The breakfast was continental with freshly squeezed orange juice really good there was a selection of fruit yogurt fresh pastries cheese and meats and either scrambled egg or fried eggs well presented  and fresh every day we had a twin room with marina view it' was beautifully presented very comfortable beds exceptionally clean it was the best sleep we have had in a hotel really quiet at night and  the view was 5 star rating  The staff were super friendly and ready to help at any time I would highly recommend this hotel cons:

pros: Beautiful view great location friendly staff. Room service did a great job too in freshening up the room daily. Small hotel. Loved the pool - felt like a private pool at times as it was quiet. Worth money for location and pay for the marina view the sunrise was beautiful. Got a little nippy on the evening on that side but not much that can be done about the weather! cons: Very small point but would have liked a few extra cartons of milk in the morning but I know if I’d have asked these would have been provided anyway.
pros: Location front desk staff  cleanliness cons: Hair dryer in bathroom kept shutting off
pros: Excellent quality and choice cons:
pros: Great location. Amazing breakfast. Nice spacious clean room. Very friendly staff. cons: Nothing
pros: It was sparkling clean and the location cons: N/A

pros: The hotel is located opposite the marina -fantastic for going on the boat trips around Lagos. It is also walking distance to the Old Town which was wonderful. We had a beautiful view of the marina. cons:

pros: Beautifully maintained hotel in an excellent location. Lovely little breakfast spread and the staff were very friendly. cons: More umbrellas on the pool deck are needed in our opinion but that’s all

pros: Great location views from the room over thr marina were spectacular! 
Very clean rooms and friendly staff. Great breakfast. cons:

pros: The location was perfect for us: close to the marina with a great view of the marina and within walking distance of everything. The staff were very pleasant helpful and friendly. We could park in front of the hotel with the help of the desk staff since everything we did was within walking distance. We did not use the breakfast because we planned our activities early or later based on their hours. We found All Things Dough R. Cidade de Torres Vedras 16 8600-744 Lagos Portugal the perfect place for coffee and homemade cinnamon rolls that we visited daily. cons: Nothing!!

pros: Breakfast buffet help yourself very good. Managed to get a free parking bay outside hotel. Location close to beaches and town centre within easy walking. Plenty of restaurants. cons: Towels could have been better quality
pros: Fantastic location the staff were so helpful and the breakfast was great. Loved having a balcony overlooking the Marina. cons: Nothing

pros: This is a very comfortable boutique type of hotel modern decor very clean and just lovely!!
Staff is very friendly and helpful. Rooms are very comfortable clean beautifully decorated and also very quiet. Buffet type of breakfast has a wide variety of yummy options. I am a picky eater and could find lots of options. The location is the perfect location.
We  had a relaxing comfortable stay and we highly recommend this fabulous hotel! cons:

pros: Everything cons: Parking. There is enough space but you are charged by the municipality 5 euros a day. At whatever time you arrive. And in the morning they force you to get up at 9 to put in a further 5 in the meter.

pros: Lovely view of the marina from the rooftop! 
Small pool area but was usually very quiet when we used it.
Very clean rooms and the bathroom was well maintained! 
Comfy beds with a great Aircon for the room!
The location was very close to the bus station marina old town and beaches! 
Quiet at night - no noise from outside the hotel or other guests! cons: Nothing- everything was perfect for our 2 night stay!

pros: The room was very nice and the hotel was clean.  The location is amazing - right on the water and close to everything.  The rooftop terrace was a really nice bonus.  Staff was all friendly and helpful. cons:

pros: Location lovely view of marina and close proximity to restaurants etc. 
don’t have to drag your suitcases on those rocky roads. Really quiet at night. 
Really comfortable beds and clean rooms cons: Rooms are really tight. 
Shame the pool faces the large bus depot/carpark

pros: A beautifully designed modern new and exceptionally clean room. The hotel has clearly been refurbished to a really high standard. The proximity to the Marina was a big plus. I had an early start on my checkout day and the hotel arranged an early breakfast for me. cons: My room overlooked the bus station but that was the only drawback to this fabulous hotel.

pros: Super convenient for train station took one rolling luggage easily. Clean room had all the basic amenities very nice staff. AC was perfect both in the room and around the lobby. A great experience for vacation. cons:
pros: Room with balcony. Important for heavy smoker. Neighborhood. cons:
pros: We took the bus from Lisbon and was pleasantly surprised at how close it was to the hotel.  The hotel was close to the old town and the marina! cons:
pros: Location is perfect. cons:

pros: Lovely clean room and comfortable bed. Also great balcony overlooking marina. Very comfortable loungers on roof top. Very good breakfast and staff very nice and helpful. cons: Roof top pool more accessible ladder into it so could not use as had knee operation. Also pity they only offered breakfast.

pros: Hotel was a nice modern hotel right across from the marina and about 10 minutes to old town. The room was spacious and clean and had a balcony facing the marina very nice. Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. We were able to park right in front of the hotel . The breakfast was adequate. We also took the front desk recommendation on a boat cruise of the cliffs and beaches which turned out to be a highlight.  I would recommend this hotel for a stay in Lagos. cons: Nothing really to complain about.  Good hotel in a good location.
pros: Very clean rooms friendly staff beautiful hotel cons: Breakfast could have been more varied. Maybe omelettes pancakes etc?

pros: Immaculate and excellent location. Excellent price for such a nice place. Slippers and robes were a nice addition. Great views and super close to everything. We used this as a central location. We will definitely recommend this and also stay here again. cons: Everything excellent!
pros: Great location and the room and staff were lovely. cons: We had the view of the bus station behind the hotel so terrible view.
pros: The hotel was in a fantastic location our room had wonderful views across the Marina. The staff were friendly. The breakfast was good. cons:
pros: Marina view from our balcony was amazing. Location was fantastic…a short stroll to the old town.  The cleaning staff was superb…room and facilities were excellent cons: Pillows
pros: The decor was good and it was extremely comfortable. View of the marina good cons: Nothing
pros: The staff was amazing and we really enjoyed their friendliness and advice. They all seemed to love their jobs and they seemed to enjoy helping us have a fabulous vacation. cons:
pros: The staff were so helpful friendly and professional. Nothing was too much cons: Nothing
pros: It made our short break even more memorable. cons: There's was nothing we couldn't like
pros: Lovely hotel great location comfy beds and pillows good breakfast.   Roomed Cleaned daily  friendly staff always attentive to your needs cons: Nothing to dislike at all
pros: Location staff room cleanliness breakfast buffet rooftop pool. cons: N/a
pros:  cons: We started the Costal Camino there.  Great starting point.  Loved the 2 restaurants located at the sea side.  Great!
pros: Location was fantastic with a wonderful view of the marina. Quiet location cons: Nothing really. Staff were very helpful and breakfast was really nice
pros: Everythingloved the breakfast buffet. cons: Nothing

pros: Location was convenient to old town. 
Nice property and very clean. Staff very friendly and helpful. 
Great rooftop deck with nice views of marina. cons: Breakfast selection limited
pros: Good and clean room cons: Nothing

pros: This is a new modern hotel with a fantastic view over the harbour near the old city centre and the harbour and sea. 
Great sunny roof with swimming pool cons: It has limited restaurant facilities.
Near a quite busy road. 
No fitness.
pros: Great location with a nice breakfast.  Staff was accommodating and the hotel was very clean. cons: Nothing
pros: close to the city but not right in the centre. 15min walk. cons: nothing
pros: Good location and facilities. Staff were very friendly and attentive cons:
pros: Great location super clean nice breakfast. cons: Nothing
pros: Everything cons: Nothing. The one lace was great and highly recommend

pros: Loved the breakfast! Hotel was spotless cool and quiet. Every member of staff we spoke to was friendly and helpful. Lovely room with plenty of storage. Room at the back of hotel overlooking bus station - but there was no noise or exhaust fumes from this. Small hotel meant it was very quiet. We have booked this hotel again. cons: It was all great would have liked a view of the marina but we got the last available room so really wasn’t a problem.
pros: Very nicely done and great location cons: Nothing
pros: The location was great and the front desk staff was exceptional. cons:

pros: We spent 2 nights in this hotel and we found the hotel particularly clean. Employees were also kind and attentionate making the stay even more pleasant. We also enjoyed the roof terrace and its pool. cons: We did not take any breakfast so we cannot provide an opinion on that aspect. Everything else in the hotel was pleasant and we recommend it if you're coming over to Lagos to enjoy the beaches.

pros: Loved the location super close to the train station and the old town. The room is super clean and comfortable. The hotel staffs are nice  and always helpful. We especially loved the rooftop pool and sun lounge area beautiful view of the marina! Would definitely stay here again if we return to Lagos. cons:
pros: Everything!  It couldn’t have been better.  Great location and beautiful view of the marina. cons: Nothing

pros: The location was excellent.
our room overlooked the back of the hotel and the bus station but was very quiet.
We opted for a room wih no breakfast included but there were tea and coffee making facilities in the room
so it didn't matter.
The staff were really friendly and helpful.
Everywhere was SO clean. cons: We were happy with everything.

pros: Loved the hotel which was very stylish and having a swimming pool was a bonus. Everywhere was clean and tidy and comfortable. Our room was a great size and layout with enough storage for our week’s stay.
We enjoyed a tasty breakfast and if there were any queries the staff always helped immediately.
Everyone was friendly and helpful. cons: Our safe didn’t work properly but when asked the staff sorted immediately. It was found to have a low battery so once a new one was put in everything was fine and there were no more problems.
pros: Good location cons: Staff can be friendlier
pros: Everything cons: Nothing

pros: Great location. My husband and I stayed there for 3 nights and had a Marina view room. The rooftop terrace is the best. Very good breakfast. On our last morning they opened up breakfast an hour early (6:30 am) so that we could eat before our 7:30 bus. Highly recommended. cons:
pros: Great location helpful staff. cons:
pros: Location was great and very nice breakfast. cons:

pros: It was fantastic from start to finish.  Excellent location clean rooms wonderful breakfast.  We had to leave very early the last day and a full breakfast room was set out for us.  We would definitely stay here again! cons:

pros: Hotel location on the marina is lovely
The hotel is immaculately clean cons: Absolutely fabulous hotel in a great location
pros: Everything. Amazing views over the marina location is excellent - lots of local cheap bars in the area. Rooftop pool is superb. Air conditioning was first class. cons:
pros: Amazing location. Super clean and comfortable. Amazing staff. cons:
pros: Great location to old town. Beautiful room wonderful staff! cons: Nothing!
pros: Location rooms breakfast staff cons: Public parking with fee. But not too much.
pros: Great location very comfortable very quiet good breakfast and very friendly helpful staff cons:

pros: Amazing view from our room and rooftop. Super comfortable beds and spacious bathroom. Walkable to nearby coastline viewpoints. Ample parking near the hotel for your rental car. We Loved our stay and highly recommend for your visit to Lagos. cons:
pros: The hotel is very modern & well constructed with expertly designed interior finishes cons: Nothing

pros: We loved the location right on marina. Short walk to the ocean/beach and old town. We booked a room with balcony and marina view which highly recommend. They also have rooftop deck with a pool  and you can lounge and enjoy a view. Everything was clean breakfast had a lot of options staff were great. If you travel by car there is a public lot adjacent to hotel for €3 per day. cons:
pros: Proximity to everywhere  cleanliness and value cons: There isn’t a thing we would change
pros: Perfect location and very well kept.  Clean comfortable and decorated nicely. cons: Most TV channels were in German.  No smart tv options to watch our own apps like Netflix.
pros: Great view of the Marina the hotel was clean and the staff were lovely cons: Parking outside- have to be on the ball or will get a ticket
pros: The hotel was extremely clean. It was in a great heart of town very comfortable bedrooms. cons: Couldn’t get the electrical plug to work in the bathroom. I am sure they will get it fixed.
pros: Very clean great view. The staff were very kind and helpful. Short walk to historic centre. Will stay again. cons:

pros: The location of this hotel was excellent; our room overlooked the marina. It was too cool to sit outside on the balcony though. The breakfast buffet was very good there was a lot of choice. It was easy to walk to the historic center and to various restaurants. cons: The shower in our bathroom was just a narrow stream of water; we would have liked a better shower head.

pros: It’s in a perfect location overlooking the Marina.
It’s been refurbished since we last visited and looks really great. cons:

pros: The location is perfect! You are right across from the marina next door to the bus station and about a 5 minute walk to the train.
Breakfast was great had a good selection all that was missing was fried eggs. cons:

pros: Great breakfast. Room facing Bus station and city. Quiet no road noise close to Railway Station. Nice walk along river/marina. cons: Could be a longish walk to centre and beaches for some people. For us it was fine out of the hussle and bussle.
pros: Location views room size cons: Breakfast more choice
pros: Good quality room. Very modern. Lovely roof terrace. Very clean. cons: OK but not outstanding breakfast versus other similar hotels in Portugal

pros: Rooms are excellent and the location is perfect. Breakfast was ok but not 5 star. cons: The pool deck cafe was not open - this would have made the stay much better as it would have held us in the hotel a bit more

pros: The location is excellent. The room had a beautiful view of Marina. The staff at the front desk was very friendly welcoming and helpful. The breakfast was good and the restaurant staff was very attentive. cons:
pros: Location. Staff very helpful    Great breakfast cons: Nothing
pros: good location and clean cons: nothing
pros: Very clean friendly staff and central to town and the port. cons: Nothing
pros: Watching fireworks from viewing area . Friendly staff especially Miguel . cons: Coukd have done with more milk to go with coffee/ tea

pros: Room was a little noisy as next to the cleaners cupboards and shower was lacking water pressure .
Staff were fantastic at check in and beyond - lovely . cons: Cupboard next to room and shower pressure
pros: . cons: .
pros: The positionclose to the old town and if you pay a little extra for the front rooms that over look the marina even better. cons: Nothing
pros: Location from train station and old town. Staff very friendly and because of an early train departure open breakfast early. View of marina was very nice. cons:
pros: Everything cons: Nothing

pros: I'd highly recommend this hotel! It's close to the bus station train station the marina and the centre of Lagos. It's quiet very clean comfortable modern and the staff were very friendly and helpful. We will be back! cons:

pros: They provide all the extras. Coffee maker coffee pods kettle fridge corkscrew as well as toiletry items.
Easy walk to old town.
Easy parking in lot next door for 3 euro a day in the off season.
Good insulation so quiet at night once the windows are closed cons: Difficult to adequately control the room temperature complicated system. Has a nice balcony but the street noise makes it somewhat unpleasant to sit out and there was also a sewage smell at certain times.

pros: Everything.
Our balcony did not have the best view but we could sit in the sun in the afternoon until it set and half november we loved doing that. cons:

pros: The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful. They went out of their way to assist me when I forgot something in my room organizing its delivery back to me. The room was clean quiet at night and the location was perfect with the beach restaurants and shops within walking distance. cons:

pros: New hotel with all the facilities you need.  Very nice staff and only a short walk to the bars and restaurants in the centre of Lagos.  Its definitely worth paying extra for breakfast its a very comprehensive spread with everything you could possibly want for breakfast & good coffee. cons: There is no free parking however carpark next door is only 3 euros/day.
pros: Location was great.  We needed to leave early in the morning and they let us have an early breakfast.  Room was very nice clean. cons: WIFI was very spotty.
pros: Lovely Clean hotel good breakfast staff very nice  location excellent for restaurants town centre marina cons:
pros: Excellent stay! Room with terrace facing marina was beautiful. Very close to town centre and restaurants and shops. Breakfast was great and staff were very friendly. cons: Nothing

pros: The hotel was extremely clean and comfortable and had a beautiful vie of the marina. The greeting from the front desk was friendly and welcoming.  I am forever grateful that housekeeping found my good camera in the room and caught me as I was checking out.  The cameras is worth a lot but the memory card held irreplaceable wonderful memories of my visit to the Algarve and other places in beautiful Portugal. cons:
pros: Great view of the marina cons:
pros: Location. Deck. The roof. Miguel was excellent he handled our crazy perfect! So fun! Really made the stay unique. cons: Breakfast could be better.
pros: We really enjoyed our stay at Marina Rio. Lovely staff really good choice for breakfast & coffee was good too. We had room with marina view which was lovely. cons: Everything was good.
pros: Brilliant location an easy walk to the marina and Lagos old town centre. Staff were so helpful and friendly. Breakfast was great. Lovely view from balcony. cons:

pros: I had a wonderful stay at Hotel Maria Rio. The service was excellent check-in was smooth and the location is great. The room was clean and comfortable. Special thanks to Jorge at the reception for exceptional service. Highly recommend! cons: Nothing
pros: Location comfort and friendly staff cons:

pros: The location is excellent. Parking is conveniently located right beside the hotel. The view from our balcony was overlooking the marina and we were a short five minute walk to the old part of the town. cons:

pros: Excellent location and a great view to the mariners of Lagos.  Helpful staff as he patiently explains the details of various local excursion tours.  Decent breakfast and beyond expectation hardware equipment in the room...not expecting a garment dryer installed. cons: The breakfast could be more in varieties and the in-house dining facilities deserves an investment as comparing to the next door Michellin listed restaurent in Lagos Avenida.
pros: Everything  location staff cleanliness cons: Can’t think of anything

pros: The breakfast offered a broad variety of items and a good choice. Staff was very friendly and helpful. cons: It was unclear why the roof top areas was looked at 8pm. Following our request we were allowed to take a drink after 8pm.  It’s such a nice place at the roof top that it should be allowed to stay until 11 or 12pm of course respecting rules of minimum noise.
pros: Nice view clean room and new cons:
pros: Location staff and value. cons: Bath soap and towels.
pros: Great location cons: Really nothing I can think of
pros: Cleanest Hotel we have stayed in- close to marina & old town. cons: Parking not great
pros: Clean great location cons:

pros: This hotel is close to everything. The rooftop pool is great to have after a hot day and the additional deck overlooking the marina was a bonus. The staff are so  friendly and helpful. cons: The breakfast was just ok.
pros: Great location facilities staff and breakfast plus parking available cons:

pros: A lovely comfortable room overlooking the marina with good soundproofing. On the top floor there's a nice sun lounge area in addition to the swimming pool. Breakfast was fine with good fresh ingredients and expertly run by just one member of staff. cons: Nothing

pros: The room was beautifully furnished and very clean. Not uncommon for Europe also fairly compact and there was only one occasional chair so one of us had to sit on the bed. Our room faced the bus station so while the view wasn't noteworthy our room was quiet. Very modern amenities and a beautiful rooftop terrace that faces the marina. The bathroom has a huge soaking tub heavenly after a long day of walking. Very friendly helpful staff. The location great in that it faces the marina but the beach is a 15-20 minute walk just something to keep in mind depending on what one is bringing/if you have children. cons: The hotel is very secure because ones room card is necessary to open the elevator door in addition to the room. But it also must remain in the slot by the door to keep everything electrical in the room running. Great for conservation but not for climate control as the a/c (or heat) goes off when the card is removed. Our room was quite warm when we returned to it the first day and it took a while to get comfortable again. Because there were two of us we subsequently left one key card in the slot when we left so the a/c would remain on. The hotel offers breakfast but at 12.50 euro per person per day we opted not to take advantage. A bit pricey. In fairness I don't know what was offered so it might have been incredible but we aren't huge breakfast eaters so it was an easy decision.

pros: Great location quiet and above all its feels like we are in the city centre but not with the fuss and noise that usually we can see in August. Just perfect!

I recommend this hotel cons:

pros: Friendly and helpful staff.
Great and healthy breakfast with lots of choices and excellent coffee.
Great location easy parking and very very clean and excellent value. cons:

pros: Locationstafffacilitiesbreakfast😋beds soundproofing from road noise😴😴
Modern hotel with up to date decor.
Special mention to Miguel for his welcoming smile and banter ☺️ 😊 cons: 👍to everything
pros: Great location it could not have been more convenient.  Staff were great friendly and helpful.  The room was clean and very comfortable. cons:

pros: The location was superb overlooking the beautiful Lagos marina .the breakfast was top class beautiful array of fruits juices hams cheese you name it they had it x cons: Nothing to dislike at this lovely place.I wanted to stay longer but they were booked up.I wasn’t surprised .
pros: Excellent location cons:
pros: The room was comfortable and very very clean. We were there on business so didn’t really have long to stay there. Would thoroughly recommend. cons: Nothing.

pros: Highly recommend this hotel as we loved the location of the hotelaway from the hussle & bussle but close enough to walk to it. 
Hotel was spotlessly clean. ALL staff were very friendly & helpfulnothing was a problem. Thank you. Breakfast was very goodall fresh & always plentyeven requested an early breakfast as we had to leave for train on our last day & everything was ready & waiting.
Fantastic view overlooking marine & lovely roof top terrace & pool.
Enjoyed the great balcony with chairs & tables to relax in.
Room was cleaned every day with plenty of clean towels from housekeeping. cons: Coffee machine wasnt easy to operate but not a problem
pros: Service Room size and cleanliness modernity location cons: No own parking lot but a public Parklichts right next to the hotel

pros: Lovely room with balcony marina view location
and fabulous breakfast. cons: Enjoyed everything
pros: The staff the rooms and the breakfast were super. This is a special hotel and want to thank them again. cons: Nothing
pros: Very nice hotel right on the marina comfortable bed and nice bathroom. Also had a nice breakfast. cons:

pros: Staff was outstanding helpfulwarm and gracious location was perfect checki in checkout quick was having trouble with my back and they were quick to furnish ice for my back made delicious  cappuccino every morning cons: Nothing negative to say
pros: Friendly staff and great rooms cons: If you could have ordered drinks on the roof terrace it would have been perfect!
pros: Excellent staff and location. cons:

pros: The breakfast was amazing! Lots of variety with hot and cold items. Some mornings we asked for omelettes and they were delicious. Specialty coffees too! The staff were all so friendly and helpful. The roof top was an oasis overlooking the marina and the pool so refreshing. cons:
pros: Perfect location. Easy to move around. Friendly staff. cons:
pros: Great place 😁 cons:
pros: Very comfortable room & ensuite lovely decor with balcony overlooking marina cons: All good
pros: Fantastic location friendly welcoming and helpful staff lovely terrace with views of the marina great breakfast very clean. We loved our stay at Hotel Marina Rio. cons:

pros: Overall hotel was nice and located at a great location. cons: Cleanliness could be improved as soon as we got the keys to our room we noticed the toilet was dirty from a previous guest. A couple hours later we then noticed ants crawling on the walls which they came later to fumigate during our absence.

pros: The rooms are contemporary with good air conditioning balcony overlooking the Marina was a treat. Bathroom facilities were excellent. Central location made it easy to navigate around the town. cons: The reception area needs to be modernised and the pool is very small although warm. Limited seating around the pool area. You need to book to rooms facing the Marina as to the rear of the building you face a bus station.
pros: We have stayed at this hotel before and each tie we return  we feel it is our happy space.  An excellent start to our holiday cons: Nothing
pros: Excellent location very comfy beds great showers! cons: Wish we had had a room with a view of the marina and not the bus depot behind :(

pros: Very clean and quiet with comfy beds. Small pool and a nice little terrace area with sun loungers on the roof. A few free parking spots in front of the hotel and a parking lot next door (have to pay). Easy walk to the town centre. Would recommend to friends and family. cons:
pros: The receptionist was very kind and helpful cons: Nothing

pros: It was close to both the centre and the Marina  and an easy walk to beaches. cons: There was nothing to dislike: it was clean comfortable and well designed. It’s rooms were lovely and the staff were exceptionally helpful cheerful and welcoming.
pros: Everything within the hotel was excellent. Would definitely go back. cons: Nothing

pros: Perfect location.Walking distance from Batata beach and lagos center.Camilo beach and dona Ana beach are also not far.extremely clean rooms.Staff is very kind.Miguel Ribeiro helped us a lotthanks for that.Recommend this hotel hot. cons:
pros: Great central location friendly staff and comfortable rooms cons: Nothing

pros: This is one of the best hotels I’ve ever stay. Perfect location. Excellent cleaning. Absolutely professional management and staff. Perfect food view. Comfortable rooms. I’m very happy to stay at this hotel and highly recommended!!!

And last but not least I would like to mention one of the people from reception. His name is Miguel Ribeiro. Very kind and professional person who advised us regarding the beaches trips restaurants and everything. Special thanks!!! cons: Nothing. Every part of the accommodation was perfect

pros: This is my second time at the hotel. It was even better than I remembered. The location was perfect - close to the marina the beach the old town and the bus station. It was very clean and the mattress was extremely comfortable. We were happy to have a balcony with a rack to dry our bathing suits and towels. cons:
pros: It has improved pretty much. Since 2017 last time I was in lagos all forniture has change completely modernized and generally it changed pretty good. cons: Nothing.
pros: The breakfast was everything you could want. Fresh fruit hot food and a lovely selection of pastries. cons: Nothing.
pros: loved the sun terrace the location and the cleanliness of the hotel. cons: absolutely nothing that I disliked

pros: Michel at Reception gave us the friendliest and most upbeat welcome we have ever received in our 40 years of traveling. This was consistent throughout our stay. An amazing person and a credit to the hotel business.
Rooms were of very high quality including the beautiful softness of the bed linen and the balcony was to a very high finish/maintenance quality. Unbelievably relaxing atmosphere. Coffee machine in room was fantastic and croissants in your restaurant were delicious.
Loved it. cons: (1) No access to the back of the TV for streaming. This is very unusual now in most hotels. 
Recommendation: An hotel note could be left in room to allow pick-up of the required cable at Reception (with a required deposit to ensure return). We had our laptops but it wasn’t the same and unfortunately just for this reason alone we couldn’t return or recommend. 
(2) A bit of a bad/ugly smell was present in our room after cleaning was carried out on our 2nd day. Smelled as if cleaning cloths were not sanitised correctly. It was gone after about 20 minutes with door open to balcony. We waited on the balcony for the 20 minutes until bad smell was gone.
Bed sheets not changed on 2nd day and not shaken out correctly - there were crumbs/particles of dirt and small stain still present on the sheet on the 2nd evening. Disappointed with this.

pros:  cons: A member of staff was rude when we mentioned that they should have worn us about the noise from the bus station that we had a view of it. We would have paid extra to move or ask for front facing room initially should we have been made aware. 
When you are on holiday you don't want to be up at 5 am because of the noise. And that is what we have experienced. 
The staff member should have been polite about it but instead the lady was rude and not wanting to listen. In despite of the hotel itself which we like unfortunately we will not stay there again.

pros: Great location. Walking distance to the bus and the train station (no noise issues). 5 min walk into the main hub of shops bars restaurants.

Room was clean and very comfy with great wifi good shower pressure and air con. There's a small fridge in there too. 

The pool is small but nice. 

There was a new girl training on the desk when I arrived who was very helpful patient and made a great first impression. cons: The aircon was cool enough but the controller didn't seem to work when trying to switch the temp.
pros: The hotel was spotless cons: It was all good.  Helpful staff clean hotel
pros: The best location and the people who worked there were so nice and helpful to us Americans !!!! We loved it so much! It was beautiful cons:
pros: Location was perfect. Close to everything we needed. Staff were very friendly and accommodating. Went out of their way to help with any questions we had. cons: Nothing - it was perfect

pros: everything!
clean location staff highly  recommend! cons: nothing
pros: Cleanliness location friendly helpful staff cons: Nothing
pros: Location rooms breakfast staff cons: Think water should be complimentary each day
pros: breakfast was of a good quality staff were very friendly and helpful cons: nothing
pros: First class throughout  lovely staff  the hotel was absolutely fantastic  clean throughout   great breakfast 👌 will defo be back 😋 great location right on the marina cons:

pros: literally steps away from the bus station (though don’t worry it doesn’t feel like it at all from an aesthetic perspective) to and from Lisbon and a 5 minute walk to old town 15 to beach. Nice balconies with drying racks for your swimwear. looking over the marina. the gentleman who did our check in - we only interacted once but I’m pretty sure his name was Miguel- was super helpful outgoing and charming. A great value for Porto. cons:

pros: The hotel is in a fantastic location next to Lagos Bus Station and opposite the Marina.  The hotel staff were exceptionally helpful and polite.  The rooms were immaculately clean and spacious.  We enjoyed the breakfast in the hotel which had a great selection of food and beverages.
The hotel pool whilst small is excellent and situated on the rooftop which provides great views of the area.  Would definitely visit again. cons: Absolutely nothing.
pros: Very spacious. Nice balcony. Good location right next to bus terminal. cons: No door for the shower.
pros: Our stay was amazing from start to finish cons:

pros: The hotel is perfectly placed overlooking the marina and just a short distance to the centre of the old town. All the staff we met were so friendly and helpful and made us feel welcome from the minute we arrived. The pool and the sun terrace were fantastic with amazing views of the marina and town. We upgraded to a marina view room and it was a great decision. We witnessed some amazing sunrises from our balcony and spent many an hour sipping wine and watching the activity in the marina. cons: Nothing
pros: Location. As if travel to Lagos by bus that’s perfect the hotel is just in front of the bus terminal. If you get a Marina view room the view is great too. cons: Nothing.
pros: Location is perfect for guests arrive by bus. A huge supermarket closes by. cons: No gym room.
pros: marina Rio was perfect in every aspect from the location to the staff and to the cleanliness of the property cons: nothing
pros: Great location and facilities. Front desk staff were very nice and helpful. Bus terminal was 3 minutes away. cons:

pros: Great location friendly staff and comfortable room with balcony overseeing the docks. cons: Only a couple of places on the street for hotel parking. The staff should warn the guest that the adjacent parking lot does not belong to the Hotel and it is constantly monitored by the police it is like a trap. We parked and went in to the hotel to check in and inquire about parking. This only took a few minutes and by the time we went back we had already received a parking ticket.

pros: This was a wonderful hotel! The rooms were very comfortable and we loved the big bathroom bathtub and bathrobes. It’s pretty well located too right across from the marina if you wanna take a boat trip and about ten minutes walking to the old town. The staff was also lovely and the pool on the roof was nicely heated. Would definitely recommend! cons:

pros: Great location to walk to everything. However our balcony faced the bus station. We weren't aware of that.  We had a partial side view of the water. Actually we didn't use the balcony so it didn't affect our stay. Also there was a wonderful rooftop area with lounge chairs and beautiful views of the marina and a nice pool.  The staff was very nice and helpful.  The breakfast was very good.  The room was clean and comfortable. cons:
pros: Location bus coaches behind hotel 2 mins walk cons: All good

pros: The hotel was close to everything  with a lovely balcony overlooking the marine. The room was clean comfortable and had everything we needed. the rooftop pool was a lovely temp and towels provided with a bond that we could also take to the beach. Parking was right next door and reasonably priced. The staff were friendly and efficient. cons: nothing

pros: The hotel itself is just in the most perfect spot being in the ventre of town the rooms are brand new - but the two receptionists that we dealt with were lost the best that I have veer known - nothing too much trouble helpful and with a wicked sense of humour. Delightful.... cons: The pool on the roof is a disappointment but it is only a small matter.
pros: Everything was excellent The hotel has a very homy feel. cons: Nothing. I can't fault this hotel.
pros: Location pool staff view cons: Nothing! We loved our stay here
pros: location facilities breakfast cleanliness cons: most staff were excellent not all

pros: Exceptional design throughout the hotel. Fantastic sun terrace with quality sun beds settees and cushions. Great lighting in the room good beds and very modern bathroom. Brilliant location…right next to the marina…excellent restaurants nearby so we did not need the hotel to provide an evening meal. Good breakfast. Good aircon. cons: The only disappointment was that the pillows weren’t soft enough.

pros: The location was great - just a short walk to the old city and the beaches and cliffs. The room was clean and large. The front desk person who checked us in (Miguel) was super friendly helpful and funny. Pro tip: When you leave the building always turn to your right - there is nothing interesting to the left. cons: I would have preferred a queen bed instead of two singles.
pros: Excellent location.  Less then 10 minute walk to the train station and old town (the other way.)  Close enough to the main beaches and other sights in the city.  Had a very restful sleep. cons:

pros: nice hotel near to the centre of town. cons: view from the rear balcony is of the bus station but this can’t be helped. Marina view is slightly more expensive but rear balcony gets the evening sun.
pros: This is what I would expect from a 4 star hotel. cons:
pros: We stayed one night b4 going back to Lisbon. Wonderful hotel centrally located 4th floor deck was amazing. Thank you. cons:
pros: loved the location as it was right next to the bus station it had many markets and restaurant nearby plus the staff was always super helpful! cons: -
pros: Everything - location service comfort view breakfast ease of access to everything cons: Nothing!
pros: everything is great except bath water pressure is a bit low details have been taken care of good location great breakfast. cons: bath water pressure a bit low
pros: Fantastic location great staff very clean. cons: The beds were a bit hard.

pros: location and staff especially Miguel at reception!!! cons: noise from crosswalk signal outside
our room was constant!

pros: This hotel is in a fantastic location across the street from the marina and 5 mins walk to old town so there are plenty of shops and restaurants everywhere and a laundromat 2 blocks away if you need to do a load of clothes as well as Lavanderias that provide that service.  Also there is a parking lot next to the hotel for $3euros per day.  The staff is very accommodating.  I would definitely stay here again. cons: There's nothing I didn't like as I would stay here again.  But I booked a standard room which faced the back of the hotel and my terrace looked out the bus parking lot directly in back of the hotel.  It was not noisy at all but if you don't want to look at a parking lot full of buses I would book a marina view.

pros: Phenomenal location: close to Marina bus station old town . Hotel is very modern  sleek and beautiful. Staff is very friendly and gave a recommendation for late dinner. The hotel rooms are great in design have a nice balcony and there is rooftop pool and balcony. I highly recommend this hotel. It’s a must if want to be close to the Marina. cons:
pros: As Advertised small hotel friendly staff great breakfast! cons:
pros: very well located decor very fresh whole hotel spotless and d dry staff member I came across was lovely. cons: nothing
pros: Good variety and choice of hot and cold foods cons:

pros: Immaculately clean hotel. The room was absolutely gorgeous with a wonderful balcony overlooking the marina. Lovely spacious bathroom too and heated pool up on the roof. Breakfast was delicious with the best cappuccinos I have ever had! Would definitely come back to this hotel. Staff were so friendly too. cons: Beds could be softer/better mattresses. I cant think of anything else!
pros: wonderful welcome at reception good breakfast great view of marina and balcony … very convenient location for market and bus cons:

pros: Immaculate and spacious. Great location for bars and restaurants  friendly staff. Comfortable bed and despite overlooking the marina and main road the room was quiet. Heated outdoor pool which even in March is to a high temperature. cons: Nothing
pros: Location excellent. Easy walk to train bus eating beach old town. cons: Can't think of anything
pros: location cons: everything was perfect
pros: location cons: Should have stayed longer
pros: Location clean staff cons: Coffee pot broke no free parking terminal very noisy behind and strongest lamp post behind balcony
pros: location cons:

pros: Such a calming and beautifully designed hotel. The beds were very comfortable. We loved being able look at the marina from our room and had coffee on the balcony. Such a pleasure we will be back! 😍 cons:

pros: The hotel is modern and fresh. They were happy to convert the twin beds into a doubled and the bed was very comfortable. The bathroom is clean with a good shower. The staff are helpful. Miguel is the friendliest and most helpful. cons: The breakfast was overpriced. The selection was small and made to order eggs were only offered on one occasion. The bread was stale on the third day.

pros: Location was excellent...within walking distance of the old town and most sights.  Staff were extremely helpful and welcoming. Breakfast was great - lots of choice and very fresh. cons: Can't think of anything.
pros: easy access from motorway and to Lagos old town cons: Private car park is small
pros: The staff was really friendly and helpful and we loved the view of the Marina. It was also close to great dining in old town. cons:
pros: the hotel is right across the marina.  plenty of the food on the other marina.  hotel offers free parking in the basement level.  very clean .  good breakfast . cons:
pros: Very well appointed and wonderful staff! The breakfast was great as well. cons:
pros: Spacious room and bathroom breakfast OK perfect parking cons: Nothing particular.
pros: Everything! Very friendly and helpful staff. Perfect location overlooking the marina.  Breakfast was excellent. cons: Nothing
pros: Everything from check in to check out was perfect cons: Cant think of anything that needed imporving
pros: Excellent location car parking available beside hotelbus station 100 meters bars and restaurants nearby cons: Nothing
pros: it was very clean and close to all the restaurants and shops. the staff was very welcoming and polite cons: everything was great

pros: This hotel is very conveniently located with marina in front of it and bus station right behind it.  Furthermore it is a few minutes' walk to downtown.  Room is very clean and very well maintained. cons:
pros: Clean near the town cosy and value for Money. cons:

pros: Very good location- right across from the Marina and easy walking distance to central squares.  Staff from all departments very friendly and sincere.  Building very clean and well maintained.  Bed very comfortable.  Breakfast excellent with lots of choices. Roof top pool and roof top patio with comfortable seating and excellent view of Harbour.  Glass sidings on decks and room balconies was sparkling clean!  Parking easily accessible. cons: There was nothing that I would complain about!
pros: Everything was excellent including staff and location. cons: Nothing

pros: This hotel exceeded our expectations in terms of comfort. It was the best hotel we stayed at during our Europe trip because the rooms have been designed with comfort and functionality in mind.
- The beds were large comfortable and clean.
- Strong aircon
- Bathrooms were spacious well lit and storage areas under the sinks.
- Heated towel rack inside and drying rack for clothes outside. So easy to wash and dry our clothes here.
- Lots of storage to hang and store our belongings. Great when sharing a room with someone else.
- Miguel at the reception were SO friendly and helpful
- Great view of the Marina (if you get a Marina facing room). Our second room faced the bus stop but we didn’t mind.
- Right in front of the bus terminal so it was easy for us to check out and head over to our coach which took us to our next destination. cons: Not much. It’s a slight walk into the city centre but not too bad.

One of our rooms faced the bus stop but we knew that ahead of time from photos and reviews so didn’t mind. Just be aware! :)

pros: Beautiful hotel right across from the marina and centrally located right near old town. I had a lovely room with a marina view and a balcony which I highly recommend. Large bathroom as well. very nice front desk staff as well as the woman working at breakfast. cons: A bit pricey but worth it!
pros: Great location good value for money exceptionally clean and room was very good. cons: Unable to get an airport transfer for an early morning flight despite it not being peak season.

pros: staff
cleanliness cons: traffic noise when balcony doors open
pros: location was great for walking and parking either in front free if available or cheap next door. cons: no heated rooftop pool for an October trip

pros: The hotel is small and intimate with only 12 rooms per floor and yet has so much to offer in terms of views location and spacious rooms with a balcony. The terrace looking out over the Marina was just beautiful and the perfect place to read a book and relax. cons: Our first reaction to be over-looking the bus depot was a bit of a downer but with the city views and we also had a marina view it really didn’t have any impact and there was no disruption at all.
pros: clean rooms a great rooftop experience! cons: I liked it all!

pros: location comfortable parking near by.  near by laundromat.  lots of restaurants around cons: the room was on the 1st floor on the back (no marina view) facing the bus depo.  when the balcony door was opened the exhaust fumes came in the room.
pros: Over all stay is good cons: Nothing

pros: From entry everything was excellent.
Clean Friendly cons: Leaving….😩

pros: this is the second time we have stayed in the marina rio. we love it for its great location  5 minutes walk from the old town and also the marina. the staff are all very very friendly and make you feel very welcome. the roof terrace and pool are perfect and very quiet and private with great views over the marina. the room and the hotel was immaculately clean all of the time.  just wonderful cons: absolutley nothing we will be back again

pros: Great access to everything. Approx 5 minute walk from the train station - so it was walkable with bags. Gorgeous views. There is a pool and lounger area on the top floor (didn’t use the pool but was able to use the shower after the beach before my train). Staff was super welcoming and offered a ton of great tips directions restaurant recommendations. On a main road so felt very safe walking in the evening. Not far from beaches (walked). Room bathroom and common areas were very clean. My balcony faced the bus station in the back but very little noise when the door was shut. I would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to others. Espresso machine in the room in addition to standard kettle. cons:
pros: First class location overlooking the Marina. Clean modern building facilities and rooms. cons: Nothing
pros: 3 stay at this hotel. Great breakfast. Exceptional staff. I will recommend this hotel to everyone going to Lagos. cons:

pros: everything! lovely hotel - our room had a marina view definitely request that on the third floor. it was clean and updated with comfortable beds and bath. loved the balcony for an evening cocktail cons: nothing. a little walk into town but it was a lovely promenade and easy fast walk
pros: Sundeck & small pool cons:
pros: central to Lagos cons: nothing
pros: Lovely modern room overlooking the Marina and what a view!!  We had breakfast included and really enjoyed it with a great choice of fresh options. cons: Nothing!
pros: Location cleanliness staff friendliness and quality breakfast. cons: Nothing
pros: spectacular views spotlessly clean beautiful rooms cons: all great

pros: Very close to the bus station. The room has a balcony with a rack for hanging out wash-ups. It was quiet despite being next to the coach oark.On the very clean and the staff were helpful. On arrival I requested the staff member to confirm with me a booking with a tour company. He agreed and got reply fast. cons: Nothing really.
pros: Marina location was excellent! cons: We were put in “accessible” room even through we never asked for it. The shower practically flooded the bathroom!!
pros: Location is very good the room beautiful decorate peaceful colours cons: Early morning the smell  coming from the marina
pros: Get a marina view room! Great hotel with comfortable bed great view and perfect location. cons:
pros: everything modern clean & bright lovely staff excellent breakfast cons: nothing

pros: Breakfast was lovely plenty of choice and excellent quality. Staff member overseeing front of house very efficient. Pool was warm and clean. Rooms spacious modern pretty and the view over the marina exceptional. Even the stairs cases are wide bright and spotless. Staff were very friendly. Large comfy communal area. There is a lift to all floors including the roof top terrace and roof top pool. cons: Nothing
pros: breakfast is really awesome. the location is great. sun bed and pool are also in good quality. cons: wifi is quite slow

pros: Great location that is very central to everything yet slightly distant from the noisy part of the town.  Very friendly and welcoming staff.  Clean rooms.  Very good breakfast. cons: Our room #208 was on the small and tight side (but in fairness it's common in Europe).

pros: Breakfast was exceptional in choice availability and presentation. Room was excellent as it was spacious cleaned to the highest standard and staff were non intrusive. Location was great. cons: Nothing

pros: The breakfast was amazing…lovely fresh fruit flakey pastries and a full assortment of breakfast items. The roof top lounge and pool with scenic views made the stay extra special. Best of all was our balcony overlooking the marina. cons: We loved everything.

pros: Beautiful marina view modern & clean rooms great location! Easily accessible to old town by foot and tons of restaurants! About a 15 minute walk to the first set of beaches! Would recommend highly and come again :) cons:
pros: Our room was very comfortable and clean and our balcony was good. Breakfast service and food very good. Would definitely stay here again. cons: Only downfall they only serve breakfast.

pros: The hotel was very centrally located with a view of the Marina close to restaurants and Old Town. I walked everywhere and left my car parked inexpensively right next to the hotel. The staff was friendly and accommodating. The room was quiet and clean bed was comfortable. cons:
pros: It’s in the perfect location is clean and the staff are friendly. cons:
pros: Location cons: Hairdryer doesn't work properly we need to wait after a usage of 5 mins
pros: Nice hotel with good breakfast good room and a pool at the top. cons:

pros: We chose this hotel for it's location and price.  It is situated right if front of the marina where you can book tours and have access to many restaurants and bars.  The beach is a 15 minute walk.  Right in the back of the hotel there is the bus station and down the street there are many restaurants mini market and stores.  You could walk to the Old Town easily.  The room was just a right size.  The bed was really comfortable and the balcony was really nice.  There was no issues with hot water or AC.  The breakfast was really good and had many choices.  You can even make arrangement for breakfast if you have to leave early which was really nice of them. There is a lift for our convenience. The staff was really friendly and helpful. They do have parking but very limited so don't forget to reserve your space.  I woud recommend this hotel to anyone. cons:
pros: good breakfast. Lovely view over the marina a very quiet hotel even though well placed in Lagos. Good sound proofing cons: Price was quite high.

pros: Perfect location - hotel is located 10 minutes from the historic centre with all the restaurants and bars just in front of the marina. 
Super clean - rooms were sparkling clean as was the swimming pool beds were very comfortable. Amazing to come back to after a long day of exploring the Algarve. 
Friendly staff - we very much enjoyed Miguel’s jokes :) and friendliness going out of his way to make sure we felt at home. cons: Nothing - perfect stay.
pros: Very friendly and relaxed vibe. cons: There was a bit of smell from bathroom but it didn’t bother us too much.

pros: Breakfast was lovely.
Friendly staff.
Beautifully appointed rooms and roof terrace. cons: Nothing. It was brilliant.
pros: beautiful hotel perfect location friendly helpful staff and a great breakfast! the roof top pool was a fantastic bonus too cons:

pros: The stay was amazing - definitely exceeded expectations. The staff was extremely friendly and welcoming going the extra mile to help us with recommendations + airport transport. The location was great as well and had a lovely view of the marina. Wish we could’ve stayed longer - will definitely be back!! cons:
pros: Location and room cons:

pros: Location is superb and the staff very helpful and polite. cons: We thought it would have been a nice gesture to put a bottle of water in the fridge.  Most people travel a substantial distance to get to Lagos and a nice cold glass of water would have been nice upon arrival!
pros: Room breakfastlocationcleanlinessstaff cons: No bar near the pool

pros: Lovely view friendly staff clean rooms quiet at night nice heated pool on the roof walking distance to the centre. cons: Hairdrier is not powerful enough. If you have long thick hair take your own hairdrier.
pros: Excellent location wonderful staff super clean! cons: They served breakfast but they don’t have restaurant.  They have a small bar where you can get water wine snacks  etc.

pros: The service was great. We lost a shirt and a bottle of water. Later we walked into the restroom after checkout and they returned both to us! The rooms were nice with a small balcony. The bathroom had an amazing tub and a towel warmer. cons: The A/C wasn't cold enough and didn't get to the 18 degrees we set it at.
pros: Excellent location. Exceptionally clean. Very friendly helpful staff. cons: There is nothing not to dislike about this hotel.

pros: Beautiful Hotel great location opposite the Marina  close to bars and restaurants can't find any fault with this hotel breakfast was good continental with eggs and bacon.  Roof terrace perfect with amazing views of the Marina. We'll definitely return to this hotel. cons: Our room was at the back with a city view but over looking the bus station.  Saying that it didn't bother us at all.
pros: Great staff nice room very clean and cozy! Great location. View was beautiful overlooking the marina. Highly recommend! cons:
pros: Comfy and clean room! Great staff and the breakfast was good. cons:

pros: The hotel is well located with a nice view. We received a warm welcome at the reception. The room despite being small are well equipped. The swimming pool (also despite being very small) is a plus when the weather is not good. To note that the parking is public outside and cost 5€ for half a day. cons: The room could be bigger.
pros: A very warm welcome every time we come to this hotel it’s our favourite when we come into Lagos for a night out cons: Nothing

pros: Lovely hotel. Fantastic views of the marina off our private small patio. Extremely pleasant and helpful  staff. Rooms are very clean and nice. Rooftop pool and sitting area was awesome. Definitely stay here again cons:
pros: The hotel was in a delightful location .  The staff were friendly and helpful cons: nothing
pros: spotlessexcellent staffgreat locationlovely breakfastfantastic view from marina facing rooms cons:

pros: location was amazing pool was great. roof top was excellent. Marina view was amazing. breakfast was plentiful and staff great. cons: sadly I had a bus station view. there was no bar upstairs or rooftop bar this would have been amazing at this hotel. parking was challenging as it wasn’t well explained on the parking meters so we were fined once. breakfast room was a bit small and HOT.
pros: the hotel was just fantastic it was lovely and clean everything was perfect for a great holiday cons: nothing
pros: Excellent staff very quiet and clean. Breakfast is very and homemade cons:
pros: Breakfast was lovely receptionist Miguel was really helpful and welcoming room was a good size and beds very comfortable cons: Nothing
pros: Location cons: Nothing
pros: Great location and a clean and friendly hotel. The roof top heated pool was a bonus. cons: Nothing
pros: Staff lovely  clean  convenient location breakfast lovely and reasonably priced . cons: nothing loved it

pros: The hotel is in a great location opposite the marina and close to town. The supermarket Pingo Douche is a short walk away. Breakfast is good and the variety is fine. It is not rocket science but works well. The cleaning is superb you can not fault it. The showers are to die for there is so much space. All the essentials are supplied and there is even a towel warmer. Mini fridge is great and safety deposit box is free along with air con. The staff are so nice and my thanks goes out to Isabel for booking me a taxi to and from the airport. We stayed in room 201 and it was great. The sun sets behind the hotel but it is lovely sitting in the late afternoon on the balcony watching the world boats go by. The pool is on the 4th floor and is small but is a bonus. The lounger area opposite is a must for all those who want to watch the world go by. cons: Breakfast could be a little different and the reception area seemed to lack a bit of panache. It works but need something to liven it up.

pros: Very nice hotel with extremely helpful and friendly staff. cons: Bathroom we were given a bathroom with a wet room which is great if you need disabled access. The design meant the floor was always wet around toilet and sink. I do not like walking on wet floors. However everything else was faultless.
pros: Staff were very helpful and friendly.  Amenities were nearby also the train and bus station. cons: Nothing we didn't like.
pros: great location cons:
pros: Amazing location right in the city centre and across the marina. staff was very friendly especially Miguel on the front desk. Excellent breakfast in the room with the marina view. cons: nothing

pros: The hotel delivers on all our expectations located close to restaurants bars and cafes. It looks out over the marina which is a great view while enjoying a glass of wine on the balcony. The friendliness of all the hotel staff is just what we were looking for. The pool is small but adequate for a swim and cool off while on the sundeck which is well equipped with loungers and comfy chairs. Breakfast in continental style with cereal fruit cold meats scrambled eggs and coffee/tea. cons: There was nothing we didn't like about the Marina Rio
pros: location and breakfast cons: pool did not look too clean
pros: Everything cons:
