pros: location location location clean breakfast rooftop parking nearby. cons: hair dryer very old and barely worked.
pros: Everything. cons: Nothing
pros: Very clean and modern. Great staff. Small and quiet. Handy location. cons:
pros: location cons:

pros: the staff attention to customers.   location . room was clean and well appointed.
complimentary toiletries and coffee was of good standard . cons: the smell coming from bathroom drain need attention.
pros: Excellent hotel with a really first class staff group who can’t do enough to help and make your stay pleasant. Outstanding. cons: Nothing

pros: Great location 
Good facilities 
Very clean 
Staff were really helpful and polite 
Would definitely return again cons: Breakfast buffet could have been in a larger room. Very little room to manoeuvre around the buffet selection.
pros: The property was very clean and location was great! cons: nothing
pros: Great breakfast good location very friendly staff and overall really clean hotel. Everything was top of the top. cons:
pros: Updated hotel clean excellent facilities wonderful staff.  Very comfortable room & bed.  Rooftop pool & terrace for relaxing. Great location. cons: There were no negatives with this property.
pros: Staff were very friendly and super helpful.  The hotel was very clean.  The roof top patio and pool were lovely. cons:
pros: Excellent value for an outstanding Hotel and right in front of the bus station! cons:

pros: Cleanliness is important to us and we were delighted by the standard of this in the hotel. We also found the friendliness of the staff made our stay a very pleasant one. The location of the hotel is very good for access to the marina beach and town. cons: I felt that although the hotel was impeccably
clean  there may be an issue with the drains as there was a sour smell of this type in the bathroom occasionally.
pros: The marina view and the rooftop pool. The front desk staff were great. cons: The two Russian television stations on TV.  They should have been removed because of the war in Ukraine!
pros: great location close to Marina & town centre cons:
pros: The people cons: Nothing
pros: Everything! Lovely staff perfect location for everything 5 minute walk to the train station would highly recommend cons:
pros: Great location!  Friendly staff clean and loved the view over the marina.  Highly recommend! cons: Wish we'd stayed longer!  This visit we had limited time.
pros: amazing location over looking marina so you sit and watch all the boats coming and going. Also just a few minutes in to Lagos centre cons: can not think of anything
pros: Great selection at breakfast. Friendly staff. Great facilities cons:

pros: Excellent room with balcony with a view of the marina.  Swimming and solarium on the roof terrace.  Excellent breakfast with very good choice.  Location was easy reach of Lagos town centre the beaches and bus and railway stations. cons: The rooms overlooking the marina are next to the road so obviously some road noise expected.

pros: Very nice and clean hotel near Lagos marina. The staff is very kind. The breakfast is good. Location is excellent near Lagos marina and close to Lagos city center where you have a lot of restaurants. cons:
pros: The hotel exceeded expectations in most respects with the breakfast a clear winner. cons: I don't think there was anything.
pros: Very friendly and helpfull staff superb breakfast wonderfull rooftop terrace. cons: Rooms are missing a luggage rack you'll have to leave it on the floor. Internet connection was poor.

pros: Excellent  breakfast in a lovley sunny room. Staff were very helpful and friendly and all spoke excellent English. the room and bed were very comfortable. Liked the expresso coffee machine and roomm fridge. Pool arera was very clean and well kept cons: Honestly nothing!  Excellent hotel in a super location
pros: Every thing was perfect the staff amazing the reception staff were exceptional nothing was to much trouble cons: perfect
pros:  cons: Maybe a little for storage space for clothing
pros: great location friendly staff clean hotel and good value cons: nothing

pros: Exceptional hotel with modern nice decoratrd rooms amazing bathroom comfy beds and balcony overlooking the marina. Parking lot is right next to the hotel. Parking is 3 euro overnight. Good breakfast nice and helpful staff. cons: Nothing we'loved everything...
pros: We have stayed there on 5 occasions. Always great. Tremendous breakfast. cons: There is nothing to dislike.

pros: Nice hotel staff on reception all very helpful and went above and beyond to help out - thank you to Isabel on the desk for helping me sort out the parking and just being generally helpful and friendly cons: My room had a view overlooking the coach park not the best but wasn't all that noisy thankfully

pros: View of the Marina 
Very clean room
Good breakfast
Friendly staff. cons:
pros: Perfectly located to the marina for boat trips and easy walk with luggage to the train station. We enjoyed our short stay! cons: nothing

pros: The pretty comfortable room.  The rooftop terrace and pool cons: Beware the old lady at reception who suggested perhaps we had the wrong hotel even though our booking was PRE PAID! Her manner continued to be unpleasant and she did not apologize for her mistake.

pros: We had a wonderful time in our one night visit to Lagos starting with great suggestions from Isabel at the front desk as to where to eat and what to do.  We were able to park in the very convenient outdoor lot alongside the hotel for just 3 Euros/day. The room was very nice with a balcony with table and chairs overlooking the marina.  The beds were very comfortable. Front desk staff was fluent in English and attentive to our needs even providing bandaids right away for a cut finger.  We didn’t make use of it but the front desk also handles a nice bar area downstairs that other guests were enjoying. cons: Nothing. It was great!

pros: The property is very well located being across the street from the marina (access to various boat trips) and at the north end of the typical walking tour to see the old town and main historic sights. We had a river-facing room and recommend that even though there is more traffic noise (with the balcony door open). Breakfast was excellent with both healthy and diverse fare. Jorge at the front desk was both friendly and helpful throughout our stay. It’s nice to experience a good sense of humor across languages. cons: The only negative which was not very negative at all was the parking. There is an adjacent lot that costs 3 euros per day (9:00 am to 7:00 pm strictly enforced) and spaces across the street that cost the same for a 24-hour period (also strictly enforced). We were there in late-April and parking was reasonably plentiful but I expect the same will not be true during peak season. If you don’t pay for parking by the daily deadline you should expect a 5 euro ticket under your wiper blade.
pros: Did not include breakfast in my reservation. Plenty of restaurants around.  Vegans:  You must visit Artesao! cons:
pros: Great location. super view of Marina. Exceptionally friendly staff. great breakfast. great value. cons: nothing it’s great
pros: Lovely breakfast cons: Nothing

pros: this is the second time we’ve stayed at this hotel and both visits were great. very friendly and helpful staff a great hotel and a great location. cons: occasionally the floor above was noisy with moving furniture in the morning. Not sure if that was other guests or the team cleaning the room. not a big issue at all either way.
pros: Jorge was super nice !! Obrigada Jorge 😊😊 cons:

pros: What a super hotel. Wonderfully helpful and friendly staff. Bedroom overlooking the Marina and boats going by. Lovely balcony with discreet clothes drying. Bathroom with everything you ever need.
Lovely bedroom with super comfy bed.
Rooftop surprise with sun deck on one side and small heated pool on the other
10 min walk to old town. 1 minute to the bus station and right opposite the door bridge.
Loved it all. Will be back. cons: Nothing

pros: The location opposite the marina was fabulous. The hotel was exceptionally clean. A good selection for breakfast.
The receptionist was very pleasant and even took the time to apologize about a small area that had been cordoned off on our landing for some emergency repairs. cons:

pros: Great central location on the marina. lovely room and breakfast. Staff very helpful let us check-in one hour earlier. Free parking in front of the hotel. Really loved our view over the marina. Just perfect. cons: Nothing

pros: Wonderful location with view over the marina and easy parking. Room was immaculate. 
Polite staff nothing was too much trouble.
Will visit again. cons: Nothing
pros: Location and breakfast were both perfect cons: Everything was OK no complaints.

pros: Good location. Nice view. Professional personnel. Clean. Effective cleaning ladies. Roof top with excellent view. Parking close and cheap. Two separate hotel parking space could be used if free. cons: It could be possible if not the "best" neighbors in the room next to you that you may hear too much? Not too bad but could be better.

pros: Very clean
Friendly staff
Nice rooftop pool cons:
pros: good location modern clean not too large and impersonal and with friendly staff. cons:

pros: Beautifully clean and modern
Wonderful breakfast cons: Nothing

pros: We spent 5 nights on a return trip to this wonderful hotel because we love its location cleanliness helpful staff and hotel amenities. They serve a wonderful breakfast with eggs cooked to order. All the rooms have a balcony with a table and two chairs. We opted for a room with a harbor view as other rooms in the back of the hotel overlook the surrounding buildings and a bus parking lot. The hotel has a pool and terrace located on the top floor which we enjoyed. There is pay parking for 3 euros next door but there are two free parking spaces in front which we were lucky to be able to use. The train station is also within walking distance. We would recommend! cons:

pros: Well-appointed comfortable room with balcony at the back of the hotel and overlooking the bus station which we could see but did not hear.  Tea and coffee making facilities provided also dressing gowns and slippers.  No glitches with the wi-fi.  The hotel is conveniently situated a few few minutes flat walk from the centre but far enough away for easy parking. cons: There was a low humming noise in the background which was only noticeable in the quiet of the night.  Our room was on the third floor and perhaps it came from the pump for the rooftop swimming pool above?
pros: In the centre of Lagos close to our favourite restaurant cons: Everything was fine as usual

pros: The breakfast was excellent. Such a wide range of meats cheeses breads etc  not forgetting eggs cooked to order  omelette fried scrambled. cons: Only one criticism. A choice of tea fresh coffee In the room and only 2 milks  meaning as a couple we could only have one drink each in the room . Bit mean I think !!
pros: Great breakfast hotel close to the marina. cons: Great hotel.

pros: Good sized room with balcony overlooking the port. Buffet breakfast had everything we needed - continental toast & cereal options. Easy parking next door and only 5 minutes flat walk to the old town.
And roof terrace with pool with plenty of loungers.
Would definitely stay here on next visit. cons: Slightly noisy road noise in the mornings but only if you left the windows open.
pros: the view to marina was very nice the pool was heated and open whevere we wanted to go the pool (even though it was december) cons:

pros: The hotel is located in a very nice part of the city. The rooms are comfortable the staff is helpful. During the check-in process they suggested several activities that were available in the city that evening. cons: Maybe the selection for the breakfast could be a bit better. And a couple of bottles of water in the room would be nice.
pros: The location was good cons: They sprayed fragrance in the room. We think they are trying to get rid off some bad smell in the room.
pros: We had a great view of the bus terminal. Otherwise it was a nice property with pay parking next door. cons: We didn't pay for the view.

pros:  cons: The staff might be the least friendliest staff we encountered after two weeks in Portugal. Can't send postcards for us; cannot tolerate even 30 mins late check out despite we explained that our tour got delayed unexpectedly. All we asked was 30 mins more and the answer was "we are fully booked" on a Monday night on November.

pros: Pretty decor great location. Has nice  breakfast. cons: Room too cold couldn't get the temperature up.  Nothing to eat there at night if someone is sick and unable to leave. No menu to order from  a restaurant  either.

pros: Perfect location in centre of town. The bedroom was spotless and very comfortable.  We had a lovely view over the Marina. cons: This hotel is rated as 4 stars but please be aware it has no restaurant for lunch or dinner or even a snack or coffee during the day. There is a very small pool on the roof but not really suitable for sunbathing as it is very windy. A few sun beds on a different part of roof but little or no atmosphere.  Also there is a tiny bar if you want a drink in the evening you go to reception and they get it for you.  Breakfast area very small you are literally bumping into other guests trying to get breakfast. Also not a lot of choice. One member of staff to clean tables restock and seat guests.
pros: Staff and building excellent. Lacking facilities like drinks at the pool would be nice. Lots of ants in the room cons:

pros: New hotel. Plenty of parking space. The breakfast is great!! cons: Our room was in the back and had not a nice view (bus station) It was not near the beach and the pool was very small.
Window were soundproof so no noise. Very nice designed rooms and good beds. Near the Marina a bit far out of the old center

pros: Good breakfast. Close to bus station and train station and water tours. View from rooftop is good but very windy to enjoying (in June). cons: The view for standard rooms is a bus station. Marina view is extra €70 per night which then makes it expensive compared to other places which are closer to the town with a view (this is a 10 min walk which is long when it’s hot). Bright light outside shines in during the night. The bedding is not 4* quality lumpy pillows.

pros: Location was within walking distance to the Marina area and the old town.  Drove and found some hide-away-beaches. cons: The view (city view) was a bus parking lot.  Requested a Marina view prior to and upon arrival but none were available.

pros: Great location across from the Marina & train station - so easy access if arriving by train.  Nice breakfast & rooftop deck. Short walk to town. cons: The beds were a bit too firm but of course this is subjective.
pros: Location cons: Not 4 stars no bell boy or any staff to help us  to unload and deliver to our room at all
pros: Perfect location cons: Only two parking spaces…….
pros: Location was perfect absolutely perfect! cons: The tv was old and tough to operate. Yes I know that doesn’t matter to some people but it does matter to me.

pros:  cons: On check in told no kitchen therefore no early breakfast possible ( breakfast at 8) however when I left at 7.30 am there were people taking an early breakfast.
Also I requested extra milk capsule and woman ( not receptionist) told me each room only given 2 per day! She did give me two more— however a minor issue felt rather mean for £170€ and not very customer friendly
tea bags seemed to be similarly restricted .
pros: Breakfast wasn't part of our package however we paid for breakfast on the first morning €9.50 each and it was rubbish. Went out for breakfast after that. cons: Poor selection.

pros: This small hotel is very conveniently located for both the bus and railway stations. cons: The 7-stage  instructions procedure for the in-room  coffee machine are unintelligible ; do this hotel management expect guests to spend 15 minutes deciphering small-print instructions and a list of complex pictures before making coffee? We settled for tea!
The price hike since our last stay and extra cost of breakfast which we declined.
pros: Didn’t dtay cons: Rooms no Wi-Fi  no phone  no ambiance

Además no olía a comida ni a malos olores se estaba muy a gusto . cons: Estaba todo bastante bien .

pros: En general me gustó todo  limpieza  ubicación  está muy cerca del centro. El último día nos fuimos muy temprano y fueron muy amables y nos prepararon desayuno 
Todo muy bien cons: Por poner una pega la presión del agua de la ducha

pros: La piscina y las habitaciones excelentes (limpias modernas y cómodas)!! El personal muy amable también. cons: El desayuno estaba muy rico pero por ese precio me hubiera gustado encontrar un poco más de variedad.

pros: Quarto e banheiro bem organizado. 
Cofre de fácil  manuseio. cons: Frigobar pequeno  e gela pouco .

pros: El hotel es muy moderno se nota que se ha reformado hace poco. La limpieza y sus encargadas de la limpieza excepcional/es. El personal es amable. Camas muy cómodas. Te dejan dos almohadas una más blanda y una un poco más dura. El desayuno no es enorme pero tiene lo justo y necesario y está todo muy bueno. Si vuelvo a Lagos me alojaré aquí desde luego. Relación calidad precio excepcional. La ubicación también es muy buena enfrente de la marina y a 5 minutos del centro. La piscina es pequeña pero suficiente. El ambiente es tranquilo. cons: Nada. El mayor “inconveniente” que tuvimos fue que un día se nos colaron 4 o 5 hormigas en la habitación y en seguida subieron a “fumigarlas” (lo pongo entre comillas porque para la cantidad que había no hacía ni falta) y al día siguiente nos hicieron limpieza intensiva y no se volvió a ver una. Todo perfecto.
pros: Ubicación  instalaciones limpieza cons:

pros: El hotel está muy nuevo y muy cerca del pueblo de lagos andando las habitaciones son espaciosas y cómodas con nevera y cafetera en la habitación. 
El desayuno con todo lo necesario cons: Mis vistan daban a una estación de autobús que estaba en obras pero ya lo sabía si quieres vistas a la marina hay que pagarlas.
La piscina es un poco pequeña pero para darte un chapuzón más que de sobra.

pros: El hotel es muy acogedor y muy tranquilo está frente al puerto marítimo con unas vistas maravillosas nuestra habitación daba hacia el lo recomiendo. Desayuno correcto y atención de 10 por parte de los empleados. cons: Me gusto pero mejoraría la piscina con duchas y algún tipo de cerramiento porque le da el viento por todas partes y es súper incómodo ya que está muy alta. Por lo demás cumple su cometido un baño y listo.
pros: Muy buena ubicación cerca del centro y de la zona de Ponta da Piedade. cons: Es una pena que la piscina no de al puerto

pros: Escolhi esse hotel por ser menor e como estava com meu neto achei melhor ficar em um local com menos hóspedes e mais tranquilo. Fiz a escolha certa!  Ótimo hotel  muito bem localizado em frente a Marina e perto do Centro histórico. Café da manhã muito bem servido com itens de excelente qualidade. Quarto amplo limpo bem decorado super confortável. banheiro excelente. roupas de cama e banho de ótima qualidade. Super recomendo. cons:

pros: El desayuno cumplía mis altas expectativas la cama era gigante y supercómoda (2 metros por 22m). 
Limpieza muy buena y todo muy muy bien a 3 mins caminando del centro y silencioso. cons: El tema parking que no había aunque cerca del hotel había plazas para aparcar aunque casi todo es zona azul.

pros: A localização é excelente! Em frente a Marina e a 800 metros apenas do centro histórico sendo possível fazer tudo a pé. As instalações estão renovadas e excelentes. O recepcionista Miguel foi maravilhoso nos dando várias dicas e sendo muito atencioso. Tudo excelente. cons: O único porém é que se quisermos usar o terraço pra fazer um happy hour não é possível levar copos e bebidas para o terraço.
pros: localização e conforto cons: nada

pros: Bien situado a 10 minutos andando del centro.
Frente a la marina de Lagos.
Desayuno estupendo con productos de muy buena calidad (zumo naranja natural salmón jamón) cons: Hizo viento los 3 días que estuvimos así que no pudimos disfrutar de la piscina.
La calle donde está situado el aparcamiento es de pago pero encontramos fácilmente aparcamiento en las calles de atrás.
pros: tudo ótimo cons:
pros: La simpatía y la atención por parte de la recepción de 10. cons:
pros: situación y desayuno cons:

pros: Staff muito simpático. Quarto confortável bem decorado moderno e limpo. Áreas boas. 
A localização é excelente para visitar a marina e o centro de Lagos.
Um pouco caro para o tipo de hotel que é. cons: O pequeno almoço fraco: muita pouca variedade e a qualidade é média! O espaço da refeição é muito pequeno quer para as mesas quer para a disposição dos produtos. Pelo preço a refeição deveria ser bem melhor.
pros: O hotel é perfeito! Limpeza é impecável! Os funcionários muito atenciosos cons:
pros: ubicación cons: muy fuerte la calefacción
pros: Adorei cons:
pros: Os quartos são extremamente confortáveis excelente higiene. cons:
pros: Buena ubicación habitación grande y limpia. Personal agradable y desayuno super completo. cons:

pros: La habitación es amplia y la cama cómoda  y las vistas al puerto están muy bien. cons: Que está en una carretera de cuatro carriles con tráfico aunque la verdad es que por la noche no se escuchó nada.

pros: Hotel confortável ao lado da estação de ônibus de Lagos em frente à Marina o que facilita os passeios de barco. cons: Falta informação no Booking.com sobre a proximidade do hotel com a estação de ônibus. por isso a chegada foi um pouco confusa!
pros: tudo !! hotel novo perto de tudo cons:
pros: El desayuno es riquísimo y muy variado. Las habitaciones son muy lindas y las camas muy cómodas. cons:
pros: TUDO! Surpreendente pelo cuidado com todos os detalhes! Quarto perfeito simpatia dos funcionários café da manhã gostoso localização ótima vale demais! Voltaria com gosto! cons:

pros: Funcionários muito atenciosos muito!!!! cons: Unico defeito do hotel a piscina deveria ser na frente  do hotel e não no fundo. Uma vista deslumbrante na frente da cobertura e a piscina fica no fundo da cobertura. Só faltava esta piscina ser na parte  frontal da cobertura para o hotel ser perfeito.

pros: El hotel está impoluto. La habitación es muy cómoda y completa con unas vistas preciosas al puerto de Lagos (recomiendo coger habitación con vistas porque merece la pena). El desayuno es muy completo. La atención de todo el personal de recepción es espectacular con especial mención a Isabel con quien más coincidimos que se portó de 10 con nosotros. Da gusto encontrarse con gente así. cons: Nada!!
pros: Bom pequeno almoço cons:
pros: Moderno y cómodo cons: nada

pros: La cama es comodisima y las almohadas (para las que soy bastante especial) muy de mi gusto
La piscina y el solarium en la azotea son una gozada: no podía faltar un baño por la mañana antes de salir del hotel y por la tarde antes de ir a cenar…
El desayuno esta muy bien también. cons: Es un poco caro
pros: El personal muy agradable y la ubicación y estado del hotel perfecto. Si vuelvo repetiré cons:

pros: Miguel e Isabel da recepção eram fantásticos
boa localização ótimo café da manha
boa limpeza e comodidades cons: nada a declarar

pros: O pessoal da recepção muito simpático e solícito. Localização excelente. Quarto limpo e bonito. A vista para a Marina é melhor. cons: Não gostamos do chuveiro e do box aberto. O ralo não dava vazão e inundava o banheiro.
Local do café da manhã pequeno não comportando a todos e com uma funcionária sobrecarregada correndo pra lá e pra cá.

pros: La amabilidad del personal de recepción.
La habitación con vistas muy bonitas. cons: Nada.

pros: Un hotel bastante funcional con vías de acceso expeditas fácil de poder estacionar alrededor. Es un hotel correcto. cons: El personal encontramos que tenia mala disposición. El día que llegamos lo hicimos cerca de las 13:15 horas al entrar para ver el tema del estacionamiento lo primero que nos dicen es que el check in es a las 14:00 lo cual lo teníamos claro luego de poder finalmente aparcar llegamos con las maletas y la persona de recepción nos queda mirando y le digo que tenemos una reserva y me dice: el check in es a las 14:00 (segunda vez). Y ahí le pregunté si nos podía hacer el ingreso por mientras que esperábamos los 40 minutos restantes y lo hizo pero de mala gana. Y asi cómo eso pasaron otros temas por lo que en definitiva deberían mejorar su servicio al cliente poco cálido y muy transaccional. Nos pareció caro para lo que ofrecen. Considerar que al centro son unos 10 minutos caminando.
pros: Me encantó la ubicación el trato del personal la comodidad en general. cons: nada en especial

pros: Localização privilegiada mesmo na Marina de Lagos. Perto da parte histórica da cidade. Funcionários muito simpáticos e atentos. Bom pequeno almoço com muita variedade. cons: Hotel sem estacionamento. Um pouco caro para as comodidades oferecidas e para o tipo de hotel. Mas...é no Algarve.
pros: The staff were lovely and the food was amazing!! cons: The gym could have been bigger with more free weights. The jacuzzi was cold.
pros: The Breakfast and the servers @ breakfast were great. The room presentation was outstanding! cons: NA

pros: Location was excellent Staff were very friendly 
In fact everything about our stay was superb cons: Can’t be faulted
pros: hotel was nice and com cons: hotel too isolated beach was dirty and full of seaweed or grass
pros: The pool was great to swim outside in November. The room was very clean and nice with a beautiful view over the garden/pool. Breakfast was very good. cons:

pros: Beautiful hotel with stunning grounds. Gorgeous pool and next to sandy beaches. Spotless and modern rooms and facilities. Staff were friendly and accommodating went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable. cons: Maybe it would’ve been nice to have a kettle or coffee making facilities in the room (they do supply them at reception though). As it was off- season the hotel was very quiet so sometimes there wasn’t always someone in the bar/restaurant to get drinks.

pros: Beautiful room in a lovely hotel very close to the beach with use of the spa and wellness centre. There was a surprise bottle of sparkling wine and water in the room. cons: No coffee/tea facilities in the bedroom

pros: Great hotel only 40 rooms so feels like you’ve the place to yourself. Staff are lovely and nothing is too much trouble. Room over looking the pool was great good size and all you need. The spa includes free access to jacuzzi sauna and steam room and I would highly recommend getting a massage (prices are not too bad)! There’s a chill out area which pool table and cocktails from the bar are fab! Location is great 3 mins walk to the beach which you pass a fab Italian restaurant and on the beach there are a few bars the one on the right we had a great fish meal in one of the nights. If you are looking for something a little more peaceful then this is your spot. We got a Uber into Albufeira one of the nights and was so glad we were staying out of that madness. cons: The bed had a mattress protector made of plastic so when you moved it made noise and was not comfortable as we were roasting with it but easy solution just remove it and remake the bed. Breakfast options were lovely and tasty but limited so after a few days we were a little bored with it perhaps maybe it could be changed up each day? 

Two very small things which would not stop me from recommending this place!
pros: We were so welcome all the staff were very nice cons: Nothing

pros: Staff were so lovely and accommodating. We were there for our anniversary and they'd surprised us with a bottle of delicious champagne. The hotel is clean shiny and quiet. Don't bother with local restaurants because the one here is exceptional. The pool and spa feels secluded and a treat. And then you go down the road to reach the beach and sea. Felt like the escape we needed. cons: We probably couldn't have done longer than 3 or 4 days just because there's not too much to do in the surrounding area. It would have also have been nice to have a coffee machine/kettle in the room already and not have to pay for milk.
pros: Perfecto ambientes y tranquilo cons: Todo perfecto
pros: Location was great wonderful restaurants to walk to & amazing beach cons: Breakfast could be better

pros: Hotel is is a quiet location which was perfect. Long strip of a beach you can walk. 3 lovely restaurants on the beach and a few more next to the hotel. you won’t feel you need to go to another town to eat. Best sunset and seafood. hotel is boutique comfortable room clean and spacious. Staff is lovely. Grounds of the pool area is beautiful. Plenty of sun beds. There is also indoor hot water big jacuzzi and steam room sauna. Overall it’s a lovely hotel to relax and enjoy the warm weather. It’s not on the beach but literally less than a min walk to it. sun beds on the beach are  for couple 10 Euro. I recommend to use the beach behind the first restaurant on the left. More secluded and quiet. And that restaurant has a bar upstairs. It’s the best spot to watch glorious sun set whilst you sip your delicious cocktails with lounge music. Just lovely. cons: Everything was great
pros: Lovely facilities clean rooms helpful staff comfortable beds great breakfast pool great beach. cons: The walk to the beach but not too long. And the beach was great.
pros: Breakfast could be improved a little. cons:

pros: Location
Staff
Breakfast + Dinner cons: The number of staff in the dining area was insufficient for the hotel's capacity during our stay
pros: Fantastic location near beach. Really nice room with balcony swimming pool garden facilities. Very good breakfast. Posibility of parking. cons: Not good coffee 😉

pros: Beautiful pool area. Every member of staff was polite and helpful.

The size of the hotel meant it was quiet during the day and we always were able to get a pair of loungers by the pool. cons: Whilst the included breakfast was good the “cooked breakfast” elements (bacon sausage beans etc.) were cold each morning. 

That being said the rest was great hence the minimal impact to overall  rating.

pros: Beautiful quiet and clean. 
Excellent service. cons: Very limited dinner menu in the main restaurant. It never changed.

pros: Clean rooms spacious with balcony pool steam room sauna jacuzzi spa bar and restaurant.
The breakfast set up and selection is great.
Made use of the spa and it was lovely especially the facials! Left my face super smooth. The best part was I had a surprise from the hotel where on my birthday I was out and came back to a lovely chocolate cake and a bottle of wine for me to celebrate my birthday. The best part was I didn’t tell them but they must have noticed when I checked in and they decided to be intentional. Now that was the highlight of my stay. Can’t thank the staff enough for making my stay here a wonderful one. Highly recommended!!! cons:

pros: This hotel is beautiful the gardens and pool area are immaculate with plenty of space and always a comfy sunbed no matter what time of day it is.  The staff are very attentive professional and friendly.  Breakfast was delicious with a good choice of hot and cold and cava! and there is a lovely restaurant for dinner and a pizza restaurant next door. The rooms are extremely clean and big our bed was huge and so comfy!  The shower was very powerful and big bath sheets!  The resort is very quiet but the beach is just down the road with 3 restaurants/bars.  We also found an Indian Seafood and Chinese restaurant about a ten/fifteen minute walk inland.  I would recommend this hotel 100% and would definitely go again! cons: The pillows were lumpy and I wish I'd asked to replace them.
Booking.com advertised a free taxi to this hotel but never included details of how to book and then denied it when I messaged them.

pros: Been a few times now…it’s a special place and so
peaceful..

Breakfast superb. cons: About time they renewed the pool umbrellas
pros: Clean great staff breakfast good restaurant good cons: Gym a little small and limited no air-conditioning in gym a little far from the night life
pros: Everything cons: Nothing

pros: Very quiet location with beach a few minutes walk
Staff exceptionally helpful and friendly. Nothing was too much for them.  The personalised check in service explaining what to do if there was a problem made thing easier. They tried to make sure our special dietary needs were met also very nice toiletries. cons: If you are staying for a few days it would be nice to have more vegan options on the bar menu

pros: Exceptionally help full staff  clean pool and bedroom quite and good location. cons: The food menu could be expanded as the choice was limited specially if you stay longer than seven days and wanted to eat at the restaurant.

pros: the staff from the moment of reception hotel lounge area pool wellness area breakfast everything was excellent comfortable and beautiful. close to the beach and with the Bolt app you can go anywhere. We really enjoyed 🥰 thank you cons: --

pros: Buffet breakfast was excellent. Amazing location and vibes! Super close to beaches and restaurants. Pool and lounging area were great and amazing staff! Eugenia offered a wonderful massage and Catia and Mr Bravo at the front desk made us feel welcome and served us well. Restaurant staff were also very good! cons: The bathroom sink did not drain very well.
pros: Staff were brilliant and the breakfast was excellent. We were in room 306 and I WILL request the same room upon my next visit. cons: Nothing.

pros: Adult only and location to the beach cons: The breakfast hasn’t changed in 7 years and needs updating to reflect current trends. Lack of coffee making facilities in room. Waiting staff inexperienced and not clean (personal hygiene). Art work in dining and bar area needs changing!
pros: enjoyed the pool  spa and sauna very much. Smashing! cons:

pros: Quiet location close to lovely beach 4 or 5 good restaurants a short walk away nice room and bathroom nice pool area plenty of space around pool easy to relax great spa fantastic staff very good breakfast buffet no screaming kids cons: Room soundproofing could've been better would've been nice to have coffee machine in room dinner was slightly more expensive and slightly lower quality compared to nearby restaurants
pros: EVERYTHING cons: Bit of noise from local bar/music venue. But in all fairness it did not go on late into the night

pros: Fairly priced and comfortable cons: The photos of the property were deceptive. They show this hotel and others owned by the company that are much larger. And the property is not directly on the beach.
pros: Location boutique adult facilities pool. Great breakfast cons: Lack of parking some lack of certain drinks in the bar and sometimes difficult to get someone to serve in the bar
pros: Great location near the sea. Loved the pool and outdoor area. cons:

pros: The room was big as well as the bad. The breakfast is great with a lot of options. The pool area was very nice and clean. cons: If we have a automatic coffee machine in the restaurant area for the breakfast I think would be a plus.
pros: Everything was excellent.  Great room great staff great food great location cons:

pros: We have stayed here before several times actually and definitely will stay again. I especially like the pool facing rooms the breakfast which is excellent the tennis courtwhich we used. Ricardo at the reception was especially nice and is one of the reasons we will keep coming back. cons: I couldn’t find a direct number to the hotel on internet. Please provide me with one.

pros: Spotlessly clean. Staff were brilliant and couldn’t do enough for you cons: Food let the hotel down. We had to eat out on the second night which we didn’t really want to do and the cooked breakfast was bad

pros: This small hotel in a beautiful location is made even more special by the wonderful attentive staff. The ambience could not be better. The half board option is really good and you can chose to have dinner in the adjacent Massa Fina restaurant also. cons: Nothing it’s just a great hotel
pros: Quiet location but more than makes up for that with quality in every area cons: There was nothing to dislike. Staff dining and leisure facilities second to none. 0

pros: This hotel is in an excellent being only a 2 minute walk to the beautiful beach. It is  immaculately clean and the rooms are comfortable. The staff are particularly friendly and made you feel really special! The rooms overlooking the pool are the best. We are booked to go back in 4 weeks time and can’t wait! cons: More variety in cereals and fruit at breakfast would be nice.

pros: Breakfast very good.
Location great close to beach cons: Don't like all these blooming questions you keep asking

pros: The staff is super friendly and helpful. Breakfast was excellent. cons: In a 4* hotel I expect that daily a shower cap is provided (or at least every other day) and there was no hair conditioner available.
pros: Great Pool cons:

pros: We were very pleased with everything at this property. From the moment we first walked until we checked out. The staff were wonderful and the location could not be better.
I have already recommended this property to friends. cons: Lighting is needed for the 3 steps leading to the rooms on the first floor.
At times the seagulls were a nuisance around the pool.

pros: The pool clean and big very close to the beach the rooms clean and spatious free access to gym sauna and jacuzzi. We loved the tranquility of the place beeing an adults only hotel.Breakfast very good. cons: We had to pay all the drinks including water( we had payed in advance half-board)they did not have a coffee machine at breakfast and the coffee they served was not as we expected for a high rate hotel. Also at dinner they served the same menu all week.

pros: We last visited in 2014 at which time we were hugely impressed by every aspect of the stay. Returning after so many years we were unsure if we would be able to repeat the wonderful experience we had however everything was perfect and we look forward to returning hopefully sooner this time! cons:

pros: The complimentary breakfast was really very nice. We came from the Epic Sana so we had been a bit spoiled (their breakfast was really excellent)- Gale was a smaller version and they had an omelet and crepe maker which was nice. The check in at Gale was absolutely 💯- Louisa was very attentive and informative. We were delighted to come to our room and find some bubbly and chocolate strawberries after telling her we were celebrating something special. This is a very quiet resort and great for couples. cons: We were a little disappointed that they charge to use the tennis court on site as well as renting rackets and balls. It seemed a bit tacky considering the level of service at the hotel- it was right behind the pool and not used at all by anyone during our 3 day stay.
pros: Clean and tidy the staff were excellent. It was adults only hotel so very relaxing cons: There was nothing we didn’t like.
pros: Everything pool was amazing really quiet. Staff were really helpful and friendly. cons:
pros: Great location excellent helpful staff whom were superb. Food great and varied. Outdoor gardens just lovely. cons: Bed was a little hard for me as well as softer pillows would have been nice.

pros: location was great and the staff helpful and friendly. Roosm ver clean and the hotel itself was just beautiful. cons: The toilet didi not work properly hard to flush it. But apart from that everything was nice.
pros: This is a wonderful relaxing place to stay. cons:
pros: Nice and quiet pool area excellent breakfast to start the day cons:
pros: Location is outstanding restaurants close by beach close by. cons:
pros: Excellent location great food. Lovely beaches and walks. cons:

pros: The breakfast bar had a good selection of food to suit all tastes.  Hot cooked breakfasts were made to order.  All the staff were very friendly and helpful.  Our room was cleaned to a good standard on a daily basis. cons: More general information in the room about the hotel facilities opening times of restaurant use of towels in pool booking for treatments etc would have been useful.
pros: Everything….the staff were friendly & helpful. the good choices great & very clean. cons: The beds weren’t the most comfortable but the staff provided mattress toppers.
pros: very clean friendly staff cons: parking not that much

pros: bed was very big staff was amazing. the waitress at the breakfast buffet had so much energy really made our days start on a cheerful note. very close to the beach and there was a nice cafe/surf shop just next to the hotel cons: will be nicer if the spa opened till later so people can enjoy it after a day of activities

pros: excellent location 3mins walk from beautiful Praia Grande and a very comfortable hotel. Welcoming staff very good breakfast pool spa near to local cafes and restaurants facilities a great choice. cons: Nothing
pros: Excellent bar jacuzzi and Sauna cons: Unfortunately the pool wasn’t open but the beach was nearby

pros: Fantastic breakfast professional hotel staff  members at the reception and restaurant. Room cleaning was perfect and bed was comfortable. cons: The pool area was under remodeling. However it was not noisy and the hotel gave me prior notice about it.

pros: An excellent location close to a beautiful beach.  The room was very well appointed comfortable and well serviced.  The staff were very friendly and helpful always pleased to help with requests in the breakfast room.  The pool and lounging area was very comfortable and attractive with plenty of loungers and good service. cons:

pros: The staff make this hotel experience exceptional. They cannot do enough for you and no request is too much hassle. We had our birthdays here and would highly recommend anyone wanting to have that extra personal touch to do the same.

The food at breakfast was delicious as was the evening restaurant menu and we had very attentive service. The spa facilities were perfect relaxing and treatments reasonably priced for the value given. 

The area is quiet so you can hear the ocean waves from the balcony and the hotel is just a 5 minute walk to the beach. Both check in and check out were seemless. 

Unlike other hotels I've stayed at the management here were keen to understand how they could do even more in future to make a stay at the hotel better and took time to meet us and ask for our suggestions. This was a simple but effective idea and I hope to come back in future to see what has developed. cons: The gym was a little small and under equipped there could have been better use of the library/pool table area and the pictures of the yoga stance people on the wall in the restaurant seemed out of place but minor things overall.

pros: A fabulous oasis of calm in the midst of a hectic world.  With top class food an attentive staff to see to all our needs and easy access to the beautiful beach it was all we could have wished for. cons: Perhaps a little more variety of cereals and fruits at breakfast  but that is really searching for fault!

pros: The staff is very nice 
The location is good
Good price quality ratio
Great breakfast cons: Some facilities are getting old and outdated
pros: so close to the beach loved the pizza restaurant outside  pool was wonderful and breakfast great cons: Nothing
pros: Perfect hotel will definitely come back cons:

pros: Huge extremely comfortable room and terrace. Really enjoyed lounging by the pool making use of the spa and being so close to the beach. cons: Options for eating/drinking in the area around the hotel weren't fantastic.

pros: location was excellent the pool was lovely the spa facilities were good and the staff were very friendly. cons: Unfortunately they said we had half board and it turns out we didn’t so had an extra meal there than we would have done as the menu was limited.

pros: Excellent customer service at the front desk. Had an amazing pedicure in their beautiful spa. Our room had both pool and ocean views very quiet.  Great breakfast buffet in the morning. We had dinner in the restaurant one night - it was good but nothing special. Beautiful pool area which was quiet no children allowed. Close to the beach (a 3 minute walk) and other restaurants and shops. cons: The hotel was very nice but the guest rooms were a little dated and are in need of a refresh.

pros: Breakfast was a good spread. Gentleman at front desk in night was excellent! Excellent customer service communication effort promptness!! cons: Couple of ladies in breakfast area seemed to have not great attitude. Coffee and milk need to be hot when customer asks for hot.
pros: Very clean great breakfast attentive staff close to the beach lovely spa cons: Parking

pros: Fantastic from start to finish. At check in we were given iced tea and fresh face cloths to freshen up for us to then find out our room was ready 4 hours before our check in date. The hotel is spotless with a lovely pool area spa facilities and the restaurant for breakfast is outstanding. cons: Nothing.

pros: What a complete find! Have be visiting area for 35 years & our first stay here.
Staff absolutely amazing & could not have been more helpful.
Small & extremely personal hotel.
We’ll definitely stay again.
Thank you to every member of staff that made our stay so comfortable & wonderful. cons: Lighting along corridor to room & that is all!

pros: We had an amazing stay here. Right from the moment we arrived the staff could not do enough to make our stay comfortable. Our room was huge with a stunning view of the pool area and the ocean. We were celebrating a special event and they went above and beyond to help us celebrate this. The pool area was serene calm and had a lovely boutique feeling to it. Would absolutely stay again! cons:
pros: Lovely pool quiet and spotless. cons: A charge of €1 for each coffee pod used in the room.
pros: Everything is superb at Vila Galé…roombreakfaststaff…been there several times and there’s nothing not to love!! cons: Nowt.

pros: Staff excellent 
Breakfast wonderful
Beautiful grounds and always clean cons:
pros: Breakfast and room cons: Pool was cold. Gym needs a BIG UPGRADE and lots more room
pros: very very good cons: $$$ price for room

pros: Vila Gale is a real gem. Disreet centrally located to a lovely beach. It has a big swimming pool lovely outdoor space. The staff are very helpful and everything is set up so that you can have an enjoyable and quiet stay. cons:

pros: Very nice and tranquil ambiance at the pool; nice clean and spacious room; excellent breakfast and evening dinner; very good service from Jessica and Nicole and two other male waiters (didn't get their names); Ricardo at Reception was very helpful too as was Assistant Manager Sandra. cons: Can't really think of anything negative to say about our stay... we had a most relaxing one-week break there... would certainly recommend it and hope to return.
pros: Beautifully presented adults only hotel. Facilities were excellent & it enjoys a perfect location a short stroll from the beach. cons: Hotel bedrooms were perhaps a little dated.

pros: Out third stay here and our first choice of hotel in the area. Great location for a quiet holiday which we want. Staff are friendly and good service. We asked for a specific room location and were given the exact room we requested - thank you.
We will definitely return.  Beach and three good beach restaurants just a few minutes away.  Hotel is very clean and well maintained and with a reasonable range facilities for a smaller hotel.  Very good breakfast. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. cons:
pros: Everything it’s like our own little paradise nothings too much trouble we’ve stayed there several times before and just love it. cons: Nothing

pros: The breakfast was excellent and the location is also excellent.
The staff were exceptional friendly and helpful cons: They could provide better tea making facilities in the room
pros: Very good. It was varied so you didn't get fed up with the same thing cons: Carpet in bedroom
pros: spotlessly clean with a beautiful pool area. located by one of the most beautiful beaches I’ve ever been too. With fantastic staff. cons: nothing
pros: Amazing staff and so clean! cons: Nothing 😊
pros: I loved the location. So close to beach also the staff were excellent nothing was too much trouble. Will look forward to returning. cons:
pros: its a fantastic spot and wonderful hotel. cons:
pros: The breakfast was average cons: The bed was extremely hard and uncomfortable and the shower was inconsistent - perfect temperature one moment scalding hot the next. Dangerous!

pros: great location 
excellent breakfast 
friendly staff cons:

pros: Pool balcony near to the beach.enough sun beds for everyone. Quiet location. Adult only. Not crowded
Ricardo on reception was very professional and helpful. cons: Plastic under sheet on bed- awful
Lumpy pillows. No tea/ coffee facilities in room. Only 1 small bottle of water throughout the whole stay was complimentary. Lack of training in staff. The bar was not manned. Shortage of staff. Bland breakfast. Broken sun beds. Hotel needs an update. Needs a restaurant manager.

pros: The room was large with a huge bed and balcony. Also the breakfast was much better than average with eggs made to order good coffee (not just a machine) and fresh orange juice. The staff was efficient and some were friendly. cons: The gym was tiny but even worse it had only three cardio machines and one (eliptic trainer) was completely broken with an "out of order" sign on it. Also the clock in the gym was broken and only a jug of tap water to drink and no gym towels. We were there 4 nights and complained about the cardio machine the first day but they did not fix it while we were there. Also the Jacuzzi had no stairs to get in/out so we could not use it and we are middle-aged but not retirement age. Finally we parked ok on the street but the hotel has no parking so I would not come here with a car during high season (summer).

pros: Excellent breakfast and very nice table staff. cons: The hallway was dark and the lights outside the rooms needed to be turned on each time. Not automatic. I did not like the carpeting in the rooms…looked dirty and Idont understand why they don’t have wood or tile floors. We were on the non pool side of the building and the property next door started working very early in the morning using a loud machine. However I am sure if we were staying a second night the hotel would have made an effort to move us. We only stayed one night so didn’t bother to discuss it with reception.
pros: Location cons: Seemed short staffed on an evening all staff working the restaurant with no staff on the bar waiting up-to 30 mins for a drink if not eating in the restaurant.

pros: Clean elegant and relaxing Hotel lovely rooms if you get a pool view staff are chatty Spa is very pleasant although in need for an upgrade. Staff left us strawberries and wine as a honeymoon gift. Great location for the beach. Manager is pleasant and happy to talk about future improvements and plans for the Hotel. He encouraged us to voice any issues when they happen so if you do go - please do tell the staff directly if you have a problem with tough food or room as they like constructive criticism straight away. cons: food was really not to expected standard coffee in the morning was horrible if you want something and can’t see it on the menu ask as they usually have something you want but don’t like to advertise it...they need much better veggie options. lack of consistency in lunch bar food quality - came out cold chips and small portions then the next day big portions and hot - not good quality meat - greasy or tough. coffee machines need nespresso capsules - it is cheaper to bring your own because they charge you a few euro per pod. Breakfast food is ok in selection but the hot food is tasteless and greasy in the buffet continental option could include more like cucumber olives fish. 
If you are a foodie it is disappointing. We ate out most evenings although we went to pizzeria down the road which was soggy pizza and absent staff - turned out it is owned by hotel. 
if you like food then we recommend the restaurant by the roundabout on the sea front for good food and beautiful views . 
Apart from food and coffee quality - we loved the hotel and would definitely return if the food quality improves.
pros: Very relaxing hotel cons: Same dinner menu every day.

pros: I highly recommend Vila Gale if you’re planning on having a couples retreat or a pampered holiday trip with friends. There is a lovely spa clean pool area also just 3mins walk to the beach. All the staff are super friendly and attentive. We arrived just after midnight as our flight was a late one and was greeted nicely by Bilgita. Thank you Liliana for taking care of us at breakfast. Thanks Bruno Ricardo and the lovely gentleman at the bar. We will be back sometime during the summer. cons: None

pros: Da localização como é óbvio 
Da simpatia dos funcionários e por ser um hotel intimista 
Poucos hóspedes e tudo adultos claro. cons: Só achei foi falta de animação pois numa noite de réveillon e depois de um delicioso jantar esperávamos pelo menos um pouco de música ambiente para conviver um pouco!
pros:  cons: Péssima iluminação  concordo que no quarto a iluminação pode ser com menos intensidade mas no banheiro é necessário uma ótima iluminaçãoluzes brancas  claridade !
pros: Localização  SPA restaurante. cons:

pros: Lugar  instalaciones cercanía a la playa piscina desayuno muy bueno y mucha tranquilidad. Especialmente grata la atención de recepción de todos en especial Joao amable y muy dispuesto a colaborar cons: Me gusto todo pero creo q se podría mejorar un poco la carta del restaurant con cosas incluso más simples  lo mismo para lo q ofrece como snack durante el día…. Personal amable por momentos no tanto y algunos muy rígidos si. Ninguna gana de acomodarse a lo q pide el cliente.
pros: Todo muy bueno cons: No tienen estacionamiento

pros: Piscina linda quartos bons o nosso era sem vista pelo preço pago. Achamos o hotel um pouco caro pelo que oferece. Tínhamos saído de um em Lagos melhor e mais barato. Ofereceram sorvete na piscina como cortesia foi uma delicadeza que adorei. Gostei de saber que o grupo hoteleiro Vila Galé começou ali na região. cons: Não passou nosso cartão Wise para pagamento e todos os outros lugares no Algarve aceitaram. Na pizzaria do hotel (ao lado) não aceitou também.

pros: A localização é muito boa mesmo ao pé da praia que também é muito boa com chapéus e espreguiçadeiras (pagas). 

Os funcionários do pequeno almoço são muito simpáticos e eficientes.

Mesmo ao lado do Hotel há 1 restaurante italiano muito bom e um café alternativo com sandes excelentes as tostas mistas são perfeitamente executadas enormes com muita qualidade e a um preço muito bom. cons: O pequeno almoço é pouco variado mas suficiente.

Falta máquina de café e chá no quarto parece-me um equipamento básico nos dias de hoje.

O bar junto a piscina serve sandes pedi uma tosta mista demorou muito tempo veio fria sem manteiga nem sequer era uma tosta porque o queijo nem sequer tinha derretido nota-se que o pessoal não tem formação de hotelaria.

pros: Gostamos de tudo!!! Próximo à praia e com ótimas instalações.
Camas grandes e muito confortáveis e um óptimo pequeno almoço.
Vamos voltar com toda a certeza cons:
pros: Tranquilidad cons: Olor de  los bajantes
pros: Yaquzi y piscina cons: El servicio del restaurante

pros: Staf.
Instalações.
Piscina exterior aquecida.
Apenas adultos. cons: Apenas sugestão.
Mais variadades de iogurte e frutos secos no pequeno almoço

pros: O ambiente era muito tranquilo a comida de boa qualidade e os colaboradores exttremamente simpáticos e disponíveis. O Hotel fica a walking distance da praia pelo que conseguimos estar praticamente uma semana sem pegar no carro. cons: Não se trata de não gostar apenas dois comentários: as toalhas da piscina era pequenas e a limpeza era feita depois de almoço. Para quem se levantar muito cedo vai calhar na hora da sesta :)
pros: Excelente desayuno cons: El carecer de parking es un gran inconveniente  y más estando al lado de la playa.

pros: Funcionários extremamente atenciosos
Limpeza dos espaços muito boa cons: A comida podia ter uma aposta mais regional.

pros: El bote maravilloso.... Muy tranquilo limpio. El personal muy atento. La piscina fantástica. Un lugar idóneo para descansar y desconectar por unos días. Muy recomendable. cons: Lo que menos me gustó fue la comida.
pros: Me gustó la tranquilidad de la estancia los desayunos el personal y todo en general. cons: Lo que menos me gusto fueron los precios del bar

pros: Localização excelente com a praia apenas a uns passos de distância. Muito tranquilo piscina excelente cama muito confortável bom pequeno-almoço (embora o café em si seja francamente mau) e staff muito simpático e eficiente. cons: Do hotel em si de nada em particular mas o restaurante anexo ao hotel da própria cadeia pouco após as 21h30 não aceita mais clientes fecha cedo para uma zona balnear e com muita dificuldade de reservas. Quem gosta de aproveitar um final de tarde quente até ao pôr-do-sol e tomar o seu duche para jantar a seguir terá de ir a outro lugar.

pros:  cons: Após a reserva fiz um pedido de um quarto especifico via telefone por ser o mesmo de estadia anterior. Foi-me dito que seria concedido. À chegada não me atribuiram o quarto o que foi uma desilusão com os serviços.

pros: Localização ofertas de boas vindas spa piscina jacuzzi  restaurantes Inevitável e Massa Fina quarto completo com tamanho bom espaços envolventes... cons: Sugerimos local reservado para efetuar transporte de bagagens na entrada do Hotel sinalizado para cargas e descargas.
pros: Sossego no geral piscina cama e pequeno almoço. cons: Spa.
pros: EXCELENCIA das acomodações cons:
pros: Muy tranquilo cómodo y exclusivo. cons: No tenía parking propio. Dependiendo de la hora del día el aparcamiento por los alrededores era complicado. Hay una playa muy concurrida muy cerca.
pros: Localização e simpatia dos colaboradores cons: A limpeza deixou a desejar já que a casa de banho tinha vários cabelos de antigos hóspedes

pros: Limpeza muito boa no geral. Funcionarios muito simpáticos e muito prestávies.
Pequeno almoço bom.
Piscina excelente. Ambiente calmo muito bom para disfrutar da praia e do descanso. cons: Serviço de mesa ao jantar um pouco desorganizado talvez por haver poucos funcionarios.
pros: La tranquilidad; la piscina y el personal( Liliana  magnifica cons:
pros: Gostei de tudo ! Principalmente da comida um bom pequeno-almoço pão muito bom e quentinho  fui com meia pensão os jantares foram muito bons! Obrigada cons:
pros: La ubicación cons: El desayuno era algo escaso y además no reponian
pros: Serviço qualidade das infraestruturas ( quarto e demais espaços ). cons: O funcionamento do restaurantes não foi o esperado cf expectativas de estadias anteriores.
pros: Gostei de tudo excelente localização e excelencia no profissionalismo cons:
pros: Localização e Tranquilidade. cons: O pequeno almoço tem o básico para um Hotel desta categoria contudo falta alguma variedade.
pros: Tudo impecável! Conforto dos quartos Spa e piscina com muita área verde ! Pequeno-almoço completo e com muita variedade! Simpatia dos funcionários! cons:
pros: Zona de spa cons: O pequeno almoço podia ter mais variedade.
pros: A localização a simpatia dos funcionários o preço do pacote com meia pensão cons: Nada!
pros: Tudo maravilhoso desde a chegada a saída cons: Gostamos de tudo
pros: Simpatia e conforto cons:

pros: La habitación el desayuno y la simpatia del personal. Especial mención a Doña Lucilia responsable por el salón del desayuno. Tuve necesidad de desayunar antes de la hora de apertura y me lo serviron. Muchas gracias cons: No tener zona de parking privado

pros: Gostei de tudo em geral
Grande simpatia de todo o staff sempre disponíveis para ajudar.
Excelente pequeno almoço excelente jantar. 
Bons quartos excelente isolamento. 
Grande tranquilidade devo acrescentar que dava a sensação de que eramos só nós que estávamos ali  hospedados.
Bem hajam. cons: Do colchão era um pouco ruidoso para o meu gosto.

pros: Tudo! Tranquilidade piscina SPA pequeno almoço e jantar muito bons. Restaurante Massa Fina TOP.
Proximidade da praia e meio envolvente. Super mercado a 5 minutos a pé 
Esperamos voltar! cons: Difícil estacionar próximo do hotel durante o dia.
Quando chegamos tivemos dificuldade em estacionar e tivemos de trazer as malas pelo passeio até ao hotel
pros: A localização a limpeza e a simpatia dos funcionários cons: O preço
pros: La paz que se respiraba en el hotel y la ubicación a pie de playa cons: La falta de espacio para bajar el equipaje del coche
pros: Extremamente tranquilo. Dimensão ideal para um pequeno hotel. Tranquilidade em agosto. Funcionários atenciosos. cons: Limpeza das capas das espreguiçadeiras da piscina.
pros: Tranquilidade e localização cons:
pros: Maravillosa la zona de piscina con tumbonas y la ubicación próxima a la playa cons: Tienen un problema con fosa séptica en la primera planta de habitaciones que no dan a la piscina
pros: Tranquilo sin niños Para descansar maravilloso cons: Todo perfecto
pros:  cons: Pedimo para comer una cataplana y el sevicio compltamente deficiente la camareros no tenian la formacion ni para poner un cafe
pros: Todo muy bien. Hubo un problema durante nuestra estancia y el personal de dirección lo resolvió y superó nuestras espectativas. Todo muy bien cons:
pros: La habitación estaba muy limpia y era cómoda. El personal era muy amable. cons: El desayuno. Todo estaba demasiado racionado.

pros: A localização é perfeita contudo esperava mais de um Vila Galé collection. A Decoração dos quartos e triste e escura para um local de praia o pequeno almoço é bom e a piscina também tem boas condições  bem localizada e cuidada.
Não correspondeu às minhas expetativas talvez porque eram mais elevadas do que o que encontrei. cons: Não gostei da decoração muito triste e desadequada a um local junto à praia sendo um Vila Galé tão bem localizado esperava um pouco mais do seu interior atendendo o custo elevado que tem.
pros: Muy bien cons:
pros: Do serviço e atenção! Era o nosso aniversário de casamento e preparam uma surpresa. cons:

pros: Localização excelente - estacionei e fiz tudo a pé!
Excelente pequeno-almoço!
Funcionários 5 estrelas cons:
pros: Localização perto da praia e muita tranquilidade. cons: O estacionamento sendo público depende da disponibilidade.

pros: Staff super simpáticos e atenciosos atendimento perfeito. Ótima piscina e a alguns passos da praia. Recomendo a massagem vila Galé. cons: Entraríamos as 15 mas as 16 o quarto ainda não estava disponível foi limpo as pressas. O quarto tinha um odor forte de suor que ficou empreginado. Para completar o ar condicionado velho e barulhento.

pros: tranquilidade por ser uma unidade mais pequena que os restantes hotéis do grupo.
proximidade à praia cons:
pros: Todo en general. Excelentes instalaciones. Había estado hace años y la zona es genial cons:
pros: Excelente! Muitas opções de pequeno almoço comida quente e com qualidade. cons: Gostamos de tudo.
pros: cama cons: x
pros: Todo el trato exquisito y amabilidad al máximo. cons: Nada
pros: Empregados de grande excelência e empatia! Condições Top e com grande glamour! Parabéns voltarei sempre! cons:
pros:  cons:
pros: localização cons: pedi cama casal e deram me camas separadas .

pros: Localização hotel conforto quartos limpeza. cons: Preço elevado
Meia pensão não justifica comida sem sabor. Embora tenham uma ementa "vegetariana" não têm os pratos disponíveis. Doses pequenas. Serviço muito demorado.
pros: La tranquilidad que se respiraba y el trato tan cordial de todos los empleados cons:

pros: El hotel es precioso. Las habitaciones están súper limpias y muy cómodas todos los días limpian y ordenan y además te reciben cada día con máquina de Nescafe. Piscina increíble además puedes disfrutar de spa sauna y gimnasio. El personal muy educado y siempre dispuesto a ayudarte en lo que necesites. Desayuno completo muy acertado y variado. Muy cerca de la playa a 3 minutos andando si llega. La playa de Gale es muy bonita. Su atardecer es mágico. Todo 10. Ubicación perfecta ya que estás en zona tranquila sin molestias ni ruidos pero puedes moverte en coche para ir al centro de Albufeira y enseguida estás allí. cons:
pros: A proximidade com a praia. cons:

pros: La limpieza y lo amable que es el personal. La piscina el spa está bien.
 Las habitaciones bien aunque el baño es muy pequeño para un hotel así. cons: El baño muy reducido
pros: Todo. Es una maravilla tanto el hotel como las instalaciones y el personal. Llevo muchos viajes a las espaldas y este hotel merece una calificación espectacular. cons:
pros: De tudo .Não podia ser melhor aconselho vivamente cons: Não existe nada desagradável até os hospedes são simpáticos uns com os outros .
pros: localização  sossego e serviços cons:

pros: LA HABITACIÓN ERA FANTÁSTICA POR FIN UN HOTEL CON CAMA DOBLE Y GRANDE. POR DESGRACIA NO PUDIMOS DISFRUTAR DE LA PISCINA Y OTROS SERVICIOS COMO EL SPA PERO ERAN GENIALES TAMBIÉN. LA COMIDA MUY BUENA TANTO EL RESTAURANTE COMO EL DESAYUNO. EL PERSONAL ERA MUY AMABLE Y TODO ESTABA MUY LIMPIO. NOS PARECIÓ BASTANTE TRANQUILO PUES EL RESTO DE HUÉSPEDES ERAN ADULTOS. cons: LAS HABITACIONES DE LA PLANTA BAJA NO TIENEN MUY BUENAS VISTAS
pros: El personal muy amable y atento. El desayuno muy bueno. Todo fue perfecto. cons: Esta un poco alejado del centro de Albufeira pero a mi no me importó.
pros: Muito bom cons:
pros: Amabilidad y atención de todo el personal instalaciones impecables limpieza en general cons:
pros: qualidade das instalações staff e localização cons:

pros: Bem localizado apesar de ser um pouco afastado .
Mas  em 10 minutos se chega ao centro. cons: PerfeitoTudo.
pros: A simpatia de todo o pessoal. O Tamanho da cama. As condições da piscina e SPA são excelentes. Boa localização do Hotel numa zona bem bonita. cons: Nada. Tudo muito bom.

pros: Localização proximidade da praia. Hambiente calmo. cons: Pouca variedade e quntidade de prudutos no pequeno almoço. Alguma lentidão do serviço do restaurante e mau aspeto dos funsionarios devido a escolha de fardamendo inadequado (demasiado informal de aspecto deslixado e sujo devido a má escolha da core do mesmo). Demasiada luz imluninando o quarto durante a noite perturbando a consiliação de sono provinda do enorme displei luminoso indicador da temperatura do aerocondicionado.

pros: está cerca de la playa y la zona de la piscina. cons: Habitaciones que necesitan reforma no hay parking en el hotel y la zona está llena de coches hay que aparcar sobre las aceras. El desayuno es muy justo y la fruta es de muy mala calidad. Decepción total.

pros: Las instalaciones en general muy bien . Habitaciones cómodas y zona de recepción  así como una gran piscina cons: El trato del personal . Problemas con El check in; contraté habitación doble y decían que solo podía estar una persona por habitación y si había más debía abonar la diferencia .
Desayuno - lentitud en reponer productos . Hubo que esperar 15 minutos para que repusieran el pan . Tomamos cola cao para desayunar y al día siguiente dijeron que se habia gastado . 
En general el personal del restaurante bastante apático . El personal de recepción bien .
pros: Alojamento cons: Restaurante

pros: A localização é o melhor do hotel dá para ir a pé para a praia mas atenção que o hotel não tem estacionamento. A cama também é grande e confortável e o ar condicionado funciona bem no quarto. A piscina exterior e muito agradável com muita exposição solar. cons: As almofadas são altas mas penso que dá para pedir outras. O pequeno-almoço ficou muito abaixo das expetativas. A sala onde é servido é fria e escura e a qualidade/variedade é muito fraca raramente serviam fruta da época sumo de laranja não e natural. O hotel está a precisar de um refresh em termos de decoração.
pros: Localização cons: Do pequeno almoço e do serviço do pequeno almoço
pros: Localização.  Pequeno almoço . Conforto do quarto. cons: Atraso de 2 horas e meia no check in. Chá frio para compensar a espera. Wc com fungos nas junções do vidro da banheira

pros: • Boa localização cons: • Fizemos o pedido de cama de casal e forneceram nos duas camas de solteiro juntas com lençóis individuais com a justificação de que não tinham tido tempo sendo uma reserva feita a pelo menos 1 hora. 
• No duche saia água a ferver durante o banho sem qualquer justificação. 
• tivemos dificuldades a ligar as luzes do quarto derivado ao cartão. 
• para termos acesso ao quarto temos de passar pelo restaurante do hotel.
pros: Da localização e conforto cons: Da ementa está confusa e a explicação não foi a melhor
pros:  cons: Hotel desactualizado colchão e almofadas antigas e pouco confortáveis preço bastante elevado.

pros: Bom hotel com boa localização. Boas comodidades. cons: Muitos dos hóspedes fazem reservas de espreguiçadeiras na piscina com toalhas e o hotel não tem funcionários capazes de evitar que tal aconteça (como existe em outros hotéis em que se recolhem as toalhas que estejam a marcar espreguiçadeiras). Falámos na recepção mas não puderam fazer nada. Só conseguimos ir à piscina 1x em 5 dias pois das outras ocasiões estava sempre cheia (quando na verdade estava vazia). 
O serviço de limpeza de quartos foi quase sempre muito tardio (depois da hora de almoço) o que acaba por condicionar caso se queira descansar um pouco no quarto ao final da manhã ou depois de almoço.
Apesar de existir algum estacionamento público na rua em época alta é complicado estacionar pois estacionamento público é ocupado pelas pessoas que vão à praia. Para um hotel nestes valores teria que existir uma alternativa de modo a garantir estacionamento para os hóspedes.

pros: o quarto o spa os funcionários cons: o pequeno almoço deixou um pouco aquém. o sumo de laranja natural era de pacote o que para um hotel localizado no Algarve seria de esperar que o sumo fosse um bom sumo de laranja natural

pros: O hotel fica localizado próximo da praia numa zona tranquila e de acesso por carro fácil. Quanto ao quarto este apresenta-se espaçoso embora a casa de banho tenha dimensões menores do que a média para a sua categoria. O AC funciona de forma silencioso e efectiva. cons: Por ter sido durante a época baixa o pequeno almoço não era na modalidade buffet e o serviço deixou algo a desejar em termos de qualidade e confecção.

pros: Un sitio super tranquilo para desconectar con un precioso jardín con olivos junto a la piscina es solo para adultos y se respira calma. Muy buen desayuno. Bajas a la playa en menos de 5 min andando. cons: La cama aunque era nueva era súper dura e incómoda. La habitación y el baño son muy espaciosos quizás el baño podría modernizarse.

pros: Staff went the extra mile to make our stay very special. The rooms and bathrooms were outstanding. Very clean and well maintained. Breakfast was spectacular. cons:
pros: The hotel was fantastic - the rooms were clean and spacious all the staff were very friendly and helpful and the breakfast was marvellous! cons:
pros: Fantastic stay super quiet and peaceful even within the centre of faro. Spa facilities are great and staff very helpful. cons:

pros: Excellent breakfast. 
Exceptional service at all times.
Great facilities. cons: Nothing.

pros: It’s a beautiful hotel with it’s perfect location coupled with very warm friendly and helpful staff.
The room was very beautiful and breakfast was to die for.
We highly recommend this Hotel! cons: Nothing

pros: Excellent property one of the best breakfasts I’ve had in a hotel lately. The coffee was really good.
Not possible to park or drop off near the entrance but the staff goes out of their way to assist and help in every way they can. cons:
pros: Food staff facilities cons:

pros: A gem of a hotel everything you could ask for in a central location. The staff were all wonderful and helpful. The facilities were fantastic and the cleanliness and ambience of the hotel was perfect. cons: Nothing

pros: I wasnt expecting  to enjoy delicious spinach and homemade cookies coconut buns and fruit bread for breakfast.Staff in Spa very friendly & facilities & pool great.Reception Staff welcoming. Room spacious & especially the comfy bed with tea coffee water available.l liked the eco friendly decor. cons:
pros: This was absolutely gorgeous hotel in the centre of the city. It had amazing views a lovely little spa and nice roof top pool. overall it was amazing. cons: I liked it all.

pros: The Hotel was magnificent perfect location for shops and  restaurants. The staff were down to earth and cool the spa was amazing. If your looking for a chilled couples weekend away this is the hotel for you. cons: The Hotel was perfect.

pros: Extremely well run property .. attention to detail in all areas - pre arrival  arrival & all through stay . 
Beautifully maintained & furnished with facilities to match .. the most outstanding element was all the staff .. genuine personalities they shine in roles - from reception to restaurant. cons: The only thing I can think of is maybe outside tables & chairs in the restaurant area ..
pros: Central location clean and modern. Everything you could need or want. cons:

pros: Hotel was fabulous. The room was spacious housekeeping service excellent. Breakfast was delicious. Loved the rooftop bar and pool. Fantastic sauna and steam room. Very convenient locaiton near the Marina. Highly recommended. cons: Nothing.

pros: Comfy bed that helped me sleep sweetly.
Most amenities made easily available.
Excellent breakfast once dietary requirements sorted. Close to most of the seasonal attractions. cons: Not applicable
pros: It was perfect. Comfy bed and pillows. Black out curtains. Good temp control. Awesome bathroom. Attentive staff. Wouldn’t change a thing. cons:

pros: The hotel is stunning. Very modern and sleek. Our room was beautiful and very spacious - we were on the first floor so only down the corridor from the spa area and indoor pool. The restaurants and bars were lovely and the staff were so very pleasant and helpful. A thoroughly enjoyable stay! cons: Not one thing.
pros: Good selection of breakfast items though similar to most hotels throughout the World the buffet items were not hot but lukewarm otherwise no issues. cons: Nothing

pros: It was a really nice stay.
My highlight was the small stereo to play music. cons: The room view was not as incredible.
pros: Very stylish and relaxing hotel. Great staff lovely spa. cons: N/A

pros: Upscale and beautifully decorated/furnished hotel. Room was very comfortable! Breakfast was outstanding. Great location! Friendly and helpful staff. I definitely recommend it and would stay here again. cons:
pros: Impeccable in all categories cons:

pros: The breakfast was truly amazing. The staff pleasant and very helpful. The rooms were smart modern and very comfortable and superbly equipped. We loved the gym and spa facilities. cons: The fact that in every common room – restaurants terrace and as early as breakfast hour you had to listen to music [usually of the thumping kind]. It is not indispensable to have background noise all the time and everywhere but if you have to the level [in my view] should be kept low. Some people will not mind but there are a lot of plane taking off close by especially un the early morning. The area and Faro as a town is not the prettiest place.

I don’t know if she thought I wasn’t a guest there or what the issue was but she turns to another guy and he’s like yeah she can sit anywhere. She takes me to the table and asks my room number (which they didn’t ask anyone else that while I sat there) then comes back and was much nicer. That left a very bad taste in my mouth as I spent a lot of money to be there.

pros: We’ve stayed here 3 times now. All the staff (especially the morning breakfast team) are so attentive and friendly. They’re very kind and helpful with anything you need. The housekeeping staff are really discreet and somehow keep everything to clean and tidy without ever making any noise in the corridors. The pool towels and pillows are lovely - and again the service is great. He keeps everything so organised. It is a bit expensive but it’s worth it. The Malton Brown toiletries are SO nice!! And they’re exclusive to the hotel sector so enjoy them while you can. The reception team always say hello when you walk past and eager to ask if you need anything. We’re coming back in September. It will be our 18th visit to Faro. We’ve stayed in so many places and we’ve only come here more than once so that’s saying something. 🇲🇦🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 cons: Nothing. Everything is great.

pros: Amazing hotel. The location interior staff rooms restaurants bars and pool were all fantastic! We had a standard room which was spacious with a modern slightly industrial design. Everything was clean the bed was large and comfortable and there was a balcony.

We arrived around 7 PM and the spa had just closed which was a bit disappointing as I was looking forward to it. However the rooftop pool was open until sunset and it was perfect after a long day. The rooftop area was excellent with a terrace lounge chairs a pool with city views and delicious cocktails. The pool water was a bit cool but still enjoyable.

We then went to the Italian restaurant on the ground floor and everything was perfect. The food was delicious the place was beautiful the staff were excellent DJ's music was fitting. Breakfast was also excellent with a great selection.

All the hotel staff were very nice and professional helping with our luggage showing us to our room providing a quick and easy check-in and helping us to find the parking. 

This was the best experience and I’m sad we only stayed one night. I highly recommend this place! cons:
pros: Really liked the decor of the room cons:

Unfortunately we did not have a time to use the indoor swimming pool but the gym was well equipped which I really enjoyed. Also the location is fantastic as it's in a very centre of the town so it's so easy to access to restaurants shopping the marina and the beach Faro Station Bus terminals. Staff are very friendly and helpful. The room we stayed had a large balcony where we enjoyed the evening drinks there. Also we enjoyed a few drinks in the rooftop bar where you can see the sea.
I highly recommend the hotel if you stay in Faro! cons: N/A
