pros: This hotel is fantastic. From arrival to when we left this was a 5 star experience.

The location is excellent right in the heart of faro in the old town you can explore the landmarks and there are walking tours online that you can follow to explore. One day we took the ferry to the beach through the lagoon ferry stop is 5 mins walk would strongly recommend.

Rooms - Immaculate and decorated to an extremely high standard lots of space and well finished with nice lighting. Copper effect fixtures in the bathroom rainforest shower lovely toiletries. The bed was a dream to sleep in so comfortable. Plenty of bottled water restocked every day and during the day if you use it. It also seemed like whenever we left the room consumables would be checked and topped up fantastic service.

Facilities - Excellent. The indoor spa is great with steam room sauna and different showers (cold rainforest mist). The pool is a nice size and has integrated jacuzzi areas to stand and sit in. They’ve crammed a lot into a moderate sized space and done it to a very high standard. Nice sun-bed area to relax too. The spa area is free to residents.

The outdoor pool area is also very nice rooftop infinity pool with lovely views sunbeds and seats and you can get snacks and drinks brought to you. There weren’t enough sunbeds for number of guests personally I’d swap out some seats for loungers.

We couldn’t get late check out but were offered to leave bags at reception and there are two private shower facilities in the reception area we were really impressed with this just shows attention to a great customer experience.

Staff - All were excellent welcoming and attentive. From a great warm welcome at reception and then helpful reception staff throughout. The housekeeping was amazing so much attention to detail. The staff in the bar/restaurant were particularly good making up off menu cocktails for us (mainly French 75’s) and always really friendly and helpful. cons:
pros: Breakfast was amazing and the staff lovely cons: Nothing

pros: Turkish baths were excellent. Rooftop pool was lovely. Easily the nicest hotel in the area.

Bed was.comfortable and large. Amenities were great.

Breakfast was fantastic too. Choice of off the menu and the some buffet.

The staff were very nice and very helpful.

Wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

If you're in Faro and looking for a little luxury definitely the right spot to go to. cons: Can't say anything bad. It was worth it. Would recommend.

pros: Excellent breakfast. Wide selection of fresh foods pastries and well-prepared hot dishes. Great en suite shower with high-quality fittings. Comfortable bed and good quality linen. The minibar was refreshed with water and cola daily. Good-sized easy-to-use safe. Enough wardrobe space and hangers for our 7-night stay. Easy to use gym open 24/7. Chambermaids were very efficient. Sound insulation meant the hotel was quiet even though we were in the centre of town. The staff were very responsive and fixed a couple of small maintenance issues with the room quickly and efficiently. cons: There was nothing we disliked. Having some lighter food options on the roof terrace in the evening would have made the area easier to use rather than having to order a full meal.

pros: I thought that the breakfast was very good with lots of different meal options and everything fresh and nice. The staff were very friendly and helpful; the only thing I didn't like was that each morning they made you wait for a long time before allocating you a table. You cannot enter the breakfast dining area before giving your room number and often times the entrance was staffless which made it slower than necessary. 

The bedroom beds were exceptionally comfortable with high quality cotton bed linen and great towels slippers and robes provided :) cons: The rooftop pool was very small and ice cold. The indoor spa pool was also cold very small and full of children. I booked this holiday to be able to swim daily for health but the pools were too small to do laps in and very cold. 

I ordered a bowl of ice cream  on the rooftop bar and inquired about the pricing I asked for a menu she said Ice cream was not on the menu— I asked whether it was priced by the bowl or by the scoop. The server informed me it was by the bowl. When I asked how many scoops were included in a bowl she responded "As many as you want."

Feeling perplexed by the vague response I decided to order three scoops of ice cream. To my surprise I was charged £4.50 per scoop making it the most expensive ice cream I have ever had in my life at £13.50 for a bowl. Be careful on the rooftop everything is overpriced and they are sometimes forgetful to give you menus with prices.
pros: The location was excellent very central.  Fabulous breakfasts - great choice! cons:
pros: Great breakfast loved the location very attentive staff cons: Simplify the light switches in the room

pros: We made very welcome and our cases were taken to our bedroom which was very spacious and well appointed. The hotel was in a very good situatoon to explire tge old town and go on boat trips to the islands and very nesr to Faro airport.

 There was a good choice of food for the buffet breakfast or we could order omelettes or poached eggs etc to be cooked to order. There was a fantastic view over Faro from the rooftop and we enjoyed swimming in the rooftop pool and sitting up there and had lunch outside the rooftop cafe. We also went to the downstairs restaurant twice and enjoyed the food. When it was my birthday we were given free desserts and sparkling wine. 

All the staff were friendly and helpful and our room was kept spotlessly clean. The receptionists ordered a taxi to take us to the airport. We would definitely stay again and recommend it to friends. cons: The plates were cold and the food could have been hotter for breakfast and the rooftop cafe. The food and plates in the downstairs restaurant were hot. The hotel was quite expensive but probably worth it for the luxury.

pros: Second time returning to this place because I liked it so much a first for me. 10-minutes from Faro airport to stay before heading to Vilamoura. Perfectly located amazing rooftop pool and spa - just great! cons: Nothing!

- could have done with a water dispenser or fridge in the spa really needed it after sitting in the sauna for 20mins
- the steam room was unbearable to sit in for more than 5mins 
- undecided if the concrete column in the room was annoying or not. Recognise it is probably required for the structural integrity of the building but felt strange it being in the middle of the room dividing it and blocking the entire view of the window from the bed

pros: I would like to mention Tiago Mathias at the reception and Joao at the reception plus Joao the tuk-tuk driver all going out of their way to help the customer and extremely service minded. There is also a man who works both at breakfast aswell as in the rooftop bar who is also really nice but I didn't catch his name cons:
pros: Very good cons: Slightly expensive

pros: Super location fabulous building and facilities. Superb nights sleep cons: Coffee at breakfast tasted like instant 
Carpark flooded with torrential rain carpark inaccessible ( -3 parking and had to wade through ?sewage water to get car.  Reception staff member - male - thought it was hilarious that we were like drowned rats (we didn’t) and we were trying to make flights!!!!  They could have offered some help but it felt like half our party had checked out and they really didnt care anymore - we’d paid!!!!  Rest of staff lovely.
pros: Amazing breakfast nice staff beautiful location top services. cons: the swimming pool from the top roof is closing to early around 7pm :)

pros: I can't rave enough about this property. The hotel itself is modern spotless and luxurious. It is a concrete building and you are not disturbed by anyone in the room above you. The staff are amazing. We travel the world and have lots of experience in luxury hotels. The service provided here by the staff is truly exceptional! Ricardo Cristina Joao F especially went out of the way to make our stay fabulous. Thank you so much for everything. You don't need to look at any other hotels around Faro this is the one! cons:

pros: Excellent hotel. Very convenient Breakfast beautiful. 
Rita on reception desk was lovelyvery helpful she give us 3 free upgrade rooms. Fantastic. Thanks Rita cons: Pity coffee was served in paper cup at pool but I do understand cups can be dangerous if broken

pros: An excellent and very comfortable hotel located in the heart of Faro. The highlight of this hotel is undoubtedly the staff who are unfailingly friendly helpful and professional. I would definitely recommend this hotel. cons: Queuing for entry to breakfast is not a pleasant or necessary experience.

pros: Excellent location in a very nice location with lots of restaurants and bars close by. Two minutes from the Marina. The staff were excellent and very happy to help book taxis and retaurants. cons: Nothing

pros: The friendliness of the staff location cleanliness of the hotel and rooms. Breakfast was fantastic as was our evening meal.  Highly recommended and will definitely be back. cons: One very small thing - The pool could have been a little warmer.
pros: Great location modern facilities big rooms lovely sun deck and great breakfast. Staff are great. cons: More sunbeds on the deck would be good

pros: Fantastic new and very modern hotel in the heart of Faro. Spacious and comfortable rooms very attentive staff and the rooftop terrace with the infinity pool is an absolute highlight. Breakfast is also great - large selection and very fairly priced. Loved every bit of my stay and would definitely return! cons: Nothing - everything was great one of the best hotels I’ve stayed at!
pros: Fabulously clean hotel with amazing fresh breakfast choices. Hotel off a little street no nighttime noise so quiet cons: Expensive accommodation

pros: Every part of the hotel was immaculate and very nicely decorated. The staff were all very helpful and the food was delicious! Location was also great and it is a very nice part of Faro to stroll around day and night. Couldn't recommend staying here enough. We stayed off-peak so thought it was good value for money cons: Nothing
pros: Great location great design in hotel fantastic breakfast. cons: The pool was smaller than I thought it would be as some of it was just for paddling. I would have liked a pool to do lengths.

pros: Everything about my stay was exceptional. The staff were super friendly and helpful the hotel is beautiful The breakfast was truly delicious and had something for everyone. I ordered to of the specials and both were amazing. I will definitely be heading back for a longer stay! highly recommend! cons: nothing
pros: The pool on the roof was brilliant. The rooftop bar was gorgeous. The rooms were spacious and very clean. The staff were really helpful. The spa was nice too. cons: Nothing.

pros: New modern hotel. Very spacious room with excellent bedding and very comfortable bed. Good bathroom with excellent shower. Quite hi tech in the room with curtains and lights operated electronically. Large breakfast room with attentive staff.  Rooftop bar and pool area which we didn’t use as it was very hot and sunbeds always occupied.  Very pleasant and helpful staff on reception. Located in the centre of the town quite difficult to locate on arrival by car. cons: We didn’t use the balcony as there were no comfy chairs to sit on just upright rope chairs. As usual no mirror over dressing table to do hair.
pros: Great staff cool vibe fantastic room cons:

pros: Very clean stylish and well run hotel. The staff are so professional attentive helpful and friendly. Whilst this is one of the most expensive hotels in the area it is incredible value for money. Situated right in the city centre it provides easy access to the whole region. The rooms are high quality cleaned daily. There is free water and Coca Cola delivered daily to the room by the lovely staff and no mini bar to tempt travellers. The beds are very large and both the beds and the pillows are super comfortable the best I’ve ever slept in a hotel. Fantastic shower and modern bathroom. Rooms are a good size with plenty of storage space. Having stayed across 3 rooms (there were 6 of us) the views were all different and although not amazing views they were still good. We requested 3x twin rooms which they confirmed were guaranteed but because the twin beds are right next to each and cannot be moved apart (why?!) the staff were kind enough to proactively upgrade one of our rooms to a larger room (for free) enabling 2 of our party (who were friends not partners) to be comfortable by one on the beds and the other on the large and comfy sofa bed. The breakfast is amazing with fresh wide choice available and free a la carte options. The rooftop infinity pool is refreshing with clear views across the city plenty of seats and really tasty and generous lunch and snacks available (although they are pricey). The indoor pool and spa (all included) are excellent quality and very comfortable. We would stay here again definitely. cons: The twin beds should not be bolted together and should be movable. Out of 3 rooms only 2 had a balcony.

pros: Hotel has an amazing breakfast. Food is delicious and staff attentive. 

Hotel is located in a charming shopping area with lots of places to eat. cons: Better location to drop of luggage.

pros: The location is perfect - right in the centre of Faro in a pedestrian area so limited traffic noise.
In interior of the hotel is inspiring - loved the electric curtains in the room the Bluetooth speaker and complimentary  refreshments in the fridge. 
The pool area is stunning - Soho House does Faro roof top! Loved spending some additional time there after checking out. cons: I would have loved the breakfast to be included in the room rate.
pros: Excellent everything the details the room the staff breakfast cons: It was just perfect

pros: Excellent welcoming staff great food at both restaurants but particularly Habito on the top floor very clean and spacious rooms & a delightful roof terrace! Can’t wait to go back & stay with them again. cons:
pros: Everything: amenities quality of service breakfast spa infinity pool restaurant cons:
pros: The building is incredible pretty and well located. cons:
pros: absolutely spotless hotel... lovely staff who always smiling...couldn't recommend high enough.. cons: nothing at all I did not like
pros: Breakfast was excellent. Location is just off a shopping precinct . Impossible to reach by car. Best to park first and call hotel to come and collect you and your luggage in a tuk tuk. cons:
pros: It was clean and modern. Very good breakfast and friendly staff. Loved the room with the balcony and excellent pool facilities. It was close to many restaurants and the marina. cons:
pros: Excellent great choice. cons:
pros: Great service allround spa was very professional rooms where spacious and well kept loved buffet breakfast. cons: Restaurant in the rooftop was a bit overpriced for Portugal standards.

pros: An outstanding hotel in a fabulous central location. The facilities are excellent including the outdoor and indoor pool. Everywhere was exceptionally clean. Rooms to a very high standard with a freshly stocked mini bar of soft drinks and water replenished daily. The breakfast choice is excellent. The rooftop pool restaurant has a great choice of food and drink.
  The mainly young staff are very friendly welcoming and efficient. cons: Could not find anything to fault at all.
pros: The ambiance was beautiful. Staff very attentive. Rooftop pool amazing. Gorgeous breakfast cons: There was nothing I didn't like
pros: New clean very friendly staff great amenities. cons:

pros: Food was great at the hotel but there are plenty on places to eat/get food within minutes of walking.

We were celebrating my partners birthday & our engagement & the staff were amazing at helping me with this including champagne ice buckets & glasses plus arranged a beautiful bouquet of flowers to be ready in the room as a surprise for her. cons:

pros: Amazing facilities customer service and room. Good amenities also. Very good location. The overall experience is high quality and serene. cons: Nothing staff was really nice and hotel was exceptional.
pros: super hotel  food and staff were great cons:
pros: very modern state of the art hotel with great  facilities good location cons: nothing
pros: Good location central whilst slightly off the beaten track. cons: Nothing

pros: Absolutely stunning. Lovely room and exceptional facilities- the roof terrace is stunning. Breakfast was lovely and we had dinner in the restaurant on our first night which was great. Staff were very friendly and helpful cons:
pros: Location and modernity cons: All fine

pros: The hotel was fantastic - great location in the centre of town and next to the old town staff excellent breakfasts lovely pool area was good with lovely views. We really enjoyed ourselves and will definitely go back. cons: The hotel has 2 restaurants the one on the top floor was lovely but some of the food was pricey.

pros: It’s brand spanking new. Super nice design both architecture and interior design. 
Staff are pretty great overall. 
Rooms are stunning with really comfortable beds good size and a balcony. 
Great to have a rooftop pool for chilling out during the day as there’s f’all to do in Faro.. so you’ll be glad to relax at this hotel for most of your stay. cons: The pool bar staff make average cocktails. Given the 5-hotel status and cost of cocktails they should invest in the best cocktail maker in Faro. 
Unfortunately some guests ignore the “don’t leave your towel on daybeds to reserve” sign and on a sunny day you can expect people to do just this. This meant many other guests including ourselves were seated in chairs watching empty sun loungers with their ‘owners’ sitting 20m away at the cafe having lunch. Poor form - all British tourists.

pros: Exceptionally clean modern hotel in excellent town centre location with very friendly staff and excellent breakfast.  Lovely bed linen too! Although I didn’t use them the on-site leisure facilities were super. cons: In flight path for airport … although I enjoyed a bit of ‘spotting’ from my balcony! As an older person I struggled with the electronic controls in bedroom!! Had some of the lighting on all night!
pros: Breakfast was good - healthy selection and friendly service. cons: Nothing

pros: The hotel was brand new which meant no wear and tear. The beds were huge all international channels on TV the combination of concrete and wood was fantastic as were the decorations in the corridor and the stairs. The rooftop swimming pool was amazing especially with all the aircraft ascending every 3 minutes. Good breakfast and very helpful staff. The best croissant I ate in the Algarve. cons: Nothing.
pros: The room was exquisite every detail was just wonderful. The hotel itself is stunning the decor is beautiful. The roof terrace pool and spa also wow. cons:

pros: The hotel is in a prime location in the pedestrian shopping area. The look feel and special touches of our room made our stay comfortable and relaxing. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The breakfast provided was excellent and great value for money. The restaurants at the hotel are very good. cons: We honestly cannot find any fault with the hotel. We could not have wished for a better stay. Will definitely stay again when we return to Faro.
pros: Modern luxury cons: That we had to leave
pros: The decor furnishings bed pillows fragrance toiletries staff - all amazing cons: That we had to leave!
pros: Nicest hotel I've ever stayed in fantastic facilities and value for money cons:
pros: The hotel was incredible staff were very attentive and made the stay personal. Couldn't fault out stay! cons: Loved everything!

pros: Very modern and well finished property. Very nice details giving it an upscale functional vibe. cons: No hotel parking available other than 4 places for luggage drop off but other parking options available in town.

pros: A place on your journey where you feel at home starts with good staff where you notice that the service is sincere. 
And that was the case here! 
I don't know the names but to everyone who was on duty at breakfast in the morning: thank you for making breakfast my most favorite time of the day! 
The location in the old town couldn't be better the room was top and the decor of the hotel warm and peaceful. And it smells so good ;) 
The location in the heart of the old town makes parking challenging but a good solution has been found in the nearby parking garage and a tuktuk that helps you transport the luggage. cons: A fee more shaded areas at the pool would be nice. 
The hotel is quite pricey but if it doesn't get more expensive it's worth the price.
pros: Everything was FIRST CLASS the rooms the facilities the staff the food... cons: loved EVERYTHING
pros:  cons:
pros: Wonderful newly renovated room with balcony and hogh ceilings. Good facilities. Very good restaurant and gym. cons: Slightly low pressure in shower but manageable.
pros: Breakfast Location Facilites all are spot-on cons:
pros: Location  facilities and the attentiveness of the staff cons: Could do with more sunbeds
pros: Fantastic pools great staff delicious breakfast and really good location in Faro. cons:

pros: We stayed here when our flight was cancelled but wish we could have stayed longer. Beautiful hotel in the centre of Faro. Room was amazing probably one of the best we’ve ever stayed in and had everything (even watercoffee and soft drinks). Breakfast was also brilliant with buffet and a La carte options. cons: Nothing
pros: The breakfast was amazing lots of choices. The staff are friendly and helpful. Everything was perfect. Room very spacious and very clean. We love our stay in this amazing hotel. cons: None.

pros: Everything about this property was amazing. Great location easy to walk around town and get to the marina. Breakfast was amazing too. We had dinner at the rooftop restaurant...and words cannot describe just how wonderful every course was. cons:

pros: Accommodation was fantastic - from the outdoor pool to the sauna and bedroom.
In the city centre.
Staff always extremely helpful. cons: Nothing comes to mind - everything was great.
pros: Location / staff / facilities cons: nothing

pros: The hotel was lovely great facilities.  indoor and outdoor pool were great.
Breakfast was wonderful with a lot of Gluten Free options! cons:

pros: I loved the room very clean and modern! Loved the decor! cons: Very unfortunate interaction with the receptionist when we came in a lot of racist comments toward us. Saying they had other “colored” employees and how noisy they were and other disgusting comments very inappropriateIf it wasn’t 2 am we would cancel.

pros: Best Breakfasts all trip fresh squeezed juices were very nice custom omelets were perfect.  The steak on the roof top was made to perfection! cons: Understanding how to get to the hotel was a bit tricky... We parked illegally and were luckily not ticketed. If there was a designated meeting spot listed on the booking.com site this would have been helpful.

pros: The swimming pool the room overall the service was excellent location was very central and the car park was not too far. cons: It's probably too late but if you arrive with a car is not super convenient but the staff was super helpful
pros: The room was lovely and the bed was so comfortable. Staff were very friendly and accommodating. cons: Nothing!
pros: Amazing hotel spotlessly clean best breakfast ever and the staff are so welcoming helpful and polite. Couldn't ask for anymore we had a fantastic weekend at this hotel . cons:

pros: Fantastic hotel. Really loved the modern minimalistic feel and the staff were amazing. cons: Nothing!  Only small thing was we arranged to have massages and the therapist (from outside the hotel) was not that experienced.
pros: Everything! cons: Absolutely nothing

pros: Location 
Cleanliness 
Spacious 
Peaceful 
Rooftop pool 
Sunny mornings on the balcony 
Felt special cons: Nothing
pros: Breakfast was excellent. cons:

pros: Beautiful hotel in the pedestrian area lovely decor comfortable modern rooms. Good breakfast options spa and a very relaxing massage. The rooftop is a bit crowded during the day but lovely for after dinner drinks in the breeze with a view on the city. Ricardo at the concierge desk was fabulous giving tips on all Algarve. cons: The beds are terribly soft we woke up with a back ache. The next morning we asked front desk if they could do something and they said they'd check with housekeeping. We came back at 7 pm and they hadn't done anything because before taking the topper off they wanted to ask me. So I said never mind I was not going to check after dinner and have housekeeping in the room late at night rearranging the bed. They should have done it in the morning. My other complaint being a smoker is that they should state the whole hotel is non smoking. Private room balconies too. Since smoking is allowed only on the highest part of the rooftop or outside the hotel maybe a 5 star hotel should consider adding a couple of couches just outside the entrance which is private and has lots of space.
pros: Facilities clean and modern Staff wonderful cons: Need more lying areas on roof top terrace

pros: - pools and spa 
- nice and well decorated room 
- super nice breakfast 
- kind attentive and well informed staff cons: - nothing

pros: The location was great for sightseeing and close to the old town.  The hotel was well designed and beautifully finished. I used the gym once and it was well maintained and clean. cons: The old town and the hotel are in a flight path and the first room we stayed in we could hear the airplanes so we asked to shift rooms to somewhere quieter and the staff were helpful and found a different room for us.

pros: 3HB Faro is a beautiful hotel. We had the suite with King size bed which was perfect for my husband our 8 month old and myself. They also had already set up a pack and play/ crib for the baby. 

The room had two balconies a kitchenette with sink (perfect for washing bottles) and a mini fridge and microwave. 

Breakfast was complimentary and DELICIOUS. Also enjoyed both the Portuguese and Italian restaurant. The food is a bit on the pricey side but the price reflects the quality of the hotel. 

The roof top pool was also gorgeous! Even though it was pretty busy it was very quiet and enjoyable. Our son loved to sit on the side plash the water around. 

The location of the hotel is also great. Less than 15 minutes from the airport super convenient. It is right in the center of Faro a few minutes from the marina and has a good selection of restaurants shops cafes small grocery stores and pharmacies right around the corner. cons: The indoor pool was cold even though it was advertised as being a warm pool and the sauna was out of order!
pros: Ambience design cons:
pros: Everything was perfect. Best quality hotel in Faro for the price you paid. The service was incredible and the people were so kind. It's just amazing. Definitely recommend it cons:
pros: Brilliant design led hotel. Amazing rooftop terrace and infinity pool. Great room and excellent helpful staff. Rita especially was great at reception. cons: Nothing

pros: Breakfast in the hotel - bright spacious room. very attentive polite and helpful - whilst not intruding. Food well laid out and good choice. Hot food available and chefs to cook on demand. cons: NA
pros: Great location great staff very comfortable and great decoration cons: Nothing
pros: Beautiful modern and tasteful hotel with exceptional attention to detail. Brilliant facilities and fantastic location in the centre of Faro yet still a quiet and peaceful retreat. cons:
pros: It’s very central and just 15 mins from the airport. cons: Nothing at all not to like
pros: Very clean. Lovely interiors. Staff excellent. cons: Not enough sun loungers by the roof top pool
pros: Location. Clean and stylish. Good facilities. Exceptionally pleasant and helpful staff cons:
pros: Everything cons:

pros: This hotel is 10/10. Everything exceeded our expectations. Cleanliness of this hotel is next level! And infinity pool on the roof in the middle of town is something else. cons: There was not a single thing!
pros: Excellent modern hotel with beautiful and extensive breakfast choice. Staff were exceptional from the moment we arrived until leaving. one of the best hotels I have stayed in! cons: leaving

pros: A beautiful hotel with great amenities and situated in the heart of the city. The staff were friendly and attentive. The room was of high spec with everything you needed. cons: More sun loungers would have been great.

pros: Stuff at the reception was very helpful they provided a charger for my iPhone.
Also breakfast was great. cons: The restaurant charged additional 15€ for the delievery to the room.

pros: Fabulous hotel very close to the town. Relaxing atmosphere very comfortable. Breakfast was excellent with a good variety of food. Staff very friendly professional and courteous. Would definitely recommend cons: Nothing

pros: The hotel was spotless. The staff and service were exceptional. Nothing was too much trouble. The spa was so clean and comfortable. The rooms were immaculate housekeeping staff were extremely kind and helpful. The breakfast and lunch were truly delicious and extremely good value. cons: There is absolutely nothing to not like about this hotel. The best we have ever stayed in.
pros: Everything about the hotel and the staff was excellent cons: The area was urban. It felt more like a city break.
pros: Lovely and clean  great location in Faro and the staff were helpful cons:
pros: Cleanliness pool and spa. cons: No parking at the facility a little bit far from the coast line.

pros: The attention to detail was as good as I’ve seen in forty plus years of travel. Staff were first class nothing was too much trouble to them. We felt Faro itself had little offer but this property was an absolute find cons: Couldn’t find fault

pros: professionalism that I miss in Portugal generally. quality of linen quality of room and facilities met with all my expectations of a 5* property. cons: very clean very comfortable good quality of everything. the quality shows.
pros: Everything was professional- tidy and joyful cons:

pros: We liked everything service food and special in each room they gave big spicer so we enjoyed our music. cons: Cocktails aperol spritz in rooftop and umbrella need to  change not  enough protect from the sun ☀️
pros: Perfect location in Faro for getting about for bars cafes and restaurants. cons: Nothing
pros: Beautiful hotel and very modern. Breakfast was very good. cons: Location isn’t great hotel feels slightly out of place
pros: Awesome cons: Nothing. Best hotel I ever stayed in
pros: The staff were brilliant! Thank you! cons:
pros: Hotel was beautiful ❤️ so clean staff couldn't do enough they were so friendly 10 out of 10 for this hotel cons:
pros: The food is excellent especially at the restaurant on the roof. cons: The parking is nearby not possible to go with car in front of the hotel.
pros: The design the fine details everything was perfect :) cons: Nothing
pros: Good location. Friendly helpful staff. Great breakfast. cons:
pros: Location cleanliness staff. cons: Room air conditioning food.

pros: The rooftop area is stunning the room was so clean and beautifully designed the bed and pillows were so comfortable breakfast also very good cons: The staff on reception although very nice weren’t always very efficient (eg we were left waiting several times they served people who pushed into the queue didn’t fully explain car parking/check in)
pros: Everything cons:

pros: The staff was very helping and amicable. The room was perfectly clean and we even got upgraded without asking. Of course this is a pricy hotel but I do not regreat the costs compared to the services. cons:
pros: The front office manager Ricardo and Ana in breakfast . cons: Most rooms only have shower unless an upgrade to a room with a jacuzzi.....
pros: The markup applied to tha taxi we booked was excessive. 40 euros for a 20minute ride. Should have been 12-15 cons: It was a luxury hotel but of course the cost could have been less.

pros: I had read the reviews before booking and everyone talks about the friendly staff- and wow they are! So friendly and professional. Someone took us up to our room with our bags they offered us a shower and changing room when early-check-in was not available yet and we were able to use the pool & facilities until our room was ready. Staff all so friendly! Also the gym was one of the best hotel-gyms I've been to: Good amount of space weights and cardio equipment floor mats and a few cable-machine equipment things to workout your whole body. Pool area was fabulous as well but could use more lay-down lounge chairs (they always get snatched early). cons: Pool area was fabulous but could use more lay-down lounge chairs (they always get snatched early) and at least heat the pool a bit - no one could be in there for longer than a few minutes because you would start shivering it's so cold.

pros: Breakfast was a really great spread of buffet options fresh fruit pre-made smoothie juices pastries etc. But they also made to-order breakfast dishes. Coffee wasn't from a machine either was actually ordered to the waiter & brought to you! cons: Not much to complain about - if anything pool was quite cold couldn't stay in it longer than a few minutes just to cool off from the heat of sunbathing.
pros: Breakfast and outside pool cons: We can reserve only 1 hour per day at the inside pool.
pros: all cons: Position of toilet paper holder
pros: Good location fabulous hotel cons:

pros: We liked amazing sunrise views a lot with our 6-month old baby. Hotel spa heated outside pool great breakfast well-maintained gardens and walking paths hotel interior architecture and christmasy atmosphere were super cool for us. I think it’s worth travelling to Algarve just to experience this hotel. cons: A minor glitch: Spa personnel (or reservation system) can be better organised as they couldn’t find our spa reservations two times although we did it via both main reception and spa reception. Luckily they still had availability to get us to spa area and we did not have any problem.

pros: Nice staff and accomodating staff that were quick to help if we had any questions.
Clean rooms with nice big beds. Really great breakfast. The location is overall very nice and welcoming. We visited in the off season and could think that somethings would be closed or a little slower due to season but it was not which was very nice. cons: Rooms looks a little old. Hooks in bathroom barely holding onto the wall anymore. electrical sockets very loose in the walls. The bathroom is semi-open and there is no ventilation so the room can feel moist and get a funky smell. A/C very noisy and not effecient. The pool/pool area could do with some more cleaning. The evening restaurant delivered the worst and most expensive meal on our holiday.
pros: Exceptional breakfast. Beautiful location. cons:
pros: Beautiful and calm setting. cons:

pros: Staff were fantastic
Really loved our stay cons: I'd say considering how quiet the hotel was and how much money we spent it would of been nice to be upgraded

pros: A beautiful property maintained very well. The staff were friendly & helpful. Breakfast was excellent with a great selection. Pools are fantastic especially the outdoor heated pool. Excellent beach only a 5min walk away. cons: During the day there was a very noisy fan that could be heard from room balconies & pool area. Not sure if that is a constant issue but it wasn’t pleasant.

pros: The team at The Domes Lakes are all helpful positive and well trained. The room was perfect and the food at both breakfast and dinner was of a very high standard with a large choice available. Outside areas are clean and tidy with beautiful gardens to wander through. cons:
pros: Perfect in every way xx cons: Nothing

pros: Perfect stay in November! We truly enjoyed the outdoor heated pool the bar in the pool area is fantastic and so is the friendly staff. Make sure to spend some time in the spa as well. The stay has exceeded my expectations. cons:
pros: A great resort with several pools and very close to the beach. It's also walking distance to many restaurants at the marina. cons:
pros: Breakfast was excellent cons:
pros: Location and facilities cons:
pros: Breakfast is particularly good very wide choice and quality food. cons: -
pros: The room location and confort cons: The breakfast could have had healthier options and gluten free bread.

pros: The guest relations staff were fantastic making us feel very special when we arrived and throughout our stay. Special call out to Ineos who was exceptional with her customer service and Catrina (may have name wrong) on reception when we arrived. 
Rooms food and facilities were all great. All the staff from the cleaners to the waiters were always pleasant and helpful. Well done to the whole team!! cons: The only thing we did not like was the beds which we found  were a little uncomfortable and at times the lighting in the rooms which could have been better.

pros: We stayed in Domes for our wedding week. The hotel staff couldn’t have been better. They went above and beyond to make us comfortable during our stay. We would like to especially recognize Nadia who really made our stay special! The breakfast was also great. cons: nothing
pros: Staff were friendly attentive and worked hard.  Good facilities not too busy. great quality breakfast and evening meal. cons: Noisy external air on could be heard on the balcony
pros: Everything especially the staff.  Throughout the hotel from breakfast to pool to evening bar.  Everybody was so attentive and happy smiley ready to please.  It was exemplary. cons: Nothing

pros: The staff were absolutely incredible. The spa was a amazing. plenty of room at the pool great food and drink selections an amazing evening meal at the floating restaurant. Breakfast was superb! cons:

pros: Breakfast was very good. Wide choice of fruits meats cheeses breads and lovely hummus. I like to eat quite healthy and some hotels offer limited options. The choices for me were quite imaginative. These were replenished quickly on busy times. 
I don’t eat hot breakfast but I did look at what was available and it looked well presented and tasty. 
Feeling of space in all areas plenty of beds and good pool service. 
Quiet but near centre. 
Staff were very helpful. I forgot converters  after asking reception they brought 2 up to room for me to use. cons:
pros: Everything cons: Nothing

pros: Breakfast was excellent. Staff were great. Pool and gardens fantastic. All very clean. It was lovely to arrive to balloons and cake and fizz for my 40th birthday! Very kind indeed. cons: Air conditioning in our room wasn't great! kept going on and off- room 127 and my friends had the same in their room also - Room 128 and room 125.
The rooms are so dark and the lighting in the rooms is not good for ladies who need light to get ready to go out.
pros: Incredible hotel beautiful decor every member of staff was so welcoming and  accomodating. Fantastic location right beside the marina. cons: Nothing to dislike

pros: The views hotel and location cons: The Adult pool section was a bit pointless miles away from main hotel and doesn't accommodate for adults. Tiny spot away from it all. Also the pools were not deep and freezing cold
pros: Beautiful comfortable spacious with great facilities and activities. A fabulous kids club too which is very well run. Great food by the poolside and excellent spread for breakfast. cons:
pros: It’s beautiful. cons: It was too crowded. Couldn’t find a spot at the pool.

pros: Lovely amenities and great location.
Staff in the restaurants pool area and housekeeping were extremely helpful and attentive.
Reception staff were hit and miss some very friendly and knowledgeable others not so welcoming difficulties with language and not very knowledgable.
The manager I spoke with was not very helpful. cons: Hotel advertised as having a lake with watersports. Only saw evidence of this for 1 hour on 1 day during our stay.

pros: So much to do and so many places to relax in comfort. All the staff were welcoming and very helpful. Breakfast buffet offered an excellent range of options. Will definitely return. cons: Nothing!
pros: Breakfast choices amazing staff helpful and friendly. Pool beds so comfortable. cons: More staff needed at outside bar
pros: Spacious cons: Lack of evening entertainment
pros: Good quality both in service & food cons: Expensive
pros: Very relaxing cons: Couldn’t fault it

pros: Delightful Hotel
Room with a balcony and view of the Lakes
Very large Bed
Excellent Breakfast with a wide choice
Excellent buffet in the evening 
Large number of pool beds cons: Nothing to mention

pros: The staff and management at this property couldn’t be more friendly professional and exceptional. We had a little hiccup with our room and they went above and beyond to not only rectify it but more than make up for it. We are now huge fans and will always return to this hotel when we go to the Algarve. The location is fantastic the views amazing and the spa was super. We loved everything. cons: The buffet wasn’t fine dining but the breakfast team made up for it.

pros: breakfast was superb as always. this is our 4th time coming to this hotel and i must say the breakfast is one of our favorite aspects - its super. other years we have seen extra fruit. and we love fruit so maybe some watermelon would be nice to see next time we visit.
on the whole this hotel ticks every box. the staff are certainly the best part of it. always helpful and attentive. the rooms are spotless. the changing of the rooms was done perfectly and the staff were always accommodating. we received a welcome note and a gift and a little bottle of orange juice for our child which i thought was a lovely touch to include her. it was very much appreciated.
 i love coming to this hotel. the mock beach is also one one my favorite parts. the grounds are idyllic and the location so quiet and calm. you have access to the harbour and hotel is on the quiet end of the harbour. its very family friendly. would love to see some evening entertainment for children.. just a suggestion..  
there are 3 pools and one is heated... and there is a lifeguard on duty which was great to see.
we loved chatting to the birdman (IYKYK) and overall this is a super holiday / hotel destination. cons: the buffet is too expensive. eating at the hotel buffet as a family with a toddler is seen as an easier option rather than going out. more relaxing for the parents.... however my toddler (3 years old) would eat very little and not much variety. so the charge on her of €20 is way too much. and because the charge for us @ €40 each is also a lot together one dinner now costs €100. generally i felt overall the hotel food was too expensive.
please consider removing / reducing the plant based options from the menu. most plant based food and its ingredients if produced in a factory is actually highly processed food.  its full of oils and additives and preservatives especially plant based cheese. offer it as an alternative swap out for those that want to eat it but too much of the menu was planned around it.
pros: Fantastic location property and grounds. Been staying here for 17 years as Lake Resort and now Domes - never disappoints! cons: Fantastic upgrades and atmosphere across whole resort.

pros: SPA the gym Sauna. The SPA massage was excellent which was really relaxing. The sauna facilities are also well equipped and the indoor swimming pool are very clean and tranquility as you can use by appointment and adult only. 
Staff are friendly and helpful. 
Our room had a very big balcony with sun beds facing to the main gardenw where we we saw beautiful mornings and evenings sky every day!
The breakfast buffet has a quiet range of food and especially the fruits are so fresh and juicy. We tried the dinner buffet once the it was also very delicious. 
Just a few minutes to the marina where many restaurants around. We enjoyed the beach walk every day and visited many fabulous restaurants and bars. 
The beach is on its doorstep as well. Fantastic location!
We have stayed this hotel 5 times and are sure we’ll be back soon. cons: N/A

pros: Exceptional Hotel in beautiful surroundings....top quality and plentiful breakfast buffet staff friendly and attentive. Always sun beds available with waiter service all day long. A short walk to the main beaches and Marina. From start to finish we enjoyed a relaxing and superb stay in this superb hotel with fabulous pools/gardens/lake. Just book it! cons: Nothing
pros: The staff were first class and the facilities also cons: Staying on a half board basis we would have preferred a table service to a buffet meal

pros: breakfast was good enough space not to busy few different pools witch was really good gym facility was decent also cons: wooden decking around pathways around lake uneven and also screws above ground level would b e better with a firm surface

pros: Great location close to the marina. A beautiful hotel with great facilities in immaculate grounds. The staff were all friendly and helpful. cons: We didn't feel inspired to try the hotel restaurants for evening meals as there were so many excellent (cheaper?) restaurants close by.
pros: Location is perfect comfort of sun loungers is exceptional and the staff are so friendly and helpful. cons:
pros: Quality cons: It’s perfect
pros: Breakfasts were superb staff were lovely and always willing to help cons:
pros: Fabulous hotel excellent for a young family whilst still being smart and luxurious! Fantastic facilities incredible staff and superb breakfast! Loved it! cons:
pros: There is nothing to dislike! Spotless hotel excellent food amazing staff and a stunning location. 3 brilliant holidays here so far. cons:
pros: Lovely hotel close to villamoura marina. Excellent breakfast and evening buffet. Staff were very attentive and facilities were excellent cons: Hard to find anything to halt

pros: All the staff throughout the hotel were so helpful and accommodating. We could not have been treated better. A special call-out for Rita on the front desk who was so helpful and her cheerful manner was lovely.
We enjoyed using the spa every morning. Afternoons were perfect at the bar by the lake. 
Our room was very comfortable. 
We were provided with a lovely cake and platter of fruit and bottle of fizz in the room for a double celebration during our stay. Truly felt spoiled. 
The facilities and cleanliness were excellent. cons: N/A. Everything was top notch.

pros: Staff were very friendly and nothing was to much for them to help. Very clean and kids club was good even though quiet at times due to season. cons: Sink in bathroom didnt drain but we didnt contact reception as minor in comparison to everything else was good in room. Restaurants at hotel limited would of been nice to have alcarte on site to save going to the marina for food in evening. Litter onsite in certain areas could of been picked up by grounds staff but minor.

Damaged light on balcony hanging off the wall. Its just minior stuff but for a 5 star hotel could be better.
pros: Staff were welcoming and helpful cons: Coming home 😢

pros: Accommodated my dietary needs exceptionally well the comfortable beds spacious room haute living lounge exceptionally polite friendly staff with no exceptions 
Spa facilities and treatments. The hair salon hairdresser Elsa absolutely awesome lady cons: Communication between catering depts re my allergies. However this was sorted out after the first day with no issues afterwards.
There was nothing to not like it was a fabulous experience
pros: amazing breakfast (best we ever had) very nice rooms and incredible pools and lakes. cons:

pros: The hotel is located close to the most beautiful beach on the south coast. Welcome pack including a bottle of wine and cake. cons: It is obvious that the hotel is showing its age. Balconies are located so that everyone can see their neighbors.

pros: I have been to the hotel a few times now and it never disappoints.
The staff are amazing throughout the hotel . The service is faultless . 
We particularly loved the mixology class with Costas - we learned so much and was great fun . 
As it was Easter  we were given an Easter cake which was waiting on us in our room one of the days . A lovely touch . Thank you . cons: Nothing .

pros: room was clean and cosy
breakfast was beautiful

staff were excellent cons: having to leave

pros: Fantastic location. The proximity to the beach. The swimming pools. The food (pool bar and breakfast). The kindness of the staff. Nice room with beautiful view cons: Separation between toilet and bathroom. Very narrow space between lavatory and bathtub. Difficult to control room temperature.
pros: Everyone was extremely friendly and helpful. It was baby friendly and the staff went above and beyond to make sure we enjoyed our stay cons:
pros: I loved the spa and the grounds which were extensive and well maintained. The food was superb. cons: The outdoor heated  pool could have been warmer.

pros: Amazing choices at both breakfast and dinner with high standards of service throughout. Nothing was too much trouble. our room was clean and airy with a large balcony overlooking the beautiful gardens and lake. Pool and spa facilities were excellent. cons: Nothing - perfect relaxing break.
pros: Everything service provided by all members of staff we encountered was excellent. Have stayed a number of times before so knew what to expect. Didn’t want to leave! cons:
pros: The property was clean and luxurious looking. It felt peaceful. cons: Nothing
pros: Bar staff and restaurant staff were superb. Location was amazing. Hotel rooms and facilities exceptional. Loved it cons:
pros: Great Location Clean and great staff cons: Probably went a little early in the year as outdoor bars closed and only one restaurant open in the evening
pros: Amazing hotel staff and really a lot of amenities and facilities. Great hospitality. cons: The food and menu options  were great but there was a little room for improvement.

pros: Staff were absolutely fantastic would do anything for you. Already rebooked for later on in the year. food was lovely travelled with kids when they tired more than happy to deliver room service to your room Even though we were halfway through a meal it would not be a problem for them would bring a small table. My boy was a little bit ill. They brought him get well soon balloons honestly could not recommend this hotel anymore absolutely fantastic Highly recommend cons: Nothing

pros: Domes Lake is a beautiful hotel resort set in a tranquil garden. With the lake sea and Marina a stone throw away. Perfect location. The rooms were  extremely comfortable and clean. Having a beautiful spa on the premises was fantastic especially when it was cooler. The food was gastronomical. One of the outdoor pools was heated to 25 degrees C. We made use of the tennis court complementary bicycles table tennis pool table gym and spa. The staff were extremely helpful and friendly and the wine tasting by Xeno was the best I have experienced. Todos Restuarant was brilliant - thanks Chef for treating us. cons:

pros: The staff of the hotel were great providing all details and solving our requests.
It's ideal to stay with family we got 2 big rooms for 4 + 1 baby and in the room was the mini-bar inclusive and other special offerts related with the kind of room.
The lake was ideal to do some kayak with childrem and observe the nature.
There're also a train that leave you in the beach if you want (10AM and 2PM). cons: NA
pros: Breakfast was extensive and high quality cons: We were not able to take our 9month child to the spa area.

pros: Everything was exceptional. Spacious and comfortable rooms. Dinner & Breakfast were really good both in terms of options and taste. We were in January and were pleasantly surprised to find one of their outdoor pool having warm water; wasted no time jumping into it. Very warm reception. They even accommodated my request to surprise my wife on her birthday with a cake and champagne that was a very nice gesture. Overall a very memorable stay. cons:
pros: Location close to the beach and town. Lovely garden and pool. Excellent breakfast. cons:

pros: Beautiful hotel and we loved the stay from start to finish. Breakfast was one of the best I've seen though it gets crowded at peak times which is understandable. Rooms were well decorated and spacious with lovely toiletries and extra amenities like toothbrushes razors etc. Only fault was that it took us a while to figure out the air-conditioning. The staff of the hotel are superb could not do enough to help and were so friendly and obliging. We went out for lunch and dinner a lot during our stay but we ate lunch in one of the restaurants one day and dinner in the other restaurant one night- both very good. We also ordered room service one night which was fast and freshly prepared. Loved the hotel extremely relaxing break and would certainly recommended. cons: Nothing to dislike! Only comment was that we were there off peak which added to our relaxation I can imagine it would be more crowded and busy during peak season.
pros: Great staff fantastic facilities cons: N/a

pros: Very friendly and efficient staff
Particular attention ( birthday cake ) cons:
pros: Beautiful hotel spacious rooms excellent service very good kids club great facilities and delicious meals with a huge variety! cons:
pros: Stunning resort in a central location cons:
pros: Fantastic staff and very comfortable room cons: Nothing

pros: Stunning resort amazing location by the marina and lots of space. I visited out of season so it was quiet but I imagine even in the summer it doesn’t feel too crowded. 
Rooms very luxurious breakfast lovely and fresh. 
Arrangement of the bedroom- having the toilet separate to the bathroom is a genius idea. cons: Diffuser smell in reception was quite strong and it would be good to note which water in the rooms is complimentary vs which is paid for. 
The water spa had quite a few jets that didn’t work as well as one of the steam rooms which was rather disappointing. 
It’s also a bit of a walk from inside the hotel to the beach or marina itself-  simply because the grounds are so vast. Not a negative just good to know!
pros: Everything cons: Nothing
pros: We like the breakfast our room especially the beach pool.  Staff were very helpful. cons: nothing

pros: We had breakfast and evening meals at the hotel and the standard and choice on offer was exceptional. We also felt the evening meal was good value for money for such a setting and environment. All staff we came into contact with were so friendly and polite and nothing was a problem. The grounds of the hotel were perfect with loads of space by the pools and also walking around the lake seeing the amazing birdlife. cons: The only minor issue was that the lighting in the room was quite low and so making it hard for make-up or hair in the evening.

pros: The staff were extremely helpful and were a credit to the hotel . We ended up staying HB the food was buffet style with exceptional choice and quality.   Rooms were very spacious and cleaned to a very high standard. The live music at a weekend was brilliant. cons:

pros: The hotel is very well decorated all the amenities excellent. The staff super nice. There are free bikes and vallet parking.
The food is also awesome.
Truly one of my best stays in Algarve and I'm Portuguese so I go quite often :) cons:

pros: everything!!
absolutely brilliant in every way cons: nothing at all it was great
pros: Breakfast was great.  The barmaid at the lobby made really great drinks cons: Room are little bit moisturely smelling because we were close to the spa treatment.

pros: Big thanks to Sandra who gave us a tour of the hotel facilities upon arrival and arranged for a wonderful birthday surprise for my dad. 
Amazing facilities - many pools sauna/steam room kayaking and paddleboarding options cycling etc.
Food was great and the restaurant accommodated to vegetarian and vegan dietary needs
Beautiful property cons: Great that they have yoga classes but yoga mats need to be updated - mine was quite old and torn

pros: Pool area bedrooms cons: We felt the breakfast could have been served at a hotter temperature.   We'd just come from a Lisbon hotel with a similar rating and the Breakfast was better due to it being hotter.
pros: Gardens and bar outside was nice cons: Pretty expensive for that area

pros: Extremely comfortable room. We had a suite which was very spacious with 2 bathrooms and 2 balconies. Lovely bed and linens. Loved the Castelbel bathroom amenities. Fabulous location just a few minutes walk from marina. Peaceful tranquil gardens.  Pool area amazing. Can’t fault it in any way. cons:

pros: The hotel is a great location it has excellent food and the staff are lovely. The rooms are well laid out and clean at all times.
Ideal location to get to the beach. cons: There are 3 pools and everyone commented that the second pool next to the children's pool was too cold.
The area where the sunbeds was also over watered so the ground could be a bit soggy and the grass around that area needed cutting a bit more often.
pros: Attention to detail cons:
pros: Beautiful place great staff great location. We’ll be back! cons: Nothing

pros: Great location.. amazing staff from reception agents to housekeeping.. spacious rooms.. lovely pool areas.. plenty of sun beds.. welcome shady areas.. overall cleanliness.. wonderfully calm and relaxing..!! we have stayed at this hotel many times and have thoroughly enjoyed every one of them.. cons:
pros: A resort like no other pure bliss 🥰 cons:
pros: Everything cons: Nothing

pros: Spa pools pool restaurant adult area friendly staff loads of free sun beds cons: Was told someone would phone when room was ready we waited until 3 but went back to reception ourselves as no one called. Room smelt abit damp in evening. Also €5 for tea or coffee was abit expensive. We notifed staff members already They apologise and took our feedback.
pros: It has Very pleasant staff and beautiful grounds cons: Hot breakfasts could have been better.
pros: Exceptional staff with great attention to detail. Really felt looked after. cons: Leaving.....🤗

pros: Excellent Personal touches at check in and check out really friendly staff lovely grounds. Lovely breakfast cons: Maybe more choice of lunch options would have been good and a toaster that worked

pros: Just arrived back from another wonderful stay at Domes Lake
Staff excellent upgraded free of charge 😊 cons:
pros: Beautiful facilities and lovely staff. A nice relaxing break. cons:
pros: Lots  of space and really good breakfast cons:

pros: Location building & grounds well designed. Good access to beach golf courses & marina .
Very comfortable pool loungers. Lovely interior furnishings cons: No Adult only zones were clearly marked . This would would have been appreciated. Breakfast on 1/9/23 was very noisy & uncomfortable. Families are also more comfortable away from adult couples in a family zone .

pros: The rooms were very modern and the bar area was very relaxing and nicely furnished. The cocktails on offer were excellent. Breakfast was also very good. Staff were excellent and really did everything to make our stay memorable and enjoyable. cons: The coffee at breakfast wasn't up to the standard of a 5 star hotel but that's being picky. There was a queue to go into the breakfast room after 9am in the morning but we were there during a busy period.
pros: Very clean lots of amenities.very close to the marina. cons:
pros: Food and staff cons:
pros: First class service rooms spotless and grounds superb. Has a nice laid back feel. cons: Lack of sunbeds during the day
pros: 5* service and facilities cons: Everything was top class

pros: The whole property is beautiful really well kept fully a 5 star experience. Had no issues getting beds at pool staff all so helpful service excellent great selection at breakfast location perfect to walk into the Marina for dinner. We got engaged on the grounds during this stay so it will forever be special to us! cons: I honestly couldn’t fault it.

pros: Staff very attentive good quality food.
Location and hotel grounds excellent cons: Hard to get sunbeds together in peak season unless you got up early and placed a towel and personal belongings in beds.  Usually visit in early June and this is not a problem.

pros: Spacious and high quality furnishings .
Large beds and rooms cons: Poor management of sun beds. People reserving prior to 8 am and disappearing until lunch time . Parents with small children have booked one room but take up 4 sun beds. 
Housekeeping - came back 4/30 - 5pm and on several occasions couldn’t get ready to go out as housekeeping still cleaning the room .
pros: the hotel is beautiful - amazing gardens lake and pool. close to the beach and the marina. couldn’t ask for a better location. The staff were excellent cons:
pros: All cons: Nil

pros: Amazing pools gorgeous food and amazing service. cons: We had a garden view room and the view was of the road. Next time I would opt for on of the rooms overlooking the pool because the rooms are spacious enough that it would be nice to hangout on the balcony.

pros: Activities- the yoga Pilates and canoeing were great!
Food was really good- normally don’t like buffets but gustatio’s was excellent 
Overall very peaceful clean and relaxing 
Lots of swimming pools cons: Not enough sun loungers unfortunately 
Children playing loud iPads etc at dinner and my pool with insufficient supervision 
No adults only pool exacerbated previous point! 
Makris had very limited opening times- only 3 days a week for lunch- odd given a lot made of it on website
pros: Lovely bedrooms cons: The pool bar shut quite early.
pros: The property caters really well for families. cons: Would like to see night time music every night.
pros: Beautiful hotel very clean close to marina and beach. We had the emerald suite. The bed was massive. The food was very nice and couldn't fault anything had an amazing time. cons:

pros: Fab hotel .  Staff really friendly and polite very helpful .  Breakfast amazing lots of choice for everybody . Gluten free available . Beds very comfortable rooms spotless .  Location perfect short walk to beach and short walk to marina cons: Really can’t think of anything .
pros: Perfect location close to the marina. Grounds around the complex are beautiful and the staff extremely professional cons:
pros: Beautiful setting around the lake. Huge comfortable beds. Fabulous breakfast. cons: Room a little dark.

pros: SPA Breakfast and bar. The treatment menu was very good and the price was reasonable. Staff were very friendly. cons: Did not like smoking smell from the other balcony. When we stayed last time in 2018 the hotel gave us a little treats for my husband birthday (a birthday cake fruits and a bottle of champagne) but there was nothing this time in 2023 even though the reception staff noticed when we checked in there will be my husband birthday during our stay. We did not expect anything but a little disappointment. It used to be more personal for the guests.

pros: The breakfast was lovely and the staff in the restaurant were very good cons: Room was too small for 2 people it was quite dark and depressing not somewhere you would want to spend time in. The balcony was tiny again you wouldn't want to spend time on it. The pools were nice but we didn't go in them as the kids staying at the hotel had the monopoly on both pools and we thought there was an adults pool but there wasn't also the spa was 30 Euro's to use and should of been part of the facilities on our last night the air con wasn't working either. The sun chairs were lined out to close to the person next to you a bit like sardines.
pros: great location and facilities cons: didnt quite have good communication between hotel and third party providers eg taxi service and golf booking

pros: The facilities of the hotel.  3 swimming pools available plus a 24 hours available gym and spa
Very good location
Very close to the beach
Modern rooms cons: Nothing relevant to mention

pros: I liked the staff service and my room cons: Would have liked the restaurants overlapping in service time. Example- breakfast closes at 11am the restaurant does not until 12 and roof top not until 1pm. There is not anything open at 11am anywhere in the hotel.

pros: Everything about the hotel is superb. The breakfast choice is amazing. The decor of the whole hotel is tasteful and relaxing. Sun Loungers are well spread out and the grounds are beautiful. The pool restaurant on the lake is lovely also with a terrific menu. The staff very friendly and attentive without being over the top. Room very comfortable. cons: We had booked a room with a garden view and sadly we had a room overlooking a dusty road which was disappointing.
pros: pool/lake/location cons:
pros: professional and relaxed cons: that we couldn’t stay longer

pros: A very comfortable hotel  very well serviced by a great team  with close proximity to a beautiful beach and sun beds reserved for hotel guests. cons: The main pool areas were a bit crowded for us but the nearby beach makes up for that.
pros: Simply amazing! Everything was wonderful. A beautiful hotel and super staff. Customer service was above and beyond. cons: Nothing
pros: Facilities and staff were exceptional and the location was 3 minutes walk from the main harbour. cons: Food and drink are pretty expensive
pros: Felt very tranquil cons:
pros: the style and staff cons: dessert offering at restaurants
pros: its gorgeous!  room was lovely & quiet cons:
pros: Property is beautiful  well located rooms are nicely decorated just been renovated. It’s for the staff that goes the highest score Bravo!!!! cons:
pros: Beautiful pool side and lots of seating area. The staff was great for a poolside drink. The most amazing breakfast. cons: Large resort type feel which just wasn’t us!

pros: Booked for my elderly parents. The staff were amazing with them! From complimentary bottles of wine to advice and recommendations. They said the hotel was beautiful but it was the staff that made it such a memorable experience. cons: -

pros: Very friendly service in the whole hotel. cons: Removing the towels at the swimming pool when people are gone to free up chairs for newcomers.
No selected choice "menu" in the a la carte restaurant as in the past (visited the hotel 8 years ago)
pros: 10/10 from start to finish. thank you to Carolina in concierge for the thoughtful gifts. a wonderful hotel! cons:

pros: Excellent breakfast great rooms.
Very near to the beautiful beach. cons:

pros: The clean pools and communal grounds. cons: There were a couple of areas that could do with a bit of improvement I.e. the communal corridors looking a bit on the rough side compared to the excellent decor at the rest of the hotel. Our toilet in the room could do with updating.

pros: fab location 
lovely staff 
great food cons: small amount of renovation going on but it wasn’t invasive and workmen super polite

pros: Stayed there with a friend for a long weekend - the holiday was a dream! amazing facilities super clean great amenities and outstanding service from staff. cons: absolutely nothing! highly recommend!
pros: Pool area is fantastic cons: Rooms could be a bit bigger but this  did not detract for how great the resort is

pros: Very comfortable staff were very nice and friendly food was excellent 2-3 minutes walk from the beach cons: Difficult to find a negative but if I had to say something then the sun umbrellas in the garden are a little small and are immovable so if 2 people want to be in the shade at the same time then can be difficult :)

pros: The whole experience was delightful from the room to the staff and quality of the food prepared for breakfast and evening meal. We will definitely return. A super hotel and great location. Our stay was short but the memories will last forever. Thanks to all. cons:
pros: quiet rooms the view from the balcony of the pool is lovely cons: liked everything
pros: everything cons: There was nothing to not like
pros: it was spacious and it had numerous nooks and crannies that we could retire to. as a result we had a very relaxed few days. cons: there was nothing we disliked.

pros: The hotel was perfect in every way really. The food and breakfast was brilliant. Each night we had a 'turn down service' that I did not expect and was not included in the price. Fresh towels twice a day. Villamoura itself is a little expensive but you pay for what you get. Everything is top class. cons:
pros: We were so impressed with everything at this hotel breakfast was amazing gardens beautiful staff lovely 10 out of 10 cons:

pros: Beautiful rooms gorgeous views amazing pool especially the beach pool.  The kids loved it!
Lovely staff very attentive helpful kind. cons: Just be careful when you're doing renovation work that you don't wake people up at 8am!  We had a drilling sound one morning at 8am.

pros: The rooms were comfortable and spotless with all the usual extras that you would expect for this standard hotel. The breakfast was excellent with very attentive and friendly staff. The outdoor facilities were great all set in a perfect location - two minute walk to the marina or a two minute walk to the beech. cons: The only slide disappointment was the outdoor activities for elderly children / families. There’s a covered outdoor area with a tired pool table and table tennis table. The pool queues are barely usable and the table tennis bats were almost square as they’d been battered that much. Looks like an after thought to put something there either don’t bother or put something there that is supervised and maintained

pros: although it’s a big structure
it doesn’t look too massive when you’re there. it’s a short walk away from a lovely beach and near the best golf courses in Algarve. cons: n/a
pros: staff were excellent cons:
pros: Beautiful grounds. Lovely breakfast. cons: No complaints

pros: Staff were excellent - very friendly and helpful. We liked the location which is a few minutes walk to the marina. Great facilities with plenty of sunbeds around multiple pools and it’s own lake. Rooms were cleaned daily and included a turn down service. cons: While there was plenty of options for breakfast some of the cooked options in the food warmers were not as warm as we would have liked.

pros: Very friendly and helpful staff beautiful grounds around the hotel. There is every thing you require for a relaxing holiday here without leaving the resort cons: Rooms are very tired and worn but I understand a renovation is due over the winter
pros: The hotel was lovely. the staff were lovely. it felt a bit worn down but as it is in the process of changing ownership that is probably why. cons:
pros: The hotel and grounds are beautiful and the location is great just five minutes walk from the marina cons: nothing
pros: location food facilities cons: a walk to marina
pros: Everything cons: Daily refill of tea and milk in the room was hit and miss.
pros: location food staff beach towels and location cons: nothing
pros: Book this hotel. It is fabulous the staff are amazing and go the extra mile. Cean comfortable superb breakfast excellent facilities. cons: Balcony chairs a little uncomfortable
pros: perfect location and a fantastic setting cons: nothing
pros: fab location facilities and staff cons: nothing
pros: Everything really. can’t fault it. Great location close to the Marina but still quiet cons: N/A
pros: Breakfast was good. Pools were good but a bit shallow. Room was excellent cons: Everything was very good. Could do with some sort of shop on site
pros: Great staff great food great facilities and great location cons: Nothing

pros: Check in was amazingly smooth. Diogo was very welcoming and helpful In fact all staff were excellent throughout our stay. Our garden view room was in a perfect location on the ground floor and close to all facilities but also tucked away to the side so never felt busy. Food in the poolside restaurant was great and reasonably priced. cons: A little quiet in the evenings but the marina is on the doorstep if you want a more lively night out.
pros: Staff pools food room service cons:
pros: quiet at night great nights sleep not overcrowded during the day lots of sunbeds cons:
pros: Beautiful hotel wonderful staff great location cons: Areas looking tired and in need of updating (reception/bar area etc)

pros: Staff were all excellent couldn't do enough!
Great location and all facilities you could ever need. cons: The balconies are very small and no partition between them so no privacy at all if on your balcony.

pros: We have stayed here a few times over the years and as always we had a wonderfully peaceful and relaxing stay.. the beds are just so comfortable.. there is great selection at the buffet breakfast which is available until 11am.. there were plenty of sun beds around the pools.. housekeeping were great as were all the staff.. cons: Not really a negative but the pool bar menu could have done with a few more light bites for lunch..
pros: Loved the location pools and grounds. Nice staff . cons: Evening buffet could be much better .

pros: Everything! The rooms are spacious the pools are heated the staff are all helpful and friendly. The beds are very comfortable and the sheets get changed every day. We also did half board and were impressed by the quality and variety of food we didn’t get bored even after a week. Use of the spa is complementary and is a good size with everything you’d expect. Everything has been thought of already from little things like chocolates appearing on the bedside table before bed to pool services providing as many towels as you need right by the sun loungers. You can charge everything to your room so you don’t need to take anything with you except your room key. The location is an easy walk to the Vilamoura marina if you’re after some nightlife/cheaper cocktails. Albufeira and Quarteira are within very easy reach by car (although we did walk to Quarteria through the marina/beach a couple of times. An Uber back was €5). We also did the tasting menu at Makris on the Lake which was amazing; getting the wine flight is a must! It will run to €200pp but for a special occasion it’s worth doing. I really can’t emphasise enough how good the staff were you really got the feeling nothing would be too much trouble and the high level of customer service really sets this place apart even more so than the facilities or quality of the food. cons: Being very nitpicky a couple of times there was a wait queuing up to get into breakfast but it ran from 07:00-11:00 so there was no rush.
pros: customer service amazing - people very helpful - lovely property & setting cons: nothing of significance

pros: We stayed at The Lake Resort a few years ago with family when it was previously a ‘Blue and Green’ branded resort. It was lovely then but under the Domes brand ownership it has been renovated and improved. The buildings rooms pools and grounds are beautifully maintained and spotlessly clean. The staff are all lovely cheerful friendly and helpful and the food is superb throughout the resort. The location at Vilamoura close to the beach and marina not far from Faro is excellent. It is an elegant resort. The Lake Resort is our happy place we will certainly return in future. cons: There is nothing at The Lake Resort we don’t like.

pros: This is our second stay as we first visited in 2016. We were due to stay in Albufiera this time but after a noisy night we booked to stay at Domes Lake Algarve. We are so glad we made this change the staff could not have been more lovely and accommodating. We went for a delicious lunch at the hotels beach restaurant whilst we waited for our room to be ready and then found we had been upgraded to a suite. The room was stunning we had a luxious bath two balconies and the bed was so comfortable.
We loved everything about the hotel from the beautiful pool with sand to the Molton Brown toiletries to the lovely breakfast.  I would definitely recommend a spa day we both had a massage and the hot stone massage was the best I've experienced.
It's a lovely atmosphere in the hotel the staff cannot do enough for you (they even rescued my swimsuit after it fell onto the balcony below us) excellent food and a nice family atmosphere as well as suitable for couples.
The location is the cherry on top especially if you love seafood as the Marina is a short five minute walk. 
We will definitely be returning and we can't wait to return as a family once we've expanded our family.
Thank you for a relaxing fabulous stay! cons:
pros: Absolutely perfect hotel and grounds with the loveliest of staff.  Cannot wait to return cons:

pros: Very helpful staff great food selection across all meals and comfy beds. Staff in particular helpful when flight was cancelled and were able to extend our stay to accommodate the flight problems. Great amenities and range of well-being/fitness options available throughout the day. cons:
pros: fabulous resort! this was our second time and we were still super impressed. cons: nothing whatsoever it ticked all boxes for us
pros:  cons: Expensive drink

pros: Everything from the staff the food the pool s the location were fabulous. 
Could not recommend this resort highly enough. cons:

pros: We stayed for one nightas part of our mini-moon in the algarve and this was the hilight of our trip. the staff were so welcoming offering us breakfast the morning we arrived. They upgraded us to a lakeview room left chocolates and champage for our arrival later that evening and a turndown service with rose petals.

breakfast was delicious with lots of fresh juices fruit crepes full cooked and pastries. Although we did not eat dinner in the hotel the restaurants looked lovely and there was plenty of choice. 

It’s a short stroll from the Marina with daily activities on site and a boardwalk to Falesia Beach. cons: there really is nothing to complain about!
pros: everything cons: nothing
pros: Everything was great staff very professional and could not do enough for us. cons: That I could not stay longer
pros: location and facilities cons: nothing

pros: great location with easy access to beach cons: hotel allowed guests block sun beds from early every morning with towels 😟 and didn’t remove them even when other guests arrived at pool area looking for a sun bed !! Disappointing
pros: room was excellent as was the breakfast buffet lunch service and spa treatments. cons:

pros: Hotel staff are all excellent
Buffet Breakfast and Dinner excellent
Definitely a 5 Star Experience cons: Balcony outside lights did not work for the duration of our stay (4 nights) even though we reported it on our first night.

pros: Staff are lovely. Food excellent. Beds are comfy. Rooms very clean. cons: Pool area can be crowded / noisy so we just went to the beach instead. Not enough smaller / lighter bites on the menu for lunch.
