pros: Great breakfasts. No idea on much else as we were there for a wedding at another venue cons:
pros: Everything was absolutely amazing! cons: I can't really think of anything.
pros:  cons: There was three of us in the room but the facilities only reflected for two
pros: So close to the airport. It was an effortless relaxing experience. A fab honeymoon destination. cons:

pros: The location is brilliant only a 3 minute walk to the Marina. The staff are so helpful professional and friendly and nothing is too much of an ask. Breakfast is delicious and has great variety and food at the pool bar is delicious. The sun loungers are also extremely comfortable. Overall a very luxurious hotel and everything you would expect from a hotel of this calibre is provided with ease. cons: Nothing loved it all😄

pros: Beautiful lake and garden short distance to marina very efficient and well organized breakfast and dinner service delicious food helpful receptionist. cons: The tiled floor of the room with very large tile gaps. Instead of basic white t-shirts the waiters could have some finer costumes. These are just ideas. Nothing really to complain about.

pros: Maranthi was very helpful on guiding anywhere nice around Algarve and outskirts.
Good service from all of the staff.
The food was very good better than any restaurant outside the hotel!
The deserts were also delicious. cons:
pros: all so easy. great staff clean proximity to the marina cons: sunloungers were often booked with a towel but not used

pros: Luxury hotel that did not cut corners. Staff 
incredibly welcoming and couldn’t do more. 
Facilities well maintained. Wellness schedule was
great! We like to go out into the town a lot when 
we go away but we found ourselves missing the 
hotel when we were away from it. cons: One of the restaurants wasn’t open so we would
have liked to try it out.
pros: cleanness and staff cons: nothing
pros: Everything cons: Nothing
pros: very nice hotel with good location & friendly staff cons: nothing
pros: lovely room friendly staff great stay cons:

pros: Great food and variety . Lovely pool area and spa. cons: Room type we booked for 3 adults stated 2 single beds and a sofa bed  however no sofa bed and a child camp bed was put in room which wasn`t very comfortable for a 40 year old adult !
pros: Pool and room cons: Nothing

pros: The food/buffets are great the pools are lovely and the staff are really nice and helpful - huge facility also and a beautiful resort. cons: I know there is a kiddies club (additional cost) but if there was a soft play area for babies/toddlers it would be a huge addition as there is always an hour in the day when this would come in useful.
pros: Great location attentive staff and great spa cons: Nothing it was all good

pros: very friendly staff. makes such a difference! 

we were staying out of season so beach bar was not open etc. 

Fantastic food! cons:

pros: The breakfast was fresh delicious and with many choices. The room was large modern quiet beautifully decorated and with a large really comfortable bed. The three pools were magnificent in a pretty garden. cons: It's hard to think of anything that could have been better. Perhaps rooms closer to the rest of our family. Information on the opening times of the beach restaurant was conflicting so that could have been better.

pros: Food was very good location wonderful secure and private but very easy access to the marina and shops and also to the beach. The beaches are stunning… miles of beautiful sand beaches perfect for an early morning walk! cons:

pros: excellent stay location is great the marina is an enjoyable five minute walk away not so close you get the noise but close enough to stroll to.
Hotel is very comfortable and definitely five star the comfort room with its complimentary food and drinks was a real bonus. We’ll go back cons: Nothing

pros: Ultimately the location.
Very clean.
Great staff.
Breakfast 9/10. cons: Pool Bar run very poorly slow food and drinks. Needs managing better.

pros: We were very happy with the room and the little extras provided as part of our stay.  The beds were very comfortable and the curtains blocked out sunlight which is a great bonus in summer.  The view from the room was great and we had a restful sleep.  Breakfast was very good with a lot of choice.  Evening meal was a good standard for a half board option.  We understand that there is an update to the resort due later this year which will enhance things and why i haven't listed the few bits that are slightly worn. Very friendly staff. cons: A designated walkway in the dining room so that people do not constantly pass your table when going to the buffet.
pros: service accommodation & staff all first class. cons: nothing
pros: stunning location great attention to detail and lovely staff. cons: nothing
pros: clean and quiet rooms. great pools. Ed emotionally friendly staff. cons: we don’t dash down to the pool so although we always found sunbeds there weren’t many to choose from.
pros: The perfect mix of luxury for adults and lots of fun for children. We travelled with an almost 2 year old and we all loved it! Worth the price! cons:
pros: huge and very nice cons: nothing

pros: The customer service is impeccable.
Food was delicious
Service and overall beauty of the hotel was lovely and elegant.
Very diverse workforce which very refreshing to see as young black travellers we felt welcome. Inclusivity was 10/10. 
Abi at concierge was very helpful. cons: The single only thing I couldn't stand was the smell of the pillows. I don't know if it's a particular detergent that was being used or whatever but the pillow smelt stale each time. No matter how many times it was cleaned.
pros: Restaurant And pool bar staff were exceptional. Literally couldn’t do enough for you and are so courteous and lovely. cons: Buffet food could be a little hotter at breakfast and dinner.

pros: went for our first anniversary and were met by the concierge taking our bag. we arrived at reception around 10am early for our check in and the kind young lady took us for a tour firstly to the restaurant where breakfast was being served and to our suprise arranged for us to eat which was just so appreciated since we had been up since 3am! it shouldn't have been available to us until the following morning but they were so accommodating. the food was fantastic so much choice and all very clean and wonderful choice of places to sit. the coffee was great and you could have anything from healthy fruit and veg to has browns and sausages!
we were treated to a gift in our room of a lovely bottle of Champagne and chocolates and spent most of our four days by the pool which is special. it has sand and is so warm. plenty of space to find a bed and a bar and restaurant open during the day. one day there was even coffee cocktails from a little stall for free which was a nice touch. so many great things to mention but don't have space. but really the staff were so kind and friendly and just seemed like they wanted to help and wanted to be there. they were meticulous. we would definitely come again. thank you to all staff especially Marianthi and Soraia on reception (sorry if names are not spelt correctly!). cons: slightly slow on the pool bar and quite expensive - a beer is 9/10euros.

pros: Staff were all friendly and helpful
And couldn’t do enough to help you out. Food was lovely and pool area fabulous. cons:
pros: everything superb hotel with all the fine details of a luxury resort cons: nothing!

pros: Breakfast was lovely and sitting outside was an ideal location. Great view over the lake from the bedroom! cons: Shame the restaurant on the lake wasn’t open to give another option. A small shop selling holiday things and magazines/newspapers would be nice too
pros: The resort was unreal. Bedrooms were pristine with unreal views of the resort. The pools were clean and lots of beds. Lovely location. Couldn’t recommend more. cons: I loved it all!
pros: everything cons: nothing

pros: The activities schedule for kids and adults.  Kids club and location.  Live entertainment and beach bar. cons: Buffet gets a bit monotonous and not many themes.  didn’t see any Indian Mexican or Asian theme nights.  mostly Portuguese Italian and Mediterranean.  Very difficult to read the menus next to each food item.  suggest making them white in background color with BLACK writing.  more options needed for vegetarians.

pros: We loved everything about the hotel. Everything was perfect and the staff were all very friendly and helpful.
The gardens and lake were delightful and it was just a few minutes walk to the Marina.
Whatever you could possibly want was there. cons:
pros: Fantastic hotel with great facilities and friendly polite and professional staff. cons:

pros: The breakfast is out of this world and the hotel is so beautiful. cons: When I booked the room it looked like we had a patio area in the pictures but we had a small balcony. Next time I know to request this type of room when booking. The other down side is the pool area does not have enough beds and space.  We arrived one day after breakfast at 10am and there was 6 left nowhere near the pool.
pros: Breakfast was excellent the dinner not so good as was lukewarm cons: The dinner is the only thing that let the whole place down
pros: Everything cons: Nothing

pros: the location facilities and staff were all excellent. service was absolutely 5 star cons: we had our baby with us. all of the staff were so lovely to him. the only issue I has was with the cot in our room. while he was very comfortable in it the mattress didn’t fit it properly and he often woke during the night with a leg stuck down the side. also the pillows on our bed were a little high but we should have asked for flatter ones so that is our own fault.

pros: What an absolute gem of a hotel. Exceptional experience at the Lakes Resort.

A truly 5 star luxurious holiday from the moment we walked through the stunning entrance to leaving.
Pool areas are beautiful particularly the Sandy beach pool which if you had young children would be absolutely perfect. Grounds are immaculate and it’s lovely to be able to walk around the lake and admire the stunning hotel.
The rooms are spotless and very comfortable and the Molton Brown products in the bathrooms were a lovely surprise. The staff are absolutely fantastic nothing was too much trouble particularly around the pool .Can’t fault anything about this wonderful hotel and we will absolutely be returning next year . Thanks Domes for the best hotel stay we have ever had! cons: Nothing was perfect!
pros: Beautiful setting and close to the marina. The rooms were very comfortable and clean. The hotel staff were always  friendly and helpful. Great breakfast too! cons:
pros: location   friendly staff cons: no beds on beach  we had to pay
pros: Location bedroom size and staff all top cons: The bar near the lake needs improve service

pros: Breakfast was very good. No complaints.  Room and pool area all good.   Loved the Spa. cons: Maybe let the guests know if there is entertainment on in the evening.  Maybe advertise who will be singing/playing.  Plus some evenings no entertainment.  Maybe get somebody to play on Piano and let guests know.  We came back to hotel every evening at 9 30 for a a drink and it would be nice to have some entertainment.
pros: Everything! The room was great used all the facilities and the service could not have been better. Made to feel so welcome and staff were just amazing. could not have been better. cons: nothing

pros: Staff were all very helpful and plenty of them. The food was of a high quality and hotel was always kept clean with no litter around - excellent. cons: Doing building work during our stay was NOT acceptable. This should have been done before or after the season. No mention of the work before our stay otherwise would not have booked it!!
pros: Excellent location great facilities and attentive staff cons:

pros: One of the best hotels I have ever stayed at in terms of the hospitality the staff were so helpful and nice. pros: We loved everything!! Breakfast was amazing and the whole resort was beautiful! cons: N/A
pros: Very good breakfast excellent location exceptional staff. We will come back without a doubt! cons: Beach facilities
pros: beautiful resort very relaxed attentive friendly staff fabulous food great location and excellent facilities and amenities 😁 cons:

pros: Airy and spacious hotel inside and out.  Relaxing and quiet.  Pool area is amazing - love the "beach" pool. Staff were incredibly friendly and happy to help.  Breakfast was top rate - everything you could possibly want.  Yes it's expensive but you get what you pay for. cons:
pros: Great location with wonderful facilities. very clean. the food was really good and the staff were so nice. cons:

pros: very clean
lovely pool area cons:

pros: Lovely breakfast. Great pool area for kids and beautiful surroundings as the pool and pool bar looks out onto the lake. cons: Things were not always replaced/ tidied in the room in a logical order. For example some used dishes were replaced but not others.

pros: get location and had everything we needed in the resort for the family there is no reason to leave the resort 
staff were amazing especially the guest relations team always ready to help they were spot on. 
great restaurants and bars the food was fantastic be prepared to add a few kgs as you can’t say no to their menus cons: N/A

pros: Loved the breakfast sunloungers location staff and poolbar. Will also be better when you get the allocated beach loungers for the hotel

pros: Beautiful family friendly hotel with friendly staff kids friendly facilities and 10 mins walk to the beach and marina. Rooms were a great size and cleaned well everyday. Pools were lovely and so is the lake in the hotel. Really enjoyed taking a stroll around the property after dinner and walking to the beach in the evening to watch sunset cons: There was only one lift to get to our room from the pools which meant going back to the reception and then walking to the other side of the hotel and taking another lift. With kids it got a bit tiring at times. 

The kids club was fantastic for one year old but didn’t seem to have very engaging activities for older kid - four year old.

pros: it was a lovely hotel set in lovely grounds cons: the pool bar closes at 7pm - it’s by far the best located bar and was disappointing it closed so early. the service at the pool bar was at times very slow and disjointed. the internal bar that opens late packed any atmosphere
pros: Wow they upgrade me because of my birthday even got champane it was the most amazing birthday i had cons: n/a
pros: Great selection for breakfast cons:

pros: Absolutely fantastic hotel. Amazing location only a 2 minute walk from marina spotlessly clean lovely staff. I’ve stayed in several places in Vilamoura and this was by far the best. It blew the Tivoli out of the water and is half the price. cons:
pros: location and friendly staff cons: evening meal choice limited
pros: very friendly staff good location to the marina clean cons: hotel slightly dated and service around the pool area very slow
pros: Amazing hotel staff were so friendly and acccommodating. Fantastic facilities. Will definitely visit again! cons:
pros: Lots of facilities. Excellent staff. Great location. Bar lunch very good and affordable.poor area excellent cons: Buffet dinner  only average

pros: I loved everything about this experience especially the staff. There were plenty of staff around they were always approachable friendly and willing to help. They really did care for our family and they made the stay in this truly stunning hotel all the more enjoyable. cons:

pros: The breakfast is excellent including the sparkling wine - to start the day off properly (when you're on holiday). We also enjoyed the gym and hydro-therapy facilities. cons: It's an impressive building but it all just feels a bit soulless. Whether it's because the lobby and outside entrance are quite spacious I was just left with the feeling that it lacked any spirit or buzz within the hotel. I'm all for calmness & prestige but this just feels 'flat'.

pros: Staff were very friendly and the location was walkable to marina and beach. They gave us two complimentary bottles of wine which was very kind. cons: Vilamoura marina (unrelated to hotel) was probably a little bit more on the tacky side but has lots of options nonetheless.

pros: Wonderful welcome nice touch of welcome drink plus in our room much appreciated. cons: The breakfast buffet area was very dark and a long wait for coffee . I had lunch at the lake area and the service was very slow.
pros: Staff  Pilates classes  breakfast was great cons: Evening buffet wasn’t as good as breakfast
pros: Excellent breakfastnice private room for suite stayers which included drinks before dinner and light bites at lunchtime cons: Soulful buildingno pictures anywhere
pros: Picturesque location and only a small walk to the marina and the beach cons: Nothing
pros: amazing cons:

pros: We were half board the buffet breakfast and buffet dinner were both fantastic so many options and all the food was really good. We were planning on eating out a few nights but the food was so good at the buffet we ate at the hotel every night. cons:
pros: this has been our 4th visit to the lake. we love everything about the lake but the two standouts are the location and the team. everyone is so welcoming and nice. cons: n/a
pros: Just returned from a beautiful week away at this hotel. Everything was 5*. Breakfast was lovely and a great choice every morning. Highly recommend! cons: Champagne breakfast 🥂

pros: Fantastic hotel and staff! A place where you can relax and unwind! The view and surroundings were amazing. cons: The city/harbour close by was dominated by tourist - there is no really local charm.
pros: One of the best hotels in the area lovely staff great service. Would recommend cons:
pros: excellent location great customer service and brilliant facilities. Would definitely recommend. cons:

pros: very clean and comfortable. facilities were great and staff very friendly. great for kids. cons: the only criticism was really the food for dinner if half boards. felt they could really improve and take the hotel to the next level. not many option for veggie or vegan. not all restaurants were open. Greek restaurant onsite was not as good as we thought it might be. nicer food outside hotel. breakfast was nice tho.

pros: This was our second stay at Domes Lake Algarve (previously Lake Resort when we last went). It has improved but was already an outstanding destination. The whole place is stunning facilities are top class attention to detail is obsessive and every single member of staff polite and friendly no matter where on the resort or who you are always greeted with a hello. cons: If I had to be picky... the AC in our room was a little temperamental isn't wasn't until we changed room on our last night (due to an oversight on my part) that we realised it was only working intermittently. It isn't the cheapest by a long shot but this isn't a negative as you get what you pay for and Domes delivers!!

pros: local to Marina and beach food excellent as soon as we were in the hotel car felt relaxed and left everything to the Domes Lake staff who welcomed us with a refreshing drink on arrival. A dish of fruit and a bottle wine welcomed us to our room could not fault staff excellent. cons: Really couldn’t find anything to dislike.
pros: Staff were exceptional. Location amazing. Loved it. cons: Nothing

pros: The grounds of the hotel and beautiful and calm very well kept and spotlessly clean.

The staff at this hotel go above and beyond with their service. A special mention to Tomas at the front desk who was incredibly helpful. 

The bar make the best cocktails and I think I may have had the best massage of my life - thanks to the lovely Patricia.

The perfect stay cons:

pros: Staff were so friendly and professional. The hotel never felt busy or stressed.
Food was excellent. cons: Nothing

pros: A perfect stay with excellent facilities an ideal location and a very high level of service from the staff. We want to single out one member of staff (didn’t get he’s name) who served us in the evenings at the bar he had been with you for one month and was very attentive and professional a credit to your hotel! cons:
pros: Good breakfast.  Pool quiet.  Pricey lunches. cons: Lighting in th lifts.  Had difficulty seeingbthe floor numbers
pros: Room and view excellent cons: I was bed and breakfast only and although there was plenty of choice hot food could have been kept warmer

pros: We had a fantastic stay at Domes Lake Algarve.  Everything was amazing from the facilities to the staff. We had a fantastic introduction to the resort from Abidulay.  He was an absolute gent. The buffet breakfast and coctails in the bar were delicious. We will 100% be back soon. cons: There was nothing we could fault
pros: The staff was fantastic.  Very attentitive to our needs.  Location near beach and the pool are excellent.  I would reccomend this hotel to anyone staying on the Villamour area. cons:

pros: Everything was brilliant. 
Staff location breakfast room and clean. cons: Cannot fault it

pros: Fantastic breakfast options beds are super comfortable.  TV  channels and Wifi are great.  Pool and sun lounge area well kept.  Grate floral colors on display.  Gym looked well equipped but didn't use myself.  Staff were very pleasant and its clear they work very hard. cons: The tennis court area was out of action.  The pool restaurant was over priced and the portions felt more like finger food.  I would have had to order the whole menu to get a proper meal.
pros: great location very friendly staff clean and spacious rooms good facilities esp the pools and great breakfast cons:
pros: A large comfortable room with beautiful view.  An excellent breakfast and attentive staff.  Lovely pools but need to be heated! cons: Very cold pools!
pros: staff location cons: food poor on half board
pros: Staff lovely/ breakfast amazing cons:

pros: Having spent a week here we've felt like VIP's from the moment we arrived to the moment we left a true 5 star service. Very relaxing and tranquil yet moment's from the Marina with bars and restaurants. Tomás and Maria always went beyond our expectations and were so nice to us the whole time always available to help us and the rest of the staff cannot be faulted either. We came for a special occasion and it was made extra special with the high level of service. The place itself is very nice the pool areas are fantastic and everywhere is so clean and tidy. We definitely plan to return to Domes Lake Vilamoura and will look out for the Domes brand if travelling to Greece.
Thanks for a memorable holiday from myself and the Moore family. cons:

pros: The staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. everything was very clean and the rooms were attended to twice per day. beautiful drinks at poolside. nice and quiet. breakfast is amazing!!! excellent airport transfers. cons: food at the outdoor restaurant could use some more veggie/vegan options.
pros: the staff and facilities were excellent. cons: slightly pricey
pros: The hotel was stunning the staff were attentive and very gracious. The food whether it was breakfast room service snacks by the pool or dinner was of excellent quality. Its an oasis. cons:
pros: The hotel pools lakes and facilities are brilliant the staff are excellent and can't do enough for you it's a short walk to the beach and marina. cons:
pros: We loved absolutely everything about Domes Lake Algarve.  Stunning place  tranquil  spotless comfortable just simply gorgeous. A piece of Paradise. cons: Could not fault it …
pros: Couldn’t fault anything with this hotel and the staff were superb nothing was too much trouble.  Highly recommended. cons: Nothing to not like!
pros: how clean the hotel was. great breakfast and really good customer service cons: nothing

pros: Everything was amazing! The room & view was perfect and always clean thanks to the staff. The staff from checking in to dining even the door staff were incredibly friendly and polite. The food was delicious. If we could give more than 5 Stars we would. Will most certainly be back! It was less than a 5 minute walk to the marina & beach too. cons: Nothing
pros: great location attentive staff. incredible breakfast cons:

pros: The location hotel grounds free bikes free use of the spa turndown service and WOW the breakfast were amazing! 

But what made it 10 out of 10 for me where the staff all immaculately turned out and they couldn't do enough. INCREDIBLE!!! cons: My only gripe was the price of the food menu at the restaurant pool bar for me it was a little expensive.

pros: Where do I start with this incredible hotel!? From the moment we arrived we were treated like royalty it was the first time travelling with our nearly 2 year old. The staff are incredible and cannot do enough for you everyone is so friendly and made a real fuss over our little girl. 
Facilities are amazing our room was incredible everywhere is spotless. 
Breakfast was excellent a huge selection to choose from. 
The hotel is about 5 minutes walk to the Marina amazing location. 
We are looking to return to this hotel in September as I can honestly say it is the best hotel we have ever stayed at! 
Thank you so much Domes Lake Algarve for an unbelievable stay!! cons:

pros: The whole experience was very special. The hotel went beyond all our expectations. we were celebrating our 20th wedding anniversary and my birthday. On arrival our room was beautifully decorated with red rose petals and chocolates. A beautiful plate with a White chocolate heart filled with handmade chocolates and surrounded by strawberries dipped in chocolate accompanied by a chilled bottle of Prosecco on ice. 
we were so impressed with the 5 star treatment then on both our wedding anniversary day and my birthday the following day we had more lovely surprises of chocolates and Prosecco and a beautiful birthday cake. 
All the staff were exceptional and always greeted us with smiles in their eyes behind their masks. cons: The only thing that I can say was unfortunately not all the restaurants were open. But with the vast selection of restaurants on our doorstep one can’t really complain
pros: pool area and food were excellent cons: gym could be updated
pros: amazing food and staff! great location and wonderful facilities cons:
pros: staff were outstanding cons:
pros: The staff were amazing and couldnt do enough for us cons:
pros: So quiet and relax.Nice walking around the lake.Beautiful view from extra big balcony.Only problem that too short stay.Only two nights. cons: All was perfect

pros: Gardens and pool areas all good except for the shortage of sun loungers. 
The (twin) room was good / average but not 5 star lacking a bit more quality. The room did have have good views of the gardens and lake.
Breakfast choices were good and fresh. cons: Evening dinners was somewhat repetitive and food often cold self-served from catering trays.
Additional sun loungers required around the pools and gardens which often not available in the afternoons.

pros: The setting of the hotel was just perfect stunning grounds which were immaculately maintained yet close to the beautiful Marina and all that has to offer . 
The breakfast was the best I’ve ever seen with a huge selection for every taste including avocado and honey comb. The staff were amazing  friendly attentive and nothing was too much trouble . Chocolates and a birthday cake were a lovely unexpected treat too. cons: Nothing - can’t wait to come back !
pros: The breakfast was exceptional cons: The property should have recycling bins. Other equivalent hotels have this available

pros: The hotel has a beautiful environment and great food with the beach conveniently close. cons: However the service needs improvement: the water heater was insufficient WiFi issues took too long to resolve the sofa bed was not clean and there were limited children’s facilities. Additionally the buffet bill was incorrect. If these issues are addressed it would greatly enhance the experience.
pros: food cons: air conditioning in room very poor
pros: Lovely grounds and pleasant staff cons: Small dark bathroom in Emerald retreat expensive room. And 3 star bedroom

pros: The location and breakfast were great. Most of the staff were great but that's as far as it goes cons: Very poor view from bedroom. We were 3 adults sharing a double room and a camp bed was put in room to facilitate a third person. Not good enough for and adult paying thousands of euro for a room. When we looked for second pillow for the camp bed we were told there were no spare pillows in entire hotel. We were given a cushion with a pillowcase. 
Stains on tiles in bathrrom and generally it looked tired amd worn. 
Upon checkout we were not even asked how our stay was. 
This place definitely not for more than 2 people sharimg a room.  
When we emailed Hotel we got no response. This is simply not good enough. Definitely not a 5 star standard.

pros: We enjoyed the beach pool and the location of the property. cons: The staff clearing plates during meals was excessive and air con was not very good. Engineers were in our room trying to fix it during first night..

long wait to get table for Breakfast. Very busy in the morning

Room:

- Comfy bed even though it was two twins pushed together.
- Toilet was nice and had a bidet. 
- Big tub.
Pools:
- Were nice enough.
Restaurant on the beach:
- Food and drinks that actually arrived to our table were delicious. Had one guy there that did help us with our order but only after it had gone quite wrong. 





Restrooms by lobby bar:
- Ran out of room in the negative text section was using toilets on way to breakfast at 8.30am and toilets weren't clean in two of the stalls. Only did this one day so can't be sure if one off or recurring but still disappointing. cons: Room:
- Flooring in room uncomfortable to walk on.
- Complimentary wine bottle wouldn't open and cork fell apart without us getting any wine out of it.
- Squeaky doors to wardrobe space - was introduced to the room  by a front desk attendant and was shown the mini bar and fridge behind one of the wardrobe doors and it emitted a painfully loud squeak that she even winced at but never bothered to try and fix it.
- There's no shower head in bath tub so you need to get out of the tub and move to the shower to rinse off.
Pools:
- Not deeper than 4 feet.
- Sandy beach pool is only sand to about 2 feet deep then changes to a rather rough pool bottom that I ended up wearing flip flops while in the pool because it hurt my feet that much from the pool bottoms (all three had this same issue)
- The hotel itself wasn't compliant with their own pool policy (no toys or floats) so couldn't enjoy any of the pools without floats and children's toys being thrown at you or bumping into you.
Service:
- English speaking staff was intermittent at best. Advice: bring your phone and google translate with you just to ask for some ice water in 36 degree heat and not have it show up.
- Prepare to ask multiple times for the same thing from different people because they tend to not deliver. This occurred at check-in breakfast and poolside but also at one of the hotel restaurants (the one on the beach).
Restaurant on the beach:
- Painfully expensive for what you get if you manage to get all of the food you ordered delivered to you.
- Again English speakers here was a bit of a miss didn't get our starter finally got our main 1.5 hours into the dinner asked where our starter was and they concluded the starter order was never entered in their system and asked us if we wanted it alongside our meal or after it. No sign of original staff member after this until we asked someone else to give us our bill so we could escape and go somewhere else entirely.

pros: The pool cons: We traveled as a group of 5 friends two couples and myself. We all booked the same category and paid the same price for the rooms except for them as couples they shared a room while I had my own I was given a horrible room which was next to the kids area while my other friends were given different categories which had bigger space balcony and one of them even was a suite. I informed the hotel that we are paid the same price and I was expecting to get a similar category. However they told me they are out of rooms. This made my experience unpleasant. ￼ This is of course including ￼ a low level of cleaning where the housekeeping did not even remove the trash and give me plastic bags to put my own trash. Furthermore there were many moths in the room. The only reason I could find for such treatment was the discrimination based on the passport as I had as different passport than the other two couple. ￼

pros: Location rooms Staff cons: Every night one has difficulties in sleeping in a quiet environment (but promoted as such !) because there is this disco/ restaurant with absurd loud music until the very early morning hours. Makes no sense. So for those who wish to have a relaxing vacation this is not a recommendable hotel / resort to stay in.
pros: Outside facilities including garden and pools. cons: Pools are too crowded. Rooms need upgrade in furniture bathrooms USB connections tvs.

pros: lake and surround good. cons: Breakfast and buffet poor.
Spa pool only i metre deep. No good for swimming

pros: close proximity to harbour
sun loungers and gardens cons: casual dress staff
room housekeeping could be better cups and glasses not cleaned daily
tiles in rooms worn looking small bathroom arealack of privacy on balcony

pros: the location is great for the marina cons: the room seemed dated and we had ants all over the top and bed
The cleaners left no towels so had to wait near 30min to be abel to shower for dinner they also left dirty bedding in the room.
The buffet was ok but when i went to get some salad at breakfast and wr qas some of the first there that day i lifted the lettuce and  it was full of hundreds of little files which put me off having anyrhing as they obviously did not clean the food and it had been sat for sometime for that to happen. this hotel is deffinetly not 5*

We spoke to a manager who was good enough to give us a meal in the Restaurant there but unfortunately we waited so long between starter and main and when it came the potatoes were not cooked and raw so qe just left
pros: Breakfast was okay nothing special. cons: Cleanliness was very poor m. Bed sheets had stains it was really disgusting along with towels. Very poor for a 5 star hotel

pros: perfect location at the beach cons: no bed sheets it's unbelievabe...looks like a 2 star hotel in Nordic
staff with lak of preparation mainly at restaurant

pros:  cons: I booked a twin room.  I was given a double bed.  They said they would fix it but they didnt offer me an alternative room until 9.30 at night.  It was too late to pack everything to move.  Disappointing when you pay that amount of money.  Otherwise the place is amazing

pros: great location easy access to the beach cons: having been a visitor to the resort for the last 12 years I was surprised that under the new management they are trying to introduce a Greek element to the resort including their signature restaurant in the lake if I want to visit Greece I will do so. if I am holidaying in Portugal I expect Portuguese cuisine.
pros: The beach pool buffet staff Lake cons: room furniture bugs in room needs a revamp
pros: Location was excellent and outdoor facilities was great. cons: I found the food choices in the restaurant for dinner disappointing but the breakfast was excellent.
pros: Rooms were nice upgraded on arrival to an apartment. Staff are really nice. cons: Food is meh. Breakfast ok but evening meals were lousy.

pros: Service at reception at check in was ok and the staff made me feel Welcome.
Pool are was nice ( although overcrowded) 
Spa was nice. cons: The hotel needs serious work: the windows across the overal hotel were dirty some of the walls are scrapped it looks dated and for a 5 start hotel that is not acceptable. The room where I had a spa treatment smelled of mould and had a infliltration on the ceiling ( you can see the water bubbles). Also soeone opened the door while I was having my pedicure... I mean. In my bedroom ( 261) the woden doors looked like they neede a lick of varnish or good wood treatment. All looks like it needs seriopus refurbishement and there is a lack of attention to detail

Service at the bar and at the restuarants was awful and far frm a 5 star standard ( tue quality of food was ok though) .The staff is on a constant rush to rmeove plates from you and keep interrupting guest with the constant question: can I rmeove your plate. The general manager ( i am assuming) that runs the service in the bar and restaurants knows nothing about service and needs to be seriously considered. The staff constantly moans and argues between themlseves in front of guests. I have no words for the service levels.

I have asked for an iron and ironing board to the room and was waiting for more than one hour. 3 calls to receptions made it happen!!

All hotel restuarants close for lunch so guests are only left with pool bar. 

I have done half board and at dinner you had to queue to give your room number and be seated and you had to queue again to ask for you bill should you had any drinks. Only food was included. As you can imagine everyone has drinks so everyone has to get up and queue... Bringing the bill to the table NO. 

Its a nice building with a lot of potential but its not a 5 star. There are much better 5 star and actually 4 start hotels in the Algarve area. Nice pools sells itself on the look of it but its not worth it.

Go somewhere else.
pros: location is unparalleled. cons: the rooms are small the mattress was uncomfortable the fixtures need upgrade within the rooms.
pros: Fab location. Lovely staff and facilities. cons: Parts a little bit outdated. The drinks and very expensive.
pros: Relaxing great food and efficient staff! also cushions on sun beds a real bonus! cons: nothing
pros: The facilities are absolutely amazing!! The place was super clean and the staff were so friendly and helpful! cons: Nothing! Could not fault anything!

pros: The hotel was absolutely wonderful from the moment we arrived. We were greeted by Diogo who gave us a gorgeous welcome. The room was wonderful. The hotel breakfast was one of the best I have ever had!!! The staff were so friendly and helpful for everything. The pool area is beautiful I especially loved the sand pool. Would highly recommend this hotel can’t wait to go back!! Also only a 5 minute walk from the marina which is perfect! cons:

pros: El hotel es excepcional pero lo que más nos gustó es la amabilidad de todo el personal. También los desayunos y la magnífica cena de fin de año con música en vivo y fuegos artificiales. El acceso directo a la marina y la playa a 7 minutos también son cosas a tener en cuenta. El spa muy bien y las raciones del bar por si no quieres cenar de restaurante geniales. Para repetir más veces! cons: .

pros: Excelente experiência vamos voltar cons:

pros:  cons: Quarto no piso zero zona de banho/ duche da instalação sanitária “aberta” p quarto não sendo possível impedir a luz ou o ruído da água.
pros: Gostámos de tudo. Hotel fantástico.  Staff muito prestável e de grande simpatia. cons:

pros: TODO PERFECTO. Especialmente la amabilidad y el buen trabajo de Pedro y Tiana que solucionaron mi problema rápido y bien
También el servicio de masaje del Spa cons: Me sobran los niños gritando

pros: Este hotel cumple con todas las expectativas de un hotel 5 estrellas. El trato de todo el personal desde que llegas hasta que te vas es exquisito. Cuentan con un servicio de aparca coches lo cual es conveniente puesto que llegamos con un coche alquilado. 

La habitación es amplia y el baño se divide en dos partes: la parte del WC y la de bañera y ducha. En la habitación cuentas con nevería y cafetera con café de cortesía. La cama es muy cómoda de 2x2 y cada tarde/noche el hotel cuenta con servicio de turnover que se encarga de preparar la habitación para dormir y proporcionar dos botellas de agua grandes y unos chocolates de cortesía. Nos dejaron una tarta y una botella de cava por el cumpleaños de mi novio sin si quiera haber dicho nada nosotros. No obstante al estar nuestra habitación en el primer piso dando al jardín se llenó rápidamente de hormigas y tuvimos que tirarla. Hay que tener esto en cuenta puesto que todos los días nos hemos encontrado alguna hormiga en la habitación.
El desayuno es muy bueno aunque recomiendo ir temprano sobre todo en esta época puesto que sobre las 10h se suele llenar mucho más. Hay opciones sin gluten saludables y también un puesto de huevos bacon etc. El zumo de naranja es recién exprimido.  
La zona de la piscina es muy relajante. Las toallas se pueden coger allí mismo sin necesidad de dejar ninguna fianza (como había leído en otros comentarios). De hecho nos llevamos un par para pasar el día en la playa y no hubo ningún problema. Siempre hay disponibilidad de hamacas con espacio de sobra. Las piscinas cuentan con un bar en el que se puede pedir tanto comida como bebida que te pueden servir en las mismas tumbonas. Comimos allí un día y la verdad es que bastante bueno.
En el bar del lobby también ponen música en directo varios días y se puede comer tipo hamburguesa patatas fritas etc. Lo recomiendo mucho después de un día cansado y sirven coktail increíbles. cons: El café del desayuno es pésimo: servido de dos grandes cafeteras por los camareros al estilo americano. Teniendo buenas cafeteras en la habitación no se explica que en el desayuno se sirva este café insípido.

Me llama la atención que no haya un restaurante de cocina portuguesa en un hotel como este. El restaurante fusión griego-portugués está bien pero no da la talla en este aspecto. Si estás 5 noches las opciones para cenar se hacen repetitivas teniendo en cuenta que el restaurante Blend sólo abre dos días. Además el Blend aunque muy bueno nos pareció excesivo en cuanto a su precio. 

El SPA fue una decepción total y no está a la altura del hotel. Lleno de niños tirándose de cabeza y chillando sin que la recepcionista les llamase la atención. Los masajes fueron increíbles yo repetí con Barbara dos días gracias. No obstante es horrible salir relajado y encontrarte con niños gritando en la sauna piscina etc. 

El recibimiento fue muy bueno pero la salida no tan buena. El señor de recepción simplemente nos ha dado la factura sin mirarnos preguntarnos cómo había ido ni tener ningún tipo de interacción con nosotros. No es lo que esperas de un hotel así.

pros: Hotel espectacular uma óptima experiência:

pros: Las piscinas lo cerca que está de la playa la cafetera con cápsulas de la habitación la botella de vino como obsequio de bienvenida   la terraza la comodidad de la cama el buffet del desayuno los restaurantes  todos ofrecen mucha calidad la amabilidad del personal . Excelente espaços verdes com um lago que valoriza o espaço uma piscina de areia que todos adoramos fantástica ideia embeleza o hotel junto da melhor praia alimentação excelente com sabores bem confecionados quartos espaçosos bem apresentados staf de parabéns. cons: Poderia se proporcionar algum espetáculo ou festa no exterior junto ao lago para aproximar pessoas e conhecimentos.
Uma nota importante para quem tem crianças nos corredores tem puxadores nas paredes que dão acesso a eletricidade qualquer criança abre facilmente podendo gerar um problema acho uma pequena falha do departamento da qualidade que assegura a segurança dos clientes

pros: Tudo cons:

pros: Da localização e simpatia dos empregados cons: Não foi a minha primeira vez no hotel. Estive ainda era The Lake Resort. Por isso levada as espectativas muito elevadas. O pequeno almoço muito menos variado ficámos junto às janelas e estava muito frio. Optámos por jantar também e não achei um buffet para um hotel de luxo. 
De lamentar que em pleno inverno (e será assim noutras estações) só deixem as crianças a partir dos 4 anos usufruir da piscina interior só com marcação e só até às 14h. Viajamos com crianças é um hotel para crianças mas não lhes dão as devidas condições. 
Fiz a minha reserva quase com um mês de antecedência. Pedi dois quartos muito perto por sermos uma familia de 3 adultos e duas crianças. Acabámos por ficar com quartos entre os nossos quando mesmo à nossa frente estavam dois quartos juntinhos com um casal e um filho e no outro a avó.
O hotel é de excelência e quem o procura deseja encontrar isso mesmo.
pros: bom cons:

pros: Nos gustó el hotel en general las piscinas son realmente bonitas una de agua a temperatura ambiente otra de agua atemperada y la playa artificial que es super bonita. cons: Esperaba mucho más de la cena buffet de Nochebuena el restaurante Topos extraordinario servicio y calidad de la comida.

pros: Hotel magnífico bem localizado. cons: A limpeza especialmente no spa era inexistente o cheiro a urina era evidente e a limpeza dentro da sauna banho turco  etc era inexistente. Lamentavel encontrei algum lixo na lagoa que seria facil de resolver

pros: A estrutura o conforto as opções de lazer e a limpeza. cons: Péssimo atendimento da equipe no café da manhã. Muitos funcionários mas totalmente descoordenados pareciam não ter tido um treinamento.
Pedimos café com leite e demorou 10 minutos (café com leite é uma coisa básica que deve estar a disposição imediatamente em qualquer café da manhã) e só trouxeram o meu e esqueceram o da minha esposa. 
Não tinha açúcar na nossa mesa e eu tive que levantar pra pegar enfim...nos pareceu que era uma equipe totalmente nova sem muita orientação..
Precisam ajustar isso urgentemente pois compromete a qualidade da hospedagem.

pros: Já estive várias vezes no agora Domes Lake. Mantém um serviço excelente a todos os níveis. Tudo perfeito funcionários de uma delicadeza e atenção fora de série. Pequeno almoço muito bom. 
Voltarei certamente. cons: Aspeto desolador da piscina a partir do meio da tarde com praticamente todas as espreguiçadeiras "ocupadas" com toalhas que eram deixadas pelos seus utilizadores ao abandono o que impedia que outros as ocupassem. O mesmo na praia na zona concessionada onde os hóspedes chegavam ao ponto de as levar e no fim irem embora sem as recolherem.
Não há qualquer controle de toalhas podendo qualquer hóspede usar as que quisesse ao longo do dia era só pegar levar e deixar em qualquer lado. 
Pretendendo que esta seja uma crítica construtiva acho que este é o único aspeto que precisa ser melhorado.

pros: Zona residencial aislada y muy tranquila sin vecinos.
Servicios completos e impecables a tono con la calidad y precio del hotel.
Desayuno completo abundante pero a última hora tardan en reponer lo que se va a acabando
Varias piscinas y amplios jardines y dependencias.
Habitación con terraza (poca intimidad) y vistas al mar desde pisos altos
Muy cerca de la playa 3 minutos andando que además es enorme cuidada segura y con muchos servicios. 
Las sombrillas y hamacas en el beach club son gratuitas. Hay servicio de bar y comida en la propia sombrilla a muy buen precio más económico que el propio chiringuito.
Chiringuito/restaurante en la playa muy buena cocina y muy buen servicio. Precios altos.
Aparcamiento gratuito en el hotel a cubierto o en sótano con aparca coches y servicio de equipajes.
Salón bar cócteles del hotel  a buen precio y buena calidad. Profesionales.
Playa de Falesia 
y cerca Quarteira y Vilamoura cons: Tristemente como es habitual en hoteles grandes no se respetan las condiciones de uso de las piscinas y es casi imposible encontrar una tumbona a media mañana o por la tarde...
En la playa en la zona del hotel y beach club las sombrillas de primeras filas no están reservadas al hotel sino para el pago externo Debería ser al revés.
A pesar del precio (5 estrellas y altos precios) parece que hay turoperadores europeos que deben ofertar muy por debajo y se nota....

pros: O hotel é excelente. o quarto é grande e muito confortável. funcionários da recepção muito gentis. cons: Fomos jantar no restaurante achei um pouco caro para o que foi servido pedimos um polvo e um bacalhau que era minúsculo e o serviço demorado. O atendimento do bar da praia é pessimo o funcionário que nos recebeu disse que estava sozinho e que tínhamos que esperar até que ele pudesse nos atender.
 Nem sentamos saímos e fomos para outro restaurante.
pros: quartos grandes e confortáveis cons: tudo ótimo
pros: a localização e as instalações são fantásticas! pessoal simpático e cuidado. cons:
pros: decoração e tamanho cons:
pros: Tudo neste Hotel é perfeito! cons:
pros: Tudo :) cons:

pros: Tudo foi ótimo. O ckeckin foi bastante tranquilo com direito a um inesperado miminho como welcome package. A estadia foi muito curta para poder aproveitar tudo que o hotel oferece. Contamos voltar numa próxima oportunidade.  Optima localização com várias opções de restaurantes cons:

pros: Conforto do quarto instalações do hotel piscinas lago e a praia com bar do proprio hotel para atender os hospedes. Atendimento impecavel  desde a chegada -  gentileza com que nos receberam  fazendo um roteiro perfeito detalhado e cuidadoso para conhecer o Algarve . Com restaurantes passeios pontos imperdiveis a serem visitados. Fizemos a opção por meia pensao -  excelente escolha pois a oferta do Buffet a noite bem variada e ainda com opção em outro restaurante a la carte. Funcionarios super atenciosos bem humorados. Meu marido teve uma indisposição e foram extremamente gentis - desde mandar uma refeição especial para o quarto até ligarem durante o dia seguinte  para saber como estavamos e se necessitavamos de algo. Parabéns . Voltaremos com certeza e recomendamos! cons: Nada

pros: La habitación la comodidad de las camas la calidad de la ropa de cama la piscina e instalaciones la limpieza y el personal muy atento. Es un resort para relajarte a casi 1 km del ambiente y del puerto deportivo al que se puede ir andando en 5 minutos. cons: El buffet para la cena muy escaso y poco variado para un hotel y precio de esta categoría. He estado en hoteles de 4 estrellas con mucha mas variedad y mejor elaboración. Pocas opciones saludables y baja calidad en los elaborados. El restaurante de la piscina personal muy atento pero baja calidad y poco saludable. Muy enfocado a comida rápida poco elaborada como hamburguesas ensaladas y wraps. No obstante mi estómago es delicado y me atendieron muy bien a lo que pedí pero deberian incluir comida mas elaborada y con mas calidad. Demasiado calor en el spa aunque era una buena experiencia y estaba muy bien.
pros: tudo cons:
pros: A localização e as áreas exteriores cons: preços muito altos nas comidas e bebidas
pros:  cons: A sala do buffet bastante fraca e pouca variedade de comidas quentes.
pros: local lindíssimo. simpatia dos funcionários cons:

pros: Todas as comodidades são excelentes funcionários muito prestaveis e simpáticos e um serviço de excelência. cons: O hotel estava bastante cheio por ser agosto e as camas da piscina ficavam muito juntas com as de outros hóspedes.

pros: estadia magnífica. cama muito confortável (colchão e almofadas top 🔝). refeições excelentes.upgrade com vista piscina e mar com por do sol ☀️. funcionários simpáticos eficientes e prestáveis em todas as áreas (recepção restaurantes limpeza).
ambiente aromatizado muito agradável. música de harpa e piano no hall. bicicletas disponíveis para passeio. localização fantástica - 2 min da praia com areal ótimo para passear apoio de praia cinco estrelas 2 min da Marina de Vilamoura com acesso aos restaurantes lojas e animação . passeio junto ao campo de golfe .
paisagem linda 🤩 
hotel muito recomendado para qualquer idade e qualquer altura do ano.
A voltar SEMPRE ☺️👌 cons: este hotel não tem defeitos😉
pros: Tudo incrível. cons:

pros: Quarto espaçoso cama confortável bom blackout amenities agradáveis 
Pequeno-almoço com muita variedade e qualidade.
Staff muito simpático.
Toda a zona exterior piscinas e jardins muito agradável e cuidada. cons: Buffet do jantar com menos qualidade do que seria de esperar neste tipo de hotel.
Não gostei de não me terem permitido ver um jogo de uma equipa portuguesa na Liga dos Campeões  estando nós em Portugal simplesmente porque os hóspedes ingleses preferiram ver outras equipas. A justificação dada foi que a 2a TV estava avariada….

pros: Hotel incrível. 
Desde o espaço interior e exterior a limpeza a localização e as refeições mas na minha opinião ganha pelos excelentes funcionários. Faço destaque aqui à Rita e ao Hugo  pela simpatia delicadeza e profissionalismo acima da média. cons:

pros: funcionários na recepção 
localização cons: limpeza do quarto e nas espreguiçadeiras 
funcionários no buffet

pros: El hotel es estupendo con jardines y espacios verdes y tres piscinas aptas para niños. Está muy cerca del mar y muy bien ubicado para descubrir el Algarve. Las habitaciones están muy bien decoradas las camas son muy cómodas y todo el personal es encantador. cons: Nos gusto todo: la comida las atenciones del personal el gimnasio los espacios verdes... En cuanto a mejoras tal vez se podrían hacer algunas en relación al cuidado del medioambiente: podrían instalar papeleras de reciclaje y cambiar las toallas solo cuando sea necesario no diariamente.

pros: A localização limpeza  bom atendimento e simpatia dos funcionários um agradecimento especial para a Bárbara uma colaboradora do restaurante que iremos guardar na nossa memória uma delícia de pessoa que com toda a certeza terá muito sucesso cons: Não existência de um spot para venda revistas e jornais. já existiu mas foi eliminado

Simpatia dos funcionários (receção restaurantes limpeza etc). cons: Gestão das entradas nos restaurantes para pequeno almoço e jantar. 
Filas provocadas por muita demora no encaminhamento. A maior parte do tempo não está ninguém  os restaurantes na zona de receção dos hóspedes e gera-se uma inexplicável demora.
Não obstante o anterior os funcionários são simpáticos e bastante atenciosos.

pros:  cons: Colchão muito mole

pros: Quarto amplos  limpos e bem cuidados ótima localização cons:
pros: a qualidade da infraestrutura cons: alguma impreparação de alguns dos funcionários mais novos claramente desenquadrados do nível do hotel

pros: Portugal é espetacular. Esse hotel tornou nossa viagem ainda mais espetacular. Acolhimento comida instalações localização atividades e spa maravilhoso. Apesar do restaurante Gustatio estar incluso na diária como opção de buffet o restaurante Topos é ímpar. Uma fusão de Portugal e Grécia! nos chamou a atenção vários colaboradores durante nossas férias: Rodrigo (mensageiro) Diogo e Raquel (recepção e concierge) Denyse (brasileira que trabalha no Gustatio e no bar do resort) Carolina (Topos) e a número 1 em simpatia… Bruna (spa). cons: Há algumas modalidades de upgrade que fiquei sabendo apenas durante a estadia. Teria optado por eles caso me oferecessem no check in. Não me sentiria constrangido caso não quisesse mas teria aceitado caso soubesse.
pros: La atención del personal todos muy amables y simpáticos cons: La poca variedad en el bar de la piscina y en el buffet tanto en el desayuno como en la cena
pros: El sitio ideal..el acceso a la playa cercano...las piscinas muy bien. En general el hotel muy bonito. cons: Para mi gusto muy poca luz en el salón interior donde ofrecían el desayuno y la cena.

pros: Local excelente
Hotel muito confortável e com muitas atividades
Staf super atenciosos cons:

pros: O hotel tem excelente localização o facto de ter várias piscinas incluindo a de areia e ainda ter um lago faz com que se distinga de muitos outros do mesmo nível. A cama é muitíssimo confortável espaçosa lençois suaves proporcionando um óptimo descanso. A possibilidade de ficar indoors outdoors ou "meio termo" no Gustatio é excelente. As nossas toiletries eram da Molton Brown e ficamos impressionados com a sua qualidade muitas vezes esse tipo de produtos cheiram bem mas não são hidratantes neste caso o condicionador é bem suavizante uma coisa muito apreciada para cabelos que andam na piscina e praia e muitas vezes os hotéis não dão importância. A maioria dos funcionários foi super simpática. A Nadia responsável pelo espaço disponível a quartos de maior categoria é muito atenciosa e atenta ao detalhe excelente profissional.
BBQ night no Gustatio muito bom lulas grelhadas saborosíssimas. cons: Já tinhamos estado neste hotel antes e infelizmente desceu um pouco de qualidade. O grupo Domes decidiu pintar as fontes/repuxos do hotel mudou do normal azul para um cinzento esverdeado que fica muito muito feio! Além de pintar por cima dos ladrilhos (elemento muito Português) o que por si já é um mau trabalho a cor é absurda e nem se vê a água dos repuxos é como se as fontes não existissem a água nem brilha ao sol. Foi-nos comentado que aquela cor iria pintar todo o hotel no futuro o que é uma pena. O grupo Domes por ser grego parece querer implementar uma cultura e look gregos ao hotel (através das comidas e das cores escolhidas) o que me parece um tiro no pé se as pessoas vêm de férias para Portugal é para encontrar a experiência de Portugal e não da Grécia. Para isso vamos à Grécia. A fruta disponível principalmente no pequeno-almoço é pouca e não teve muita qualidade o que nos deixou surpreendidos pela negativa. É pena que o hotel tenha apostado tanto em toppings de panquecas e se esqueceu de frutas. O sítio onde são colocadas as miniaturas de pastelaria (croissants folhados etc) foi uma má escolha do hotel estes alimentos são muito apelativos para crianças (e todos nós) e o suporte destes alimentos é o mais baixo existente no buffet e está mesmo ao nível dos mais pequeninos acontece que eles passam o tempo a tocar nas miniaturas com as mãos ou deixam cair e voltam a por no sítio escusado será dizer o quanto isto é pouco higiénico. As almofadas que encontramos na cama à chegada literalmente cheiravam mal foram trocadas de imediato e foi-nos dito que era porque eram novas não voltou a acontecer mas achamos estranho não aparecer um responsável ou uma chamada para pedir desculpa de um sucedido tão estranho.
O Topos é inferior ao restaurante que estava sob a alçada do grupo Blue and Green não acho que valha o preço. Na realidade não vimos melhorias relativamente ao grupo que geria o hotel anteriormente.
pros: Cafe da manha muito bom! Localização espetacular e atendimento perfeito... destaque especial para Rita e Joana. cons: Jantar do restaurante onde se toma o cafe da manha.

pros: Espectacular Resort en medio del Algarve. Todo de 10: habitación cama instalaciones personal actividades acceso a la playa desayuno restaurantes… todo cons: Lo único que añadiría es algo más de variedad en la carta de los restaurantes de noche.

pros: Simpatia profissionalismo e atenção ao pormenor de todos os funcionários. Espaço físico envolvente muito agradável e sereno. 
Qualidade de pequenos-almocos e jantares ótima. cons:
pros: o espaço exterior . mas principalmente a simpatia de todo o staff que só por isso tornam a estadia bem agradável. cons: não houve nada que não gostasse
pros: o espaço exterior cons: não houve nada que não tivesse gostado
pros: limpeza cons: localização voltado a nascente
pros: o lago. A zona da piscina de areia cons: Nada a apontar
pros: ubicación comida cons: la zona exterior estaba completa totalmente era difícil conseguir sitio y no había distancia entre reposeras.

pros: O pequeno almoço tinha muita variedade e produtos de qualidade nomeadamente vários sumos naturais padaria e pastelaria variada e de qualidade assim como os lacticínios ou produtos destinados a quem não quisesse lactose. E o facto de estar disponível até às 11h é também muito positivo na minha opinião.
A qualidade da oferta dos snacks e almoços do bar da piscina também é boa assim como a localização a simpatia dos funcionários que aí nos atendem e a possibilidade de dispormos desse serviço até às 18h00.
Por último mas não menos importante toda a envolvente do hotel a possibilidade de circular pelos passadiços à volta do lago inclusive fazer exercício físico junto ao lago torna-se sem dúvida um aspecto que torna este hotel especial. cons: O menu ao jantar por comparação com o de outros hóteis da mesma categoria do Algarve causou alguma decepção. Apenas num dos dias aquele em que o tema foi o barbecue consideramos estar perfeito. Com produtos variados cuidadosamente confeccionados e de elevada qualidade.

pros: a localização e a simpatia dos funcionários  bem como a infra-estrutural no seu conjunto. cons: as Almofadas eram muito baixas e por duas não era solução) e o colchão era muito mole. 
Quanto ao deck que percorre a propriedade ela está muito mal iluminada durante a noite e o que podia ser uma mais valia  torna-se um pouquinho assustador para andar a passear
pros: Habitación comida limpieza en definitiva todo muy bien para pasar una estancia muy agradable. cons: Me pareció excesivo el precio.

pros: Fabulous and I mean fabulous breakfast - home made breads cakes speciality cheeses plant-based milks even mimosas available.  Dinners were also exceptionally delicious and my 7 year old even tried new things he wouldn't have because the food looks and tasted so wonderful. cons:

Exquisitely comfortable bed and room clean and comfortable with excellent bathroom facilities. Pool area lovely. Did not experience breakfast or any other meals as stay was very short- just passing through but would definitely stay there again cons: Nothing really although my stay was short and possibly not long enough to tell

Lovely old building and nice quiet pool area cons: Service in the restaurant in the evening was very slow but the food was excellent when it came.  They charge for bottled water in the room and although tea and coffee is provided there is no milk or creamer.
pros: Beautiful hotel in an excellent location. Their breakfast far surpassed my expectations. The staff was so friendly and knowledgeable. Wonderful stay. cons: Nothing!!
pros: Warm and welcoming staff location was great just a short stroll to bars and restaurants. Pool lovely and peaceful. Rooms very comfortable. cons: Noisy AirCon but not a huge project born!

We simply loved it. cons: Some of the rude awful guests..

pros: An exceptional hotel offering a calm serenity excellent service throughout  and situated within the beautiful historic area of Tavira. cons:

pros: Lovely hotel with excellent facilities and well located a short walk into the centre of town. Clean and comfortable rooms with a nice private balcony. The whole atmosphere of the hotel is peaceful and blends modern amenities with historic character. Lovely swimming pool and very good restaurant cons:
pros: The beauty cons: Nothing
pros: Beautiful property staff was very helpful and kind cons:

pros: Staying here was like going back in history...while still enjoying all modern amenities.  The former convent is a spectacular setting and we had a spacious room with a large comfortable bed. We very much appreciated the personal care taken by the staff   whether accompanying us to our room to explain the set-up or walking us through the breakfast buffet and making recommendations. cons: A very minor point but there were not many plugs in the room

pros: Location to all sites in Tavira. The staff could not be more helpful and professional. The convent is a beautiful building. The breakfast was varied and abundant and you could dine in the stunning courtyard .  The pool was a wonderful welcome at the end of the day before dinner. cons: Nothing I loved it
pros: The location cons:
pros: Everything is great cons: I loved everything

pros: It’s beautiful! I love that the hotel isn’t too big has the premium feeling of a boutique hotel. cons: The shower doesn’t have much pressure (but I heard that’s an issue in all of Algarve) and the AC is noisy!
pros: The courtyard is simply lovely. cons: For a 5 star hotel it was disappointing to be asked to pay for a small jug of milk so that I could enjoy a coffee (using room facilities).

pros: Location is spectacular right in heart of the old town near the castle churches to visit the bridge restaurants etc. Going back in time is wonderful too. The property is beautiful. Pool is fantastic and super chill. Breakfast is excellent and plentiful with a lot of variety of local foods. The cheeses were to die for 😋! cons: Hotel is truly wonderful but the lack of replacement of amenities in both nespresso capsules/tea and in bathroom (lotion) is disappointing and surprising. For a 5 star hotel I would expect automatic daily replenishment. Breakfast is a late start at 8am so for early risers and those looking to make the first beach ferry that leaves at 8:30am a 7am or 7:30am start would be best.

pros: Loved the old and new mixed together to create a unique property. All details were attended to: comfortable beds; plush towels and robes (and slippers!); good water pressure in the shower; strong AC in the rooms; excellent breakfast included; attentive staff and perfect location in the centre of it all. Zero complaints! 10/10 cons: Nothing at all. No improvements that we can think of!
pros: Breakfast had a wonderful selection of food. cons:

pros: The staff were very friendly and helpful. >The breakfast was amazing and the opportunity to eat outside in the courtyard was brilliant. I was amazed at how quiet the hotel was. I never heard any noise coming from any other room. I also found the perfect gift for a friend and the reception staff were fabulous at putting it all together for me. The hotel is centrally located just a stones throw away from the Castle and within walking distance to absolutely everything. cons: I had asked them to make a dinner reservation for me which unfortunately wasn't done but in the end it worked out fine. And I would have liked to get a nice massage but aalas I just didn't have time so I guess I'll have to go again and possibly for a longer period.
pros: The staff was superb very accosting. Cristiana especially was very helpful. cons:

pros: Room bed and linen excellent superb choice at breakfast.location superb pool area wonderful cons: Nothing really

Staff generally very pleasant and attentive. cons: Staffing of the bar was often sporadic and needed trip to the restaurant/reception to order food & drinks.

pros: Beautiful location with spotless rooms. Very friendly staff who go over and above to help out. Absolutely fabulous breakfast! Dinner also delicious and bar snacks good. Swimming pool not heated in May but swimmable if brave and on the hot days we were there. Quieter hotel calm and relaxing not for wild parties. Bring good grippy walking shoes—top of hill lots of slippy cobbles! Forget your heels unless using Uber/taxis everywhere (very good inexpensive service in the town). cons: Sometimes hard to get service in the bar but kind staff would rush over to help if asked.
pros: Great staff and  location. Interesting history. cons:

pros: amazing location. center of everything. beautiful hotel and setting and pool. great good. luxury but not stuffy. i extended my stay twice! cons:
