reviewText: pros: A truly unique experience! The hotel/resort is absolutely stunning by itself but also is placed in a middle of a beautiful nature reserve. On top of that the staff was extremely helpful thoughtful and kind. cons: Despite being advertised as having a heated indoor and outdoor pool the water in both pools was ice cold. They said there was a problem with the pump but we did not have the impression there were strongly committed to fix the problem since the hotel was not fully booked (and only few guests). This was really a big disappointment for us especially when we had hoped to spend some time at the pool with are child.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: It’s clear that attention has been paid to details of the design and decor. It’s beautiful. Spacious room. Excellent service. Clean. Great breakfast spread. Love that you can access the sauna steam room and areas in the spa at no additional cost. Well worth the cost. cons: The food is pricey - it’s good - but we went out 5 of 7 nights and bought groceries to keep in the room so we could bypass lunch to reduce our spend. Also wish the concierge was a little more open/informative about excursion choices. We spent 100 euro on a jeep trip that was mostly driving on a highway…slowly.

reviewText:
pros: We visited the Resort for the second time and enjoyed it even more than the first. We love the severe architecture and design and how it fits with the beautiful natural surroundings. All the staff is excellent and hospitable. We adored our morning classes and the spectacular walks to the beach before breakfast. 
This is one of the best breakfasts we ever had by the way. The food is excellent throughout. And the pool is big enough to accommodate everyone. cons: -

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Great relaxing vacation & fantastic restaurant cons: N/A

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros:  cons: the kitchen service could be a little faster

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Very relaxing location each evening an activity idea was left in your room for a walk/nearby drive. The rooms were completed with high quality finishes and very clean. The pool area was fantastic with bar service to your sun loungers. The bar at the hotel was great and they could make any drink you wanted. The breakfast was also really good. cons: The location meant you either had to eat in the on-site restaurant or drive but there were limited options nearby. The menu in the restaurant was limited and often they didn’t have everything in stock - but the food was amazing. The food was also on the expensive side compared to the rest of Portugal (e.g. €6 pp for bread). The lunch service by the pool was very slow and we often had to ask for things multiple times.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Literally wonderful hotel. It is located in a beautiful and peaceful location within a natural park. It is clear that the architects and designers wanted to respect the place starting from the shapes and colors of the structure on the outside and in the interior design. All the staff is extremely kind and professional assisting the customer from arrival to departure and throughout every day spent in the hotel. The breakfast is exceptional with a huge choice of products and a lot of variety from day to day. The Azeitona restaurant inside is perfect for gourmet dining the chef is excellent. The swimming pool is very large and allows for a nice afternoon rest if you don't want to go to the beach. Arrifana beach is few minutes away and it is very beautiful with constant ocean winds: a surfers' paradise. We stayed in a very comfortable and spacious sea view suite with attention to all the details. cons: Given the level of the hotel it could be useful to improve the spaces and the experience in the spa.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Everything was brilliant but the food and pool were exceptional cons: Nothing

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: The property is designed beautifully and tastefully. The hotel situated in a park setting allows for deep relaxation.  The pool area was very enjoyable. The staff was always gracious. I was appreciative to find a small luxury hotel in that area of Portugal. cons: The property did not have enough paved roads and proper signage.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Breakfast was great room was really spacious and perfect! The pool area is also really amazing and the interior design and decoration is simply stunning cons: Our room was only ready more than 1 hour after the check in time. They allow you to use all common areas including the pool but it’s still not a great experience. Spa experience also didn’t feel very exclusive it was crowded

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Everything was amazing cons: Some constructive feedback:
- more attention to fill in the gel and other things of the bathroom when are finished 
- to charge the water in the restaurant seems not very fair

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Hotel is new modern designed. Loved the design of hotel rooms and restaurant. It’s different from other hotels so it was very different stay for us. Room and bathroom is very spacy and quiet. Restaurant’s meals are GREAT absolutely worth the price. At the dinner I ate the best cauliflower in my life desserts and coctails were great too. Breakfast has lot of choices also very good. cons: Hotel’s location is not the best it’s in the middle of nothing. There are two roads Google maps took us on the worse one which is sandy road full of stones. Our rental car was big car with smaller car we wouldn’t be able to go on that way. By the way Google maps shows location of the hotel wrong-it shows the beach not the hotel. Hotel’s stuff told us to use the other road which was better but still at night it’s not the best way to go. If you want also to see other places in Algarve as Faro Albufeira etc. this hotel won’t be the best location to stay. Pool was little bit dirty. Hotel seems to be very nature friendly that’s why red colour by the pool (sunbeds umbrellas…) doesn’t match so well with the nature in my opinion that’s what I would change in the future:)

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Everything. Just pure perfection. The staff couldn’t do more to help you and were so good with my toddler. The breakfast and food in general was 5* - so tasty a real treat to experience. 
The hotel building itself was so stylish and a joy to stay at. cons: Only little piece of feedback would be that the pool needs a little cleaning on the bottom and sides as was quite slippy.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Perfect stay cons: nothing

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: rust cons: personeel below Standard

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Location is great lost in the middle of nowhere perfect for a getaway and to take some time off
The decor is splendid every detail considered. 
The room was spacious the bedding quite comfortable and great pillows. 
The food was great but expensive and limited offer. 

I enjoyed this place very much I would suggest to up the service level. Get guests' names in advance share hotel services (spa activities etc) beforehand get to know what would suit the guests who they are allergies or concerns. cons: The access to the hotel is terrible it is something that needs to be addressed as soon as possible.
The food was very much on the high price (bread+hummus+carrots 8euros per person). 
The staff kept going in and out of the rooms for cleaning and only at nighttime you would have quietness around the buildings not that pleasant.
The room was not entirely soundproofed and we could hear the other guests above us. Also something somehow disturbing the bathroom has a window that at the ground level exposes whoever is in this room. Noticed it the first day and then stepped out to check if indeed one could see inside and yes one does. I would advise to consider blurring this window somehow.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: amazing gym fantastic breakfast and very attentive staff. cons: all was great. only a minor suggestion for improvement - cover the pool during the night to keep a temperature a little warmer during the day.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Everything was perfect cons: Nothing

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Everything!! cons: there was nothing to dislike.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Magnificient hotel with superb staff. Everything about it is great. First off the hotel looks really good. Both the interior decoration and the exterior architecture. The weather was quite bad (very windy) but still we had an amazing time. We ate at the restaurant twice and we really enjoyed it. The bar was great too the barman was super nice. There was plenty of space and sunchairs by the pool. cons: I think there are two significant problems with the hotel. First is the access road which is in really poor shape. Unless you have a jeep your car will suffer.
The second issue and that is a bigger one is that the hotel has a lot of stairs. If you have a baby in a stroller like we did your back will suffer since you have to carry it everywhere including two flights of stairs to the room.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: The staff was amazing. Excellent service throughout our stay. Very quiet peaceful location.  Beautiful place. Breakfast was great. Everything we had for dinner was delicious. cons: Nothing

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Great location and facilities attentive team beautiful surroundings excellent breakfast cons: The access road is unpaved (unless we somehow missed the paved option) which may be challenging at times for low cars.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: This is an absolutely beautiful place with high end service. Everything is taken care of from the first minute you arrive until check-out. The room is spacious with all the amenities you'd need the Spa is cozy with a hammam 2 saunas pools and even an ice bath. Breakfast not only tasted good but also looked pretty. Overall a luxurious stay. cons: The only thing is that the restaurant on-site is expensive- the service was good and the food tasted nice but it wasn't worth the final check and from the limited menu the items we wanted were not available on that day. Everything else was great though!

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Very pleasant and relaxed atmosphere staff was very warm and friendly. Great breakfast. cons: Access to the hotel is not easy with a bumpy road.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: this is an absolutely stunning property with beautifully architecturally deigned spaces. the staff were extremely helpful I’m facilities amazing. this place has a fabulous breakfast spread. bed super comfortable. the rooms well appointed. great sofa and pool facilities. cons: Not a criticism of the property but for awareness’s because it is remote the access to get to the property is a bumpy dirt road.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Praia do Canal Nature Resort is located in a reserved area. The location is beautiful and the architecture is incredible. The service provided by the staff was unbelievable and always surprise me. Melisa and Johana at the front desk were absolutely amazing the same as Jose at the restaurant. They were always very helpful and they will go beyond their duties to help. 
Sofia the yoga instructor is absolutely fantastic very knowledgeable and engaging. Her classes were one of the highlights of my stay. They also have a Spa that you can take advantage of every day and it's complimentary all you have to do is reserve a time to go. The breakfast is incredible and is included with the room rtae and the restaurant is also very good. cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: What a wonderful place!   The staff was fantastic the room was very spacious & clean with many amenities.  The grounds are beautiful.   The massage we had at the span was the best.   We loved the Turkish steam room cold plunge sauna indoor pool.   The outdoor pool was beautiful but it was too cold & windy for us to use it.   The breakfast was fantastic. cons: The dinner was very expensive and the food portions were small
It is out in the middle of the country -- not much is near it in terms of other restaurant choices.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: We had a wonderful time during our first holiday with our baby girl of 3 months. The hotel staff were warm professional and welcoming and the setting is beautiful and serene. Breakfast was of excellent quality and the dinner at the restaurant was perfect every night. Thank you for a beautiful stay and we will be back soon🧡 cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: The gorgeous venue in the middle of nature. Pure architecture and not too many rooms. The view from the room was amazing. The cocktails from the bartender were too. cons: Although the restaurant staff was very friendly their organisation was still finding its way.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: The property and its design are stunning. we have stayed in many great hotels in many countries but Praia do Canal was one of the best. Our compliments to the architect and the interior designers.Superb. cons: Staff was amazing but in the restaurant too slow.
it was hard to get a bottle of wine. The first evening we waited 25 minutes and the second evening asked in the kindest possible way the lady showing us to our table to not forget us once we sat down and come and for someone to take our drinks order. It made no difference. I think their ‘system’ (with some allowed to take orders and some not) does not work. It’s too complicated. When we complained (which is unusual and we did so politely) the reaction we got was unpleasant. That said the staff and waiters were on general very pleasant and friendly so this was an ‘outlier’ experience! It did not take away from our overall experience and had it not been for this we would have scored a 10 out of 10!

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Great staff
Lovely rooms and views
Fantastic swimming pool cons: The acess road is very rough bumpy and full of potholes

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: great staff lovely rooms views breakfast and dinner were lovely. Raod to it is bumpy but is like all the other roads off the main path in that area of portugal so expected and should not be changed. cons: despite it being billed as an eco resort there was zero information available in the rooms as to what made it an eco resort. We did get some info from the cocktail bar man because he had the time to talk to us. Would be good if more information about the nature reserve and what the hotel is doing to manage its impact is available in short in the room somewhere to read. Even a little description of the birds we might hear and the flowers we are seeing. a missed opportunity for the guests that are really into nature. Lunch food by the hotel was disappointing given the price of it. Two salads and each had 1.5 tomato halves meaning only 3 tomatoes used in two salads. not good for the price of it.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: everything! cons: everything was perfect!!!

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Amazing in every way. The restaurant is extraodinary. cons: Nothing.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Restaurant was delish with fantastic staff.  Rooms were nice.  Amazing yoga teacher. Fantastic place to get away feel pampered and enjoy. cons: For being in a nature reserve the look of it was a bit boxy with a lot of concrete.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: A lovely hotel friendly and professional staff in all areas we had a lovely room quiet and stylish. There is a really excellent breakfast with a large menu of cooked options a fab small spa area which has max 6 people at one time so very relaxing (you need to book). Elemis products in room and spa and turn down service in the room in the evening. It was my birthday and they bought an iced bottle of cava on arrival and 2 glasses of champagne with a delicious chocolate cake on the day. We felt pampered and spoilt and didn't want to leave. A quiet and relaxing break and we will definitely return. cons: The access road is appalling an unmaintained dirt track very rough and bumpy. We tried approaching from the north (don't do it unless you have a sturdy jeep!) and really thought we wouldn't make it -  a steep dirt road very rough and full of potholes. The access from the south is better but still completely unsigned and in a dreadful condition in places. We arrived in a very negative frame of mind due to this.
The restaurant Azeitona does excellent breakfasts but we had a bad experience at dinner it was very expensive (12 euros for bread butter and a small saucer of olive oil!) and also expensive main courses considering they came with nothing else on the plate except a smear of sauce. All garnishes and side dishes have to be ordered separately but there were very limited choices and so nothing was matched to the individual dishes. There were also some issues with cookery of our mains. We were very disappointed but we raised our concerns with the waiting staff who tried hard to make amends and gave us a generous discount on the bill but we chose to eat out after the first night.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: the hotel is beautifully designed and the nature that surrounds it is spectacular. cons: the road leading up to the property is very poor.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Great service & accommodation the breakfast is extensive and made with lots of love - very enjoyable and exceptional experience can highly recommend it cons: Only minus: Bad access roads

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: An oasis tucked in nature. Beautiful surroundings peaceful and calm. The perfect place to reset and unwind. Wonderful amenities access to walks and lots of activities to pick from if you traveling with kids. We did the donkey sanctuary and  pottery workshop.  The property is beautiful. Even though it is very modern the materials they have selected are very organic and blend in with its natural surroundings. When the vegetation matures it is going to look even more stunning.  Even though the hotel is tucked away  it is easy to access  Aljezur and the nearby beaches with a car. 

Our room was spacious comfortable and we appreciated the extra little touches like the welcome champagne. We also loved the deck chairs outside. 

The spa facilities were small but good.  First time we have done the spa as a family and my son loved it 😃

Breakfasts were exceptional and we loved how flexible the staff were at accommodating our requests. Staff overall were super friendly and helpful. 

We loved our stay here. Just what  our family needed. Thank you. cons: We loved our experience. I think the spa pool is too small relative to the size of the hotel. But this is managed well through a booking system. And i think the restaurant is overpriced.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: This is special place with unusual location - and that might not be for everyone. Another thing it is probably much more advisable to travel there by summer time. We spent 3 nights and I can surely praise the staff A LOT. They did a lot of care especially for our kid whom they got involved into helping around the hotel daily rhythm and that was better than any kids club. Service is on the very high level we truly enjoyed at the restaurant and in the bar. The food was great - tasty creative modern and enough to choose from within the days we stayed. cons: This is personal but there were plenty of what we disliked.
- the road that leads to this place (last 3km) is HORRIBLE. We were with SUV during the dry weather and still bad. 
- the overall architecture looks strange and ugly. The rooms have good facilities and nice bathroom yet the entry is messy due to always not being clean (gravy road that leads to the rooms) and as you open the door you are bumping into the bed.
- Spa was useless. Few saunas (small) tiny small inner pool - kind of heated but COLD very cramped and small area overall (why? there is so much space around..)
- The outdoor pool is beautiful but not heated at all. Unsure what is the point of that beyond summer months?
- the breakfast selection was so-so. Limited choice on buffet and a la carte doesn't compensate for that.

Pool temperature is very subjective we found it fine and refreshing for November. cons: The only negative point was the access to the hotel by vehicle but it’s not the hotels fault.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: The hotel is very cleverly designed - giving a feeling of relaxed luxury. Although modern it does blend into the beautiful surroundings. We had a great walk from hotel to Praia do Canal then Arrifana for lunch and back to hotel. It was good to just leave car in the car park for two days. The staff was exceptionally pleasant helpful and professional. We spent a very relaxing time in the spa and very much enjoyed our massages. We ate well in the restaurant the chocolate dessert well worth the calories. cons: Yes the restaurant is a bit pricey - but no more than you would expect in a hotel like this. We enjoyed the food but can see that for more than a short stay you might want more choice. There is a more casual restaurant by the pool for lunch... but didn´t try it.

The spa was amazing probably the best I have been to in the area. The room was gorgeous and clean! Although children are welcome and I went without mine I probably would not take them here as it is definitely a place for some adult relaxation time. cons: Dinner I felt the food was overpriced overall… small menu and was not very impressed with some of the dishes.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Beautiful place in every detail. We felt happy and relaxed. Breakfast was amazing: the ambiance with soft music and morning light & sittings to choose between outdoor/indoor.
Staff was super welcoming and kind.

The sunsets on the patio are one of a kind.

Architecture is done in a very meticulous and elevated style. The west-facing patios geometrical lines of the buildings. Timeless interiors and gorgeous lobby.

Keep in mind that if you are staying long you might get bored with the room service menu. We found it was a great idea going out by car to the nearest city to lunch or dine there & grab some groceries from the market on some days. cons: Nothing. Wish to be back one day ❤️

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Beautiful hotel in the middle of nature amazing stuff very bide garden and pool area and best sunset from the rooms. cons: Prices in the restaurant for dinner were very expensive. Also taste wise it was not worth this pricing.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Incredible location quiet peaceful and amazing space. cons: the food in the restaurant is brilliant but after 2-3 nights it does lack a little variety

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Breakfast was great with lots to choose from. Location is perfect 13 min drive to Aljezur. A place for relaxing and enjoying the peacefulness of the nature resort. cons: Nothing.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Absolutely loved this hotel.  It is a small hotel so even in peak season (August) it was not crowded.  The rooms are very spacious.  The bathrooms are huge and beautiful.  Loved the bath products.  We loved our welcome wine and snack.  It was a nice touch after a long drive.  Food in the restaurant was good however dinner prices were high and you couldn't eat there every day otherwise it would get repetitive. Breakfast - light buffet + eggs from menu - was very good.  I would suggest adding pancake or waffles for the children.  Pool is beautiful but it was quite cold even though the weather was hot.  The area is set back from the beach but it can get windy and it was cooler than Lagos and other beach areas.  You need a car to get there and then explore the beaches and restaurants in the area.  We loved this hotel off the beaten track! cons: Road to hotel.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: the service was so special from the moment you arrive until the moment you leave. the property was gorgeous and it felt really wild peaceful and totally relaxing cons: nothing

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Our stay at the resort was amazing! From the moment you arrive the staff are accommodating and nice and greet you with warmth. The views from the pool were incredible and the food at the restaurant and pool bar were delicious —although more casual options and a larger pool/lunch menu would be great. The room was comfortable and felt luxurious. If desired they offered a turn down service nightly that was so sweet. 

The staff was cheerful and eager to give recommendations—the restaurant server Jessica suggested a sunset and dinner in town that ended up a highlight of the trip! 

The spa needs some work. Professional spa attendants and treatment specialists are definitely needed.

Overall a memorable restful and lovely time at this beautiful hotel! We will definitely be back! cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: the location is phenomenal - everything is laid out beautifully with thought for the amazing natural beauty.

the staff made the stay unforgettable. from the checkin with Joana and Sylvia to the great staff in the restaurant in particular Jessica and Agusto. cons: for a new hotel the maintenance was not great. the plaster in the hydrotherapy area in the spa is already coming off the sun umbrellas were not all working properly. not what I would expect given the great state of the rest of the hotel.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: The grounds are beautiful and the architecture of the building is exceptional. The staff are lovely and very attentive and the rooms are modern and thoroughly clean. cons: Very limited menus and food options in general. Also confirmed step free access to the room only to arrive and find this not to be the case. The general experience feels like it's not quite the finished product yet.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: + brand new modern functional and luxurious (without being overwhelming or pretentious).
+ independent large very well decorated rooms with balcony and excellent housekeeping service.
+ extremely polite helpful young and friendly staff.
+ peaceful eco-friendly and immersed within nature environment.
+ ideal for hike lovers and naturally beautiful landscapes; a couple walking kilometres from an  untouched beach.
+ fantastic breakfast with made to order menu and table service of top quality fresh products. cons: - The Hotel is located in an isolated hilltop with no indications or signs along the way.
- The access to the hotel is terrible. If you are taking a rental car opt for a AWD 4x4 robust vehicle. There is no actual paved road getting you up there. It’s more of a mixed earth rocky path with some pavement appointments.
- Food menu is short lacking options and variety for longer stays. (nonetheless everything on the menu is very good made with top produce).

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: The architecture look and feel are one of a kind! The atmosphere and the location are the best support to relax. cons: - food options and presentation can improve a lot
- housekeeping is very busy all day. they work very hard and it makes it exceptional clean but it creates a nonstop working atmosphere around the lodges
- sustainability is verya low for a nature resort: lack of vegetarian options lots of paperadministration (FE: Daily weather forecast in smartphone periods lots of poolwater disappears in the open field next to the pool tab water like at the reception in stead of all the tetra boxes at the pool/rooms... ).
This accommodation has a lot of potential one of a kind with still some space to grow and to define it's ID.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Amazing property that perfectly fits to the beautiful nature park. Great architecture and grand design. cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Praia do Canal Nature Resort is one of the nicest hotels I've stayed at. It's truly remarkable. Everything is meticulous and the property is stunning. The design is magazine worthy. Delicious food lovely staff huge pool hiking trails etc. The staff thought of everything from bringing around umbrellas on a rainy day to leaving hand-written notes with tailored activity suggestions. I have nothing but praise for this property. It will definitely become one of Portugal's most sought after resorts once it's more well-known. I hope to return someday! cons: The property doesn't have any control over this but yes the road is a challenge. Any car should be able to make the journey but it is a bit stressful (especially when renting a car). However the seclusion is also part of the appeal.

The property should consider making certain spaces adult-only specifically the spa.

reviewText: pros: it was beautiful 🤩 calm loved the architecture the colors marbled bathroom the food ( diner and breakfast) was delicious and less options than huge hotels but it was good quality …I can only encourage you to keep it small and great 👍 the main point was the staff!! really super helpful sympathic very present very polite… a side note considering their uniform that was just spot on…somehow it conveyed a feeling of proximity  openness and friendliness which to my eyes is key to have a great time! I think ties scarfs medium high-heels reception balconies show too much formality that somehow brings up some barriers between staff/customer interactions…. heads up to the staff but in particular to Joana that was the entry and departure face…she was just great/cool! I must say it was a big surprise to see a relaxed staff (didn’t look stressed in an unhealthy way) and with few formalities! keep it that way… Keep on guys! cons: perhaps try to have the staff more informed on the plates recipes !

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Praia do Canal Nature Resort has a wonderful location in a National Park not far away from the beautiful coastline. The members of the staff were amazing very friendly and helpful and interacting with them was genuine and not a typical rigid hotel experience. We really enjoyed the views over the ocean and the park the comfort of the room and the terrace. We also loved the separate design of the hotel into smaller units. Our room was always spotless and fresh. The breakfast was delicious and we really loved the bar sitting with a drink there was very relaxing. We also loved the picnic baskets that we requested there are some amazing viewpoints to visit and enjoy a picnic during sunset. cons: As this is a relatively new place we understood that it has some minor faults so these are only our own remarks. The bar next to the pool could be a great spot for lunch but it has a very limited menu and feels a little boring after a while. Also the pool is not heated at all which can be very unpleasant when strong winds blow outside. The 'heated' indoor pool was cold too the water jets were not working and the outdoor pool of the spa was even colder. I think guests would use a lot more these places as they would be very relaxing if they were more tempered. Also the spa needs some maintenance the steam room was not working nor was the shower next to it so the only way to cool down after the sauna was the bucket 'shower'. Altogether this is gonna be an amazing place and the staff does everything to make you fell great.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World

pros: Beautiful property located in a nature preserve.  
Hotel Pool and pool bar were the best of any stay 
we had in Portugal.  The staff was friendly and accommodating. cons: Not the properties fault.  I used Apple Maps which 
took me to the wrong location.  suggest using 
google maps.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Style and design of the hotel in particular the bedroom - double with balcony - most comfortable bed/bed linen and spacious well laid out bathroom. First floor outlook offered beautiful views towards the Atlantic coastline. cons: Dining options including room service were extremely limited for a hotel of this standard especially given the prices. 
In addition the dining experience ( in particular dinner) was noisy and lacked atmosphere partly as a result of targeting young families. This doesn’t make sense as the hotel is a Spa hotel and doesn’t seem to offer facilities suitable for children.  
Finding the hotel  as mentioned on previous reviews was indeed a challenge with absolutely no signage which would have really helped.

The room was very comfortable but the bathroom has a very transparent glass facing the outdoor hiking path which makes it feel a little bit uncomfortable. And the restaurant menu while very good with some things had many very 'basic' dishes for an upscale restaurant (eg sandwiches and salmon salad).

reviewText: pros: Incredible warm welcome spectacular room amazing yoga experience beautiful spa and pool area. Chance to disconnect and relax. Restaurant evening meal experience was made by Juno Sofia and Luis- thank you so much cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Its a real gem. Did not expect it when we first booked it and especially did not think it to be this pretty after we had already driven 10mins of dirt road into what seemed to be the absolut middle of nowhere. But then you are there. And its much prettier and more stunning then on their recent photos. Also: They have a very young and eager staff and just finished their soft opening and are very open for feedback and to make your stay as pleasant of possible. 
I really rarely had that many open and honest interactions with the staff at such a resort in my life. 
Very refreshing makes you feel even more comfortable if the views and lush nature around it arent already enough to please your soul. cons: As I said: They just finished their soft opening phase and still have a couple of things to figure out 
but since they are open for constructive feedback anything that is not to your liking will be fixed - and you´ll get a little extra on top. P.e.: we had a couple of minor points of critic and were immediately upgraded to one of their suites with a private roof and little pool which completely spoiled us but will get you a little idea about how commited they are. BTW - Thanks to Kristina & the crew from reception - that was a real nice treat for us!

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: If you are looking for a peaceful getaway then this is the place. We arrived here after 5 days of walking the Rota Vincentina and loved the remoteness of the resort. The staff are extremely friendly (thanks for all the tips about Portugal Nuno!) and professional and made our stay very welcoming.  There are plenty of surrounding walking trails and we did a different hike each day. The spa facilities were an amazing added touch. It would have been nice to try the second restaurant and we look forward to visiting again when the hotel is 'fully' open. An absolutely wonderful resort in the middle of the nature park far away from the hustle and bustle of the daily grind. cons: Nothing but would have been nice to have more casual dining options for lunch during our stay.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: It was a wonderful time at Praia do Canal Nature Resort! The newly opened hotel itself is located in a national park so you can slow down and recharge your batteries and enjoy the sounds of nature. The rooms are very spacious equipped with a big bathroom with a marble shower and bathtube - overall beautifully designed. There's also a spa area included with a heated indoor pool and outdoor pool overlooking the nature as well as several sauna rooms to choose from. The staff always welcomes you with a smile and makes you feel like you are the most important guest. They are very attentive starting from picking up your luggage serving you the most delicious breakfast with fresh made ingredients from the local area around. It's really lovely! We enjoyed our stay at the hotel at the fullest and can't wait to be back! cons: Nothing - we totally enjoyed our stay at the hotel!

Thank you for making us feel like princes for two nights - highly recommended !! cons:

reviewText: pros: Everything at the resort was amazing! There are so many things that ensured that we thoroughly enjoyed our time. The attentive and super helpful staff really did go above and beyond to provide us with a memorable time. We had a lovely meal at the on-site restaurant which had a good selection of vegetarian dishes. And they even surprised my husband with a piece of cake for his birthday which we both appreciated and thought was very kind. Watching the gorgeous sunset from our balcony and using the fantastic spa facilities were also highlights of our stay. We can't wait to come back! cons: Nothing...everything was perfect!

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: The staff were all excellent the meals both breakfasts and especially the fixed price Set Menus in the evening were fabulous and we just were made to feel very welcome for all of our two night stay. The newly built hotel has only been formally open since the 1st January this year so the staff welcomed our feedback on any issues we came across. lovely sea view from our first floor room. cons: A bit tricky to find as it is located on an unnamed road but with the provided directions from the hotel we found it easily enough.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: The property is well designed in a beautiful location cons: The poor service

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros:  cons: No sinage to property minor road which gave out to a dirt track this continued right through the car park and up to the front door with dust blowing everwhere. The check in process was extremely long winded the check out was not much better. On arrival we were told the dining room was full and we could not dine until 9:15 pm they suggested we go elsewhere to eat ! We explained that if we could not eat at a sensible time they should refund our payment and we would go and stay elsewhere they then accomodated our request of 7:45 pm when in the dining room it was far from being full or busy ! The food was good but not exceptional and orders were consistently presented incorrectly. All in all very disapointing especially in view of the price paid food drink and accomodation just under 600 euros per night !

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Great location and atmosphere. Very nice architecture. cons: The front desk lady at the check-in was really unfriendly and badly trained. Far from 5-star standard. 

Very noisy rooms. You hear every step from above. Not what you would expect in a retreat.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros:  cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Furniture and location cons: Mini bar was non existent and no extra touched

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: The breakfast was incredible! Location was great a car is needed.
The environment is calm and the pool area is nice and quiet. Rooms are spacious. cons: The inside pool wasn't warm. The staff told us they were trying to fix it but some friends were there 2 months before and they reported the same. Not acceptable in a place where there is not much to do. In addition when we asked for bikes they said they only had 3... and the staff told us they have more but they were for maintenance as it was low season. Very poor!

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: We liked: 
• The spaciousness of the place. 
• The decor and style in main hotel building. 
• Friendly attitudes of most staff
• They ordered us flowers 💐 when we asked. 
• Surrounding nature is beautiful and perfect if you want away from civilization.  
• Sauna high quality
• Lovely breakfasts 
• Great fireplace in the bar 🍸 👏 
• Really nice little boutique clothes shop. 
• The Nepalese house keeping team are ace. 
• Front of house staff are always ready to help. cons: • Bed was two singles put together and was OK but not 5* comfortable.  
• Award winning Spa open only 10am-7pm which meant there was little time for us to enjoy it as we were out most days. We would have appreciated an 8or9am opening. 
• Roads surrounding hotel very pot holey. 
• 11am-1pm no possiblity to get food or drink as resto closed and no place around also their second restaurant closed for low season.  Not mentioned on website.  
• Lack of vegetarian options on restaurant menu only 1! 
• Having desk at the entrance of the bathroom in the room didn't feel good for working the room design could be better.  
• 15euro for room service was prohibitive.  Drinks should be brought to room free of charge. 
• Ocean view does not mean Ocean view you can not see ocean from room you have to walk uphill 30m to see a distant ocean. 
• The Laundry is ridiculously expensive.   We paid 60e for washing 9 pieces underwear 1 socks and 1 top.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: It was a nice spot. The bathroom was designed nicely and the balcony sunsets were lovely. Not much to rave about. I would not go back. cons: Breakfast was too formal took forever all guests were annoyed it took 30mins just to get a coffee the wait staff wasn't very excited to help and it took forever for them to come to take just your coffee order. The regular americano coffee flavor was terrible. Extremely hard to get to the beaches or anywhere unless you had a great car and no one let us know any information about where to go or what to do. The staff was not the nicest. Seemed like we were bothering them. They took something from our room that was ours (and returned it) but at the same time this should not have happened.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: The property is set in an amazing location 
The architecture is unique and blends with the surrounding 
Comfy room and bed good view of the sunsets
Good breakfast cons: It is still a bit disorganized especially around meal times
You always have to wait for your tables the restaurants do not have enough seats to accomodate everyone 
Staff forgets your orders or part of it
Overall the hotel is not aligned with a 5 stars hotel expectations

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Beautiful area great sommelier in restaurant good breakfast and very kind bell person. cons: There was an issue with our reservation. For more than three weeks we tried to contact the property by email and phone. Bookings also tried with zero success. Each time we were able to communicate by phone either the reservationist (Magdama - not sure about spelling but that was the only reservationist we knew of) was in a meeting or not there. They said they would leave a message and she’d call back.  Never heard from her. 

So we decided it would be best to communicate in person. When we arrived my travel partner tried to talk to the front desk and they said she needed to talk to the reservationist the following day. The next morning she went to talk to the reservationist and again “she was in a meeting”.  She asked for the manager but they were also in a meeting. She said she would wait because we needed to talk to someone before we left.  The manager came prepared with all her emails she had sent and apologized for the issue. He said “you have my word” that he would communicate with bookings and would send an email to her with an update by the end of the day.  Now two weeks later still no email and bookings said they did not hear from them. We realize now that the manager was likely just trying to get us to leave. Very very disappointing. 

Another issue was that we arrived slightly before check in which was not a the problem.  We relaxed by the pool. However the front desk said they would come and get us when the room was ready.  An hour after official check in we went to pool bar to ask if they could call to find out about our room. The reception said they forgot about us.  It was very strange.

Lastly there is poor communication between reception and the spa.  My advice is to pre-book your treatment before arriving. The spa was wonderful.

Overall we stayed at many nice hotels in Portugal and this one was just not worth the hassle. Beware of “in a meeting” response. Not sure if it is actually true.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Nice accommodation very large pool very clean cons: The restaurant is really overpriced even the meals by the pool are very expensive. The sound isolation is not good at all. Furthermore you can only approach the hotel through a dirt road so be prepared for some adventure. Finally we had a very late flight and wanted to check out later which was not possible the receptionist didn’t even mind to check the availability.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Great location into the National Park lovely view onto Nature. Interesting design of the hotel with a very cosy bar nice and smiling hosts cons: This place is NOT environment friendly. Pure old style 5 stars where water energy towels land and so on ...are used and wasted. Unbelievable that this brand new place in the middle of a National Park was not designed as a real ecological place.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Very new and modern hotel in middle of nature.
Stylish rooms good and Tasty food!

Architecture is stunning and fits perfectly into the landscape. Nice pool area also very little little spa indoor area. cons: The road to the hotel is very pumpy - you have to be careful to not damage your car. Not suitable for sportscars like Porsche.

Stuff at the restaurants should be better trained.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World

Fantastic pool but needs warm water all the time at 27cº cons: Very bad accesses to the hotel - not at all a 5 star hotel with such a terrible road access to hotel
breakfast needs an update regarding wide selection of food displays ! To little selection to choose from and very small options from the kitchen and badly presented
Very poor food service and poor selection of food menu by the pool

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: - Rooms are big comfortable well furnished
- Staff is always making an effort to enable you the best stay possible
- Great view & quiet surroundings
- Delicious drinks
- Beautiful large Pool with a view cons: - Brutal road to the hotel
- Spa is rather small
- Breakfast gets monotonous after day four
- Heater in the bathroom is literally burning hot
- Dinner is not up to five star standards 
- Staff is still clearly in training 
- We were not informed that the hotel is still in soft opening mode

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: - The design of the hotel is incredible with comfortable/stylish rooms. 
- Nice walks available from the hotel -  we certainly recommend the walk to Praia de Vale Figueiras.
- Staff were very friendly with an incredibly hard-working front of house in the restaurant. 
- Stunning swimming pool! cons: We appreciate this is currently a soft opening - although we were not informed of this ahead of time. 

There are a few issues to be ironed out largely related to service in the restaurant: 

- We waited 20 minutes for water/menus in the restaurant. When water did arrive they served my partner before becoming distracted and leaving. 
- Bottles of water are not left on the table for guests. We received a mixture of still and sparkling water in the same glass throughout dinner service due to staff confusion.
- We were given some additional dishes during our meal including a bread basket and tapenade. Unfortunately several of these dishes didn't fit our dietary requirements. The staff were aware of our requirements prior to our arrival in the hotel and prior to dinner. This may be dangerous for guests with allergies. 
- The dishes provided to meet our dietary requirement (plant based) were pretty average. Breakfast is particularly poor with limited options if you follow a PB diet. 

It's clear that the restaurant staff are working incredibly hard but can't meet the demands of service with current levels of staffing. 

- Housekeeping issues - attended 3x on our second day to clean our room. On the first two attempts our bins were not emptied/bed not made.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Gostamos de tudo! Desde o sitio que é maravilhoso à simpatia dos funcionários principalmente da D. Natalia que foi sempre impecavel connosco. Ficamos de visitar os alojamentos da madeira do mesmo grupo para nos voltarmos a cruzar.
A funcionário Sofia tambem nos tratou super bem foram todos muito simpaticos com um atendimento que nao encontravamos há muito tempo.
A piscina é o exlibris cons: Gostamos de tudo. Tivemos pena de vir embora

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Local fantástico embora a presença de muitas crianças possa retirar um pouco da tranquilidade. Quarto muito bom. Espaços exteriores muito bonitos e bem cuidados. Lobby e bar com decoração soberba. Nível de atenção ao cliente no check-in excepcional. Jantar no restaurante Dizima foi bom (mas não excepcional) com uma incrível vista de pôr do sol. Pequeno-almoço habitual para este nível de hotel mas com staff visivelmente pouco treinado algo que a responsável presente tentou compensar de forma profissional. cons: Acesso: dada a proibição de melhorar a estrada de acesso por estar em pleno parque natural se tiver uma carro baixo (sem ser SUV ou todo o terreno) arrisca-se a danos porque o caminho é de terra e pedras muito esburacado. 
Já dentro da área do hotel o acesso do parque de estacionamento à recepção é terra e já dentro da área do hotel o acesso à piscina exterior e restaurante Dizima é parcialmente em terra.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Foi simplesmente espetacular. Desde o momento em que se chega é recebido com uma hospitalidade calorosa e atenciosa. As instalações são impecáveis com quartos espaçosos decorados com muito bom gosto e equipados com todas as comodidades necessárias para uma estadia confortável. O restaurante oferece uma experiência gastronômica de alta qualidade com pratos deliciosos e bem apresentados. Além disso a localização é perfeita. Sem dúvida é o lugar ideal para quem procura conforto elegância e um serviço excepcional. cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Conforto arquitetura todo o staff proximidade de localidades e praias cuidado e atenção com crianças cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Do ambiente incrível rodeado de natureza. Simpatia dos funcionários. Piscina do infinito. Condições do quarto (espaço limpeza impecável configuração). Pequeno pedaço de jardim privativo em frente à suite. Pequeno almoço variado e saboroso. Hotel mais "reservado" sem demasiada pressão de hóspedes. Kids friendly. cons: Acesso algo difícil com estradas de gravilha terra batida e muitos buracos.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Fantástico desayuno. Habitación amplia y limpia. Cama extra cómoda. Servicios de atención al huésped geniales. 
La comida del restaurante Zimbro muy rica. cons: El baño es muy confortable y amplio pero no tiene ventilación directa (ventana) lo que provoca tras la ducha excesiva humedad en la habitación.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Pequeno almoço top! Aula de yoga espetacular. Bicicletas sempre disponiveis. cons: Impossibilidade de desligar o tolaheiro aquecido.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Pequeno almoço excelente e respetivo staff. Piscina muito boa. Quarto espaçoso bem decorado e confortável. cons: O restaurante Zimbro junto à piscina não é confortável quando a temperatura exterior é relativamente baixa mesmo nos dias de verão. Apesar de disponibilizarem mantas não é o mais confortável. No dia em que jantámos o atendimento foi muito demorado havia funcionários que andavam perdidos sem saber onde entregar as bebidas dos clientes. E tivemos o azar de ter teias de aranha na nossa mesa. As mesas do restaurante mereciam toalhas ao jantar. Ainda assim a comida era muito boa e a esse nível não desiludiu. Contudo para os preços praticados merecia outro tipo de atendimento.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Estrutura é ótima. A comida também é muito boa. cons: O hotel disponibilizou um número de whatsapp para demandas práticas esperadas de um hotel boutique de luxo. Porém também são esperadas que o atendimento do canal de whatsapp seja célere e eficiente o que infelizmente não foi o caso. A maioria de nossas solicitações pelo whatsapp não foram atendidas somente após reclamarmos pelo telefone ou presencialmente. Se não podem manter o padrão de qualidade melhor não oferece-lo. 

Houve também um momento de pico no restaurante estavam claramente com menos funcionários do que seria o adequado fazendo com que se formassem longas filas para se sentar no pequeno almoço e mesmo sentados o serviço demorava muito tempo (demorou quase 20min para nos levarem talheres e guardanapos depois de sentados por exemplo). 

Fizemos uma reclamação e ofereceram uma garrafa de espumante e um pequeno lanche como cortesia. Foi simpático e agradecemos mas ainda preferia o serviço bem prestado.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Fomos recebidos com um carinho e atenção que em poucos lugares semelhantes se verifica. As instalações são lindas e o nosso quarto foi perfeito (mesmo com uma mudança de última hora no número de residentes). Queremos enaltecer o trabalho da Jessica da Ana Isabel e um agradecimento muito especial à Raquel por toda a disponibilidade e simpatia. Acho que toda a equipa está de parabéns! A piscina exterior é óptima e tivemos pena de não conseguir usufriur do SPA mas esperamos voltar sem dúvida!
Fizemos bastantes refeições no Hotel e podemos confirmar que desde o pequeno-almoço ao jantar o serviço funcionou sempre muito bem e a comida é maravilhosa. cons: Nada a apontar.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Hotel perfeito para quem quer descansar e usufruir das praias maravilhosas do sudoeste alentejano. O acolhimento na receção foi muito gentil. Foram me dadas todas as indicações acerca do hotel e do seu funcionamento assim como das áreas comuns. Serviço de housekeeping impecável. Todo o hotel está muito cuidado e limpo. O alojamento era fantástico com uma vista maravilhosa para o campo. Todos os pormenores foram tidos em conta e tinha no meu quarto um miminho de boas vindas. O jantar no restaurante do hotel superou as minhas expectativas. Simplesmente soberbo...a explosão de sabores a criatividade dos pratos....um cuidado digno de estrela Michelin. Serviço de jantar muito bem organizado. Fui recebida de uma forma muito simpática cordial e profissional. Serviço de jantar extremamente bem gerido.
Tenho a certeza que vou voltar. Muitos parabens a toda a equipa Praia do Canal cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Hotel com instalações muito bonitas decoração muito bonita no meio da reserva natural muito silencioso e bom para descansar. Quarto muito confortável. Pequeno-almoço muito bom. Massagem no spa muito boa. cons: Staff desorganizado no serviço às mesas no restaurante (jantar e pequeno-almoço). O pequeno almoço é variado e muito bom mas pratos quentes (ovos sandes...) por menú ao pequeno-almoço revelou a desorganização do staff. São simpáticos mas nota-se ainda falta de formação do staff em geral. Piscina do spa muito pequena para o tamanho do resort. Apanhamos tempo encoberto e frio pelo que o meu filho queria ir para a piscina do spa claro mas infelizmente as crianças só podiam entrar na zona da piscina interior das 10h às 12h. Achei que no geral não é um hotel próprio para crianças mas mais para adultos que queiram muito silêncio e sossego. Se for isso que procura então é a escolha ideal.

Limpeza cons: Não haver melhor informação dos trilhos disponíveis. 
Creio que o SPA/circuito interior poderia ter um horário mais alargado (10-19h).  
Pequeno-almoço de qualidade mas deveria ter mais variedade e artigos locais.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Todo el personal es amable encantador y súper detallista. El desayuno es una auténtica maravilla todo estaba delicioso. Y la habitación es bonita cómoda y silenciosa. El diseño del hotel y la decoración nos encantó. Además hay clases de yoga y un pequeño gimnasio para mantenerse activo y bastante propuesta de actividades para disfrutar de la zona. En resumen fantástico! cons: La única cosa que mejoraría es el café soy adicta al café de especialidad y creo que con lo rico que estaba todo el café podría ser mejor. 
El spa es un poco pequeño pero cumple su función. Y si la piscina exterior fuese climatizada sería la bomba.

reviewText: pros: A decoração de interiores e o meio envolvente onde está instalado. os funcionários são muito simpáticos e atenciosos. A comida do restaurante e o pequeno almoço muito bom. hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Serviço atencioso

Conforto das instalações cons: Água da piscina interior encontrava-se fria.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Desde a preparação da chegada até à saída foi uma experiência das melhores de sempre. O quarto é surreal e a banheira no terraço é a cereja no topo do bolo. O restaurante tem um menu muito apetitoso mas o que realmente torna este num espaço tão especial é a disposição boa energia e prontidão do staff que sempre se mostraram um passo à frente do acontecimento. Sempre dispostos a fazer mais para tornar a nossa estadia ainda mais memorável. Há muitos nomes que gostaria de mencionar mas a Rita do restaurante Azeitona fez das nossas refeições experiências de outro nível. cons: Até custa "criticar" uma estadia tão especial. Os únicos 2 pontos que foram menos positivos foram o SPA os tratamentos não foram exatamente o que procurávamos e a água da piscina estava mais fria do que era suposto. O segundo ponto foi a avaria da lareira no quarto e apesar do AC funcionar e manter o quarto quente não foi a mesma coisa. Infelizmente talvez por ser fim de semana não foi possível arranjar o problema durante a nossa estadia mas mesmo assim foram ambos assuntos compensados de outras formas.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Localização ótima o sítio é incrível em redor da natureza onde se sente muita paz e tranquilidade.
Serviço ótimo os funcionários são super simpáticos e dispostos a ajudar.
O facto de a arquitetura do hotel nos fazer sentir um pouco fora de Portugal é ótimo.
Quartos super bem decorados e espaçosos apenas um pouco chato que sugiram os quartos como tendo vista-mar e não existe absolutamente vista nenhuma dos quartos. cons: Acesso de terra batida com muitos buracos acesso muito turbulento e chato. Impensável ir com um carro mais baixinho.
Pequeno almoço ótimo mas tinha pouca variedade. (Não faziam omelete)
Spa poderia ser um pouco melhor piscina interior é muito pequena e rapidamente fica cheia. 
Ginásio poderia ter uma vista mais apetecível.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Uma pérola escondida na Costa Vicentina. Sítio perfeito para eliminar o stress acumulado.
Resort novo decorado com muito bom gosto e com excelentes condições. cons: O caminho em terra batida até ao resort.
Poucas ofertas no restaurante e bar.
Bar restaurante e actividades overprice.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: As comodidades do hotel são fantásticas. A piscina é incrível apesar da temperatura da água (demasiado fria) ser um problema. O tamanho e as comodidades no quarto excederam as expectativas. cons: Deverão ser melhorados os menus tanto no restaurante principal como na piscina.
Faltam opções doces ao pequeno almoço e a opção de queijos é parca. Em relação às refeições principais sugiro que haja opções como massas ou hambúrgueres uma vez que o menu é limitado para quem fica mais que uma noite. 
Não fomos avisadas que o quarto só tinha acesso por escadas quando demos a indicação que tínhamos um carrinho de bebé.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Instalações muito boas. Quartos espaçosos. Apesar do número elevado de quartos (56) a área do hotel é enorme pelo que não se nota o número de ocupantes
- Zona da Piscina muito tranquila.
- Excelentes trilhos para fazer caminhadas em particular até à Praia do Canal (cerca de 10km ida/volta dificuldade moderada)
- Funcionários muito prestáveis. Uma saudação especial para o funcionário Bruno pela disponibilidade simpatia e profissionalismo.
- Pequeno Almoço variado com granola caseira muito boa.
- Ginásio com boas condições. cons: Abertura em Janeiro de 2022 com alguns aspetos a melhorar.
- Acesso final ao hotel em mau estado com demasiadas irregularidades comprometendo o estado do veículo.
- Alguma desorganização do serviço em particular durante o jantar apesar do número reduzido de clientes em cada horário.
- Restaurante com preços demasiado elevados para a qualidade apresentada. Pratos apelativos na teoria mas com qualidade razoável. Couvert enjoativo e repetitivo.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: De excelente qualidade com uma decoração muito bonita. Quarto espaçoso e confortável. Cama ótima. cons: Acessos ao hotel são terríveis e se não for de SUV/Jipe pode muito bem apanhar um pequeno susto. Era forçoso que se melhorassem os acessos em terra batida até ao hotel. Não é um hotel adequado a crianças pequenas - muito parado e silencioso ótimo para descansar e relaxar mas onde o barulho das crianças nem sempre foi bem visto por parte de alguns dos restantes hóspedes. A praia do canal não é de fácil acesso via hotel o que obriga a sair (e fazer o tal percurso de terra batida) do hotel para fazer praia. As bicicletas deveriam ser de livre acesso.

Enfim NADA a apontar de negativo cons: A “estrada” de acesso ao hotel é péssima! Pavimento de terra com lombas e “ buracos”  que só um todo o terreno consegue fazer com alguma facilidade. Presumo que no Inverno com chuva este percurso deverá ser bem mais difícil ainda… só lama!! De referir que expus esta “insatisfação” a uma das responsáveis pelo hotel.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Paisagem natural muito bonita ambiente tranquilo e que apela ao descanso. Bom pequeno almoço jantar bom (embora caro). 
Cama muito confortável muito cuidado com a limpeza e staff muito prestável. cons: O acesso ao hotel envolve cerca de 1 km num caminho muito difícil. Para quem não tenha um SUV ou carro alto recomendo repensar.
O resort fica num local com “microclima” planeava passar alguns dias sem sair de lá mas acabava por ter sempre necessidade de ir até outras localidades (as vezes até bastante próximas) para fugir das nuvens.
Para já ainda não estão muito preparados para crianças pequenas (não tem kids club por exemplo nem qualquer parque infantil)

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Excelente enquadramento entre o conforto de um hotel e o meio ambiente isolado tanto nos quartos como nas áreas comuns. Boa qualidade das refeições apesar da oferta ser limitada. Staff sempre simpático e prestável apesar de alguma desorganização. cons: A organização ao pequeno-almoço precisa ser melhorada pois esperámos sempre muito tempo pelos pedidos que tinham de vir da cozinha. Claramente ainda não estão preparados para uma grande afluência. As cartas do restaurante e bar são muito curtas (1 prato de carne e 1 de peixe) e não justificam o preço sobretudo tendo em conta que as alternativas estão a 15-20 minutos de carro. O acesso à propriedade é feito por uma estrada de terra batida com vários desníveis e a entrada para aceder à estrada não tem qualquer sinalética e tem pouca visibilidade tornando a saída algo arriscada.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Este hotel é absolutamente inacreditável diria que foi um hotéis que mais me surpreendeu (e já fui a alguns). Para já as fotografias não fazem jus à beleza e requinte do espaço por isso ficamos logo surpreendidos. A decoração é maravilhosa os espaços comuns muito confortáveis e o quarto/wc gigantes e ótimos para relaxar! A zona da piscina exterior é mesmo de “revista de decoração” e o sonho de qualquer espaço. Aconselho vivamente a jantar no Azeitona é delicioso e surpreendente. Queria destacar a limpeza exímia de todos os espaços e a simpatia de todos os funcionários em especial os da recepção a Jéssica do restaurante Azeitona e o Bruno que nos ajudou com as malas. Todos com um sorriso doce e caloroso que nos fazem sentir muito acolhidos e valorizados. Sem dúvida que um bom espaço também é feito de boas equipas!!  Só quero repetir! Obrigada e continuem o excelente trabalho!! cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Muito agradavelmente surpreendido com a qualidade de serviço que nao é normal em alojamentos portugueses. cons:

Recomendo a famílias com crianças. cons: Para quem como nós não saiu e fez as refeições todas no resort faltou alguma variedade no menu do restaurante azeitona e zimbro.
