hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Un lugar rodeado de naturaleza que está diseñado con mucho estilo. las habitaciones son muy cómodas y aportan una dosis extra de confort.
El personal es un plus ayudan a sentirte como en casa y disfrutan mucho viendo que estás feliz. 
Para los amantes de la naturaleza y de la tranquilidad este es un gran lugar. cons: Por decir algo que aporte ampliaría la carta del restaurante para que los huéspedes con estadías largas tengan una variedad. El acceso al hotel es zona protegida por lo que ideal ir en coche aún así el personal te aporta taxis si lo necesitas.Por lo demás es todo un descubrimiento.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Não tenho palavras para descrever a forma como fomos recebidos e todo o cuidado que todos tiveram conosco desde o check in até ao check out!
O espaço está muito bem decorado e muito confortável. A comida é excepcional!
Muito obrigado a toda a equipa e parabéns pelo vosso empenho a nossa passagem por aí nunca será esquecida.

Grande abraço a todos e até breve! cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Peq. almoço explêndido. Espaço e cenário soberbos cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: O empreendimento fica localizado no meio da Natureza tendo uma paisagem muito bonita que pode ser desfrutada a partir do quarto/varanda.

A piscina exterior é bonita e de boas dimensões.

O quarto é amplo e sossegado.

As refeições são de qualidade embora com pouca variedade. cons: Claramente os acessos não são os melhores é um percurso de cerca 2 km em terra batida com buracos e lama quando chove (foi o caso) e inclusive o próprio estacionamento também é em terra batida e fica todo enlameado consequentemente o carro e o calçado.

O pequeno-almoço é pouco variado e exclusivamente à la carte.

Apesar da estadia já estar paga quando chegámos exigiram cartão de crédito (é um abuso). A alternativa era também surreal ter deixar uma caução em dinheiro. Num alojamento deste nível desconfiar dos clientes é um péssimo sinal.

O SPA fica aquém das expectativas nomeadamente a piscina interior que é minúscula (área) e também pouco profunda (de pé a água fica pela cintura). A zona de relaxamento também é muito pequena.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Excelente localización para relajarse con mucho silencio.
Desayuno y comidas espectaculares con un servicio de magnifico. 
instalaciones en perfecto estado y limpieza. cons: Nada malo.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: O quarto é muito confortável e virado para o pôr do sol e com uma casa de banho gigante. O espaço está todo muito bem desenhado desde as piscinas aos espaços de lazer e de comer. Comida ótima. cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Gostei de tudo um espaço excecional e cheio de detalhes e requintes com muito bom gosto. cons: O colchão da cama é muito rijo.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Tudo fantástico. Excelente arquitetura conceito e construção. Aljezur precisava. cons: Achei ridículo e parolo o tratamento por Dr. Logo comigo que sou engenheiro porque não quis estudar mais!  Também preferiria a nível de pequeno-almoço um mix de bufê com frutas e queijos por exemplo e pedidos à carta apesar da qualidade apresentada

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Bom gosto na decoração  boa qualidade dos produtos de higiene simpatia  inexcedível e profissionalismo da equipa de colaboradores.. cons: Sinalização inexistente em pontos fulcrais nos caminhos da proximidade que nos levam ao  engano para estrada de cascalho de acesso à Praia do Canal onde nao existe rede de telemovel e  não é recomendável para veiculos que nao sejam 4x4. Hotel explicou estar a aguardar autorizações autarquicas para ter placas com indicações da localização reconhecendo o transtorno que tem causado a alguns hóspedes.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Las instalaciones y la amabilidad del personal. El tamaño y confort de la habitación y las instalaciones del hotel en general. cons: El servicio en restaurante era demasiado lento. La cena poca variedad y con precios muy elevados en relación a la calidad y cantidad.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Simpatia dos funcionários. limpeza. qualidade das instalações. atenção aos pormenores. 
O silêncio da paisagem! bons trilhos para caminhar. cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Os funcionários são do mais atencioso que pode haver principalmente a Jessica tratou-nos com muita atenção e simpatia.
As instalações são excelentes e toda a envolvência do hotel.
O restaurante é fenomenal com comida muito bem confeccionada os meus parabéns.
Obrigada pelo miminho no quarto à chegada faziamos anos de casados e foi-nos oferecido uma garrafa de champanhe e um bolinho... muito obrigada pela atenção. cons: A estrada de acesso tal como já foi dito precisa de ser urgentemente melhorada.
Falta sinalética no hotel e o acesso à recepção como quem vem do parque de estacionamento com muita lama.
Spa confortável mas muito pequeno e com limpeza um pouco deficiente.
Falta mais privacidade nas janelas da casa de banho um rolo/cortina resolvia fácil.
Sugeria que repensassem o pequeno almoço e o ser servido à la Carte. Demora algum tempo e houve falhas nos pedidos. Estive mais de 20 minutos à espera que me servissem um café expresso. Na minha opinião e agora com a chegada do Verão onde irão ter mais hospedes justificava-se um sistema Buffet.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Um excelente fim de semana prolongado. Excelente atenção por parte de toda a gente de modo a tornar toda a experiência o mais agradável possível. Sempre muito prestáveis e todo o ambiente circundante proporciona uma experiência relaxante de usufruto da natureza. cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: O hotel é incrível com uma excelente localização e espaços comuns muito elegantes e confortaveis. o restaurante é muito bom apesar da carta ser sempre a mesma. o pequeno almoço é ótimo tal como as comodidades do quarto. cons: O spa é relativamente pequeno e quando tentamos fazer estava com lotação esgotada é muito confuso não tendo sido comunicado previamente a necessidade de reserva com antecedência.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Um paraíso natural acompanhado por um staff de excelência - este é um local onde podem assistir aos managers a acompanhar e apoiar todo o staff garantindo consistência e qualidade no serviço.
Num soft opening é de esperar que nem tudo funcione na perfeição no geral quase tudo foi perfeito e o que não estava de acordo com as nossas expectativas foi rapidamente resolvido pela gerente e com follow-up pelo diretor do hotel. De realçar ainda que o concierge via whatsapp funciona muito bem e é bastante eficaz.
As instalações do hotel são de um 5 estrelas com imenso conforto com muita qualidade em tudo o que servem e sempre com vontade no staff de tornar a experiência ainda melhor. Deixo ainda uma enorme satisfação pelo serviço de almoço num domingo de Páscoa no restaurante Azeitona com um menu muito português e com imensa qualidade. cons: O acesso ao hotel não é de fato o melhor e durante a primeira viagem até ao hotel ficamos na dúvida se estávamos na direção certa claro que depois de estar hospedado rapidamente estava esquecido o caminho em si mas é de fato o ponto onde há mais espaço por onde melhorar - a gestão do hotel referiu que colocarão indicações nas próximas semanas para garantir que isto não será um problema no futuro.
Numa nota mais pessoal preferimos pequenos almoço que combinem o buffet com o menu. Tudo o que é servido no menu é de enorme qualidade mas é sempre bom ter a opção de compôr com o acesso ao buffet.
Nota: nenhum destes pontos manchou esta estadia.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Espaço muito bem cuidado. Decoração com excelente bom gosto. Cama super confortável. Atenção detalhada ao cliente. Massagem assinatura muito boa. cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: De tudo. desde a localização ao projeto de arquitectura os funcionários o restaurante tudo. Estão de parabéns. cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Do Spa da simpatia da recepção com toalhas quentes e chá (faz a diferença). A qualidade de construção das instalações e o conforto dos quartos. cons: Houve uma demora no pequeno almoço mais concretamente com os cafés pedi que servissem dois cafés a 4 funcionários diferentes parece que ficámos esquecidos no fundo da sala isto porque vi que os cafés estavam a ser servidos a outros clientes . Foi a único ponto menos bom.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Gostei do Spa.
Completo e agradável.

Gostei do restaurante.
Boa cozinha. cons: Questões de segurança.
Acesso aos quartos. Tráfego de buggies. Perigoso especialmente para crianças.
Pavimento escorregadio em zonas húmidas. Chuveiros nos quartos e SPA.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Excelente hotel em plena natureza no coração da Costa Vicentina salientando-se a enorme preocupação com o ambiente evidenciada tanto no acesso como na concepção do Resort e no serviço prestado.
Não é fácil priorizar o que foi melhor. Tudo estava excelente: o acolhimento as instalações o conforto o serviço a limpeza.
Um local a revistar seguramente. cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Totalmente integrado na paisagem. Sentimo-nos livres porque o espaço não implica elevadores nem circuitos fechados. O facto de os quartos serem separados (são blocos de 2 andares) dá uma incrível sensação de privacidade. O quarto é sofisticado sem ser pedante o que nos fez sentir em casa. O detalhe de termos tudo o que precisávamos à nossa espera incluindo produtos de higiene que queríamos realmente trazer connosco. O Staff foi amoroso e disponível e ajudaram-nos a celebrar o nosso aniversário de casamento. Ao mesmo tempo tivemos espaço e tempo para tomar decisões de trabalho importantes. As refeições irrepreensíveis. E não havia TV nos espaços comuns o que é super! cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: silêncio  o lugar  a decoração e todo o pessoal que desde o primeiro minuto foram simpáticos e profissionais . bem haja a toda a equipa . parabéns . cons: nada a apontar

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Do Staff da limpeza da envolvente e da decoração. cons: O acesso ao hotel a falta de sinalização e o piso que fica com imensa lama quando chove.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: A arquitectura e decoração e o delicioso set menu do restaurante Azeitona. cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Ótimo local para descansar. Excelente pequeno almoço. Ótimas instalações. Serviço impecável. cons: Acessos em terra batida ainda não sinalizados. Waze e Google Maps nem sempre sugerem os caminhos mais adequados para viaturas normais.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: De tudo. O refúgio perfeito na zona perfeita. cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: O quarto é muito funcional tem uma decoração simples e bem pensada. Permite tanto trabalhar confortavelmente no quarto como ver um filme no sofá. A cama é extremamente confortável e à noite não se ouve absolutamente nada apenas silêncio. Também sentimos que tínhamos imensa privacidade.
A casa de banho é muito espaçosa. A varanda é deliciosa ao final do dia vê se o por do sol e tem vista para o mar.
Os funcionários são muito simpáticos e atenciosos.
Comida do pequeno almoço e do restaurante muito boa.
O spa é relativamente pequeno com um ambiente intimista.
Tencionamos voltar! cons: Gostamos de tudo.
Em jeito de dica para futuros hospedes; usem o Goggle Maps para chegar ao hotel e não se deixem assustar por estradas em terra batida tão características da Costa Vicentina.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Bom pequeno almoço staff muito simpático. Quartos excelentes cons:

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: Desde a arquitectura  e distribuição dos espacos à qualidade e bom gosto dos materiais utilizados e a sua decoração  
O serviço e a atenção dos empregados e detalhes como o pequeno almoço incluido ser à carta e não  em modo buffet. cons: Os acessos podem ser melhorados bem como a sinalização até chegar ao hotel e mesmo dentro do hotel na identificação dos diferentes espaços.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText:
pros: pequeno almoço à carta mas muito bom.
a localização é perfeita ao descanso.
staff prestável e atencioso.
poderia ter uma área de SPA maior em termos de espaço de piscina interior e espreguiçadeiras e com outra disposição viradas para o exterior e não para a parede.
piscina exterior com área e disposição fantástica. cons: somente da área do SPA espaço piscina interior.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Da localização do ambiente da decoração e conforto. cons: Da deslocação entre quarto e SPA de resto tudo maravilhoso.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: O que mais me cativou foi a simpatia e disponibilidade da equipa. De valorizar também a limpeza irrepreensível as áreas amplas espaço exterior cuidado e ambiente tranquilo para descansar em família. cons: O acesso é um pouco dificultado por um troço de caminho tortuoso em terra batida. No entanto não é um obstáculo que eu considere significativo uma vez que a distância nessas condições é curta e fomos previamente avisados dessa situação.

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Qualidade do projeto associado a uma equipa jovem e muito simpática! cons: nada

hotelName: Praia do Canal Nature Retreat- Small Luxury Hotels of the World
reviewText: pros: Excelente serviço desde o restaurante à limpeza e ao SPA. Especial agradecimento à Blanca pela forma como nos recebeu. cons: Pequeno almoço sem marcação.

pros: Everything! It was truly stunning 🤩 cons: Nothing!
pros: We had a great stay - The hotel is easy to locate. Very easy parking and staff very good. cons: Would like softer pillow

pros: Everything. This is without a doubt the best hotel we have stayed at to date. The staff and customer service is exceptional. They go above and beyond to help with whatever you need including activities day trips and workshops to keep you busy whatever the weather. 

It was our honeymoon and thankfully we booked here as although the weather was poor we were really made to feel special. Thankyou to the team 🥰 cons: Nothing!
pros: Lovely warm pool and all staff were amazing and helpful cons: Location a little out of the way and swim up pool wasn’t warm
pros: Lovely hotel. Clean. Staff helpful. cons:

pros: I loved everything about this hotel: stylish and modern throughout the hotel (including bedroom) large heated pools superb breakfast excellent restaurants and bars 10 min drive to Vilamoura marina many top notch golf courses nearby. Very friendly and helpful staff cons: nothing to improve

pros: The staff are really amazing at this hotel. They go the extra mile and are always available to help. The pool restaurants valet parking and the front desk. The room was comfortable large well-decorated and modern. I was at the end of a long hallway so it was quiet. cons: The shop closes on Sunday and that's when it should be open. I was told it was a partner business but they should make it stay open. Weekends are the busiest times and I needed to purchase a bathing suit as I'd left mine at home.
pros: Very modern and clean. cons: Nothing

pros: It’s Anantara what’s not to like? The hotel is huge especially with less guests because it’s off season. Unfortunately the golf course is on renovation so the view is not that pretty I bet it would once the grass has grown. The staffs are very polite and helpful. Cleaning was on point - they come visit during the evening too to ask if you needed fresh towels or more toiletries. Buffet breakfast was okay. Ria Restaurant serves delicious meals (try their sea bass; and the bread that comes with the king prawns are to die for!) plus the staffs are very attentive and Botanic Cocktail Bar makes amazing cocktails and very instagram worthy! Huge pools. Room with pool view is aesthetically pleasing. Comfortable beds. Lounge-sofa in the Balcony! Everything you expect for a 5 star hotel - room is provided! And last but not the least we were allowed to do a late checkout at no cost - since it’s off season. Thank you for that! cons: I asked for a double bed; they gave us two single beds.
pros:  cons: The dinner at the buffet restaurant Victoria was very average and not particularly cheap. Staff were always great though.
pros: Spacious luxurious room. Beautiful complex. Staff very accommodating. Breakfast buffet fantastic. cons: Nothing.
pros: Amazing hotel and facilities cons:
pros: Modern clean spacious resort. Staff very helpful. Excellent breakfast. Our limited understanding of Portuguese was not a problem. On site restaurants had very good food. cons: Nothing
pros: Lovely hotel staff etc brilliant rooms lovely cons:
pros: Great bed and breakfast cons: Shame the courtesy bus didn't run more often...

pros: The staff are friendly and attentive from the moment you arrive at the hotel till the moment you leave they do everything possible to make sure you have a relaxing and enjoyable stay.

The food is excellent there are a number of restaurants serving delicious creative food. The breakfast buffet is well stocked and has good variety.

The pool is a relaxing place to spend time  the DJ's are very talented and the music is not intrusive.

Rooms are spacious beds are comfortable showers are powerful we would go again. cons: I'm sure if there was anything I'd only have to ask.

pros: Great hotel lovely staff clean rooms good breakfast options and restaurant options. 5 star service. cons: The golf course is under construction do not spend the extra money for a golf suite. Would be better if the hotel had this announcement on their site before people book.

pros: Staff were amazing pool area beautiful fabulous breakfast and fantastic breakfast. cons: Food around the pool was not great for price.  Stayed in other hotels of a similar standard and had must more varied and interesting food options.  Loved the Botantic bar although whilst the bar staff were amazing they talked us into extortionately priced drinks.

pros: Excellent food in all 3 restaurants.  Loved the adults only pool - such a relaxed vibe everyone respected the peace and quiet.  Poolside staff provided great service. cons: Not sure the afternoon DJ around the Palms pool suits the type of guests (most wanting to relax and chill).  Would be worth doing a survey with guests I’m assuming most would rather just have the bar background music.
pros: Excellent pool and Spa facilities. cons: I can't recall any.

pros: Amazing adults pool

pros: Pool areas were very nice and relaxing. Food was good. The rooms were very comfortable and we loved the balcony area. cons: We weren’t told that you needed to book the shuttle to the marina so we couldn’t avail of it.

pros: Great service and very very helpful and attentive staff modern clean facilities. Great poolbar and polares cons: They were renovating the golf course which was the entire view from the pool and restaurants. We were not aware of this. Didn’t make a huge impact on our stay except for the view
pros: Everything! Literally everything. cons: I like everything about this hotel. 6th time here and just keeps improving.
pros: Spotlessly clean fabulous facilities great staff cons: N/A

pros: This resort was exceptional. Stayed here for a few nights for my honeymoon and was blown away by the resort and staff. All facilities were spotless the service by staff was some of the best I’ve ever experienced and the food was INCREDIBLE. Pools were in such good shape and well maintained. I recommend this resort to everyone! cons:

pros: Good location nice facilities cons: Some parts of facilities required renovation. Also we were surprised that the Golf field was under re construction which was not told when booking and didn’t allow us to play golf

pros: The facilities and hotel itself were lovely the breakfast included was top notch and the staff were very nice and very helpful. Sorted my girlfriend with a cake for her birthday and were overall very pleasant. cons: The value for money considering location isn’t great. €35 for two cocktails is a bit steep. The air conditioning could also do with an upgrade.
pros: The pool and the variety on Breakfast cons: I stayed for 2 nights no one clean my room. Someone forgot it.

pros: The pool area was stunning and the bed and pillows SO comfortable. cons: The changing facilities when we checked out - dark underground no air-con and no shower gel in the holders in both showers.

pros: Beautiful hotel clean with great facilities. The food was amazing and the staff was friendly and helpful. The gym is descent size with good facilities. DJ was playing chilled house music by the pool in the day. There is a chilled out room if your flight is a late one and you have to leave them room. cons: N/A

pros: Unfortunately my wife had a health setback during the holiday but the warm and kind support of the entire staff made it more tolerable. From the ladies at reception over to the staff in any of the restaurants .. all were extremely sweet and helpful. A very special thanks to Neusa from Housekeeping. We enjoyed the beautiful settings the cleanliness of the entire resort and not to forget the very nice food. cons: We made reservations for a room with golf-view. Unfortunately the golf course was being renovated and looked just like a construction site. This was not mentioned to us and if we would have known we would have changed our travel plans. But the hotel offered us a complimentary upgrade to a suite with pool view and that was very nice. In the end the construction site didn't bother us that much at all.

Although the food was excellent we found it a tad overpriced.

pros: Stay was amazing. Team is really amazing. Full support and extraordinary service level.
Location and facilities are incredible. cons: Wifi is not working properly.

pros: Beautiful hotel with large well decorated rooms.
Excellent breakfast
Very polite staff especially round the pool bar and very nice food and drinks (that you pay for) - strawberry daquiris were great! cons: The digging and total renovation works going on at the Golf Course behind the property were a bit of a eye sore. To be fair to Anantara emails were sent warning us so I expect it couldn't be helped.
Bit of a security issue when leaving luggage at reception the "left luggage" room was often left open and not very secure.
pros: Everything was amazing cons: Nothing I wouldn’t change a thing
pros: Stylish and very clean. cons:
pros: Everything was excellent cons:

pros: Underground parking equipped with charging stations for electric cars very spacious and comfortable bedroom with an amazing shower (water pressure was the best we ever experienced) nice pools with enough lounge-chairs for those who are looking for sunbathing throughout the day or for who needs some shadow. 
All staff members were very nice proactive and quick. Glad to see the hotel was not understaffed nor staff lacked training even though our booking was not for high season. Every single interaction was pleasant.
Meal portions and quality served at the pool bars were also a nice surprise. cons: Being charged for 8€ for 1l still water while dining at the Victoria restaurant (imo there’s no need to do it in such a product increase the price of a glass of wine for example - paid 9€ and 11€ for two Portuguese red). 
The bedroom TV service is very slow.
Reserve done to the “adults only” section of the hotel and then getting a room upgrade that was actually to the “non adults only” section (which was not communicated during the check-in).
The hotel events (e.g. private parties) end-up having a negative impact to the guests stay which is not a fair policy (e.g. pool areas access restricted) …
pros: Staff and ambiance cons: Too far from the marina

pros: Breakfast was excellent. 
I liked the gin bar with the live performers but missed a lot of the performance as it was over dinner time cons: Sendai restaurant closed
pros: excellent facilities away from the coastal buzz. cons: .

pros: Excellent hotel. Impeccable service - we would like to thank Denilson at reception Vinícius Carol and Patricia who always welcomed us very well at breakfast. Spacious and well decorated rooms. Complimentary mineral water and Nespresso. Beautiful pool. Close to the main and best golf courses in the region. We highly recommend it! cons:
pros: Spacious luxurious excellent pool area. cons: Rather isolated. Food/drink over priced. Shuttle service to marina not often enough.

pros: Huge room. Incredibly comfy bed (I am still dreaming about this). Beautiful pool. Wonderful buffet breakfast/ a la carte omelette station. Super friendly staff. I really cannot fault this place! cons:
pros: The hotel was great we really liked our room the staff were lovely the pool areas were fab and the food and drinks were very good. cons: There were none.

pros: The whole place was immaculate the staff were fabulous and friendly. I have only good things to say about the whole stay. cons: Nothing

Attentive staff at entrance for luggage and car service. Great pool staff. 
Room was lovely. Housekeeping very attentive. 
Lots of choice of beautiful outdoor areas cons: Pool bar is a little expensive 
Location needs a car or taxi to go down to Villamoura or QDL 
When checking in the staff were nearly over attentive. While the girl was checking us in a man was over trying to take our luggage to a room we didn’t even have yet and a second man behind reception came over and told us all the same things the lady had just told us at reception.
pros: All of it very good experience 👌 cons: It was very expensive

pros: Our second visit to Anantara Vilamoura. Clean comfortable rooms. cons: The golf course was under construction with lots of noise and dust and Sensai Restaurant was indefinitely closed.  It's a pity this was not highlighted to us before our visit.

pros: Excellent facilities. Pool was really nice all of the food we had there was good too including the breakfast. Attentive staff. Big room. cons: Nothing! pros: There is a very relaxed atmosphere as soon as you enter the hotel. Valet parking. Help with suitcases to your room. All excellent. Breakfast superb. Room very comfortable. Very large bath cons:

The food is amazing the spa is one of the best I have experienced.  Sensai is delicious for dinner . We received a complimentary upgrade which was a welcome surprise and there was even a cake in the room for my husbands birthday which was a very thoughtful touch . cons: That we didn’t stay longer
pros: It’s stunning. The staff were exceptional. cons:

pros: Absolutely amazing service and exceptional breakfast. We really enjoyed our stay! The rooms were clean and comfortable. They gave us complementary welcome snacks. The hotel itself was located closer to nature. There were beautiful surroundings. We felt a very forest like vibe everywhere. Even their room cards are made with wood. Again the breakfast was one of the best I had in my life!! cons:

pros: Great breakfast and the hotel staff was wonderful especially Roberta at the front desk! cons: The housekeeping staff did not knock on the door before opening I was still in the room twice when they came in. The first time was before the checkout deadline the second was after but I had a late checkout.
pros: Good breakfast staff was super friendly and lovely and the spa is really nice ! cons:

pros: The staff in all areas is very attentive the cleanliness is a 10 the breakfast is abundant the Spa is complete very quiet. highly recommended. we will return for sure. cons: Everything was perfect

pros: Breakfast was amazing and the staff so pleasant and helpful.
Pool was beautiful.
Room was lovely. cons: All was good
pros: was atmospheric cons: nice location a bit remote but if you have your own transport that is no problem. Neat hotel and friendly staff. room had a beautiful view.

pros: Great location nice staff and love the pool area. Second stay and would return again. cons: Had issues with the screen cast to watch movies and sink pipes seemed to be stuck but staff sorted it. Not crazy about the food options at the pool need more variety. Also very expensive for food and drinks at the pool a lot higher than typical Portuguese prices. I think it’s €4 for a soft drink can and for basic ice creams. We were surprised at the sister hotel the Tivoli they gave out free snacks and ice creams and it’s less expensive than this hotel.

pros: The room was very comfortable with beautiful view cons: One of the staff called Pedro Gomez from the guest experience apartment was really rude and he was responding really badly to out questions

pros: The spa and the gym are fantastic
The pool is very nice besides of the cool water
The restaurants are very good
The rooms are big size cons: A little bit expensive
pros: The people were very nice and friendly. Breakfast had lots of choices. It was but expensive. cons: Price

pros: We booked very last minute for a 5day babymoon and found this to be really reasonably priced compared to other options so weren’t expected the world but we were so so incredibly surprised!! It’s a fantastic hotel really great quality so great that it’s split between family friendly side and adult only side (which we were on). The room was so clean and nice and felt luxury. The pool was fantastic so clean and we loved the pool bar with excellent food it was exactly all we needed to relax on a babymoon and just loved it. The breakfast was so great one of the best hotel breakfast buffets we’ve had in a very long time and we travel a lot! Great underground safe car park with easy access up to rooms or lobby. For any golf lovers this is right on an incredible golf course and generally the hotel grounds are so well kept and lovely.
It’s about 20-25min drive from Vale do lobo and Quinta do lago and we just drove to them each night for dinner out where there’s such a huge selection. 
We really couldn’t fault the hotel generally the staff are so friendly and we had everything and more that we wanted to just chill out for 5 days. cons: Do you really need a car to make the most to access the beaches and restaurants nearby but we hired a car for our trip and it was super easy. The slightly further out from VDL/QDL location meant the price was lower and I’d take that any day of the week given Anantara’s great quality compared to some of the closer hotels. 

The hotel restaurant options were on the pricier side but it wasn’t really an issue as we just then went out to various restaurants for dinners which were nearby and fantastic.
pros: Breakfast was lovely it’s a bit far from the main marina but it’s only 5€ in an Uber cons:
pros: All the people working at this resort went above and beyond in their duties! They made our vacation exceptional! cons: N/a

pros: The hotel seems to be quite new. cons: Elevator didn’t work 2 out of 4 days of our stay. 
We asked the staff to bring our suites from the room to the car by the check out and we went to spa at that time.  When we finish and got into the car  I wanted to change clothes and  go to the trunk to take the necessary thing but the suitcases were not there. Once I didn’t want to change the clothes we will leave the hotel without our staff. 
The shower was moldy  some doors at the room closed with creaking sound. 
Live music promised every evening  happened from time to time. Food at the restaurants are overpriced as the taste is mediocre and very salty. Generally hotel is fine but minding all that the price should be lower.
pros: Staff were amazing & extremely helpful . The room was spacious and very clean ! cons: The spa pool was very cold and didn’t use
pros: Surroundings were nice. cons: Poor service - need more training

pros: The staff were brilliant My son and I really enjoyed the hospitality. Breakfast was great and all the staff went over and beyond to make our stay memorable. The reception staff were all exceptional and our favourite was Miguel. Nothing was too much for him and he always provided a service with a smile on his face.  He really made our stay worthwhile. Thank you so much Miguel! cons: The only minor thing that needs improvement was the time it took the shuttle bus to pick us up from the Old Course back to the Hotel. I really hope this can be improved and that

pros: A beautiful place to rest quiet and relaxing. cons: Caipirinha (15€) was serving with ice cubes and not with crushed ice....
In this 5 Star Hotel is not acceptable 😒
pros: Modern clean and not too busy. Staff were attentive. cons: No USB charging in reception - essential if you cannot check out of room late.
pros: Location fantastic staff excellent all round cons: As a couple the swim up albeit nice was for families I feel
pros: every thing was good and for a golfer on of my favourite destinations cons: Nothing

pros: Very beautiful hotel with a spacious room. Nice big pool enough space for everyone. Room was perfectly clean. Great food in all the restaurants. Perfect place for someone looking for peace and relaxing. cons: Can’t find anything
pros: Breakfast and the shuttle service cons: They should do tickets for the shuttle service to prevent disagreements between hotel guests

pros: This was a truly exceptional holiday. The staff are amazing. The venue is superb so chilled out
Breakfast bar to die for
Spa treatments superb cons: We had only one complaint The DJ music at the adult pool is way too loud and not appropriate we felt. The morning music is so relaxing thank you.
I think it would be great to have a water font to refill your bottle around the pool area... We drink alot of water and it was beautifully hot when we were there in August

pros: Loved our stay. We were upgraded to swim up rooms. We were only meant to stay one night and go to another hotel. But ended up checking out and checking back in because we enjoyed the first day so much. Lovely shuttle to the Marina. Will definitely be back. All the staff were great. Loved breakfast. Games room for the kids. cons: Only negative was the buffet dinner at €65pp and a party of 9 the bill was huge and the food was really disappointing we barely had one plate each so that burned on the first night. Once I got over that the stay was amazing.
pros: Pool area adult only. Great fusion restaurant with stunning views. Open room with walk-in closet. cons: Room somewhat outdated.
pros: Staff and service cons: Too noisy with children in the lobby
pros: Beautiful resort very friendly staff great activities for the kids. cons: Room services however it was fixed once notified to reception.
pros: Really clean lovely staff and the food was amazing!! Huge selection at the buffet for breakfast and all really fresh produce! cons:

pros: The resort is absolutely exceptional. I loved everything it is so beautiful and comfortable and everybody is so nice. The food is great and they have a lot of different restaurants my favourite was the asian one!
What impressed me the most was the care they put in having separate areas for adults and kids both brilliant. cons: It could be closer to the beach. But since I had a car it was absolutely no problem! I recommend praia da Falésia.

pros: Adult pool excellent comfy bed design and room AC Service reception + pool bar area + breakfast Coffee Station in room size of room amenities cleanliness of hotel and room terrace room service excellent service. cons: Not freshly squeezed natural orange juice in breakfast. 
For the price of 491€/ one night and in the area of Portugal known for it's oranges would be expected. 
Everything else in breakfast fine and nice speciality touches. To be considered to improve this point. 

Many cigarette buds outside the terrace between the plants.
pros: Food and Restaurants are fabulous. Breakfast Buffet was the highlight of our trip so much to choose from. The adult only pool is very welcome. cons: Nothing
pros: Professional staff very clean ￼ cons:
pros: Could not fault anything about this wonderful hotel cons:

pros: Very relaxing environment. Staff couldn’t do enough for the guests. cons: The ‘open plan’ style of room-very un relaxing being on show in the shower or bath! Space could’ve been used far better.

pros: Breakfast offering was very good and pool facilities excellent. The Botanic bar is a nice addition and the two male bar staff there are excellent! The boys on the front door (Concierges) are truly amazing!!
Nice to see that the pool adult areas are policed and kept free from kids. cons: Our room was not serviced until late (after 4-5pm) for 3 out of 4 days. It wasn’t consistent with sometimes items provided and sometimes not. Suggest you either take the Gnocchi of the menu or make them yourself as presently they are like rubber. The main courses in the Asian restaurant were very flavoursome but only slightly warm.

pros: Absolutely fabulous property. Great facilities. Spotlessly clean. Pool was the perfect temperature and great to have separate adult and family pools for total chill time. cons: The only thing they could do nothing about was the flies. Lots of them when eating your dinner / by the pool. The only thing that stopped me giving the hotel 10/10.
pros: Everything we have been 15 times now it’s superb and the staff are all fantastic too cons: Long walk to our room
pros: Pool and access to golf cons: Room was a little disappointing

pros: From start to finish the staff and the service and the facilities were amazing. Such a relaxing and enjoyable stay definitely luxurious and no request was ever too much cons: adults only pool - would have been nice to allow older kids to use as the space where this pool was was very nice
pros: Great pool and lovely clean hotel cons: Good choices could be better

pros: The property is stunning! Has a wide range of restaurant options super clean and the lobby has a great view of the pool area. cons: The breakfast options were limited for an Anantara property and the service could have been much better.

pros: Beautiful hotel spacious with plenty of sunbeds. Delicious food at the restaurant and shuttle buses running into Villamora. cons: Not all pools and restaurants were open at the time of year we visited.
pros: Beautiful hotel. Staff were exceptional. cons:

pros: Our room exceeded our expectations the room type we chose was a standard room but it felt like a suite. The walk in wardrobe and sofa area outside was amazing. The asian fusion restaurant is incredible. cons: There didn't seem to be enough staff members especially around the front desk and as a result of that the service levels dropped.

pros: The location 
The cleanliness 
The staff 
The breakfast cons: They advertise an adult pool but in reality there’s none screaming children everywhere…
pros: Breakfast room poolside new bar all great great cons: Cats on grounds
pros: location was perfect! the hotel was cons: the pillows were way to squishy

pros: Comfortable and clean rooms.
Staff extremely friendly.
Asian fusion restaurant is incredible as well as the new bar area which had just opened during our stay - best mojito and extensive gin library.
Views of golf course. cons: Far from the centre however shuttle and tuk tuk services available complimentary
pros: proper 5 star accommodation and service cons:
pros: everything the service was exceptional and exceeded all expectations cons: nothing

pros: Food was amazing service excellent room service fabulous. they are in the process of moving the childrens area which seems a shame personally cons: A proper bar area would be nice its a bit open in the reception area also the new gin bar would be better as a coffee place in the morning also
pros: The hotel was lovely and very pleasant. Staff and overall service was amazing all members used their initiative and were all willing to help. cons:

pros: Breakfast pool staff rooms all fantastic. Great selection at the breakfast. Pool clean and staff around the pool very friendly and helpful. Room always the same! 7th time at this hotel in the past 2 years and I cannot get enough of it. cons:
pros: excellent staff polite efficient. great location cons: they are in the process of moving the children’s area not sure if that’s the right move tbh

pros: You get what you pay for the star rating and everything to a high standard.  Loved the pool and garden a fab breakfast and great selection.  We choose this hotel because we could bring our well behaved cocker spaniel.  We had to comply to hotel regulations (quite rightly so to consider other guests).  He stayed with us on our sunbed away from other guests so thank you for being open to guests with dogs.  We enjoyed our stay and visited your great gym onsite both days.  All staff were very friendly and professional/efficient. cons: Would love to see eco friendly soap/shower gel conditioner in dispensers in all rooms (all 4 star plus hotels should be doing).
pros: Always good cons:

pros: This hotel is amazing even from the drive up. Stunning views even if you’re not a golf fan amazing pool with second to none bar service. Rooms are modern and the showers are immense. I cannot fault this place and the Anantara brand continues to impress. cons:

pros: Everything was amazing but the customer service is the best ever – it is first class! They could not do more to help us enjoy our stay and make it unforgettable. It is an extremely clean beautiful comfortable and luxurious hotel we had such a great time can't wait to visit again soon! The shuttle bus to Marina is very convenient and the drivers make the journeys enjoyable.
 A perfect and relaxing place to have a holiday! Truly recommended! cons: N/A

pros: We stayed here for nearly 2 weeks for our wedding with our friends and family. It was such a wonderful experience from start to finish we were treated like royalty by the staff who were so welcoming and pleasant. Loved the hotel atmosphere as well as the wonderful breakfasts loved the pool spa and gym! We will be definitely staying again. cons: It’s a little out of the way so having a car was perfect for us.
pros: Great Breakfast cons: Nothing
pros: Breakfast excellent cons: Took the half board package. Not good value

pros: Breakfast excellent
Roooms clean & comfortable
Pool clean and comfortable and great service
Staff - all of them - excellent polite & professional cons: We would like to have stayed longer
pros: beautiful hotel with a very calm atmosphere and amazing staff. cons: nothing.

pros: huge room extremely comfortable bed luxurious toiletries and a beautiful pool area. All the staff were friendly and helpful and we really didnt want for anything. Breakfast was a highlight for my other half who is very demanding about these things! Plenty of choice freshly cooked options and a delightful terrace to sit out on. We ate pool side a couple of lunchtimes which I really enjoyed too - extremely tasty food lots of choice and a great wine selection. We didnt eat dinner in any of the restaurants but I'm sure they are good. Love the shuttle service! The pool area is comfortable and spacious and I like the addition of regular visits from staff with water and snacks! cons: Honestly I couldnt fault it - i wish the weather was better but not sure the hotel can accommodate that kind of request!
pros: I couldn’t recommend Anantara more highly. Everything was exceptional particularly the hospitality of all of the staff. cons:

pros: The hotel is amazing. From the modern luxurious rooms to the breakfast options we were blown away. The staff were welcoming and couldn’t do enough to make our stay special. One thing I really appreciated was the availability of gluten free options for food and how knowledgeable the staff were. As a Coelaic traveller this can be tricky but here I felt at ease right away. cons: Service in the bar was quite slow on both occasions we ate there but the food was exceptional. Use of the spa facilities like the pool and sauna was free for members but had to be booked which means that a spontaneous visit isn’t possible.
pros: Everything very comfortable. room very big staff very available and kind. Pool and bar/restaurants very good. Overall amazing staying. cons: nothing

pros: Great staff extremely friendly and helpful. Fab breakfast rosé sangria by the pool was delicious cons: There was a charge for the bikes and the spa. With a luxury hotel this should be included in the price.
pros: ALL GOOD. cons:
pros: it’s beautiful great staff fab pool cons:

pros: The hotel is amasing! Everything is on veeery high level! 
One of restaurants (italian) cooked for us the best pizza and pasta in my life! 
I had never met such comfort in a hotel! cons: -
pros: Amazing service very helpful. A true 5-star experience. cons:
pros: great customer service..food gym pools all vg cons:

pros: This property was everything it advertised.

heated pools are great and very easy for the family 
rooms are nice and clean.

pros: Excellent service especially the wait staff at breakfast. cons: NA
pros: Great Location! Nice people. Great breakfast. Room was very comfortable and big. cons: Far away from the Sea. You need a car to go somewhere

pros: the staff were fantastic very friendly & helpful. the free shuttle to the marina was definite beneficial. cons: spa manager was a bit ansy.  hard to put your finger on what didn’t make it excellent or feel 5 star.  there were just lots of little things that didn’t fit the 5 star rating

pros: Our stay was fantastic the staff were friendly and welcoming. The rooms were contemporary with all the mod cons. We were met with Prosecco & chocolates in our room as it was our anniversary lovely gesture. The spa was first class. Breakfast was wonderful lots to choose from. The views of the golf course were world class. Shout out to the staff especially Paul from Germany and Carla who checked us in great representation of the hotel. cons: Our stay was fantastic however here are some of our experiences; The drive to Vilamoura is 10 to 15 minutes the driver was driving fast on two occasions I had to ask him to slow down as it was making my wife ill. There’s an engine management light on the vehicle which needs addressed. Our Prosecco glasses to the room had lipstick on them. The hotel is a large complex and requires 5-8 mins to reach reception (depending on room) The restaurants and shops were closed during our stay in December. However the staff made everything great.

pros: Beautiful hotel with wonderful staff. great room overlooking the pools and views of the golf course. Very clean bedroom and bathroom the whole hotel was immaculate. Breakfast was again good with a great selection and very attentive staff. I would highly recommend the Anantara and will definitely stay here again. cons: A disturbance during the early hours to do with very noisy guests which was dealt with by the hotel staff but this has no negative reflection on the hotel or the staff as this was totally out of their hands.
pros: The beauty and comfort cons: Air conditioning could be quieter

pros: The hotel is situated near the Victoria golf course in Vilamoura. The bedrooms are absolutely stunning we had a deluxe bedroom which was very spacious luxurious furniture fabulous bed and well equipped mini bar. breakfast at the property was amazing. Champagne breakfast was on the menu and anything that you could think of you could have. The staff were so friendly and helpful. 
The spa was lovely as was the outdoor swimming pool. 
loved that the hotel offered a free minibus shuttle down to the marina and we use this a few times . cons: nothing to list other than perhaps a little shop selling some items / snacks.
pros: Excellent breakfast. Very helpful staff. cons: Cat in the Dinng room.
pros: Beautiful hotel very well kept. Staff are so attentive. Fantastic complimentary shuttle service to Marina & back to hotel. Pool areas lovely. Amazing Spa. cons:
pros: great facilities very relaxed...nive friendly staff...massage fantastic breakfast great...cant fault it at all. cons: nothing

pros: service level is very high. with all the facilities you need welcome water boiler Nespresso conditioner body lotion slipper hard pillow pyjama ect. 
the hotel itself is at a very nice surrounding beautiful. cons:
pros: Nice hotel. Room was very nice. cons:
pros: fantastic breakfast and pool area cons:
pros: lovely lay out super pool cons: mostly the staff were good had a few hiccups
pros: Customer service. Room size. cons: Limited dinner eating options. Evening shuttle service.

pros: I loved my first stay here so much (earlier in the week) that I had to book again for my final night in Portugal. It was nice to be remembered by some of the staff they were all so lovely! Already looking forward to be back in the near future!! cons: N/A

pros: Everything! The staff were always so welcoming helpful and attentive. I forgot to bring an adapter and they were kind enough to find one for me to borrow. Food drinks pools rooms were amazing too. Highly recommend Anantara Vilamoura!! cons: N/A
pros: Staff were fantastic.  Really great breakfast.  Great selection and high quality of food.  Highly recommend. cons:
pros: breakfast upmarket dining room and the peace cons: nothing!
pros: the main pool and the views the bedrooms the breakfast and the staff 👌🏻 cons: a bit far from the beach and Vilamoura

pros: Everything about the hotel was perfect! The service from the staff was amazing and nothing was too much trouble. The rooms were super spacious and clean we loved the fact we had a walk-in wardrobe and sun loungers on our terrace. The pool area was lovely it got the sun all day and there were always plenty of loungers. The gardens and views of the golf course were stunning. The spa was definitely worth going to and so was the Sensai restaurant. The breakfast was included in the room price and there was so much choice I am gluten free and they had a whole section (with bread and muffins - as well as the cooked breakfast) which is rare when staying away. Another great touch was that there was a free shuttle bus that would take you between the hotel and Vilamoura free of charge. I would 100% recommend this hotel it really did feel 5* and we will be back! cons: It might have been nice to have some background music around the pool but honestly other than that I couldn’t fault a thing

pros: stunning hotel very quiet and the rooms are spacious and very comfortable. breakfast buffet very good and lunch at the pool bar always very good. the free shuttle into the marina was a lovely touch. cons: nothing
pros: true 5 star hotel cons: nothing. was fabulous

pros: Stunning setting and top notch overall. Own made probiotic yogurt at breakfast and great variety/quality in food confection… cons: Spa with amazing views to the golf course and sea but expected a little more in terms of Turkish bath or sauna room. Beautiful facilities that deserve a more creative spa and warmer water for the pool which is not hot therefore a rather cold tub.
pros: The property was soo beautiful it felt like I was in Dubai. cons: I didn’t like the location. it was too far from everything.

pros: Pool area was fantastic hotel very clean and obviously 5 star. Facilities gym spa etc were amazing and the area beautiful cons: I was ripped off by booking a non refundable holiday a day before holiday only for booking.com to drop price by £330 3-4 hours later
pros: Loved this hotel & will recommend to others. Beautiful decor & very clean hotel. Will return in the future cons: N/a

pros: Pool area
Great breakfast
Comfy bed and room
Good TV and movies
Shuttle to vilamoura is a great service
Food is excellent.... cons: Nothing
Return trip for us as we loved it before..

pros: Another wonderful visit to the Anantara. As always hotel rooms & staff was fantastic. cons: Only thing I can comment on slightly negatively : Decking around the swimming pool really needs some attention. 
For the standard of hotel and what you pay to stay plus for food and drink (which isn’t cheap) it should be a much better / higher standard then this.

pros: the rooms were very clean and beautiful  loads of wardrobe space.  The pool areas are beautifully maintained with towels and cushions.   Breakfast choice was amazing well presented and high quality. cons: Service in the bar was a little slow at times and no service in the adult pool.
pros: Great hotel stay there plenty of times cons: Just like the rooms like the swimming pool set up

pros: The facilities are amazing. The pools are great beautiful and together with the fact that they are heated brings the comfort at any time of the day no matter the weather. Also the comfort of the room fantastic. The pool's bar staff nice attentive and effective. The check out went well as well. Very nice breakfast. cons: The experience didn't start well with a long check-in time specially with one counter off which was just open after 20min. I'd say that three or four people I've crossed with at the front desk was not a great experience. Then the breakfast organization and the service didn't go well either. Honestly I believe the staff is not prepared for the Anantara standard. I've been in many in different places and it always exceeded any kind expectation bringing a great experience. The only thing I've got on the arriving to the hotel was tension. Not a good service at all. A final note to the maintenance of the deck around the pool and to the very warm lights on the floor around the pool (trees lightning) anyone who accidentally steps on that will get hurt.

pros: One of the best hotels I’ve stayed at. An excellent relaxing experience from start to finish of the week we stayed. We loved the room the hotel pools the adult only pool the spa facilities the hotel restaurant (we did the tasting menu with wine pairing which we found excellent) excellent breakfast with freshly prepared variety of eggs daily and the very helpful staff. The shuttle service to and from Vilamoura is efficient and a lovely touch. cons: Struggle to think of anything I disliked about this hotel. The hotel lacks atmosphere and entertainment at night but I suppose that is easily got in Vilamoura marina.
pros:  cons: the options in the Ria restaurant could be better.

pros: Service was great.
Proximity to Vilamoura/Quarteira.
Adults only pool! cons: Hotel is quite long and sprawled out - my room was at one extreme of the property

pros: we liked the rooms cons: water in the swimming pools is cold
location too far from the beach

pros: I have many food intolerances and the kitchen staff catered towards me well. Even making me a fresh special breakfast. I trusted that the food was safe to eat. The staff was also very lovely (especially at the bar) and the hotel itself was clean and beautiful. cons: there could have been more options for the buffet. But that is only a small complaint. Otherwise everything was amazing.

pros: room was spacious big bathroom and very comfortable bed and pillows. The sorroundings were wonderful. breakfast was 10/10 cons: the hallways need to be redone because when you walk there it is smelly and feels old. Also restaurants and bars in the hotel were a bit overpriced.
pros: Everything from staff to room and facilities was excellent cons: If there were more food options it would have made the stay perfect

pros: Hotel makes you feel very comfortable from the get go. As expected room is comfy breakfast is amazing pools are also great (for both children and adults) and I had the best pina colada ever (congrats to the guys doing cocktails). There are 2 electric chargers in the parking totally free. Great hotel chain overall knowing it was pricey. cons: Hotel is huge and a bit pricey but we are also in the high season. Maintenance could be better (some areas around the hotel can be improved). It has 300 rooms and it was a bit "packed". Sometimes it was difficult to find a spot by the pool. SPA is not included and needs to be paid extra (unless you use a SPA service).

pros: great facilities and pleasant helpful staff 
great decor and lots of choices of restaurants 
very clean and a beautiful setting cons:
