pros: exceptional cons: it was perfect
pros: Everything cons:
pros: Beautiful spacious room lovely adults only pool and the Emo restaurant was delicious! cons: The buffet restaurant wasn’t great but probably good for kids!
pros: everything! cons: ongoing wedding for 3 days that took over most of the pool area on the Sunday ..
pros: Excellent breakfast great sitting in the gardens . Perfect location and really good stuff cons: Nothing to worry about

pros: A very good stay and a nice hotel. Everything was spotless.
The shuttle bus service was really useful and accommodating. 
All the staff we encountered were very friendly and professional. cons: The adult's pool could be heated it was very cold.

pros: The rooms are amazing the staff is super nice the main pool and the food at the pool were good cons: The only thing I hated was the burger I ordered at room service tasted like expired meat.. I swear. Also there was an excursion when I went and they were doing speeches at the pool or something with like 50 people really weird.
pros: Staff cleanliness pool area cons: Food

pros: We got married here 5 years ago so this place holds a special place in our hearts it was so amazing to be back and go around all the areas we knew so well. The rooms are spacious and clean breakfast is amazing the staff are so attentive and friendly and the pool areas with loungers are the best we’ve seen. I know some people were saying the food and drink round the pool was expensive but we were paying similar prices on the marina and so we didn’t have any issue with that. The free shuttle you can take to the marina and call to bring you back is a brilliant addition. cons: Having been there 5 years ago (and the prices going up since then) we expected everything to be as good and even though we had a great time I’m not sure it was. They used to have a pool attendant who took you to your lounger with towels and whilst that may seem over the top it eliminated people putting towels down on loungers they didn’t use for hours. Some mornings towels were reserving loungers before 9am and then not being used until early afternoon which is ridiculous. Everyone we spoke to had the same compliant we mentioned it to the staff but it was clear when they’re busy serving drinks and food all day they can’t be expected to notice how long someone has or hasn’t been on a lounger.  A polite warning at checkin that loungers can’t be reserved all day is really all it would take to limit this happening.

pros: Beautiful location clean facilities polite friendly staff. Excellent breakfast choices.
Free shuttle service to Marina very safe way for myself & daughters to travel . cons: Unable to connect to Wi-Fi throughout stay even though informed staff not resolved.

pros: Great staff : nice and attentive as well at the reception as at restaurants as at pool
Beautiful room: big clean and with a nice ‘natural’ touch 
Nice pool: clean and ideal temperature
Good food: not a big buffet but well presented tasty different every day cons: I believe water should be included in the meal plan (or less pricey)
I’m not sure the busy season is the right time to perform loudly works in the hotel (it happened only one day but was inconvenient)

pros: Amazing hotel excellent service wonderful facilities.  Rooms are exceptional. Breakfast is outstanding. Ate at EMO restaurant - had one of the tasting menus every course was delicious. Fantastic recommendation from the Sommelier. cons: Evening meal at Victoria restaurant (buffet) was ok but v expensive for what it was. Sadly food didn't match the quality of breakfast.

pros: Great selection at breakfast and fresh quality food.
Pool area had comfortable sun beds and plenty available. Waiters around the pool were really friendly and attentive and we never waited long for a drink.
Bedrooms were large open and fresh. Had a walk in wardrobe which was a really practical touch.
Nice large lobby area with help yourself champagne and flavoured water. cons: Not much atmosphere around the pool could do with some background music.

pros: This was a superb anniversary date night. 
The room was probably the most comfortable and practical in which we have ever stayed. The flexible romantic bathroom concept works really well.
Staff were all helpful and well trained.
Pool areas were thoughtfully laid out and comfortable with really great pool towels and beds
Breakfast was well organised with huge choice of quality food.  Go early!
Location is calming overlooking the golf course but is not a sea side hotel.
Would return in a heartbeat. cons: As we were only there for one night we did not eat in the buffet and whilst we enjoyed the a la carte restaurant (the service was really first class) the food was very nice but not as memorable as one might have anticipated from a 5 Star hotel.

pros: Hotel stay pool and staff was excellent. Drinks and extras a bit pricey.
Great free shuttle service and helpful stay. Pool areas all so very good cons: Drinks and extras a bit pricey.
pros: Overall service cons:
pros: exceptional cons: quality

pros: Comfortable bed spacious and very clean room. Amazing pool and sport facilities. Spa and fitness centre are great additions. Great staff and decent breakfast! cons: Hotel restaurant Victoria for buffet is overpriced better to get the free shuttle to the marina and eat at a restaurant there.
pros: We have been before enjoyed it then. cons: distance away from the main pool and restaurant etc.
pros: Nice property beautiful view over Victoria golf course good location for golfers. cons: Far from the centre.

pros: the rooms are luxurious and comfortable 
and the sun beds also cons: air con wasn’t great in the room
pros: clean attentive and friendly staff. Very relaxing and good food. cons: I liked the property there was nothing to dislike

pros: Staff were very attentive. Rooms cleaned twice a day! Bed turned down of an evening lovely touch! Rooms were really nice and nice toiletries provided.
Spa and treatments were fabulous. nice comfy beds around the pool cons: Food was nice a little expensive

pros: The staff were so helpful and friendly. The hotel was very clean and tidy. 

Fantastic service and can’t wait to go back again. cons: There isn’t a nearby shop/ supermarket and the prices you pay for bottled water was expensive.
pros: tennis court mad hatters afternoon tea the rooms and mainlu the staff cons:
pros: the staff  the breakfast. cons: some areas were closed off due to functions at the hotel.
pros: Nice clean hotel with a beautiful location. cons:

pros: Excellent choice of food at breakfast. Good pool layout plenty of comfortable sunbeds. Very convenient and efficient free shuttle to the Vilamoura Marina - given the hotel's location this was an important service. cons: Some facilities in the room could have been better - no dressing table and chair with mirror for doing make-up no desk chair for working at the desk (only a stool) and the shaving mirror in a very inconvenient position being attached to the shelving next to the basin.

pros: Great staff and experience right from pulling up outside with Valet and check-In experience. Great attention to detail. Dinner at EMO was very good with attentive servers. Breakfast was excellent. Great choices high quality and well explained on our arrival. Pool area was busy but very nice too. Previous stay under the Tivoli brand and has only got better now as an Anantara resort. Very pleasant stay and will visit again when we next make it back to Vilamoura! Thank you to all the amazing staff throughout. cons: Nothing everything to a high standard. Although maybe a little room upgrade or some complimentary bubbles for our Honeymoon would have made it 11/10! :)
pros: Breakfast amazing ! Staff amazing ! Everything was perfect cons: Nothing. I liked everything
pros: Superb rooms staff service and pool facilities cons: The hot breakfast could be of better quality and different varieties on daily basis
pros: 5 stay. never had a bad experience cons: N/A
pros: Breakfast fantastic - Room excellent cons: Decking areas around the pools looking a little tired!
pros: Everything great as per usual especially bfast cons: Irish golfers

pros: The rooms were great - not the largest we've stayed in but great layout and so they felt spacious. Large balconies and lovely views. 

The gym was a reasonable size and did the job. We went in early May so there were always loungers and beds available however I imagine there might be more of a bun fight for loungers in the busier summer season. 

Complimentary prosecco in the lobby and shuttle to the harbour were lovely touches. cons: Reception staff lacked warmth and so the checking in and checking out processes were  oddly clinical experiences but the pool bar lobby bar and breakfast service staff were all very accomodating and friendly. 

I was disappointed that despite mentioning it a few times the hotel did nothing to acknowledge my dad's 70th birthday. This was a first for me with any hotel I've stayed in and I've stayed in many. Usually a complimentary bottle or cake/dessert are left in the room. One breakfast staff was kind enough to wish him a happy birthday after I put a happy birthday banner on the breakfast table. Overall a decent hotel but perhaps lacking that human touch in key areas.

pros: Most of the staff are fantastic and so friendly. Always attentive and with a smile. The pool was beautiful always clean. The breakfast was vast and always exceptional. The room was spacey the bed was the most comfortable we've ever had. cons: The restaurants were limited as were the menus. The food was very average for the price. The sunbeds needed a proper clean. There were building works when we arrived that we weren't notified about this lasted for a couple of days. Then there was a wedding on the last few days of our stay which we weren't notified of and kept us awake into the early hours. This ruined our last couple of days as we were exhausted.
pros: clean and modern good quality sun loungers cons: not having full use of the facilities as there was a 4 day wedding during our stay which we wasn’t told about when we booked

pros: There is a lovely relaxing atmosphere the pool area is stunning and breakfast was gorgeous. Staff are very attentive and the rooms were lovely. Second time staying here in a year and will be back again. cons: N/A

pros: Beautiful surraundings and views of the golf course. Comfort room.Nice that bathroom was quite big and separeted.
Emo restoran. Delicious and best  food we got at Vilamoura.Quite pricey but it's  expected. cons:

pros: Breakfast was excellent staff were extremely helpful and polite.
Room service by the cleaners was excellent loved the turn down of the bed each night.
Reception staff were also very helpful
Also thought the shuttle to the mariner was excellent cons: Room was lovely except we thought we would of had a better view like the pool or garden but instead it was a car park.
pros: Hotel is great and staff are some of the best I have seen. cons: Nothing to complain about.
pros: The ambiance cons:
pros: luxurious surroundings cons: expensive

pros: I have to say that the SPA treatments we did were amazing! the staff was so kind and friendly. It was a pleasure to go there. Very well spent money. Also have to praise staff from the Palms and a very high praise for the breakfast staff. We met Jose and Luis which I believe could be supervisor/manager and other staff members that I'm afraid I don't remember the name. Jose made sure we tried detox juices brought us whatever coffee we wanted with pastries to try. It was refreshing watching all of them work and how they were smiling happy  accommodating everyone's request. A very well done to them! cons: In general the thing I really was a bit sad about is that the hotel is not adults only. The amount of screaming and running around was bit too much for me as I went for a relaxing SPA break. Sometimes I wasn't relaxed at all. Another thing I have to mention which was very disappointing was our dinner at EMO. Service did not match my expectations it was very poor. Me and my daughter ordered drinks as appetizers and after that no one came to the table to suggest wine or ask if we wanted anything else to drink. Considering that you have a sommelier it was disappointing. When I asked if I could have wine I was answered abruptly yes of course. I also asked why wasn't the couvert plates removed as there wasn't anything else to eat and the staff said that unless I ask it stays until the end of the meal. Why would I have a dirty plate on my table if I'm not eating from it... I was offered a meat sushi to try which was very good but the girl never asked if I liked it! when I said to her it was very tasty she replied good! On the plus side they were kind to offer glass of wine as this was my daughters birthday dinner. There were times there was no staff in sight Overall it took us 2h to eat we were cold and didn't want to be there anymore. Not good value for money at all.

pros: The breakfast buffet was great and varied so were most of the evening buffet meals though the evening buffet is very expensive. Staff were all very friendly and attentive though we did get cleaning staff knocking on our day around 9pm for 'turn down' which we weren't used to. The kids pool area was great (adult pool was closed when we went) and the cocktail bar fantastic with lovely staff. All in all a great experience and we would definitely go back ! cons: The evening buffet was quite expensive.

pros:  cons: Late check in. Adult only pool was closed. Difficult to find available sunbeds. We got a room at the corner of the hotel with poor views. We stayed a first time in this hotel over summer 3 years ago. At that time we had a better experience.

pros: Excellent value for money. Clean smart rooms with a very comfortable bed. Well maintained grounds. Great Spa facility lovely pools and right on the golf course. cons: Corridors to rooms felt a little tired and had no pictures or decor. You need to take a taxi or the shuttle bus to restaurants and bars outside the hotel.
pros: Lovely hotel exceptional staff close to Vilamoura harbour with free taxi shuttle from the hotel. Great hotel would definitely stay here again cons:
pros: Nice clean rooms nice pool area cons: Food and drink was overly expensive some staff wasn’t helpful enough or knowledgeable enough
pros: .Staff v helpful...v quiet peaceful. cons: Nothing
pros: Breakfast was lovely. Location was perfect. Spa prices could have been more affordable. Massages and yoga classes were priced far too highly! cons:

pros: The scenery and pool area were fab. Beautiful hotel and spotlessly clean. 
Large variety of food for breakfast (if not coeliac)
Very kind staff especially a guy called Fernando who went above and beyond to make sure I did get GF bread! cons: Found it hard to get GF toast for breakfast was hit or miss depending who you met.
Buffet dinner in the evening was extremely over priced!
pros: All of really......staff were excellent much better than anywhere I've stayed in Spain. cons: The weather.....!!!!!

pros: Looked modern and service is impeccable 
upgraded to a pool view room and allowed late check out and assistance with luggage appreciated. very good restaurant suggestion. 
bathrobes and slippers 5* quality and complimentary water.
service in lobby/bar very good cons: carpet in lobby looked a bit old
no snacks in room like some biscuits
breakfast was good but not brilliant

pros: beautiful grounds great selection at breakfast loads of parking nice gym. Paulo at the breakfast was so friendly. Room was quiet spacious and lots of storage. Bikes available which would be great option for summer. cons: The shuttle was not very efficient. One night we waited for quiet some time in which three vans came and left. Housekeeping would come at inconvenient times and were not efficient. Toiletries only got replaces once in five days. Turn down service at 10pm.

pros: Breakfast options were good i am Coeliac and the range on offer for me could be improved but that seemed to be throughout Portugal and not just the hotel. Room was so impressive huge space great balcony overlooking Victoria golf course and a fantastic bath and shower. The pool was lovely to cold for me to go in but lovely views and a great bar to support the pool. Free drop off service into Vilamoura from 9am to 11.30pm which was great. cons: Nothing

pros: very friendly hotel and staff cons: very limited food options for dinner. The room service menus was very good but could not understand why they could not serve the same menu in the Bar/restaurant area. we were there for 5 nights and did not want to eat in our room every night and the only other  option was a snack bar menu or A Fine dining menu in the restaurant upstairs which we thought was also a bit limited. we did travel at the end of of March however maybe there’s more choices in the summer months. Breakfast was fabulous!

pros: Friendly service specially the breakfast staff to be named Ms. Marta and Mr. José.
Room was specious Housekeeping staff did well pool facilities were excellent.
The hotel is recommended. cons:

pros: A beautiful hotel in a stunning location. I had a truly relaxing massage and facial with Celia at The Spa. I highly recommend the spa. The treatment rooms were luxuriously appointed with their own bathrooms tranquil music and nice views. 
Food at the hotel was excellent and we enjoyed the tasting menu at Emo restaurant.
The staff throughout the hotel were polite and helpful and our room was kept spotless.
We made use of the complimentary shuttle bus which was available on request. We ate at the marina most evenings and returned on the shuttle service. cons: The location was quite a walk from town but it was nice to be in such a tranquil location.
pros: Fantastic meals breakfast and dinner were an everyday treat! Furthermore we were hosted by such polite and very friendly and helpful staff cons: Not much to do at the location to be honest
pros: Staff cleanliness facilities on doorstep to the Victoria golf course free shuttle to the Marina cons: Very little atmosphere due to lowish season.

pros: great breakfast buffet fresh and delicious food
heated pool now is great
room well kept clean
it's the 4th time I have stayed at this hotel cons:

pros: The attention to detail
The hospitality
The hotel as a whole was one of the best ive stayed in the world cons: Not a thing well there was a slight suwer smell but that was probably the pool waters

pros: Staff were very attentive friendly and really looked after us during our stay.
Spa treatment was a highlight. The breakfast and dinners exceeded expectations. cons: Nothing. Would have preferred closer location to the harbour as in within walking distance but not a major issue as there is a shuttle service.
pros: The architecture of the building is very unique and well designed. The staff was very professional and friendly. cons: Nothing.

pros: This was beautiful hotel we stayed in November and      the weather was amazing. 
Breakfast out on terrace was delicious plenty to chose from. 
Nothing in walking distance but they do have a free shuttle back & forth to vilamoura. 
View over golf club was beautiful 
Very relaxing stay cons:
pros: great premises and extremely kind staff cons:
pros: Relaxing atmosphere. breakfast was exceptional cons: the gym wasn’t open before 10 am

pros: excellent room well equipped and laid out. Breakfast was amazing so much choice. facilities at the hotel excellent too. cons: our room allocation was disappointing as we had no view and there were workmen working outside
pros: Spacious clean and calm cons: Very quiet and lacking atmosphere in parts. Room service food was very average and expensive. Not in walking distance to any restaurants or shops

pros: Privacy 
Spacious room 
Good staff cons: Gym is very dated. Needs a lot of work 
Also not accept that the pool and sauna must be paid for to use.

pros: Rooms are very comfortable and clean and the pool area is nice. The food is good with breakfast being the highlight. cons: The golf course (which is being re-done) is basically the view of the whole hotel and pool area. I knew the course was being developed but didn’t realise it’s about 50m from the pool and your entire view - it will be nice when it’s done. There was also a huge conference when we were there (weren’t made aware at check in just received a note under our door) and you could definitely tell all staff were catering to them over other guests for example it didn’t feel like the pool was even going to open/be serviced one of the days. We ordered room service and it felt like an inconvenience for the woman who delivered it. Definitely not 5* service or hotel.
pros: Comfy.Neds and a good location cons: Rude Staff.closed.facilities due to 'private events'. Decor dated

pros: the facilities were really nice. Good pool good vibe overall in the hotel. Everything was nice and clean and the cleaning staff makes sure your room stays top notch and clean as well. cons: this is already quite an upper level hotel financially what is annoying that becomes visible after 2-3 days is that they will 1. Charge you for almost everything extra (spa is not included) 2. Their pricess are ridiculously high (17.50 EUR for 1 badly made irish coffee 6 Eur for a glass of water 5 eur for 1 cola etc.) 3. They automatically assume you will tip on EVERY EXPENSE that you make if you don't say anything about that before checking out you'll easily spend 100-150 on 'hidden tips'. 4. They will literally to the annoying level start to ask if you want anything to drink and even if you say no they persist with 'are you sure'.

pros: - Easy to reach from Faro airport only 30min by car
- Spacious room: enough storage separate WC
- Friendly staff 
- Not overcrowded cons: - Didn’t get the double bed we asked for: co-sleeping with a baby in a single bed was very uncomfortable. Given we booked as a family and asked in advance it was very disappointing and made us tired wanting to go home earlier 
- Called reception multiple times and no one ever picked up
pros: Excellent staff. Great choice of restaurants. cons:

pros: Super property excellent bfast very good house keeping staff. cons: Some staff have been rude with a lot of sarcasm. One staff particularly was very rude at bfast. Need to be taught some etiquette.

pros: Beautiful resort.  Lobby is stunning on entering. New receptionist at the desk was very lovely to deal with when checking out. 
Breakfast spread was outstanding. One of the best i have ever seen. 
Had a shuttle service to marina. cons: Not very catered for kids. Almost like they are banished to one side of the hotel with a pool under the bridge. The adults pool seemed much more suited. 
Cleaning of the room for replenishment of towels was 6pm every day. No view. Bottom floor looking out at a piece of grass and wall. 
Toilet roll holder broke chargers broke. Chips of wood taken off the coffee tables. Not 5 star in rooms. 
The staff in the breakfast - one man forgot my coffee one morning and a lady another. 
Very expensive at the pool bar. And with the hotel so far away. Had no choice but to get something to last until the evening with added charges with no option for gratuity. Surely they pay their staff.

pros: Nothing. We complained about our stay due to numerous issues. As a result we received a full refund as the stay was so awful. Incredibly misleading photos rude staff cockroach problem and card cloning with fraud to name a few issues!! cons: See above^

pros: Bar near the parking lot 
Swimming pool cons: Service 
1h waiting for the bags in the room
40min calling front desk with no answer
Hotel need remodeling
pros: Service was good cons: The food by the pool restaurants needs improvement

pros: Dinner breakfast bar excellent... But need more restaurant choices on site... Pool area fab...DJ in the afternoon too loud... Morning music way more appreciated. cons: Noise from the golf club site...
Not enough water in the room...

pros: the breakfast was lovely so much selection. the pool area is also really nice. the room was to a good standard with plenty of space. the staff were all very nice and helpful cons: the hotel itself is a little dated it definitely needs a touch up. The carpets and hallways were run down and need replacing. the entrance to the hotel is also abit of a mess definitely not 5*.

pros: the breakfast was ok underground parking without a additional charge cons: An old-style hotel during our 4-day stay a conference was organized in the hotel = a lot of people and on Sunday the wedding guests at the swimming pool were so loud and drunk it was impossible to talk calmly during lunch in the restaurant next to the swimming pool. The smell of cleaning products after cleaning the room is very strong and sometimes causes a headache. Manual old air conditioning that does not cool well.

pros: Good size room with comfy beds.
Good gym.
Breakfast staff very friendly and a great selection of food.
Front of house staff at check in were very friendly and this was an easy process. cons: It was fine but certainly not a 5 star resort.
For the room cleaning it just seemed like a very quick once over and sometimes towels and amenities like shower gel (empty) were not replaced. One time we were still in the room in the morning when the cleaner arrived and asked them to come back later (left shortly after) and by 5pm it had still not been cleaned.
Asked for the broken hairdryer to be replaced but it never was.
Pool staff were not over friendly and sometimes it was a very long wait for drinks to arrive (15-20 mins - it was busy but not excessively so).
More guests than pool loungers available.
Hotel layout was confusing and easy to get lost.
Quite expensive to stay here and then had to pay €25 if you wanted to use the indoor pool/sauna - seems excessive.
If this was advertised as a 3/4 star resort then I probably wouldnt have written this much but little things you would expect from a 5 star resort were missing.

pros:  cons: Our 1 night stay started with charging us for the night which we already paid via Booking. Then we’ve received a room with a strong smoking smell. Eventually they’ve moved us to a dirty room and we had to asked a few times to clean it properly. 
In the morning there was NO hot water for shower. When we called them they said that there is an issue in the hotel and it should be fixed within an hour.
Not just this terrible service but also there was a wedding at the hotel during our stay with loud music until the night and the hotel didn’t even mention this anywhere.
The hotel and restaurants are overpriced e.g. we had to pay for a bottle of water - 8€.
Stay somewhere else.

pros: Staff were excellent. cons: Only 2 restaurants and very limited menus. Also very expensive for the quality. Spa massage was good but had to listen to cangoing and building works for the whole duration of my massage and still charge £120. Spa pool also very very cold. We left 
Pool was lovely till the last day when a very large wedding party arrived and took over most of the beautiful pool. Had the listen to lots of swearing and people shouting and whistling to each other. Not relaxing.

pros: Room was very clean pool was very nice and breakfast was very good. cons: Having to pay extra for the indoor pool or to have a sauna is terrible. View of a building site rather than a golf course. Overall an old / dated 5 star hotel past its best and pretty much in the middle of nowhere.

pros: Pool area was fantastic. Kids Club was fabulous. Main lounge bar was really lovely. The bar staff staff at breakfast and the staff working around the pool were all absolutely fantastic. cons: With a small baby in a pram there was a lot of up and down in lifts to get to where we needed to go throughout the day. 
There were a lot of renovation works going on that we were not made aware of prior to our visit. 
There was a distinct lack of communication from the reception team and I found the reception team unwelcoming I’m not I have come to expect from staying in a luxury. Kids Club wasn’t explained to us and we weren’t even told where it was located. We had a pool access room which we had paid an extra thousand pounds for an access to. It was not explained to us. 
My biggest issue and unfortunately the reason why we will be cancelling our summer booking was that our rooms were riddled with cockroaches. I did report the issue to reception after the first day of this happening and we were promised a deep clean which one of our rooms was but the other wasn’t. I also reported a cockroach in the corridor leading to one of the restaurants and the same cockroach was under the bench in the same place for at least four days. While I understand that in hot countries you have to expect insects I have never stayed in a five star establishment where I have seen any!

pros: Location cons: Poorly maintained 
Mediocre food at Ría restaurant and lobby

pros:  cons: Spa wasn’t opened during stay until last day food isn’t great room had wind noise from doors pool view? Well we viewed a dirty pool that was closed none of this info was not shared to us at all prior or during stay sent for laundry and they sent it back shrinking a jumper that costed £600. Took no responsibility. Wouldn’t visit again. Carpets all stained with mould in bedroom.

pros:  cons: Spa closed for renovation and not informed. Reported air con not working in room nothing done so slept most of the night with door open until cold then had to get up in the middle of the night to close !

pros: Return trip some facilities closed golf course closedgreat breakfast pool area very nice cons: Had a lot of noise one night 2 30 am reported to reception by phone went on for a hour no obvious  action takenvery poor  reported on checkout no reactionwere unaware of same ??

pros: It's a nice hotel with great staff. The rooms are spacious and have a good design. The staff made the stay for me without them it would have been poor. Edgar in the gin bar was great along with all the other staff there. cons: I asked for a double room during my stay but was given a twin room with beds pushed together. I asked for a double but there was nothing available.
The location of the hotel is quite remote with no other bars or restaurants close by everything is a drive away.
I didn't realise that half the hotel was closed during my stay I probably should have read right to the bottom of the booking page.
The gym was quite poor for a 5 star hotel including no spin bike. It only had a few pieces of equipment in not great.
One of the pools was closed and the sauna and steam room were closed not great again. This meant a shuttle ride to a sister hotel 20 minutes away to use the sauna/spa facilities.
There was only one restaurant and one bar option in the evening and because there were no other local bars/restaurants there was no other option. I also found the prices to be highly inflated so avoided eating and drinking in the hotel as much as possible.
I paid 8 euros for a cold coffee by the pool and 4.50 euros for a small bottle of water! This was way too much so I avoided eating and drinking there. I would recommend eating and drinking out as it was at least half the price elsewhere for the same quality if not better.
The lobby bar could be improved by some music or atmosphere it was quite devoid of any real vibe. 
Overall it was an adequate experience as the rate was reduced. As a solo guest it was a tough stay with very little to do. Luckily I had a car so I left the hotel most days. This defeats the object of having a nice hotel to stay in! I would not visit again just due to the negative points outweighing the positive during my stay.
pros:  cons: The staff

pros: We have stayed is a few Anantara hotels and were looking forward to our stay but we were disappointed at the sterility of the environment.   However the staff were friendly and wanted to please.  Breakfast was very good and of high quality

Spar was nice but chilly for me. cons: We had to change rooms as the bed looked very old and tired and VERY slept in although it was clean.

Also most of the facilities were closed.  It was off-season but  had we known the hotel was operating on a skeletal level we would have considered an alternative hotel

pros: Great location facilities and restaurant options! Pools were great. cons: The check-in took more time than expected (we arrived early waited for an hour and at 3pm the room was still not ready).
The bathroom sink drain got stuck closed after the cleaning folks serviced our room on the second day (they left no note or anything). It was not fixed until we were gone even after we called the reception. Thankfully we were just there for 2 nights.
pros: Old cons: Personal

pros: Wallet parking stuff cons: Hotel needs total renovation. 
Water was coming to our room when our neighbours took shower. A/c was not effective. Really hot in the room even at night. 
Two separate beds staying together at double room. 
Smells bad at corridors and elevators.
Two bottles of water at minibar were opened!
pros: Nice looking property cons: The food was terrible we ended up going out everyday for for something to eat and not eating breakfast
pros: Beautiful property. Very clean with a good breakfast. cons: Location was ~10-15 minutes by car to the main town of vilamoura

pros: The property itself is very nice good breakfast amazing pool and spa and a lovely bar cons: Our first room did not have a working AC we switched rooms and the other room’s sink would not drain and the AC still was not good. Tried to contact reception and called over 10 times and no one picked up. Had to just suck it up
pros: The location of the hotel the faculties and staff were very good cons: The food for years has not been great. It’s not fresh.

pros: clean good food. cons: lots have changed since our last visit in September The Hotel used to run a shuttle Bus as and when required to the Beach and Marina this has now been reduced to a few times a day. Should you want to go between 2pm and 6pm you have to pay for your own transport. 
There was only 1 pool open as the other was having work done ( late May).

pros: staff was friendly and service was ok. cons: very expensive wasnt worth the money pools are freezing supposed to be heated menus for food very limited and overpriced drinks very expensive. five star prices 4 star service. this is a 4 star hotel.
pros: The rooms are nice staff are friendly. complimentary shuttle. cons: The prices for food and drink in the restaurants are expensive. Lots of noise in corridors.

pros: Spacious room breakfast and spa facilities great treatment pool and it is not an indoor swimming pool. cons: Sewer smell in the room expensive for its location no indoor swimming pool far from everything and no local facilities even for a bottle of water. We have to travel in to Vilamoura for food

pros: average breakfast cons: The hotel is not maintained at all as my pictures unfortunately can show. 
How come it’s possible that a property in which the room doors are eaten by mouse is evaluated with 5 stars??? Also my room was full of small mosquitoes which I found immediately weird.
Every single thing is broken and it’s clear the lack of direction in this place. 
I wrote in their complaint Book because this is above all a public health issue and I was shocked by seeing people with newborn babies making their check in…
pros: Good breakfast nice room and products cons: Very busy pool area with lots of flies

pros: Front of house staff very helpful. cons: Some changes to restaurants from last year which were not as good.
Booked airport pickup did not turn up.
A major conference was booked during our stay so one pool was closed for a day.
Poor communication from senior management.
pros: very comfy beds and large room cons: looked like it needed a bit more sprucing up to make it more modern dirty tiles around pool etc

pros: Comfy bed free shuttle to the marina. Pool beds all nice and good aesthetics all round cons: Having to pay 15 euros each for an hour to use spa is a bit tight and especially it only has a steam room and sauna and cold pool. Hot beds weren’t even on I think should be included. Pool bar menu abit small but food really nice

pros: We loved the breakfast and dinner options. The environment was lovely and it seems like a fantastic place to play golf. cons: Because we were there at peak season the resort was very busy and at times overcrowded. We would retreat back to our own rooms. The on-site store is very overpriced and does not take card.

pros: Staff were very friendly and helpful throughout the hotel.  Rooms are very nice and showers good.  This hotel is more suitable for families and doesn't cater much for adult couples. cons: Breakfast was too busy and no adult only area to sit so very noisy.   Adult pool area sunbeds not luxurious like the family pool or enough of them. This area feels like an after thought.
We have stayed in many Anantara hotels before and this one does not look or feel the same.
Spa service was very poor and not good value.

pros: Breakfast spread is good although quite standard so some opportunities to make that bit extra special for a five star experience. Golf course next door is great! cons: Service at this hotel was not that of a 5 star by some margin. There was no personal element to it at all. For example when we arrived we were rushed through check in no welcome drink was offered and despite travelling with a 3 month old baby they were not able to offer our room or any baby facilities earlier than 2pm (we arrived at 10). There was a constant battle for sun beds round the pool so when we arrived we couldn’t even get a seat at the pool whilst we waited for our room. The food in the buffet restaurant for dinner was average and for 50 euro a head was very over priced for buffet dinner. Sensai the a la carte restaurant was nice but pretty average considering  the hotels supposed 5 star rating. Due to the baby one night we decided to stay in and order room service for dinner and food was bland and took over half an hour to get through just to order. My husband also complained his back hurt and after inspection we noted the mattress was very passed its sell by date. This Coupled with a general air of not caring about guest experience by the staff (except for the cascades pool bar staff here and manager was great) I could at best say this hotel was 4star and would not reccomend it. The shuttle service to vilamoura was also badly organised.

pros: spa was good room was comfortable. cons: awful customer service! all beds reserved at the pool not 5* at all! couldn’t ever get a table to eat breakfast outside on any day of our stay no staff to take luggage for us no greeting at reception no information givin about the hotel on arrival and for a 5* resort all pool beds reserved in the mornings but with no one on them! pool area is decking which our children burnt there feet on! very poor experience.
pros: Breakfast was great clean rooms and staff was nice cons: Very old infrastructure not best maintenance anantara usually does much better worldwide

pros: Room was great cons: Location was not that central. Had to take the shuttle for everything. One of our family members decided to extend the stay for a day (from 5 days to 6 days). Reception offered a very high rate for the additional night stating high-season. They did not consider it important that the guest was already spending 5 nights with them!. The person moved to different hotel. The hotel had still unsold rooms when we checked online on booking.com on the planned day of extended stay. The hotel lost revenue. Perhaps front desk staff should be given more freedom to decide on rates especially when a guest is already staying for 5 nights and is spending so much money on the hotel.

pros: Food was good and the staff in the restaurant too. cons: General service was very poor. Reception staff were average (the lady at check in left us to figure out what we do with a sleeping child and 3 pieces of luggage when we checked in at 10pm). WiFi is very poor we had none in our room - we complained and someone came to check. Clearly it was determined it’s too much faff to fix so nothing was done (we stayed a week so this was a real problem). The whole breakfast area is full of flies on the food at the tables it’s quite alarming. The shuttle to the town is a sham too never arrives before 30 mins if it arrives at all! We have stayed at other Anantara properties and their service was impeccable. This property is shambolic in comparison.

pros: location in a very peaceful area cons: the room the lamp shades were broken bed not made well and holes in the bedsheet 
food in Sensai was very ordinary

pros: Nice breakfast and a nice location cons: Room was mediocre and a bit worn out. Overall impression of the hotel is that it’s boring and not what I expect from an Anantara hotel. Swimmingpool area is too small for such a big hotel it was overcrowded. The noise from drunken guests in the middle of the night.
pros: Occasional great service from some staff. cons: Inattentive staff slow and poorly trained.  Over crowded pool areas lack of restaurant offers other than obligatory buffet at 49 Euro head.
pros: Staff very good very helpful food was decent cons: For the money the rooms were poor. Overall the rooms and the room corridors look very tired

pros: The room was nice and we were able to be put on the adult pool side as it’s quieter. cons: Heat the adults pool as well as main one more of the comfy sun beds (these had towels on them from early!) Better and less expensive poolside drinks and food!!

pros: staff very clean and rooms. views were also good and loved Emo for a one of taster menu. cons: arrived after being stranded due to flight situation. I was exhausted and pregnant and the two people on reception didn’t even offer us a glass of water….buffet food was average for dinner wasn’t much of an atmosphere in comp. to other hotels. music ambiance etc
pros: nice and helpful staff cons: rooms were not clean despite our complaint

pros: View from our room
Miguel at the pool bar was a superstar and made our stay more enjoyable cons: Business event was on for 2.5 days in the hotel and these guests were prioritized over those holidaying
Furniture in our room was tired with paint peeling off the outside sofa bed and the indoor coffee table
The hotel has lost that exclusive / luxurious feel

pros: --loved the breakfast
--overall silence
--the hotel has a lot of attention to detail the interior design looks partly amazing cons: --we expected more form the restaurants for dinner (we just tried once and ate outside for the rest)
--in the kids club (for the most part of our stay) children were left to their own devices without supervision
--the two pools were very tiny...it was OK if few people are around yet it gets crowdy quickly
--the pricing for drinks etc. was surprisingly high 
--the hotel only ordered their preferred cabs with a mark-up on top...everything felt as if there was a mark-up

pros: Beautiful rooms very comfy beds and kind staff. cons: It did not feel like an Anantara hotel it felt like it had the potential to be a luxurious hotel but missed the mark was missed on occasions when it came to details and options. Also it could’ve been the time of the year we went over Easter but the lack of food options (a number of restaurants were closed) and no supermarkets in the area meant you’re stuck with either a 50 euros pp buffet or a fine dining restaurant every day - we ended up ordering room service a few tables as it was the only affordable option which I rarely do in a hotel.
pros:  cons: we have stayed at Anantara resorts in Asia and they are amazing. This hotel was such a disappointment in comparison.

pros: The staff were super helpful they couldn’t do enough to help they were really nice with the exception of one individual who was rude and actually threw an item when I asked for pepper. The free shuttle to the marina was great (and required as the property is in the middle of nowhere). The main lobby is nice but not consistent with that of a 5 star hotel. cons: The hotel is worn walls are all scraped carpets are dirty and the building itself resembles a public building - town hall / school building. Having stayed in many hotels in the Algarve I was disappointed this is absolutely not a 5 star hotel; 4 star at best and that is being generous. If you are looking for luxury this isn’t it.

pros: clean and friendly cons: evening dining was very restricted. EMO is a high quality and expensive restaurant but it was hard to get a reservation most nights. For hotel guests the only other dining option was a bar snack - same as lunch and with no external restaurants in walking distance that was poor choice service.

pros: Location cons: The bath water was just a trickle when brought to the attention of staff there was not a lot of interest shown.
Your toilet paper quality needs to improve.

pros: Staff at breakfast we’re so incredibly polite and helpful. Especially Paulo he was super. 
Beds were comfortable. Nice turndown service and sheets were changed every other day. 
Vitality pool was interesting and their main pool is lovely. 
Shuttle service to the marina is a life saver cons: The hotel was great. Our only disappointment was not being able to use all spa facilities due to covid. Understandable but it didn’t mention that on website when we booked. 
Only other mention is that drinks in the bar are a bit expensive. 26 euros for two standard size gin and tonics. So we ended up going out every night which wasn’t a bad thing.

pros: New and cleanliness. Staff very attentive. cons: Gym - lack of air con and range of equipment. Gym room itself is a good size and has real potential but so much equipment lacking (needs kettlebells sand bags some upper body machines battle ropes).

pros: quiet
excellent staff cons:

pros: interior design  staff cons: the gym could have A/C music and better equipment . open to
an indoor pool on the more windy days. halal no pork options for those that are muslim
pros: The aesthetics and views good staff food & drinks were up to par. cons: Wish we got a good view from our room.

pros: the staff were really helpful and friendly! especially around the pool! The room service was amazing and the food was great! the location was perfect beautiful surroundings and not far from Vilamoura. We hired bikes and the bike trail was lovely. cons:
pros: modern - clean - nice pool area cons: nothing

pros: The staff are amazing  very friendly and professional .

The room service was very quick and the check in was soo quick cons:

pros: spacious rooms. good buffet breakfast cons: property needs to provide a level of service more in line with 5 star level. tennis racquets missing. luggage took more than 2 hours to be Delivered. housekeeping often forgot to deliver items requested.

pros: De tudo em geral: quarto ótimo pequeno almoço muito bom comodidades próprias de um 5 estrelas localização num sítio muito bonito. Gostei de poder alugar bicicletas do carregamento gratuito para carros elétricos. Funcionários do bar botânico espetaculares e restantes muito simpáticos e profissionais. Piscina aquecida toalhas à disposição dos hóspedes sem ser preciso cartões de troca. cons: O jantar buffet deixa muito a desejar: muito caro para o que oferece. Não vale mesmo a pena. Carnes das mais baratas só tinha puré de acompanhamento  nem arroz nem batata para acompanhar o frango. Péssima relação qualidade/preço. Nada condizente com o hotel que é.  Da mesma forma uma tosta mista com uma fatia finíssima de fiambre e outra igual de queijo (parecia ser feita só com pão) custou 15 euros. Preço para turistas ingleses!
pros: pequenno almoço muito bom e com ótimas instalações. cons: O Colchão da cama não satisfez as minhas expectativas
pros: El hotel es increíble habitaciones amplias buen desayuno y también el buffet con todo lo necesario. cons: Se encontraba un poco apartado de los puntos turísticos
pros: Excelente pequeno almoço! cons:

pros: Staff muito atencioso pequeno almoço muito bom tudo bom de uma forma geral cons: Tivemos uma situação desagradável ao pequeno almoço com uma colaboradora. Uso um aparelho invisível que tenho que tirar para comer acontece que ao pequeno almoço tirei e deixei num guardanapo. Por lapso esqueci mas 2 min depois fui buscar quando cheguei fui deparada com um autêntico escândalo por parte de uma staff do restaurante ‘nojo’ ‘eu não limpo isso’ ‘eu não toco nessa placa’. É realmente um constrangimento e nada agradável para quem limpa mas o pequeno almoço estava cheio de gente os demais clientes ouviram e foi uma autêntica vergonha para nós.
F

pros: Sossego pequeno-almoço maravilhoso simpatia dos funcionários em geral. Embora na minha opinião ( e há sou cliente desde 2016) os funcionários da recepção tratam os clientes portugueses de forma diferente. Valorizam muito mais os clientes estrangeiros. Lamento profundamente. Porque depois todo o Staff é de uma simpatia extrema.
Também gostaria de realçar que se notou do ano para para este ano  uma melhoria acentuada na generalidade dos serviços e na manutenção do Hotel . cons: O Hotel é incapaz de fazer um agrado a um cliente mesmo que esse cliente seja um cliente frequente. Pedimos para deixar o quarto um pouco mais tarde e a desculpa é sempre a MESMA (todos os anos) o seu quarto já tem um cliente para entrar. Mas caso pretendesse reservar mais uma noite aí já podia ficar com o mesmo quarto . Lamentável. Direção comercial deveria começar a dar mais atenção aos clientes frequentes Portugueses e não só aos estrangeiros.

pros: A simpatia e amabilidade de todos os funcionários a qualidade do serviço e das infra-estruturas. O quarto estava imaculadamente limpo e os lençóis eram espetaculares.
Tanto a zona da piscina como as áreas do hotel estavam muito bem cuidadas com elevada atenção ao detalhe. Não conhecíamos e ficamos muito fãs da cadeia Anantara! cons:

pros: Espaços de lazer a calmaria cons: O chá da casa de banho escorregadio por várias vezes tive deslizamentos que quase me levavam a uma queda. Isto è o chão não è anti-derrapante com o mínimo de água depois do banho ou mesmo pingos da torneira do lavatório se põe uma situação de perigo
pros: A piscina excelente  o colchão é mesmo muito bom cons: A música junto á piscina era muito alta e maçadora

pros: Do conforto da cama e travesseiros. cons: Já estive em outro Anantara ( Maldivas) o café da manhã no Vilamoura é ótimo mas o de Maldivas era espetacular. Não ter praia próxima. ( que possa ir a pé)

pros: Funcionários muito atenciosos cons: Sendo uma viagem em família e um hotel com tantas facilidades e qualificado com 5* não se compreende que o acesso ao spa seja pago nem que não seja permitido o acesso à piscina interior a crianças em qualquer horário.
pros:  cons: O acesso ao parque de estacionamento ter que ser feito pelo exterior do hotel
pros: O quarto espaçoso e bem decorado cons: Localização do quarto na ala kids friendly. Muito longe da zona central/principal (receção restaurantes piscina principal )

pros: Toda a forma como fomos tratados foi esplêndida. cons: A gorjeta de 75% do valor total não é opcional apesar de estar escrito em todo o lado que o é. Eu por norma deixo gorjeta tanto por boa educação como por consideração pelos empregados e serviço prestado. No entanto  gosto de escolher quando e quanto dou. Em jeito de brincadeira por duas vezes questionei os empregados relativamente a dos dois valores apresentados qual tinha que pagar. Em todas as situações me foi cobrada a quantia total. Inclusivamente numa das situações apresentei o valor em numerário sem a gorjeta (alegadamente opcional) sendo que o empregado me pediu o restante.
Não gostando de me sentir forçado a entregar gorjeta por vezes em valores injustificados para os pedidos optei por não consumir tanto no hotel como gostaria.
pros: Da piscina cons:

pros: Piscina maravilhosa quarto muito confortável variedade do pequeno almoço excepcional. cons: Gostaria que tivéssemos sabido que os campos de golfe em frente à piscina estavam em manutenção. Não impacta nem incomoda de todo a estadia está apenas pontualmente menos bonito daí que o aviso talvez tivesse balizado melhor a expectativa.

pros: Havia uma piscina para adultos que fez toda a diferença. Café da manhã excelente com funcinários muito prestativos e atenciosos. Academia simples porém funcional. Quarto muito confortável amenities ótimos. cons:

pros: O pequeno almoço era fantástico e os funcionários foram todos excepcionais. Obrigada por nos proporcionarem uns dias de descanso fantásticos. cons: Nada a apontar.

pros: Os quartos estavam impecáveis as camas muito confortáveis a comida excelente. cons: Para utilizar o spa é preciso pagar um valor extra na receção disseram nos que ao pagarmos esse valor podíamos utilizar o spa o dia inteiro no spa foi nos dito que apenas o podíamos utilizar 2h. Para um spa que tivemos de pagar extra para utilizar penso que poderia ser mais completo por exemplo ter um jacuzzi e achámos a água da piscina fria.

pros: Da simpatia dos funcionários do fantástico quarto do fabuloso pequeno almoço dos vários espaços comuns. cons: Não me agradou de todo o fato de já constar na despesa a gratificação com uma percentagem definida de 2.5% considero que cada cliente deve oferecer ou não o valor que entendem.

pros: O hotel tem um quarto muito confortável e instalações boas e bonitas  academia boa para treino de perna café da manhã bom também  o bar excelente  . cons: Achei que apesar dos funcionários serem educados  estavam um pouco perdidos sempre diziam que não sabiam informar pq eram novos um jogavam para os outros  o quarto esqueceram a toalha Deppois colocaram uma lascada e com furo. Nossa fechadura estava com defeito  tivemos que voltar na recepção algumas vezes mas era problema do sensor e não do cartão. Outra coisa usei o serviço de concierge para reservar uma lancha e pedi mais sugestões  ele me passou cartões e perguntou o que queria  eu não sabia dizer queria mesmo ideias  achei ele indiferente e frio não passa acolhimento e tentou fazer uma programação para  nós! Pegamos nossas dicas com os marinheiros e outras pessoas por boca a boca  fomos jantar no hotel W e os funcionários deram várias.

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText:
pros: ### A Memorable Stay at Bella Vista

Bella Vista is truly a remarkable property offering a blend of beauty and comfort. Here are some highlights from my experience:

- **Accommodations**: The main building features stunning rooms with a captivating color palette and views of the sea. The ambiance is simply breathtaking. While the next building has more standard rooms the service remains excellent.

- **Service**: The staff were attentive and genuinely concerned about my well-being regarding my lower back issue. Their efforts made a significant difference during my stay.

- **Dining**: The food at Bella Vista is exceptional with a Michelin star to its name. Each meal was a delightful experience showcasing culinary excellence.

- **Overall Impression**: Despite some minor concerns about pricing the overall experience was unforgettable. Bella Vista is a place I would love to revisit thanks to its wow factor and the warmth of its team.

In summary Bella Vista is a destination that combines stunning views excellent service and remarkable dining making it a must-visit for anyone seeking a memorable getaway. cons: Staff hesitated too much for some extra ..

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: The hotel was super quirky. Beautiful building swimming pool and views to the beach and sea. We loved our room and breakfast served in the room. All the staff super friendly and helpful. cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: It’s in a beautiful setting with incredible views of the ocean and surrounding beaches. The building interior design is thoughtfully curated and gives you a sense of peace tranquility and tasteful luxury. The hotel never feels crowded and above all the staff’s attention to detail and general quality of service is unrivalled! It was a truly magical experience in every aspect of the stay cons: Nothing. Absolutely nothing! Everything was perfect

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText:
pros: Bela Vista is truly a gem. There's nothing not to love here. It took us a little under 3 hours to get there from Lisbon airport which was a breeze. The rooms were a decent size but the view was absolutely stunning. There really isn't much reason to leave the hotel and here's why.

On the first night we dined at the Michelin-starred restaurant which was an experience in itself. Don't be discouraged by the serving sizes—trust me you'll be full by the end of the meal. We chose the wine pairing from Portugal which was amazing. Each dish was sensational.

On the second day we decided to rent a boat with Thalassa Yachts on the recommendation of the hotel concierge. We were not disappointed. We spent $700 on a stunning beautiful yacht for a half-day complete with wine and cheese! Highly recommend this—it is very much worth it. We heard that further down the coast the pricing was three times this.

For dinner on the third day we tried to get into Reis de Praias Restaurant also known as King of the Beach but we couldn’t get a reservation. It's important to book early as the view here is stunning and it seems you can spend the day there. We ended up at Ferragudo Terrace which was excellent!

We also wanted a high-end luxury nightclub experience for adults 30+ so we recommend YOU which was about a 45-minute drive but worth it. They had some very well-known DJs and an elevated crowd.

Last but not least the food at Bela Vista's pool and dining (not Michelin) was delightful. We loved the codfish cakes—they were so good that we ordered them everywhere else we went but none compared to Bela Vista's. For dinner the sea bass in salt crust was outstanding.

That's all I have for this amazing trip! cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: The premium location and the unusual historic building itself are the strong points. These features seemed to be the main selling points rather than what one might otherwise expect in a luxury hotel at this price point. The staff were great and couldn’t have been more helpful. We loved the buffet breakfast offering served in a dining room with spectacular ocean views. Ask for the scrumptious eggs Benedict option! The evening Bistro dining options are delicious if somewhat on the pricey side. cons: We didn’t like that the main dinner option was a 2 star Michelin offering with very expensive tasting only menus and no a la carte - no meat and no choice for the diner. Our upgraded room was quite small with very limited storage for a one week stay. We had to ask them to take away some of the bedding and decorative items to create a little extra space and comfort.

reviewText: pros: My room was a good size bright and airy. The bed was incredibly comfortable. I ate dinner at Vista (their Michelin starred restaurant) which was amazing. The staff were extremely attentive in Vista and the food was outstanding. The pool is well maintained. It is quiet with a good service for food and drinks available all day. The breakfast was also good. cons: There were 3 occasions when I ordered something from the bar/cafe by the pool and the order was completely forgotten. I had to ask again for my order. I booked a 90 minute massage and 90 facial in the spa. The massage was lovely but the facial was very rough and completely undid the relaxation I had experienced in the massage. The hotel is situated in the centre of town on the main road. The nightclubs and bars are still going at 4am so you will hear this from your room.

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: We stayed for six nights in the middle of March and were lucky with good weather it just rained for a few hours on our second last day. Breakfast was delicious. The spa was excellent. We had the couples massage and it was the best massage we both had for a long time. The Michelin star restaurant was a once in a lifetime experience. The food was exceptional and the service also exceptional. It was interesting to see the kitchen and wine cellar beforehand. Nice touch of head chef Joao to present one of the dishes to us at our table. The cocktails at the bar were fantastic prepared by Paolo. The food in the more casual restaurant was excellent also. On the hottest day it was lovely to lay out beside the outdoor pool. There was a short walk to the beach. The beach is beautiful for walks and very refreshing to swim in also. The hotel is gated and accessed with keycard only so we felt safe at all times. We were on our honeymoon (postponed from 2019) and there were some nice touches like a bottle of champagne in our room along with strawberries and some treats.  As kids under 12 are not allowed it helps to make the hotel quieter and more relaxing. Close by we really enjoyed Restaurant F which is a blue and white quiet restaurant upstairs off the main street. Our sheets were changed every morning and there was a turn down service every evening. We would definitely stay in the hotel again and we look forward to it. cons: Just a note for next time not a complaint. We rented a car and drove to the hotel. In hindsight everything is in the town Praia da Rocha. There is a decent shop a few yards from the hotel along with lots of restaurants and bars and a pharmacy a short walk away. So we could have gotten a shuttle organised by the hotel or an Uber or taxi from Faro airport and avoided the €15 a day charge for parking in the hotel.

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: the property was stunning.  It was right on the beach.  the bar and dining was wonderful.  the staff was extremely attentive. cons: N/A

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: The hotel’s historic building beautifully captures the essence of its era while seamlessly blending modern luxury elements. The interior design is clearly the result of thoughtful curation with every corner showcasing meticulous attention to detail and a refined aesthetic. The Occitane spa offered unique treatments including a particularly effective one aimed at resetting sleep which we really enjoyed. The pool area was stunning complemented by well-curated music and excellent drinks making it a highlight of our stay. cons: While the hotel is beautifully designed several aspects left much to be desired. The location though central resulted in a crowded beach view marred by ongoing construction and a lot of noise. The hotel lacks its own setup on the beach with dedicated beds or amenities - this could be a great addition to enjoy more than just an ocean view. The staff while well-trained often came across as insincere which affected the overall atmosphere. Additionally the small room size and difficulty securing reservations at their Michelin-starred restaurant—even with weeks of waitlist and being guests of the hotel—added to the frustration. Unfortunately our experience was further compromised by severe food poisoning at the pool restaurant which was handled with minimal concern as we were merely directed to a nearby pharmacy and still charged in full. Dietary preferences were also overlooked as my breakfast included pork despite explicitly informing the staff that I do not eat that on arrival (this was quickly corrected but we expected more from the 5* boutique facility). The concierge’s recommendations were similarly disappointing; we were told there were no quieter beaches nearby only to discover one 20 minutes away ourselves. Altogether these issues compounded into a less-than-ideal experience and with some attention to detail and genuine hospitality these could be addressed to better serve future guests.

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux

reviewText: pros: Nice staff luxury main building good spa cons: Huge deception arriving to Bela Vista &Spa placed on a very noisy street surrounded by high and ugly buildings. Most of the rooms are not in the luxury main building but in two others  far of 5* confort. The ocean view is affected by beach restaurats and their toilets. Nothing of this is suggested by well chosen words of description artistic photos or smart association with trusted brands like Michelin Occitane or Relais&Chateaux. The reality is different of what marketing strategy makes you believe  for a price almost double comparing with the closest 5*hotel.

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText:
pros: After a roadtrip around Portugal (north countryside and south) and staying at multiple different places including many high end hotels Bela Vista was unfortunately quite a disappointment. The only positive thing I can say is that the breakfast was nice and so is the ocean view from the outside area (not from the room). Also the hotel has a gym which is helpful if you want to get a workout done during your stay. Yet none of these things would be reason enough to ever return or recommend this place to someone as I know enough other places with amazing views great breakfasts and gym facilities. cons: 1) The place is not as idyllic as the pictures show. The inside of the main building is nice but not very well illuminated. There are 3 buildings in total and you might not stay in the main building if you book a room - which is already a step down in quality and feel of your vacation. In addition the hotel location is awful and in the moment you step out of the hotel you’re faced with multiple souvenir shops and low end small restaurants which are completely in disharmony with the „luxurious“ experience the hotel is trying to sell. The pool area is also faced to the city so even in your moment of relaxation you cannot escape the skyscrapers and busyness of the outside of the hotel. Of course this is nothing the hotel can do anything against but I think it is important to consider before choosing your destination in the Algarve.
2) Overall NOT good value for money - paid a lot for ocean view and I got a very small room where I could not place my luggage on the floor and walk in the room at the same time. The room was also in a side building (not the main building you see in the pictures) and my ocean view was a small window (not even 1m wide) view to a parking lot with the ocean behind it. The shower did not have appropriate heating and the decoration of the room seemed not very sophisticated and rather childlike (nautical theme).
3) In our first evening we were not able to get a reservation in the hotel restaurant. We then we asked if we could order room service and eat in the inside restaurant or outside by the pool - or whichever place that could be outside of our room so we would not have to eat inside in the first night in the hotel but the staff was not flexible nor helpful. So we had to have room service in our first night stay which is simply unacceptable at such a high end place.
4)In the second night we were finally able to get a reservation at the bistro restaurant and I have no words.

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: The spa manager was very kind and welcoming cons: Service overall compared to room pricing was very mediocre. Way too expensive for what you get. Service at the restaurant very slow breakfast box to the standard of a 3 star.

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Beautiful cons: Loved everything

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: quiet when inside hotel grounds luxury and had character . cons: disco next door

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: cafe da manhã perfeito restaurante vista excepcional pisicna perfeita e localização otima. cons: so quarto que achei barulhento.

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Pequeno almoço incrível spa maravilhoso e equipa super disponível e acolhedora! Uma experiência inacreditável! Mesmo com o tempo menos bom é um hotel onde se aproveita cada momento! cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Funcionários prestativos cons: Virou ponto de encontro muito movimentado de pessoas não hospedadas.

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Um pequeno palácio com uma decoração singular. Excelente localização com uma vista maravilhosa. O pequeno almoço é fantástico e a simpatia dos colaboradores também. Adorei! cons: Nada

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText:
pros: Hotel lindo decoração fantástica ambientes muito simpaticos para desfrutar mesmo numa estadia curta! A vista despojada sobre a extensa praia da Rocha os jardins muito bem cuidados oferecem um ambiente único.
O staff é muito simpático e atencioso faz-nos sentir especiais!
A oferta gastronómica a cargo do chef João Oliveira é top e tem uma carta de vinhos espetacular! 
Não foi a primeira vez e definitivamente não será a ultima!! cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText:
pros: Voltamos ao hotel Bela Vista porque adoramos a hotelaria de excelência localização em cima da praia e a sofisticada decoração. 
Jantamos no magnífico Vista onde o menu proposto pelo estrelado chef João Oliveira superou as nossas expectativas e o almoço no Bistrô também foi delicioso. cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Da excelência no geral e nos pequenos pormenores. Da simpatia do staff e da decoração sempre surpreendente! Vista e Bistrô irrepreensíveis! Spa fabuloso! cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Comodidade e bom gosto em todo o espaço do hotel! Fantástico pequeno-almoço! Quarto muito bem decorado e confortável. Staff competente e simpático. Os jardins e piscina lindíssimos! cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Achei que é um hotel extraordinário fora de série e que me surpreendeu em todos os detalhes desde o pequeno almoço ao serviço aos quartos a decoração e a atenção dos funcionários. Também adorei o restaurante bistrô by vista!!! Incrível !!! cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText:
pros: Tudo perfeito. Super confortável e decoração extraordinária 
Talvez o melhor jantar que já tive com um serviço impecável cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText:
pros: A experiência no Hotel Belavista superou as minhas expectativas em diversos aspectos.
A decoração de todo o hotel o conforto do quarto a eficiência do serviço a simpatia dos colaboradores e principalmente a qualidade das refeições de destacar o restaurante Vista sem esquecer o delicioso pequeno almoço no terraço e o almoço no Bistrô. 
Experiência para repetir!! cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: MINHA  FILHA   ENCONTROU  COM  AMIGOS  E FICOU  MUITO SATISFEITA  COM  TUDO E COM  TODOS  NO  HOTEL   FICOU  ENCANTADA  COM O ATENDIMENTO cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: É difícildizer oque mais gostei porque desde o confortodecoraçãosimpatia do atendimento a piscina….mas atrevo-me a selecionar o restaurante merecedor de pelo menosmais uma estrela. cons: Nada

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Óptimo pequeno almoço. Destaco o pão feito no hotel uma perdição!!! cons: Na verdade o que podia ser melhor??? Não encontro qualquer falha!!!

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText:
pros: de acordo com a qualidade do hotel
O acesso ao hotel é terrivel pois temos que passar por uma única rua pedonal e e muito incomodo cons: o quarto

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: localização e pequeno almoço cons: preço

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Es un gran espacio para relajarse y disfrutar cons: El servicio de restaurante es limitado y hay que reservar con lo cual dificulta la planificación es increíble que en un hotel de estas características tenga que planificar con tiempo las comidas y cenas

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText:
pros: funcionários nota 1000 Bruna e Igor especialmente cons: banheiro muito pequeno do apto 301 fica todo
molhado e isso gera desconforto.

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText:
pros: Talvez o melhor pequeno almoço que me lembro de usufruir
Qualidade  simpatia vista
Oferta variada e de grande qualidade cons: Dificilmente poderia ser melhor
Dificuldade em sugerir pontos negarivos

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Hotel fabuloso bom gosto e funcionários fantásticos! Fui em trabalho mas consegui encontrar o local perfeito para descansar nas horas livres: um autêntico paraíso de tranquilidade e requinte! cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Serviço e localização fantásticos! Vista para a Praia da Rocha privilegiada. Excelente pequeno-almoço com grande variedade de produtos frescos. Quarto muito bem limpo com uma decoração requintada. Recomendo muito os tratamentos no Spa. cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Un oasis en mitad del bullicio. Vistas increíbles y trato muy amable. Sin duda repetiremos. cons: El spa es con cita cerrada y con coste. Un día que llovió con tormenta y no podíamos estar en la piscina o la playa no pudimos acceder al spa por tener todas las citas ocupadas. Deberían plantearse dejar una zona del spa de entrada libre a los huéspedes sin coste adicional.

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Tudo cons: Nada

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: acogedorcuidado hasta el ultimo detalle. cons: me gusto todo absolutamente.

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText: pros: Localização fantástica em cima da praia; serviço de excelência e pequeno-almoço  de óptima qualidade e com muita variedade. Restaurante Bistrô by Vista também com extraordinária qualidade Foram dias de sonho! cons:

hotelName: Bela Vista Hotel & Spa - Relais & Chateaux
reviewText:

Pequeno-almoço 
Área da piscina
Acima de tudo o atendimento por parte de todos os funcionários muito simpáticos sempre atentos e disponíveis cons: Nada

reviewText: pros: es simplemente impresionante cons: todo es perfecto
